Imunu wowose iyobama kuukombola ughima wake, katsowaghitsa, lekeni munu wowose iyowaghitsa ughima kwaajili yangu katsowona.
Apfi imunu katsobweda choni ang'apata isi yose, lekeni kowaghitsa ughima wake? Au imunu katsolapfa choni yapate keli ughima wake?
Kwaapfila Imwana we Imunu katsakutsa mne utunitso wa Aba wake hamwe ne malaika wake, kuya katsomghweka chila imunu kwa achila chayatendile.
Nowalongelani ghendo, iwanu wangi iwemile hano, ng'awatsokufa bae mbaka wamwone Imwana we Imunu kakutsa mne undewa wake.”
Haghabitile matsuwa sita, Yesu kamsola Petiri, Jakobu na Yohane ndughu yake Jakobu, kaghenda nawo waliyeka mchidando mwe chidunda chitali.
Hawang'ali wolola, bahala Yesu kaghaluka. Chihanga chake tsaching'ala ka litsua, na ghamaghwanda ghake ghawa matselu chwee ka ghumwanga!
Kuya Musa na Eliya walawila, walonga naye.
Petiri kamlongela Yesu, “Mndewa, pfinogha twetwe kukala hano! Ung'abama nene nitsosenga pfibumbulika pfidatu, chimwe chako, chimwe cha Musa na chimwe cha Eliya.”
Hayang'ali yolonga, libingu iling'alile liwaghubika, na litsi kulawa mne libingu lila lilonga, “Ayuno Mwanangu iyoninoghela, nonoghelighwa naye. Mumtegheletse!”
Iwanang'ina hawahulike apfo, wapfuka ng'ani, watowa maghoti wenama mbaka pfihanga pfawo pfidonza hasi.
Yesu kawaghendela kawaghutsa, kawalongela, “Mwinuke, mleke kupfuka!”
Hawalolile kuchanya, ng'awonile imunu bae ila Yesu yaliheka.
Hawang'ali wohulumka mchidando, Yesu kawalaghitsa, “Mleke kumlongela imunu wowose achila chamwonile mbaka Imwana we Imunu hayatsotsilihuka.”
Kuya iwanang'ina wamghutsa, “Lelo ule iwalangulitsi wa Ghamalaghitso wolonga Eliya kobamighwa tanu yatse?”
Yesu kawedika, “Tanu Eliya kakutsa ghendo. Naye katsokwika ghoya ipfinu pfose.
Nowalongelani, Eliya ma katsa, ila ng'awamtangile bae. Nawo wamtendela ghose ghawabamile. Pfipfila watsomdununza Imwana we Imunu.”
Kuya iwanang'ina tsawamanya ka Yesu yang'ali yowalongela mbuli tsa Yohane Mbatitsa.
Hawapfikile mne mtingano we iwanu, imunu yumwe kamghendela Yesu, kamtowela ghamaghoti,
kalonga, “Imtwatsa, umwonele libatsi mwanangu, kana chisala na kodununzighwa ng'ani. Kwaapfila kakughwagha mne ghumoto au mne ghamatsi.
Nimghala kuna iwanang'ina wako, lekeni ng'awadahile bae kumhonetsa.”
Yesu kedika, “Mwemwe mweleko ing'aghutoghola, na ighwihile! Nitsokala na mwemwe mbaka tsuwachi? Nitsowadudumila mwemwe mbaka tsuwachi? Mngalile hano imsongolo ayo!”
Yesu kamkembela chinyamkela, na chinyamkela kamlawa imsongolo ayo. Bahala imsongolo ayo kahona.
Kuya iwanang'ina wamghendela Yesu chinyelenyele, wamghutsa, “Ule ng'atudahile bae kumlapfa chinyamkela yula?”
Yesu kawedika, “Kwaapfila mwotoghola chidogho. Nowalongelani ghendo, ka ukutoghola kwenu kung'awile kudodo ka imbeghu ya haladali, mng'adahile kuchilongela chidunda chino, ‘Ulawe hano, ughende kula,’ nacho ching'aghendile. Wala ng'akutsokuwa ne ichinu chochose ing'achidahika kuna mwemwe.”
Lekeni ichinyamkela ka yuno ng'odaha bae kulawa kwa inzila yoyose, ila kwa ukulomba na ukufunga ukuja.
Iwanang'ina wose hawapfikile Galilaya, Yesu kawalongela, “Imwana we Imunu katsoghoghighwa ne iwanu,
nawo watsomkoma, ila mne litsuwa lya kadatu katsotsilihuka.” Iwanang'ina wake wona usungu sideke.
Yesu ne iwanang'ina wake hawapfikile Kaperinaumu, iwasola kodi ye ing'anda ye Imulungu wamghendela Petiri wamghutsa, “Apfi imlangulitsi wako koliha kodi ye ing'anda ye Imulungu?”
Petiri kawedika, “Ona.” Petiri hayengile mng'anda, Yesu kandusa kulonga, “Simoni ukonatse? Iwandewa we isi wosola kodi au maliho kwe iwanu wachi, kwe iwana wawo au kwe iwahenza?”
Petiri kamwidika, “Kwe iwahenza.” Yesu kedika, “Pfinogha, apfo iwanu wawo ng'awobamighwa kuliha bae.
Lekeni, ng'atubama bae kuwadesa iwanu wano, ghenda kune tsimbu, wase ludodi lwako. Umsole isomba yula yulongole kumlowa, umwasame mlomo ghwake kuya kutsakona isendi. Isole ukaweng'e kwaajili ya kodi yangu na yako.”
Bahala iwanang'ina wamghendela Yesu, wamghutsa, “Yuhi iyali mkulu mne undewa wa kulanga?”
Yesu kamkema imwana mdodo, kamwika haghati hawo.
Kawalongela, “Nowalongelani ghendo, ka ng'amghaluka bae na kwighala ne iwana wadodo, ng'amtsakwingila mbe mne undewa wa kulanga.
Apfo imunu wowose yehulumsa mwenyegho ka imwana yuno, hayo iyo imkulu mne undewa wa kulanga.
Na imunu wowose iyombokela imwana mdodo ka yuno kwa taghwa lyangu, ayo kombokela nene.
“Lekeni imunu wowose yomhonza yumwe we iwana wano iwonitoghola nene yatende nzambi, ng'apfu yohighwe libwe lya kusaghila msingo na yasighwe mwibahali mne ghamatsi ighaghendese.
Iisi yose itsoghaya kwaajili ya aghala ighowahonza iwanu waghitse ukutoghola kwawo! Agho ghatsolawila, lekeni katsoghaya imunu yula iyoghatenda ghalawile!
“Ka ghumoko ghwako au mghulu ghwako ghwokuhonza utende ghehile, ughane ughwase kutali naghwe. Ng'apfu wingile mne ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose aku kuhungukighwa na ghumoko au mghulu, kubita ukwasighwa mne ghumoto ghwa ghamatsuwa ghose aku kuna ghamoko meli na maghulu ghako meli.
Inenge yako ing'akuhonza utende ghehile, uing'ole uyase kutali naghwe! Ng'apfu wingile mne ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose aku kuna inenge imwe kubita kwasighwa mne ghumoto aku kuna nenge mbili.
“Mwalangitse mleke kumbetsa yumwe we iwana wano wadodo. Kwaapfila, nowalongelani wamalaika wawo ako kulanga ghamatsuwa ghose wa hambele ha Aba wangu iyali kulanga.
Kwaapfila Imwana we Imunu katsa kuwakombola awala iwaghile.
“Mkonatse? Ka imunu kana iwang'olo mia imwe, kuya yumwe kagha, apfi ng'atsowaleka bae awala tisini na tisa kulughongo na kughenda kumbama ayula iyaghile?
Nowalongelani ghendo, ang'amwona, katsomdeng'elela ng'ani kubita awala tisini na tisa yang'awaghile.
Pfipfila Aba wenu iyali kulanga ng'obama bae yumwe we iwadodo wano yaghe.
“Ndughu yako ang'akutendela ghehile, ughende ukamkanye totso lyake, ghweghwe na yeye mliyeka. Ang'akutegheletsa, katsakuwa ndughu yako keli.
Lekeni ang'alema kukutegheletsa, umsole imunu yumwe au weli hamwe naghwe, ili ‘kwa iwakalangama weli au wadatu ghomba lilamlighwe,’ ka Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka pfagholonga.
Ang'alema kuwategheletsa ulilongele kanisa, na ka kolema kuwategheletsa iwanu we Imulungu, kuna ghweghwe mleke yawe ka imunu ing'ammanyile Imulungu au imsola kodi.
“Nowalongelani ghendo, ghoghose ghamuhinda muisi ghatsohindighwa kulanga, na ghoghose ghampfughula muisi, ghatsopfughulighwa kulanga.
“Nowalongelani keli, ka weli wenu wetoghola muisi kulomba ichinu chochose, Aba wangu iyali kulanga katsowatendela.
Kwaapfila hanu hohose hawetingana iwanu weli au wadatu kwa taghwa lyangu, Nene nahamwe nawo.”
Kuya Petiri kamghendela Yesu, kamghutsa, “Imtwatsa, apfi ndughu yangu ang'anitendela ghamatotso, nitsomlekelela mala ngapi? Hata mala saba?”
Yesu kamwidika, “Nokulongela si mala saba bae, ila saba mala sabini,
kwaapfila undewa we Imulungu weghala na Imndewa yumwe iyabamile kukaghula tsisendi tsake tsawalinatso iwatumwa wake.
Hayanduse kupeta, kaghalighwa imunu yumwe iyang'ali yomdahi sendi milioni nyingi.
Naye kwaapfila tsakahela chinu che ukuliha, imndewa kalaghitsa yahutsighwe, yeye, mwehe wake ne iwanaghe na pfose pfayalinapfo, ili yalihe deni.
Apfo imtumwa ayo katowa ghamaghoti hambele hake, kalonga, ‘Unidudumile, nitsokuliha chila chinu.’
Imndewa yula kamwonela libatsi, kamleghusila deni lila, kamleka yoke.
“Lekeni imunu ayo koka, kuya ketingana ne imtumwa miyaghe iyang'ali yomdahi sendi chidogho. Kamghogha kamkinda halumelo. Kalonga, ‘Unilihe sendi tsangu!’
Imtumwa miyaghe kamtowela ghamaghoti, kamlomba, ‘Unidudumile, nitsokuliha.’
Lekeni yeye kalema, kaghenda kumwika miyaghe mchifungo, mbaka hayatsoliha deni lila.
Iwatumwa wangi hawonile achila ichilawile, wasing'inika sideke, waghenda kumlongela imndewa chila chinu ichilawile.
Kuya imndewa kamkema mng'anda imtumwa ayo, kamlongela, ‘Ghweghwe imtumwa wihile. Nikuleghusila deni lyose kwaapfila tsakunilomba nitende apfo.
Tsakubamighwa umwonele libatsi imtumwa miyagho ka nene pfanikwonele libatsi.’
Apfo imndewa ayo kona maya sideke, kamwika mchifungo yadununzighwe mbaka hayatsoliha deni lyose.”
Kuya Yesu kaghendelela kulonga, “Apfi pfifo Aba wangu iyali kulanga pfayatsowatendelani mng'aleka kuwaleghusila wandughu tsenu ghamatotso ghawo kulawa mne mimoyo yenu.”
Yesu hayamalitse kulonga mbuli atso, kalawa isi ya Galilaya kaghenda mne isi ya Yudeya, kumwambu kwe ghumto Yoridani.
Iwanu wengi wamuwinza, naye kawahonetsa.
Mafarisayo wangi wamghendela Yesu wamghetse. Wamghutsa, “Angu pfinogha immale kumleka mwehe wake kwa totso lyolyose?”
Yesu kawedika, “Ng'amsomile bae mne Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka, ka kulawa mwanduso Imulungu tsakalumba immale ne ipinga?
Apfo Imulungu kalonga, ‘Kwa ichinu chino, mmale katsomleka aba wake na mai wake, katselunga na mwehe wake, nawo weli watsokuwa lukuli lumwe?’
Apfo si weli keli, ila lukuli lumwe. Apfo chayalungile Imulungu, imunu yaleke kuchibaghula.”
Mafarisayo wamghutsa, “Ebali lelo Musa tsakalaghitsa immale yamwing'e mwehe wake talaka na kumleka?”
Yesu kawedika, “Musa tsakawalekelela muwaleke wehe tsenu kwaapfila imimoyo yenu mikomu. Lekeni ng'aiwile pfino bae kulawa mwanduso.
Nowalongelani, imunu wowose iyomleka mwehe wake, ila kwa ughoni, na ukukwela ipinga yungi, ayo kotenda ughoni.”
Iwanang'ina wake wamlongela, “Ka apfo pfipfo pfaili kwe immale na mwehe wake. Ng'apfu kuleka ukukwelela.”
Yesu kawedika, “Si chila imunu bae iyodaha kuitoghola mbuli ino, ila awala iweng'ighwe ne Imulungu.
Kuna ipfinu pfingi ipfiwatenda iwamale waleke kukwela, kwaapfila wamwenga welekighwa pfipfo, na wamwenga watendighwa apfo ne iwanu. Wamwenga ng'awokwela bae kwaajili ye undewa wa kulanga. Imunu iyodaha kuitoghola imbuli ino, leka yaitoghole.”
Kuya iwanu wangi wamghalila Yesu iwana wadowado awekile ghamoko na kuwalombela, lekeni iwanang'ina wake wawakembela iwanu awo iwawaghalile iwana.
Yesu kalonga, “Muwaleke iwana wadowado watse kuna nene, mleke kuwaghoma kwaapfila undewa wa kulanga wa iwanu iwali ka iwana wano.”
Kawekila ghamoko, kuya koka hanu aho.
Imunu yumwe kamghendela Yesu kamghutsa, “Mlangulitsi, angu nende choni chinoghile ili niubokele ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose?”
Yesu kamwidika, “Ebali kwonighutsa imbuli ye ichinu chinoghile? Hana yumwe yaliyeka iyanoghile. Ung'abama kwingila mne ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose, ughakinde ghamalaghitso ghe Imulungu.”
Imunu yula kamghutsa, “Ghamalaghitso ghachi?” Yesu kamwidika, “Aghano, uleke kukoma, uleke ughoni, uleke ubapfi na uleke kulonga ughutsu,
uwategheletse aba wako na mai wako, umnoghele miyagho ka pfawinoghela ghumwenyegho.”
Imsongolo yula kamlongela, “Agha ghose nighakinda. Lelo nitende choni keli?”
Yesu kamwidika, “Ung'abama kuwa imunu yatimilike, ughende ukautse ipfinu pfako pfose, uweng'e tsisendi iwahingwa, naghwe kutsakuwa na hatsina kulanga. Kuya utse uniwinze.”
Imsongolo yula hayahulike apfo, koka kwa usungu, kwaapfila tsakana mali nyingi.
Kuya Yesu kawalongela iwanang'ina wake, “Nowalongela ghendo, itsakuwa pfikomu kwa tajiri kwingila mne undewa wa kulanga.
Kuya nowalongelani, pfibewe kwe ingamiya kwingila mchonzo mwe sindano, kubita tajiri kwingila mne undewa we Imulungu.”
Iwanang'ina wake hawahulike apfo, wakangawala ghendo, wamghutsa, “Lelo yuhi iyodaha kukombolighwa?”
Yesu kawalola kuya kawalongela, “Kwe imunu chinu chino ng'achidahika bae, lekeni kwe Imulungu ghose ghodahika.”
Petiri kamwidika, “Tuleka chila chinu twokuwinza ghweghwe. Lelo tutsopata choni?”
Yesu kawalongela, “Nowalongelani ghendo, mne isi iikutsa, Imwana we Imunu hayatsokala hane chighoda chake cha utunitso, mwemwe imniwinzile nene pfipfila mtsokala mne pfighoda kumi na pfili, kughahigha makabila kumi na meli gha Isiraeli.
Na imunu wowose iyalekile tsing'anda, au kaka tsake, au lumbu tsake, au aba wake, au mai wake, au iwanaghe, au imighunda yake kwaajili yangu, ayo katsobokela mala kumi, na katsohala ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose.
Lekeni awala wa mwanduso watsakuwa wa utsighilo, na wautsighilo watsakuwa wamwanduso.
“Undewa we Imulungu weghala ne imunu yane mghunda, iyalawile lupfilipfili kaghenda kubama iwanu wakasang'ane mne mghunda ghwake.
Katoghola kuwaliha sendi tsa litsuwa limwe, kuya kawaghala mne mghunda ghwake.
Masaa madatu hambele koka keli, kawona iwanu wangi wema mne ghulilo wahela sang'ano.
Kawalongela, ‘Mwemwe mwose mghende mne mghunda ghwangu mkasang'ane, nitsowaliha pfinoghile.’
Nawo waghenda. Kuya kaghenda keli saa sita na saa tisa, katenda pfipfila.
Haipfikile saa kumi na imwe koka keli, kawona iwanu wangi wema hane ghulilo, kawaghutsa, ‘Ebali mwimile hano misi yose bila sang'ano?’
Iwanu awo wamwidika, ‘Kwaapfila haduhu imunu iyatwing'ile sang'ano.’ Kawalongela, ‘Namwe pfipfila mghende mkasang'ane mne mghunda ghwangu.’
“Nemihe haipfikile, imunu yane mghunda kamlongela mwimilitsi wake, ‘Uwakeme iwanu iwasang'ane, uwalihe sendi tsawo, wanduse na wautsighilo kuya awala iwalongole.’
Iwanu iwasang'ane kwandusila saa kumi na imwe hawatsile, chila munu kabokela malilho gha litsuwa limwe.
Apfo awala iwalongole kusang'ana hawatsile, tsawalolela kubokela sendi nyingi, lekeni chila munu kabokela dinali imwe.
Hawabokele maliho ghawo, wandusa kumsing'inikila ayula yane mghunda.
Walonga, ‘Iwanu wano iwatsile kusang'ana nemihe, wasang'ana kwa saa limwe liliheka, lekeni kuwaliha ka pfautulihe twetwe itusang'ane misi yose mlutsua.’
“Naye kamwidika yumwe wawo, ‘Sale yangu, sikubunzile bae. Apfi ghweghwe ng'utoghole kusang'ana kwa malilho gha litsuwa limwe?
Lelo usole ichili chako uke. Nene nobama kumwing'a ayula wa utsighilo ka pfanikwing'ile ghweghwe.
Angu ng'apfinoghile bae nene kutenda achila chanibama kwa sendi tsangu mwenyegho? Au kwakona chepfu kwaapfila nene namluso?’ ”
Kuya Yesu kamalitsa kwa ukulonga, “Apfo, wa utsighilo katsakuwa wa mwanduso, na ayula wamwanduso katsakuwa wautsighilo.”
Yesu hayang'ali yoghenda Yerusalemu kawasola iwanang'ina kumi na weli waliyeka, kawalongela,
“Mlole, twogheluka Yerusalemu, ako Imwana we Imunu katsakwing'ighwa mne ghamoko ghe iwatambika wakulu ne iwalangulitsi we ghamalaghitso. Nawo watsomhigha yakomighwe.
Kuya watsomghala kwe iwanu iwali si Wayahudi, nawo watsombetsa, watsomtsipula na watsomkoma kwa kumuwamba mna msalaba, lekeni ghamatsuwa madatu hambele katsotsilihuka!”
Kuya mai we iwana wa Sebedayo kamghendela Yesu hamwe ne iwanaghe, katowa ghamaghoti, kamlomba amtendele choyobama.
Yesu kamghutsa, “Ubama choni.” Ipinga ayo kamwidika, “Chondechonde, ulaghitse wanangu wano weli wakale ubali wako wa kujilo na wa kumoso mne undewa wako.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Ng'ammanyile bae achila chamlomba. Angu mwodaha kunwela ichikombe chanitsonwela nene?” Wamwidika, “Twodaha.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Mtsonwela ghendo ichikombe changu, lekeni kukala kumoso au kukala kujilo, si sang'ano yangu bae. Lekeni chinu acho watsakwing'ighwa awala iwasaghulighwe na Aba wangu.”
Iwanang'ina kumi hawahulike apfo, tsawawonela maya awala wandughu weli.
Lekeni Yesu kawakema, kawalongela, “Mwomanya ka iwabala we iwanu iwali si Wayahudi wowalongotsa iwanu wawo kwa ingupfu, na pfilongotsi wawo wana ukulu kuna wawo.
Lekeni ileke kuwa apfo kuna mwemwe, ila imunu wowose iyobama kuwa imkulu mghati mwenu, yawe mtumwa wenu,
na imunu wowose iyobama kuwa wa mwanduso kobamighwa yawe mtumwa.
Pfipfo ka Imwana we Imunu, ng'atsile bae kutumikighwa, ila kutumikila na kulapfa ughima wake kuwakombola iwanu wengi.”
Yesu ne iwanang'ina wake hawang'ali wakuka Yeriko, iwanu wengi tsawamuwinza.
Pfifita weli iwang'ali wokala mmbalimbali mwe inzila hawahulike Yesu kobita, wandusa kukemelela, “Imtwatsa, Mwana wa Daudi, utwonele libatsi!”
Iwanu wawakembela wawalongela wanyamale, lekeni waghendelela kukemelela, “Imtwatsa, Mwana wa Daudi utwonele libatsi!”
Yesu kema, kawakema kawaghutsa, “Mwobama niwatendele choni?”
Wamwidika, “Imtwatsa, twobama twone!”
Yesu kawonela libatsi, katsikinda nenge tsawo, bahala wadaha ukwona, nawo wamuwinza.
Yesu ne iwanang'ina wake hawang'ali habehi na Yerusalemu na kupfika Betifage mne Chidunda cha Mitseituni, kawatuma iwanang'ina wake weli,
kawalongela, “Mghende mbaka mne kaye ili hambele henu, baho mtsomwona ipunda kohighwa hamwe ne imwanaghe, muwadohole mngalile hano.
Imunu wowose ang'awalongela chochose, mumlongele, ‘Imtwatsa kowabama,’ naye katsowaleka mke.”
Achino chilawila ili aghala ighalongighwe na manabii ghatimile.
“Umlongele neghe Sayuni, Lola, Mndewa wako kokutsila, Kahola na kadina ipunda, imwanapunda, imwana we ipunda.”
Apfo iwanang'ina waghenda watenda ka Yesu pfayawalongele.
Wamghala ipunda ne imwana we ipunda, weka ghamaghwanda ghawo mchanya mwe punda awo, na Yesu kakala mchanya mwake.
Iwanu wengi wagheka ghamaghwanda ghawo mnzila na wangi waghana milala wanzasa mnzila.
Na iwanu iwamlongole na awala iwamuwinzile wose wandusa kukemelela, walonga, “Yatogholighwe, Imwana wa Daudi! Imulungu kambaliki ayula iyakutsa kwa taghwa lye Imtwatsa! Yatogholighwe Imulungu yali kuchanya kulanga!”
Yesu hayengile Yerusalemu, iwanu wose wakangawala, weghutsa, “Ayu nani?”
Iwanu wawedika, “Ayuno nabii, Yesu wa Natsareti ya Galilaya.”
Yesu kengila mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu kawawinga wose awala iwang'ali woghula na iwang'ali wohutsa. Katsibindula tsimetsa tsawo tsa ukubenela tsisendi na ipfighoda pfa awala iwang'ali woutsa iwanjiwa.
Kawalongela, “Yandikighwa, ‘Ing'anda yangu itsokemighwa ing'anda ya ukulombela.’ Lekeni mwemwe mwoitenda iwe mango ye iwabapfi!”
Ipfifita na ipfimbete wamghendela Yesu mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu, naye kawahonetsa.
Lekeni iwatambika wakulu na iwolangulitsa ghamalaghitso tsawona maya hawonile pfinu pfa kukangawatsa pfayatendile Yesu, ne iwana pfawakemelele mne ing'anda ye Imulungu, “Yatogholighwe Imwana wa Daudi!”
Apfo wamghutsa Yesu, “Apfi kohulika chawolonga iwana wano?” Kawedika, “Ona, ng'amsomile bae? ‘Kwa milomo ye iwana wadowado ne iwana iwakong'a kwotogholighwa ghendo.’ ”
Yesu kawaleka kaghenda Betaniya, kunze kwe ghumji, kawasa kuko.
Nemitondo lupfilipfili, Yesu hayang'ali kakuya mne ghumji, tsakona inzala.
Kaghwona mbiki mmbalimbali mwe inzila, kaghughendela lekeni ng'onile chochose bae ila imitsani iliyeka. Apfo kaghulongela, “Uleke ukweleka keli ghamatunda!” Bahala mbiki ghula ghunyala.
Iwanang'ina wake hawonile apfo wakangawala, wamghutsa, “Ule mbiki ghuno ghusumka kunyala?”
Yesu kawedika, “Nowalongelani ghendo mng'atoghola na kuleka kwalangula, mwodaha kutenda si achila chiliyeka ichanendile mne mbiki, ila mwodaha kuchilongela chidunda chino, ‘Wibule, wikeyase mwibahali,’ kuya itsakuwa pfipfo.
Mng'atoghola, chochose chamlomba mtsobokela.”
Yesu kengila mne ing'anda ye Imulungu, na hayang'ali yolangulitsa, iwatambika wakulu na iwakulu we iwanu wamghendela, wamghutsa, “Kwa ukulu wachi kotenda ghano ghose? Yuhi yakwing'ile ukulu uno?”
Yesu kawedika, “Na nene nitsowaghutsa imbuli imwe, mng'anyidika, nitsowalongela notenda ghano kwa ukulu wachi.
Apfi ubatitso wa Yohane ulawile kwani? Tsaulawa kulanga au kwe iwanu?” Wandusa kwighutsa iwenyegho kwe iwenyegho walonga, “Tung'alonga, ‘Ulawa kulanga,’ katsotughutsa, ‘Ule lelo ng'amumtoghole Yohane?’
Lekeni tung'alonga, ‘Ulawa kwe iwanu,’ twopfuka iwanu, kwaapfila wose tsawatoghola Yohane kakala nabii.”
Apfo wamwidika Yesu, “Ng'atumanyile bae.” Naye kawedika, “Na nene siwalongela bae kwa ukulu wachi notenda ipfinu apfi.
“Mkonatse? Imunu yumwe tsakana iwana weli, kaghenda kwa ayula mwana mkulu kamlongela, ‘Mwanangu, leloli ughende ukasang'ane mne mghunda.’
Naye kamwidika, ‘Sighenda bae,’ lekeni hambele chidogho kaghaluka kaghenda.
Kuya aba ayo kamghendela imwana wa keli, kamlongela ichinu chichila. Naye kamwidika, ‘Ona aba,’ lekeni ng'aghendile bae.
Lelo yuhi mna iwana wano weli iyatendile achila chayabamile aba wake?” Wamwidika, “Imwana imkulu.” Yesu kawalongela, “Nowalongelani ghendo, iwasola kodi na iwaghoni watsowalongola kwingila mne undewa we Imulungu.
Kwaapfila Yohane tsakatsa kuwalangusa inzila inoghile, namwe ng'amumtoghole bae, lekeni iwasola kodi na iwaghoni wamtoghola. Namwe hata hamwonile apfo, ng'amghaluke bae na kumtoghola.”
Yesu kalonga, “Mtegheletse imbuli ingi, imunu yumwe yane ing'anda kahanda tsabibu mne mghunda. Kaghuteghela luwa mghunda agho, kahimba lipondo lya ukukamila tsabibu, katsenga ghumnala, kawakodishila iwanu iwolima, kuya koka ghumwanza.
Ghamatsuwa gha ukupfuna haghapfikile, kawatuma iwatumwa wake wakasole tsabibu.
Hawala iwanu iwolima wawaghogha iwatumwa wake, yumwe wamtowa, yungi wamkoma, na yungi wamtowa na ghamabwe.
Kuya tsakawatuma keli watumwa wangi, tsawengi kubita awala wamwanduso, na iwanu wala iwolima wawatendela pfipfila.
Hawamalile wose ghendo, kamtuma imwanaghe kuna wawo, kalonga, ‘Watsomtegheletsa mwanangu.’
Lekeni iwanu iwolima hawamwonile, welongela iwenyegho, ‘Ayuno iye muhala, mtse tumkome tusole uhala wake!’
Apfo wamghogha, wamwasa kunze kwe mghunda ghwe imitsabibu, wamkoma.
“Lelo, imunu yane mghunda hayatsakutsa, yatsowatenda choni awala iwanu iwolima?”
Wamwidika, “Katsowakoma ghendo iwanu awo wehile, katsoweka iwanu wangi mne mghunda aghwo, nawo watsomgholela tsitsabibu mne ghamatsuwa ghe kupfuna.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Ng'amsomile bae Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka, ‘Libwe ililemighwe na iwatsengagha liwa libwe kulu lye lukwalambatsa. Imbuli ino ilawa kwe Imulungu, nayo yotukangawatsa.’
“Apfo nowalongelani ghendo, undewa we Imulungu utsobokighwa kuna mwemwe na kwing'ighwa iwanu iwakweleka ghamatunda ghake, awala iwotenda aghala ghobama Imulungu.
Na ayula iyakughwa mchanya mwe libwe lino katsobeneka beneka, na wowose ilitsomghwila litsomhonda.”
Watambika wakulu na Mafarisayo hawahulike apfo, tsawamanya Yesu tsaang'ali yowalonga wawo.
Apfo wabama inzila ya kumghoghela, lekeni wapfuka iwanu, kwaapfila iwanu tsawamona Yesu tsakakala nabii.
Yesu kawalongela keli iwanu kwa imbuli.
“Undewa we Imulungu weghala ne Imndewa iyamtendele mwanaghe chihungo cha ukukwela.
Kawatuma iwatumwa wake wawalongele awala iwakemighwe watse kune chihungo, lekeni walema ukutsa.
Kuya kawatuma iwatumwa wangi, kalonga, ‘Muwalongele pfino awala iwakemighwe kune chihungo, nyambika ipfijo. Wang'ombe wangu iwanenehe wachinjighwa, na chila chinu chaghoya. Mtse kuchihungo.’
Lekeni iwanu awo ng'awalangitse bae, woka, yumwe kune mghunda wake na yungi kune sang'ano tsake.
Nawo iwanu iwakalile wawaghogha iwatumwa wake, wawatendela pfihile na wawakoma.
Imndewa ayo tsakona maya. Apfo kawatuma asikali wake wawakome awala iwawakomile iwatumwa wake, na wailakatsa isi yawo.
Kuya kawakema iwatumwa wake kawalongela, chihungo cha ukukwela ma cha tiyali, lekeni awala iwakemighwe watse kune ichihungo ng'awatsile bae.
Apfo, mghende kunzila, ako wowose wamuwona muwakeme watse kune ichihungo.
Iwatumwa wala woka, waghenda mne tsinzila wawaghala wanu wose yawawonile, iwehile na iwanoghile, na chihungo tsachimema iwahenza.
“Imndewa hayengile mng'anda kuwalolesa iwahenza wake, kamwona imunu yumwe, ng'apfalile bae lighwanda lye ichihungo.
Kamghutsa, ‘Sale yangu, angu wingiletse hano naghwe kwahela lighwanda lye ichihungo?’ Lekeni imunu ayo ng'alongile chinu bae.
Kuya imndewa kawalongela iwatumwa, ‘Mmwowe ghamoko na ghamaghulu mmwase kunze kune chisi. Ako kutsakuwa ne ichililo ne ukughegheda ghamatsino.’ ”
Kuya Yesu kalonga, “Kwaapfila iwakemighwe wengi, lekeni iwasaghulighwe wadodo.”
Apfo Mafarisayo woka na wabama inzila ye ukumtegha Yesu kwa mbuli tsake.
Kuya wawatuma iwanang'ina wawo hamwe ne iwanu wangi wa kingili lya Herodi. Walonga, “Mlangulitsi, twomanya ghendo ghweghwe kolongesa. Naghwe koilangulitsa pfinoghile inzila ye Imulungu, ng'upfuka bae ukulu we imunu wowose, kwaapfila ng'ulola bae ipfihanga pfe iwanu.
Utulongele lelo, ukonatse? Apfi pfinogha kuliha kodi kwa Kaisari, au ng'apfinoghile bae.”
Lekeni Yesu tsakamanya ukwiha kwawo, apfo kawalongela, “Mwawang'enye, ule mwobama kunitegha?
Nanguseni sendi yamlihila kodi!” Wamghalila isendi,
Naye kawaghutsa, “Angu chihanga na taghwa lino pfa nani?”
Wamwidika, “Pfa Kaisari mndewa wa Roma.” Apfo Yesu kawalongela, “Lelo, mwing'eni Kaisari aghala gha Kaisari na mwing'eni Imulungu aghala ghe Imulungu.”
Hawahulike apfo, wakangawala, apfo wamleka, woka tsawo.
Litsuwa lilyo, Masadukayo wamwenga, iwanu iwolonga kuduhu kutsilihuka, wamghendela Yesu.
Wamghutsa walonga, “Mlangulitsi, Musa katulongela immale ang'afa bila kweleka iwana, ndughu yake kobamighwa amkwele chitsuka ayo, ili amwelekele indughu yake iwana.
Lelo, hakaye hetu hano tsahana iwandughu saba. Wamwanduso kakwela, kuya kafa, na kwaapfila tsakahela iwana, mwehe wake kamlekela ndughu yake.
Chinu chichila chimlawila ndughu yake wa keli, wa kadatu, mbaka ndughu yake wa saba.
Kuya mwehe ayo naye kafa.
Lelo iwanu hawotsotsilihuka mne litsuwa lya kutsilihuka, mwehe ayo katsokuwa wa yuhi mna iwandughu wano saba? Kwaapfila wose tsawamkwela.”
Yesu kawedika, “Mwakwagha, kwaapfila ng'amanyile bae Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka au ngupfu ye Imulungu.
Kwaapfila iwanu hawatsotsilihuka, kuduhu ukukwela wala ukukwelighwa, watsokuwa ka malaika iwali kulanga.
Lekeni, imbuli yo ukutsilihuka kwe iwanu, ng'amsomile bae achila chayamlongeleni Imulungu? Kawalongela,
‘Nene na Imulungu wa Abrahamu, na Imulungu wa Isaka, na Imulungu wa Yakobu.’ Yeye si Imulungu wa iwanu iwafile bae, ila Imulungu we iwanu waghima.”
Iwanu hawahulike apfi, wakangawala kwa ghamalangulitso ghake.
Mafarisayo hawahulike ka Yesu kawatenda Masadukayo wenyamale, wetingana hamwe,
yumwe wawo, imlangulitsi we Ghamalaghitso, kamghutsa Yesu kwa kumtegha.
Kamghutsa, “Mlangulitsi, ihi indaghitso ng'ulu kubita tsose mne Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka?”
Yesu kedika, “ ‘Mnoghele Imtwatsa Imulungu wako kwa ghumoyo ghwako ghose, kwa muhe wako wose, na kwa tsimbutsi tsako tsose.’
Aino iyo indaghitso ng'ulu na ya mwanduso.
Na ya keli ighala na ino, umnoghele miyagho ka pfawinoghela imwenyegho.
Ghamalaghitso ghose gha Musa na ghamalangulitso ghe manabii ghohuwila Ghamalaghitso ghano meli.”
Mafarisayo hawetingane hamwe, Yesu kawaghutsa,
“Mwemwe mmwonatse Kiristu. Angu imwana wa nani?” Wamwidika, “Imwana wa Daudi.”
Yesu kawaghutsa, “Ule lelo Daudi kwa kulongotsighwa na ghumuhe kamkema ‘Imtwatsa?’ Kwaapfila tsakalonga,
‘Imtwatsa kamlongela Imtwatsa wangu, ukale hano hane ghumoko ghwangu ghwa kujilo mbaka niweke iwokuhila hasi he ghamaghulu ghako.’
Ka Daudi komkema, ‘Imtwatsa,’ lelo ikuwatse awe imwanaghe?”
Kuduhu imunu yamwidike, na kulawa litsuwa alyo na kughendela kuduhu imunu yadahile kumghutsa Yesu imbuli yoyose.
Kuya Yesu kawalongela iwanu na iwanang'ina wake.
“Iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso na Mafarisayo wana ukulu wa kulangulitsa Malaghitso gha Musa.
Apfo mghakinde na mtende aghala ghose ghawowalongela, lekeni mleke kutenda aghala ghawotenda wawo, kwaapfila ng'awotenda bae aghala ghawolonga.
Wakowa imitsigho mitito na kuwatwika iwanu mmahegha mwawo. Lekeni wawo iwenyegho ng'awobama bae hata kugholosa chidole na kuinula.
Ghose ghawotenda, wotenda ili iwanu wawone, kwaapfila wopfala ipfinu ipfandikighwe Ghamalaghitso mne pfihanga pfawo na mne ghamoko ghawo, na wakongetsa utali we ghamaghwanda ghawo.
Wonoghela kukala hanu hanoghile mne chihungo na kukala mne pfighoda ipfili hambele mne tsing'anda tsa ukulombela.
Wonoghela kulamsighwa mmasoko na kukemighwa ne iwanu, ‘Mlangulitsi.’
Lekeni mwemwe mleke kukemighwa ‘Mlangulitsi,’ kwaapfila mna Mlangulitsi yumwe yaliyeka, na mwemwe mwose mwawandughu.
Wala mleke kumkema imunu ‘aba’ hano muisi, kwaapfila mna ‘Aba’ yumwe yaliyeka, naye ka kulanga.
Na mleke kukemighwa ‘Ipfilongotsi’ kwaapfila mna ichilongotsi yumwe yaliyeka, naye Kiristu.
Na imkulu mghati mwenu kobamighwa yawe mtumwa wenu.
Na imunu wowose yetenda mkulu, katsotendighwa mdodo, na wowose yetenda mdodo, katsotendighwa mkulu.
“Mtsoghaya mwemwe yamlangulitsa Ghamalaghitso na Mafarisayo! Mwawang'enye! Kwaapfila mowahindila iwanu libani lya undewa wa kulanga, na mwemwe iwenyegho ng'amkwingila bae, wala ng'amuwalekelela awala iwobama kwingila.
Mtsoghaya mwemwe yamlangulitsa Ghamalaghitso na Mafarisayo! Mwawang'enye! Mwemwe mwakuja mne tsing'anda tse pfitsuka na kwa ung'enye hamlomba mwolonga mbuli nyingi! Apfo mtsohighighwa ng'ani!
“Mtsoghaya, yamlangulitsa Ghamalaghitso na Mafarisayo! Mwawang'enye mwemwe! Mwoloka ibahali na mwakwanga mne isi yose kumtenda imunu yumwe iyaiwinze dini yenu, na ang'aghaluka, mwomtenda yawe na uwetso mala mbili wa ukwingila Jehanamu kubita mwemwe wenyegho
“Mtsoghaya mwemwe pfilongotsi pfifita. Mwolonga, ‘Imunu ang'elaha kwe ing'anda ye Imulungu si chinu bae, ila ang'elaha kwe inzahabu ye ing'anda ye Imulungu keyowa.’
Mwemwe mwawabotsi na pfifita! Chihi ichinoghile, inzahabu au ing'anda ye Imulungu iitenda inzahabu ideghete?
Pfipfila mwolonga, imunu ang'elaha kwa hanu hakutambikila si chinu bae, ila ang'elaha kwa nambiko iili hanu ha kutambikila, ayo keyowa.
Mwapfifita mwemwe! Chini chikulu nambiko au hanu ha kutambikila hakutenda nambiko ideghete?
Apfo ayula yelaha kwa hanu ha kutambikila, kelaha kwa chila chinu ichili mchanya mwake,
na ayula yelaha kwe ing'anda ye Imulungu, kelaha kwe ing'anda ayo, na kwa Imulungu iyokala mghati mwake.
Na ayula yelaha kwa kulanga kelaha kwa chighoda che undewa che Imulungu na kwa Imulungu iyochikalila.
“Mtsoghaya mwemwe imlangulitsa Ghamalaghitso, na Mafarisayo! Wang'enye! Kwaapfila mwolapfa tsaka ya pfinu pfidodo ka imitsani iinung'ila ghoya, binzali na kalafuu, lekeni mwoleka kutsikinda mbuli ng'ulu tsa Ghamalaghitso ka pfila haki, libatsi ne ukutoghola. Mghatende agha, na mleke kughaleka aghala ghangi.
Pfilongotsi pfifita! Mwolapfa ng'onzi mne ghamatsi, lekeni mwometsa ingamiya!
“Mtsoghaya, mwemwe yamlangulitsa Ghamalaghitso na Mafarisayo! Mwawang'enye, mwohopfugha chikombe na chiha kwa kunze, lekeni mwoleka mghati mmema ipfinu pfampatile kwa kuboka na ubwa.
Ghwe Mfarisayo chipfita! Tanu wopfughe mghati mwe ichikombe ne ichiha, kuya kunze kutsodegheta.
“Mtsoghaya, mwemwe yamlangulitsa Ghamalaghitso na Mafarisayo, mwawang'enye, mwighala ne tsikabuli itsibakigwe ichokaa, kunze tsakwoneka tsinogha, lekeni mghati tsimema imipate ye iwanu iwafile na chila chinu chihile.
Namwe pfipfila, kunze mwakoneka kwe iwanu ka mnogha lekeni mghati mwenu, mmema ung'enye na ghehile.
“Mtsoghaya, mwemwe yamlangulitsa Ghamalaghitso, na Mafarisayo, mwawang'enye! Mowatsengela tsikabuli manabii na kutsighela unzolingo tsikabuli tse iwanu iwanoghile.
Namwe mwolonga, ‘Tung'akalile mne ghamatsuwa gha iwabala wetu, tung'alekile kwilunga nawo kuwakoma manabii!’
Apfo mwelangusa iwenyegho ka mwa watsukulu wa awala yawawakomile manabii,
lelo mghendeletse achila chawatendile iwabala wenu.
“Mwemwe iwanzoka na iwana we iwanzoka! Mtsohepatse ukuhighighwa Jehanamu?
Apfo nowaghalilani manabii, ne iwanu wane nzewele, na iwalangulitsi. Wangi wawo mtsowakoma na wangi mtsowawamba mna misalaba, wangi mtsowatowa pfiboko mne tsing'anda tsenu tse ukulombela na kuwawinga kulawa ghumji ghuno kughenda ghumji ghungi.
Na idamu ye iwanu iwanoghile ikwitike muisi itsodaighwa kuna mwemwe, kulawa idamu ya Abeli ayula yanoghile, mbaka idamu ya Sakariya imwana wa Balakiya yamumkomile haghati he ing'anda ye Imulungu na hanu he ukulapfila inambiko.
Nowalongelani ghendo, mweleko ghuno ghutsohighighwa kwaajili ya agho.
“Ghwe Yerusalemu, Yerusalemu! Ghweghwe yuwakomile manabii na kuwatowa ghamabwe awala iwatumighwe kuna ghweghwe, mala nyingi tsambama kuweka hamwe iwana wako, ka ing'uku pfowafunamila pfitsiya wake kwa ghamabawa ghake, lekeni ghweghwe, ng'aubamile bae.
Mlole, ing'anda yenu ye Imulungu ilekighwa uchuwa.
Kwaapfila nowalongelani, ng'amtsombona keli bae mbaka mlonge, ‘Kabalikighwa ayula iyakutsa kwa taghwa lye Imtwatsa.’ ”
Yesu kalawa mne ing'anda ye Imulungu, na hayang'ali yakuka, iwanang'ina wake wamghendela wamlanguse matsengo ghe ing'anda ye Imulungu,
Yesu kawaghutsa, “Angu mwoghona agha ghose? Nowalongelani ghendo, kuduhu libwe ilitsolekighwa mchanya mwa liyaghe, chila libwe litsokwasighwa hasi.”
Yesu hayang'ali kakala mne Chidunda cha Mitseituni, iwanang'ina wake wamghendela waliyeka wamghutsa, “Utulongele, agha ghose ghatsolawila tsuwachi? Na chihi chitsakuwa chitango cha ukutsa kwako na ukumala kwe iisi?”
Yesu kawedika, “Mwalangitse, imunu yaleke kuwaghutsukila.
Kwaapfila iwanu wengi watsakutsa kwa taghwa lyangu na ukulonga wawo iwo Kiristu Imkombotsi, na watsowaghutsukila iwanu wengi.
Mtsohulika tsing'ondo na mbuli tsake, lekeni mleke kupfuka. Agho ghose ghobamighwa ghalawile, lekeni ukumala kwe iisi ng'ana kupfike bae.
Isi ingi itsetowa na isi ingi, undewa ungi witsetowa na undewa ungi. Kutsolawila inzala ng'ulu na mdedemo we isi chila hanu.
Agha ghose ka mwanduso wa usungu wa ukweleka imwana.
“Kuya mtsoghoghighwa na kudunuzighwa na kukomighwa. Na isi tsose tsitsowahila kwaajili ya nene.
Ghamatsuwa agho iwanu wengi watsoleka ukutoghola kwawo, na watsehunduka na wetsehila,
na manabii wengi wa ughutsu watsolawila na kuwaghutsukila iwanu wengi.
Kwaajili ye ukongetseka ghehile, unoghelo we iwanu utsohunguka,
lekeni ayula iyodudumila mbaka utsighilo katsokombolighwa.
Na Imbuli ino Inoghile ya undewa itsopetighwa mne isi yose ka ukalangama kwe isi tsose, kuya ukumala kwe iisi kutsakutsa.
“Mtsakona, ‘lideso lya ukuhinya’ lyalongile nabii Danyeli, litsakwima hanu haenzeluke, ayula iyosoma amanye.
Kuya iwanu iwali mne isi ya Yudeya watsumile mpfidunda.
Na iyali mchiswili mwe ing'anda yake, aleke kuhulumka kusola chinu chochose.
Yali kumghunda aleke kuya kusola lighwanda lyake.
Watsoghaya iwapinga wane tsiinda na awala iwakong'etsa mne ghamatsuwa agho.
Mlombe ili kutsuma kwenu kuleke kuwa mne msimu wa chipfeghetsi au mne litsuwa lya Sabato.
Kwaapfila kutsolawila maghayo ng'ana ghalawile bae kulawa isi hailumbighwe mbaka leloli, na ng'aghatsolawila keli bae.
Ka ghamatsuwa agho ng'aghahungusighwe bae kuduhu imunu yang'akomboke. Lekeni kwaajili ye iwanu wala iwasaghulighwe, ghamatsuwa agho ghatsohungutsighwa.
Imunu ang'awalongela, ‘Ulole, Kiristu Imkombotsi kahano!’ au ‘Kahala!’ mleke kutoghola.
Kwaapfila tsina Kiristu wa ughutsu na manabii wa ughutsu watsolawila na kutenda pfitango pfingi na pfinu pfa kukangawatsa ili kuwaghutsukila iwanu, ka yodahika hata awala iwasaghulighwe ne Imulungu.
Muhulikitse! Nongola kuwalongelani imbuli ino ng'ana chipindi chipfike.
“Apfo, Imunu wowose ang'akulongela, ‘Ulole, kakunyika!’ mleke kughenda, au ‘Kahano, mne chiheleto cha mghati,’ mleke kutoghola.
Kwaapfila Imwana we Imunu katsakutsa ka lumwesa pfalumwemwesa mlanga mwose, kulawa ubali wa kwalilawila litsua mbaka ubali wa kwalikuswela litsua.
Hohose hane mtsogha, pfimanga watsetingana.
“Bahala ghamatsuwa agho gha ghamaghayo aghatsomala, litsua litsoghumighwa ichisi, na lwetsi ng'alutsolapfa bae ghumwanga, tsinondo tsisolaghala kulawa mlanga na tsingupfu itsili kulanga tsitsohighisighwa.
Chipindi acho, chitango che Imwana we Imunu chitsolawila mlanga na isi tsose tsitsolila, iwanu watsomwona Imwana we Imunu kakutsa mna ghamawingu mlanga, hamwe ne ingupfu na utunitso mkulu.
Naye katsowatuma wamalaika wake wane malati ilikemela sideke, nawo watsoweka hamwe awala iwasaghulighwe kulawa chila ubali we iisi, kulawa utsighilo uno we lilanga mbaka utsighilo ungi.
“Mwilangulitse imbuli ino kulawa mne mbiki ghwa mkuyu, ghamaputila ghake haghakuwa madeke na kwandusa kutsuka, mwomanya mvula tsahabehi.
Pfipfila, hamkona agha ghose mmanye chipindi cha habehi ghendo.
Nowalongelani ghendo, iwanu wa mweleko ghuno ng'awatsoluta bae mbaka agha ghose ghalawile,
lilanga ne isi pfitsoluta lekeni mbuli tsangu ng'atsitsoluta mbe.
“Kuduhu imunu iyomanya litsuwa wala isaa ayo, hata wamalaika wa kulanga, wala Imwana, ila Aba yaliyeka iyomanya.
Ka pfailawile mne ghamatsuwa gha Nuhu, itsakuwa pfipfo hayatsakutsa Imwana we Imunu.
Kwaapfila ghamatsuwa agho ng'ana ghamafuliko ghalawile, iwanu tsawang'ali wakuja na ukunwa, wokwela na kukwelighwa mbaka litsuwa lya Nuhu hengile mne safina.
Ng'awamanyile bae choni ching'alawile mbaka ghamafuliko ghatsa na kuwasola wose. Apfi pfipfo pfaitsolawila hayatsakutsa Imwana we Imunu.
Iwanu weli watsakuwa kumghunda, yumwe katsosolighwa na yungi katsolekighwa.
Iwapinga weli watsotwanga hamwe, yumwe katsosolighwa na yungi katsolekighwa.
“Apfo, mwalangitse, kwaapfila ng'ammanya bae litsuwa lyachi Imtwatsa wenu hayatsakutsa.
Lekeni mmanye apfi, ka mwenye kaye ang'amanyile imbapfi kakutsa tsuwachi, ang'akalile meso, na tsang'oileka bae ing'anda yake ibenighwe.
Pfipfila namwe mwiyandae, kwaapfila Imwana we Imunu katsakutsa mne isaa ng'amuilolele bae yatse.”
Yesu kaghendelela kulonga, “Kuya yuhi imtumwa yotogholighwa na yane ihekima? Ayula imtwatsa wake yamwikile yawemile iwatumwa wangi mne ing'anda yake na kuweng'a ichijo chawo chipindi chinoghile.
Kabweda imtumwa yula imtwatsa wake hayatsakuya na kumpfika kotenda apfo,
Nowalongelani ghendo, imtwatsa ayo katsomwika kwimilitsa ipfinu pfake pfose.
Lekeni ka mtumwa keha, na ang'elongela imwenyegho, ‘Imtwatsa wangu katsokawa kuya,’
kuya kakwandusa ukuwatowa iwatumwa weyaghe na ukuja na ukunwa hamwe ne iwanu iwopatika.
Imtwatsa we imtumwa ayo katsakutsa mne litsuwa lyang'omlolela bae na mne isaa yang'aimanyile bae.
Imtwatsa ayo katsomghana pfihindi pfihindi na katsomwika hamwe ne iwang'enye, ako kutsakuwa na chililo na kughegheda ghamatsino.
“Chipindi acho undewa wa kulanga witseghala ne wali kumi, iwasolile pfitasa pfawo na waghenda kumbokela imunu yokwela.
Watano mna wawo tsawabotsi, na watano wangi tsawana ihekima.
Awala wali wabotsi wosola pfitasa pfawo, lekeni ng'awasolile bae ghamafuta ghoghose.
Awala wane ihekima, wasola tsisupa itsimemile ghamafuta hamwe na pfitasa pfawo.
Imunu yokwela tsakakawa kutsa, apfo wali wose wapata nongo, wawasa.
“Chilo chikulu, kulawila litsi, ‘Imunu yokwela kapfika! Mlawe mkambokele!’
Kuya wali wose walamka, watuwa pfitasa pfawo.
Awala iwabotsi wawalongela awala wane ihekima, ‘Mtugholele ghamafuta ghenu chidogho kwaapfila pfitasa pfetu pfotsimika.’
Lekeni awala wane ihekima wawedika, ‘Mbe, ng'aghotwenela bae twetwe na mwemwe, ghendani kwe iwanu iwohutsa ghamafuta mkaghule.’
Lekeni hawang'ali woghenda kughula ghamafuta, imunu yokwela tsakapfika. Wali awala iweyandaye, wengila naye mng'anda mne chihungo cha ukukwela. Na libani lihindighwa.
“Hambele chidogho wali wabotsi woya, walonga, ‘Imtwatsa! Imtwatsa! Utupfughulile libani!’
Lekeni kawedika, ‘Nowalongelani ghendo, siwamanyile bae.’ ”
Kuya Yesu kalonga, “Apfo mkale meso, kwaapfila ng'ammanyile bae litsuwa au isaa.
“Pfipfila undewa wa kulanga witseghala ne imunu iyoghenda ghumwanza, iyawakemile iwatumwa wake na kuweka wemilitse tsimali tsake.
Kamwing'a chila yumwe kwa kulola uwetso wake, yumwe kamwing'a mikoba mitano, yungi mikoba mili, na yungi mkoba ghumwe. Kuya koka ghumwanza.
Bahala imtumwa iyabokele mikoba mitano kaghenda kutsitendela sang'ano, kapata mikoba mingi mitano.
Pfipfila, ayula iyabokele talanta mbili tsongetseka keli talanta mbili.
Lekeni ayula iyabokele talanta imwe, koka kahimba hasi, kaipfisa isendi ye imtwatsa wake.
“Ghamatsuwa pfaghalutile, imtwatsa we iwatumwa awo koya na kwandusa kupeta tsisendi hamwe nawo.
Imtumwa iyabokele talanta tano kamghalila talanta tano tsingi, kalonga, ‘Imtwatsa, tsakungaya talanta tano, ulole tsongetseka talanta tsingi tano.’
Imtwatsa wake kamwidika, ‘Kutenda ghoya, mtumwa yunoghile na mtogholighwa! Tsakutogholighwa kwa ipfinu pfidodo, nitsokwika wimilitse pfinu pfingi. Utse udeng'elele na mtwatsa wako!’
“Kuya imtumwa iyeng'ighwe talanta mbili naye katsa, kalonga, ‘Imtwatsa tsakungaya talanta mbili, ulole, tsongetseka tsingi mbili.’
“Imtwatsa wake kamwidika, ‘Kutenda ghoya, imtumwa yunoghile na yutogholighwa! Tsakutogholighwa kwa pfinu pfidodo, nitsokwika wimilitse pfinu pfingi, utse na udeng'elele hamwe na mtwatsa wako!’
“Kuya imtumwa iyabokele mkoba umwe katsa, kalonga, ‘Imtwatsa, nokumanya ghweghwe kwa imunu mkomu, kopfuna hanu ng'auhandile bae, na kokunga hanu ng'aupwililise bae tsimbeghu.
Apfo tsanipfuka, mbuka kupfisa isendi yako mne lidongo. Ulole, aino iyo isendi yako.’
“Mtwatsa wake kamwidika, ‘Ghweghwe kwa imtumwa wihile na imdebwe! Tsakumanya ka nene nopfuna hanu sihandile na kukunga hanu sipwililise bae tsimbeghu.
Apfo tsakubamighwa kuika bengi isendi yangu, ili hambuile na nene nyambulile ifaida.
“ ‘Mumboke sendi ayo mmwing'e ayu yane mikoba kumi.
Kwaapfila wowose iyalinacho, katsokongetsighwa, na wowose iyalihela chinu hata achila chayalinacho katsobokighwa.
Na mmwase imtumwa yuno yehile kunze mne ichisi, ako kutsakuwa na chililo na kughegheda ghamatsino.’ ”
“Imwana we Imunu hayatsakutsa mne utunitso wake, hamwe na wamalaika, katsokala mne chighoda chake che undewa mne utunitso wa kulanga.
Iwanu wa kolo tsose watsetingana hambele hake, naye katsowabaghula ka iwadimi pfawowabaghula iwang'olo na iwamene.
Katsoweka iwanu iwanoghile kune ghumoko ghwake ghwa kujilo na iwanu wehile ghumoko ghwake ghwa kumoso.
Kuya Imndewa katsowalongela awala iwakalile ghumoko ghwake ghwa kujilo, ‘Mtse, mwemwe imbalikighwe na Aba wangu, mhale undewa wamwikilighwe mwemwe kulawa iisi hailumbighwe.
Kwaapfila tsanikala ne inzala, namwe mngaya ichijo, tsanikala ne ing'ilu, namwe mngaya ghamatsi, tsanamhenza namwe mnibokela.
Tsanahela lighwanda namwe mnipfetsa, tsanamtamu namwe mutsa kundola, tsanamchifungo, namwe mnyangila.’
“Baho iwanu iwanoghile watsomwidika, ‘Imtwatsa wetu tsuwachi hatukwonile kuna inzala na tukwing'a ichijo, au kuna ing'ilu na twetwe tukwing'a ghamatsi?
Kuya tsuwachi hatukwonile kwa mhenza na twetwe tukubokela, au kwahela lighwanda na twetwe tukupfetsa?
Tsuwachi hatukwonile kwa mtamu au kwa mchifungo na twetwe tukwangila?’
Imndewa katsowedika, ‘Nowalongelani ghendo, chochose chamumtendele yumwe wa wano wandughu tsangu, mnendela nene.’
“Kuya katsowalongela awala iwali kune ghumoko ghwake ghwa kumoso, ‘Lawani hana nene, yamlighitighwe, mghende kune ghumoto ghwa ghamatsuwa ghose, ighwikighwe kwaajili ya Yehile ne malaika wake!
Kwaapfila tsanikala ne inzala ng'amngaile bae ichijo, tsanina ing'ilu ng'amngaile bae ghamatsi,
Tsanamhenza, ng'amnibokele bae, tsanahela lighwanda, ng'amnipfetse bae. Tsanamtamu na tsanamchifungo, ng'amtsile bae kumbona.’
“Kuya nawo watsamwidika, ‘Imtwatsa, tsuwachi hatukwonile kuna inzala au kuna ing'ilu, au kwamhenza au kwahela lighwanda au kwamtamu au kwa mne chifungo, na twetwe ng'atukwapfile bae?’
“Imndewa naye katsowedika, ‘Nowalongelani ghendo, ka tsamlema kumwapfila yumwe we iwadodo wano, tsamlema kunyapfila nene.’
Kuya watsoghenda kune ukughaya kwa ghamatsuwa ghose, lekeni iwanu iwanoghile watsoghenda kune ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose.
Yesu hayamalitse kulonga mbuli atso, kawalongela iwanang'ina wake,
“Ka pfammanya ghatsuwa meli hambele itsakuwa Pasaka, na Imwana we Imunu katsoghoghighwa ili awambighwe mna msalaba.”
Kuya iwatambika wakulu na iwakulu watingana mne ing'anda ye imlapfa inambiko mkulu, taghwa lyake Kayafa,
tsawabama inzila ya kumghogha Yesu chinyelenyele wamkome.
Walonga, “Lekeni ileke kutendeka mne chihungo, hela kutsolawila hengele.”
Yesu hayang'ali Betaniya mne ing'anda ya Simoni mkoma,
pinga yumwe kamghendela ne isupa ya alabasta iimemile ghamafuta ighonung'ila gha bei ng'ulu, kamghela mwitwi hayang'ali yakuja mmetsa.
Iwanang'ina hawonile apfo wona maya, waghutsa, “Angu choni kwaghitsa ghamafuta pfino?”
“Ghamafuta ghano ghang'autsighwe kwa bei ng'ulu, tsisendi weng'ighwe iwahingwa.”
Yesu tsakamanya chawang'ali wolonga, kawalongela, “Ule mwomdesa ipinga ayu? Kanendela chinu chinoghile.
Iwahingwa mtsokala nawo ghamatsuwa ghose, lekeni ng'amtsokala bae na nene ghamatsuwa ghose.
Hayanighele ghamafuta ighonung'ila mlukuli mwangu, katenda apfo kuniyandaa kwa ukutsikighwa kwangu.
Nowalongelani ghendo, kokose imbuli inoghile haitsopetighwa mne iisi yose, chayatendile ipinga yuno chitsopetighwa kwa kumkumbuka yeye.”
Kuya Yuda Isikarioti yumwe we awala iwanang'ina kumi na weli, kawaghendela iwatambika wakulu,
kawaghutsa, “Ning'awapfila ukumhunduka Yesu, mtsongaya choni?” Wampetela tsisendi selasini, wamwing'a.
Kulawa baho, Yuda yang'ali yobama inzila ya kumuhunduka Yesu.
Mne litsuwa lye mwanduso lye Chihungo che Ipfighate ipfihela hamila, iwanang'ina wake wamghendela Yesu, wamghutsa, “Kobama tukutandile kwani ichijo che Pasaka?”
Kawedika, “Mghende mne ghumji kwa imunu yumwe mumlongele, ‘Imlangulitsi kolonga chipindi changu chahabehi. Nene na iwanang'ina wangu tutsakuja Pasaka mng'anda mwako.’ ”
Apfo iwanang'ina watenda ka Yesu pfayawalongele, na waitanda Pasaka.
Nemihe haipfikile, Yesu ne iwanang'ina wake kumi na weli wakala mmetsa wakuja.
Hawang'ali wakuja, kawalongela, “Nowalongelani ghendo, yumwe wenu katsonihunduka.”
Iwanang'ina tsawona usungu, chila yumwe kandusa kumlongela Yesu, “Apfi nene Imtwatsa?”
Yesu kawalongela, “Imunu iyopfabika chighate chake hamwe na nene mne ibakuli, katsonihunduka.
Imwana we imunu katsokufa ka Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka pfagholonga. Lekeni katsoghaya imunu yula iyomhunduka Imwana we Imunu. Ing'awile ng'apfu kwe imunu ka ayo ka ng'elekighwe bae.”
Yuda, ayula iyabamile kumhunduka Yesu, kalonga, “Mlangulitsi, si nene bae.” Yesu kamwidika, “Ghweghwe kulonga.”
Hawang'ali wakuja, Yesu kasola ichighate, kachibaliki, kachibena kaweng'a iwanang'ina wake, kalonga, “Msole mje, aluno lukuli Iwangu.”
Kuya kasola chikombe, kachibaliki, kaweng'a iwanang'ina wake, kalonga, “Wose mnwele chikombe achi.”
“Aino iyo idamu yangu ye lilaghano, iikwitike kwaajili ya wengi kuleghusighwa nzambi.
Nowalongelani, sitsakunwa keli bae idipfai mbaka litsuwa lila hanitsoinwa idipfai ya sambi na mwemwe mne undewa wa Aba wangu.”
Hawamalitse kwimba wila, woka, waghenda kune Chidunda cha Mitseituni.
Kuya Yesu kawalongela, “Chilo chino mtsotsuma na kundeka, ka pfayandikighwe. Nitsomtowa imdimi, na iwang'olo we likingili watsopwililika,
Lekeni hanitsotsilihuka, nitsowalongolani Galilaya.”
Petiri kamwidika, “Hata wose wang'akuleka, nene sikuleka bae.”
Yesu kamlongelela Petiri, “Nokulongela ghendo, chilo chino ng'ana ijogholo yeke, kutsombela mala ndatu.”
Petiri kamwidika, “Sikubela bae, hata ka nobamighwa nife naghwe.” Na iwanang'ina wose walonga pfipfo.
Kuya Yesu kaghenda ne iwanang'ina wake hanu hakemighwe Getisemane, kawalongela, “Mkale hano, nene noghenda hala kulomba.”
Kamsola Petiri na iwana weli wa Sebedayo, kuya kandusa kwona usungu, na kughanzika.
Kawalongela, “Ghumoyo ghwangu ghuna usungu mwingi, mbaka nobama nife. Mkale hano na mkale meso na nene.”
Kaghenda hambele chidogho, katowa maghoti, kenama mbaka chihanga chake chighusa hasi, kalomba, “Aba wangu, ka yodahika, uchileghuse chikombe chino che maghayo kuna nene. Lekeni si ka nene pfanibama, ila ka pfaubama ghweghwe.”
Kuya kawoyila iwanang'ina wake, kawapfika wawasa. Kamghutsa Petiri, “Angu ng'amdahile bae kukala meso na nene hata kwa isaa imwe?”
“Mkale meso, mlombe ili mleke kwingila mne maghetso, ghumoyo ghwobama, lekeni lukuli lwahela ingupfu.”
Kaghenda lwakeli, kalomba, “Aba wangu, ka ng'aidahika bae kuchileghusa ichikombe chino che maghayo mbaka nichinwe, ghoubama ghweghwe ghatendeke.”
Hayohile lwa keli, kawapfika keli wawasa kwaapfila nenge tsawo ng'atsidahile bae kukala meso.
Kawaleka koka keli, na kalomba lwa kadatu, kalonga chinu chichila.
Kuya kawoyila iwanang'ina wake kawalongela, “Angu mng'ali mwowasa na kubwihila? Mlole, isaa ya habehi, na Imwana we Imunu kakwing'ighwa kwe iwanu wane nzambi.
Mwinuke, tukeni! Hayo kakutsa iyonihunduka!”
Hayang'ali yolonga apfo, Yuda yumwe we iwanang'ina kumi na weli, kapfika ne iwanu wengi iwakindile imimaghe ne ipfilungu, tsawatumighwa na iwatambika wakulu na iwakulu we iwanu.
Yuda tsakaweng'a chitango. “Imunu yanimnonela iyo yuyo yamumbama, mghogheni.”
Bahala Yuda kamghendela Yesu, kalonga, “Mlangulitsi, nokulamsa!” Kuya kamnonela.
Yesu kamlongela, “Sale yangu, utende achila chautsile.” Kuya iwanu awo wamghendela Yesu, wamkinda, wamghogha.
Yumwe we awala iwakalile na Yesu kagholosa ghumoko ghwake, kasomola limaghe lyake, kamtowa imtumwa we imtambika mkulu, kamghana lighutwi.
Yesu kamlongela, “Uyitse limaghe hanu hake, kwaapfila awala wose iwokinda limaghe watsakufa kwa limaghe.
Angu ng'ammanyile bae ka ning'adahile kumlomba Aba wangu, naye ang'anighalile makingili ghe asikali kubita kumi na meli ghe wamalaika watse kunyapfila.
Lekeni lelo ghatsotimilatse Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka igholonga, yobamighwa ilawile pfino?”
Bahala Yesu kawalongela iwanu wala, “Angu mutsa na mimaghe na pfilungu kungogha, ka nene na mbapfi? Chila litsuwa tsanikala namwe na nilangulitsa mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu, ng'amnighoghile bae.
Lekeni agha ghose ghalawila ili ghawandikile manabii ghatimile.” Kuya iwanang'ina wake wamleka, watsuma.
Awala iwamghoghile Yesu wamghala kwa Kayafa, imtambika mkulu, kwawatinganile iwolangulitsa ghamalaghitso ne iwakulu.
Lekeni, Petiri kamuwinza kwa kutali mbaka hachitala he mtambika mkulu. Kengila mghati, kakala hasi na iwabetetsi, yalole choni chitsolawila.
Iwabala we inambiko na Libalatsa lyose wang'ali wobama ukalangama we ughutsu kwaajili ya Yesu, ili wadahe kumkoma.
Lekeni ng'awapatile ukalangama wowose bae, hata ka iwakalangama wengi we ughutsu watsa hambele. Kuya iwanu weli watsa hambele,
walonga, “Imunu yuno kalonga apfi, ‘Nodaha kuimwagha Ing'anda ye Imulungu na kuitsenga keli mne ghamatsuwa madatu.’ ”
Kuya mtambika mkulu kenuka kamlongela Yesu, “Kwahela che ukwidika? Agha ighawolonga iwanu wano gholongesa?”
Lekeni Yesu kanyamala. Mtambika mkulu, kamlongela, “Wilahe kwe Imulungu iyali mghima. Utulongele ka ghweghwe kwa Kiristu, Imwana we Imulungu.”
Yesu kamwidika, “Ghweghwe kwolonga. Lekeni nowalongelani wose, kulawa sambi na kughendelela mtsomwona Imwana we Imunu kakala ubali wa kujilo we Imulungu Yane ingupfu, kakutsa mne ghamawingu gha kulanga.”
Bahala Mtambika mkulu kadegha ghamaghwanda ghake kalonga, “Kaligha! Ule lelo twobama keli wakalangama? Mwemwe wenyegho mmuhulika pfayalighile.
Mwemwe mkonatse?” Wamwidika, “Katotsa, yakomighwe.”
Wambwalulila ghamate mchihanga na wamtowa. Wamwenga wamtowa makofi.
Walonga, “Ghwe Kiristu, utange yuhi yakutowile?”
Petiri tsakakala kunze mwe chikuta, na imtumwa yumwe pinga kamghendela, kamlongela, “Naghwe pfipfila tsakwahamwe na Yesu wa Galilaya.”
Lekeni Petiri kabela hambele ha wose, kalonga, “Simanyile bae chaulonga?”
Kuya kalawa kunze, ako imtumwa yungi pinga kamwona, kuya kawalongela iwanu, “Hayuno naye tsakahamwe na Yesu wa Natsareti.”
Petiri kabela keli, kwa kwilaha, “Simmanyile bae imunu ayo!”
Hambele chidogho, awala iwemile hala wamghendela Petiri walonga, “Naghwe kwa yumwe wawo ghendo, kwaapfila hata kulonga kwako kolangusa ghweghwe kwa Mgalilaya.”
Kuya Petiri kandusa kwilighita na kwilaha, kalonga, “Mbe, simmanyile bae imunu ayo!” Bahala ijogholo keka,
na Petiri kakumbuka imbuli iyailongile Yesu. “Ijogholo ng'ana yeke, kutsombela mala ndatu.” Kalawa kunze, kalila kwa usungu.
Nemitondotondo, iwatambika wakulu ne iwakulu we iwanu wose tsawalamla kumkoma Yesu.
Wamwoha, wamlongotsa wamghala kwa Pilato, mkulu wa isi iyasaghulighwe ne mkulu Roma.
Yuda, iyamhunduke Yesu, hayonile Yesu kahighighwa, kona usungu katsuyitsa sendi tsila selasini tsayasolile kwe iwatambika wakulu.
Kawalongela, “Nitotsa, kwaapfila nimhunduka imunu iyalihela totso yakomighwe.” Lekeni wawo wamwidika, “Twetwe ng'atukwalangula bae, alyo lyako.”
Apfo Yuda kasa sendi atso mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu, kuya kaghenda kwikoma kwa kwibota imwenyegho.
Iwatambika wakulu wadondola sendi tsila, walonga, “Ng'apfinoghile bae kwika sendi tsino mne hatsina ye Ing'anda ye Imulungu. Kwaapfila atsino sendi tsa idamu.”
Apfo walamla sendi atso waghulile mghunda wa wafina pfiha uwe hanu he kutsikila iwahenza.
Ndo mana mbaka leloli mghunda awo wokemighwa, “Mghunda wa Damu.”
Kuya achila chayalongile nabii Yeremiya chitimila, “Watsosola sendi selasini, tsawatoghole iwanu wa Isiraeli kumlihila,
watsitumila kughulila mghunda we wafina pfiha, ka Imtwatsa pfayanilaghitse.”
Yesu tsakema hambele ha imkulu wa Roma, na imkulu ayo kamghutsa, “Angu ghweghwe kwa Imndewa wa Wayahudi?” Yesu kamwidika, “Ghweghwe kolonga.”
Iwabala we inambiko ne iwakulu hawang'ali womwing'a ghamaghomba, ng'edike chochose bae.
Kuya Pilato kamghutsa, “Angu ng'uhulika bae ghamaghomba ghano ghowokulonga?”
Lekeni Yesu ng'edike imbuli yoyose bae, mkulu ayo kakangawala ghendo.
Chila chihungo che Paska imkulu wa Roma katsowela kumlekelela imwohingwa yumwe, iyawambamile iwanu.
Tsahana mwohighwa yumwe, iyamanyike ng'ani yakemighwe Baraba.
Apfo iwanu hawetingane, Pilato kawaghutsa, “Mwobama nimlekelele yuhi? Baraba au Yesu yokemighwa Kiristu?”
Kwaapfila Pilato tsakamanya ghendo ka wamghala Yesu kuna yeye, kwaapfila tsawamwonela chepfu.
Pilato hayang'ali kakala mne chighoda cha kuhighila, mwehe wake kamtumila usenga, “Uleke kumtendela chochose imunu ayo yalihela totso. Kwaapfila leloli nechilo tsanidununzika ng'ani mndoto kwaajili yake.”
Lekeni iwabala we inambiko na iwakulu, waghusongesa mtingano we iwanu wamlombe Pilato amlekelele Baraba na Yesu yakomighwe.
Pilato kawaghutsa keli, “Yuhi mna wano weli mwombama nimlekelele?” Wamwidika, “Baraba.”
Pilato kawaghutsa, “Lelo nimtende choni ayu Yesu yokemighwa Kiristu?” Wose wamwidika, “Umuwambe mna msalaba!”
Pilato kawaghutsa, “Ule? Choni chihile chayatendile?” Lekeni wose wakemelela hamwe, “Umuwambe mna msalaba!”
Pilato hayonile ng'odaha bae chochose, ne hengele tsalyakwandusa kulawila, kasola ghamatsi, kahopfugha ghamoko ghake hambele he iwanu, kalonga, “Nene nahela litotso kwa ukufa kwe imunu ayu, alyo lyenu iwenyegho!”
Iwanu wose walonga, “Totso lye ukufa kwake liwe mchanya mwetu na mchanya mwe iwanetu!”
Kuya kamlekelela Baraba kuna wawo. Lekeni kalonga wampfapule Yesu na mijeledi, kamlapfa yawambighwe mna msalaba.
Kuya asikali wa Pilato wamghala Yesu mne ing'anda ye imndewa, na kingili lyose lye asikali limmemela.
Wamtsula ghamaghwanda ghake, wampfatsa lighwanda dung'u,
Kuya wabota fiya ya tsimiwa walika mwitwi mwake, kuya weka ing'weku mne ghumoko ghwake wa kujilo, watowa ghamaghoti hambele hake. Wambetsa, walonga, “Mbukwa, Imndewa wa Wayahudi.”
Wambwalulila ghamate, wasola ing'weku wamtowa mwitwi.
Hawamalitse kumbetsa, wamtsula lighwanda alyo, wampfatsa ghamaghwanda ghake. Wamghala yawambighwe mna msalaba.
Hawang'ali wakuka, watingana ne imunu yumwe iyolawila Kirene, iyakemighwe Simoni, wamnanahitsa yaughale msalaba.
Wapfika hanu hokemighwa Goligota, mana yake Chibombwe che Litwi.
Wamwing'a Yesu idipfai iitifighwe ne ichinu che usungu, lekeni hayailanzile, kalema ukunwa.
Wamuwamba mna msalaba, kuya wegholela ghamaghwanda ghake kwa kutowa simbi.
Wakala hasi wamlolesa.
Na hachanya he litwi lyake, wandika lighomba lyake, “Ayuno Yesu, Imndewa wa Wayahudi.”
Iwabapfi weli nawo tsawawambighwa hamwe naye, yumwe ghumoko ghwake ghwa kujilo na yungi ghumoko ghwake ghwa kumoso.
Iwanu iwalutile hala, wahighitsa ghamatwi ghawo kwa kumbetsa, wamligha,
walonga, “Ambe ghweghwe ung'aimwaghile Ing'anda ye Imulungu na kuitsenga keli mne ghamatsuwa madatu! Lelo wikombole imwenyeng'o. Ka ghweghwe kwa Imwana we Imulungu hulumka mna msalaba.”
Pfipfila iwatambika wakulu na iwolangulitsa ghamalaghitso, na iwabala wose wambesa.
Walonga, “Kawakombola iwanu wangi, lekeni ng'odaha bae kwikombola imwenyegho, ambe yeye ka Imndewa we Isiraeli, tumlole lelo yahulumke mna msalaba, na twetwe tutsomtoghola.
Tsakamuhuwila Imulungu na kalonga ‘Nene na Imwana we Imulungu.’ Lekani lelo tulole Imulungu yamkombole ka kombama.”
Pfipfila iwabapfi weli iwawambighwe hamwe naye, wamligha.
Kulawa saa sita mbaka saa tisa ichisi tsachighubika isi yose.
Haipfikile saa tisa, Yesu kakemelela, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakitani?” Mana yake, “Imulungu wangu, Imulungu wangu, ebali kondeka?”
Iwanu iwemile hala hawahulike apfo, walonga, “Komkema Eliya.”
Bahala yumwe wawo katsuma kasola dodoki, kalika mne dipfai iing'ang'a, kuya kalika mne ing'weku kamwing'a Yesu yainwe.
Awala iwanu wangi walonga, “Lelo mleke tulole ka Eliya kakutsa kumkombola.”
Yesu kakemelela keli kwa litsi likulu, kuya kafa.
Bahala lipatsiya ililimghati mwe Ing'anda ye Imulungu lidegheka pfihindi pfibili kulawa uchang'a mbaka hasi. Isi tsaidedema na ghamabambalawe ghatulika.
tsikabuli tsighubuka ne iwanu wengi we Imulungu iwafile tsawatsilihuka.
Walawa kunze mwe tsikabuli, na Yesu hayatsilihuke waghenda mne ghumji mwenzeluka, na iwanu wengi wawona.
Ayula imkulu we asikali na awala iwakalile naye womkalitsa Yesu, hawonile isi ihighisika na ghose ighalawile, tsawapfuka, walonga, “Ayuno tsa Imwana we Imulungu ghendo!”
Tsakukala na iwapinga wengi, wololesa kwa kutali, awo iwo iwamuwinzile Yesu kulawa Galilaya na iwamwapfile.
Mna wawo, tsakukala na Mariya Magidalena, Mariya mai wawo tsina Jakobu na Yosefu na mai we iwana wa Sebedayo.
Nemihe haipfikile, imunu yumwe tajiri kulawa Arimataya iyakemighwe Yosefu kapfika, naye imwenyegho tsakakala mwanang'ina wa Yesu.
Kamghendela Pilato kamlomba yamwing'e lukuli lwa Yesu, na Pilato kalaghitsa yeng'ighwe.
Yosefu kalusola lukuli, kalupfatsa isanda inoghile,
kalwika hanu hake imwenyegho ha sambi ha kutsikila. Kuya kabingilisa libwe kulu hambele he libani lye likabuli, kuya koka.
Mariya Magidalena na Mariya yungi tsawakala baho, welolesa ne likabuli.
Litsuwa lya keli, ilili litsuwa lya Sabato, iwatambika wakulu na Mafarisayo waghenda kwa Pilato.
Walonga, “Imndewa, twokumbuka mghutsu yula, hayang'ali mghima tsakalonga, ‘Ghang'abita ghamatsuwa madatu, nitsotsilihuka keli.’
Apfo, ulaghitse kabuli lyake walikalitse ghoya mbaka mne litsuwa lya kadatu. Hela iwanang'ina wake wodaha kutsa na kulwiba lukuli lwake na kuwalongela iwanu kuwa katsilihuka. Ughutsu uno wa utsighilo utsakuwa wiha kubita ula wa mwanduso.”
Pilato kawedika, “Mnawo asikali, mghende mkakalitse likabuli ka pfamdaha.”
Apfo woka na wakalitsa ghoya likabuli kwa kwika chitango mne libwe na wawaleka asikali wokalitsa.
Litsuwa lya Sabato halimalile, lupfilipfili litsuwa lye mwanduso lye lijuma, Mariya Magidalena na Mariya yungi waghenda kulola likabuli.
Tsakulawila mdedemo mkulu we isi, kwaapfila malaika we Imtwatsa tsakahulumka kulawa kulanga, kaghenda mne likabuli kalibingilisa libwe hambali, kalikalila.
Chihanga chake tsachikala ka lumwesa, na lighwanda lyake tsalitselu chwee!
Iwanu iwang'ali wokalitsa wapfuka ghendo, wadedema na woneka ka wafa.
Malaika ayo kawalongela iwapinga, “Mleke kupfuka, kwaapfila nomanya mwombama Yesu iyawambighwe mna msalaba.
Ng'alibaha bae, katsilihuka ka pfayalongile. Mtse mlole hanu hayawasile.
Lelo msumke mghende, muwalongelele pfino iwanang'ina wake. ‘Yesu katsilihuka, naye katsowalongola kughenda Galilaya. Baho mtsomwona.’ Haya lelo, ma niwalongela.”
Apfo iwapinga awo wasumka kuka kulawa hane likabuli, kwa kupfuka na ndeng'elelo ng'ulu, watsuma waghenda kuwalongela iwanang'ina wake.
Bahala Yesu ketingana nawo, kawalongela, “Nowalamsani.” Wamghendela, wakinda ghamaghulu ghake, wamtamanila.
Kuya Yesu kawalongela, “Mleke kupfuka. Mghende mkawalongele wandughu tsangu waghende Galilaya, ako watsombona.”
Iwapinga hawang'ali wamnzila, asikali wangi mna awala iwakalitse likabuli waghenda kune ghumji wawalongela watambika wakulu chila chinu ichilawile.
Iwakulu we inambiko hawetingane ne iwabala wapanga imbuli yawo, waweng'a sendi nyingi awala iwakalitse likabuli,
kuya wawalongela, “Walongeleni pfino iwanu, ‘Iwanang'ina wake watsa nechilo, wamwiba hatuwasile.’
Na imkulu we isi ang'ahulika mbuli ino, twetwe tutsolonga naye, namwe ng'amtsokwingila mne maghayo.”
Apfo awala asikali wasola sendi, na watenda ka pfawalongelighwe. Na mbuli ayo yenela kwe Wayahudi mbaka leloli.
Kuya iwanang'ina kumi na yumwe waghenda Galilaya kune chidunda, ako Yesu kwayawalongele waghende.
Hawamwonile, wamtamanila lekeni wangi wapfuka.
Yesu kawaghendela, kawalongela, “Ukulu wose uli kulanga na uli muisi ning'ighwa nene.
Apfo, mghende mkawatende iwanu we isi tsose wawe wanang'ina wangu, muwabatitse kwa taghwa lya Aba na Imwana na Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka,
na muwalangulitse kughakinda aghala ghose ghaniwalaghitse. Na nene na hamwe namwe ghamatsuwa ghose mbaka iisi haitsomala.”
Haino Imbuli Inoghile ya Yesu Kiristu, Imwana we Imulungu.
Yakwandusa ka pfayandikighwe mne chitabu cha nabii Isaya. “Imulungu kalonga, ‘Nitsomtuma imtumighwa wangu yakulongole, ayo katsoyandaa inzila yako.’
Litsi lye imunu lyokema kunyika, ‘Muyandae inzila ye Imtwatsa, muigholose inzila yake.’ ”
Yohane tsakalawila kunyika, kowapetela iwanu na kowabatitsa. Kawalongela iwanu, “Mtsileke nzambi tsenu namwe mbatitsighwe, na Imulungu katsowaleghusila nzambi tsenu.”
Iwanu wengi walawa mne isi ya Yudeya na mne ghumji ghwa Yerusalemu waghenda kumuhulikitsa Yohane. Watsitoghola nzambi tsawo, naye kawabatitsa mne ghumto Yoridani.
Yohane tsakapfala lighwanda ilitendighwe kwa ngotsi ya ingamiya, na ghumsipi ghwe ngotsi mchuno, na chijo chake chayang'ali yakuja tsachikala iwanzighe na uki.
Kawalongela iwanu, “Kuchughu kwangu kakutsa yane ingupfu kubita nene. Nene sibamighwa bae hata kwinama na kudohola mitsabi ye imikwabatsa yake.
Nene nowabatitsa mwemwe kwa ghamatsi, lekeni ayo katsowabatitseni kwa Ghumuhe ghwe Imulungu.”
Ghamatsuwa agho, Yesu tsakatsa kulawa ghumji ghwa Natsareti, mne isi ya Galilaya, kabatitsighwa na Yohane mne ghumto Yoridani.
Yesu hayang'ali yolawa mne ghamatsi, tsakona ililanga lopfughuka na Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka komhulumkila ka injiwa.
Kuya Iitsi lilawa kulanga, “Ghweghwe kwa imwanangu yanikunoghele, ninoghelighwa naghwe.”
Bahala Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka kamlongotsa yaghende kunyika,
kuya kakala ako ghamatsuwa arubaini koghetsighwa na Setani. Iwanyama wa kwibagho nawo tsawabahala, na iwamalaika wamtumikila.
Yohane hekighwe mchifungo, Yesu kaghenda Galilaya kuwapetela iwanu Imbuli Inoghile ye Imulungu.
Kalonga, “Ichipindi chitsa, Undewa we Imulungu wa habehi. Mtsileke nzambi tsenu muitoghole Imbuli Inoghile.”
Yesu hayang'ali yoghenda mmbalimbali mwe tsimbu Galilaya, kawona iwalowa wasomba weli, Simoni na Andereya, ndughu yake. Tsawang'ali wolowa iwasomba.
Yesu kawalongela, “Mniwinze, nani nitsowatenda mwemwe muwe iwalowa iwanu.”
Bahala watsileka nyapfu tsawo, wamuwinza.
Kaghenda hatali chidogho, kawona Jakobu na Yohane, iwana wa Sebedayo, wamne mnumbwi ghwawo, wotenda ghoya nyapfu tsawo.
Bahala Yesu hayawonile, kawakema. Nawo wamleka Sebedayo, aba wawo mne mnumbwi hamwe ne iwatenda isang'ano, wamuwinza.
Yesu ne iwanang'ina wake wapfika mne ghumji ghwa Kaperinaumu. Litsuwa lya Sabato, Yesu kengila mne ing'anda ye ukulombela, kandusa kulangulitsa.
Iwanu iwamhulikitse wakangawala kwa ghamalangulitso ghake, kwaapfila yeye ng'alangulitse bae ka iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso gha Musa, ila kalangulitsa ka imunu yane ukulu.
Bahala imunu yane ichinyamkela kengila mne ing'anda ye ukulombela kakemelela kwa litsi likulu,
“Ubama kutenda choni, Yesu wa Natsareti? Kutsa kutukoma? Nokumanya ghweghwe kwa Mwenzeluka we Imulungu!”
Yesu kamkembela ichinyamkela, “Nyamale! Umlawe imunu yuno!”
Ichinyamkela ayo tsakamhighitsa kwe ingupfu imunu ayo, kuya kakemelela, kamlawa.
Apfo iwanu wose wakangawala ghendo, weghutsa, “Apfino pfinu pfachi? Agha malangulitso gha sambi? Imunu yuno kana uwetso wa kulapfa ipfinyamkela, nawo womtegheletsa.”
Apfo mbuli tsa Yesu tsenela himahima mne isi yose ya Galilaya.
Yesu ne iwanang'ina wake, hamwe na Jakobu na Yohane walawa mne ing'anda ye ukulombela waghenda ukaye kwa Simoni na Andereya.
Mai mkwe wa Simoni tsakakala kawasa mlusatsi koghula lihoma. Yesu hayapfikile, wamlongela mbuli tse ipinga ayo.
Kamghendela, kamkinda ghumoko kamwinula. Utamu umlawa, kandusa kuwatumikila.
Mihe haipfikile na litsua kuswa, iwanu wamghalila Yesu iwatamu wose ne iwanu wane ipfinyamkela.
Iwanu wose wa ghumji wetingana hachibwalu he ing'anda.
Yesu kawahonetsa iwanu wane matamu ghoghose na kalapfa ipfinyamkela wengi. Ng'aweng'ile bae ipfinyamkela nyafwasi ye ukulonga chochose kwaapfila tsawammanya yeye nani.
Lupfilipfili, litsua ng'ana lilawe, Yesu kenuka, kalawa aho hakaye, kaghenda kunze kwe ghumji, hanu halihela imunu, kamlomba Imulungu.
Simoni na weyaghe waghenda kumbama.
Hawamwonile, wamlongela, “Iwanu wose wokubama ghweghwe.”
Yesu kawedika, “Twobamighwa tughende kune ipfijiji pfingi ipfili habehi. Amo nobamighwa niwapetele iwanu Imbuli Inoghile, kwaapfila acho chicho chanitsilile.”
Apfo Yesu kanga isi yose ya Galilaya, aku kowapetela iwanu mne tsing'anda tsawo tse ukulombela na kulapfa ipfinyamkela.
Imunu yumwe iyoghula ukoma tsakamghendela Yesu. Kamtowela ghamaghoti kamlomba, kalonga, “Ung'abama, kwodaha kunideghetesa.”
Yesu kamwonela libatsi imunu ayo, kagholosa ghumoko ghwake, kamkinda. Kuya kalonga, “Nobama, degheta!”
Bahala utamu umlawa, kahona.
Bahala Yesu kamleka yoke aku komkomangitsa ghendo, kamlongela,
“Uleke kumlongela imunu wowose imbuli ino, ila ughende wikelanguse kwe mtambika, ulapfe nambiko ka pfayalaghitse Musa. Kuya yakulanguse kwe iwanu ka kuhona.”
Lekeni imunu ayo koka, kandusa kwenetsa mbuli atso chila hanu, mbaka Yesu ng'adahile bae kughenda mwatsimwatsi mne ghumji. Ila kakala kunze hanu halihela imunu. Lekeni iwanu tsawang'ali womghendela kulawa chila hanu.
Ghamatsuwa chidogho hambele, Yesu koya keli Kaperinaumu, na mbuli tsenela kwe iwanu ka tsaka ukaye.
Iwanu wengi wetingana hamwe mbaka kukala kuduhu hokukala, wamema mbaka mne chibwalu. Yesu yang'ali yowapetela imbuli yake.
Baho iwanu wane wapfika, wambapa imunu iyaholole wamghalila Yesu.
Kwaapfila iwanu tsa wengi, ng'awadahile bae kumghala habehi na Yesu. Apfo watobola mchiswili, kuchanya mwe hanu hayakalile Yesu. Baho, wamhulumsa imunu ayo iyawasile mchilagho.
Yesu honile ukutoghola kwawo, kamlongela imunu ayo iyaholole, “Mwanangu, nzambi tsako tsileghusighwa.”
Wangi we iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso gha Musa iwakalile baho weghutsa mne imimoyo yawo,
“Angu ichinu chachi ichimtenda alonge pfino? Komligha Imulungu. Imulungu yaliyeka iyo iyodaha kuleghusa nzambi!”
Bahala Yesu kamanya achila chawang'ali wokwalangula mne imimoyo yawo, kawalongela, “Ebali mwakwalangula ipfinu pfino?
Chihi chibewe, kumlongela imunu iyaholole, ‘Nzambi tsako tsileghusighwa,’ au kumlongela, ‘Winuke, usole chilagho chako ughende’?
Nobama mmanye ka Imwana we Imunu kana uwetso wa kuleghusa nzambi muisi.” Baho kamlongela imunu yaholole,
“Nokulongela, winuke, usole chilagho chako uke ukaye!”
Naye kenuka, kasola chilagho chake kaghenda aku iwanu wose womlola. Iwanu wose tsawakangawala, wamtunya Imulungu, walonga, “Ng'ana twone ghendo ichinu ka chino!”
Yesu kaghenda keli mmbalimbali mwe tsimbu. Iwanu wamghendela, naye kandusa kuwalangulitsa.
Hang'ali yoluta, kamwona Lawi imwana we Alifayo kakala mne ing'anda ya kulihila kodi. Yesu kamlongela, “Niwinze.” Lawi kenuka, kamuwinza.
Yesu hayang'ali yakuja ichijo cha nemihe mne ing'anda ya Lawi, iwasola kodi wengi na “wane nzambi” tsawakala hasi wang'ali wakuja naye ne wanang'ina wake, kwaapfila tsakukala ne iwanu wengi iwomuwinza.
Iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso wamwenga iwakalile Mafarisayo, hawamwonile Yesu kakuja ne “Wane nzambi” ne iwasola kodi, wawaghutsa iwanang'ina wake, “Ebali kakuja ne iwasola kodi na ‘wane nzambi’?”
Yesu kawahulika, kawalongela, “Iwanu iwaghima ng'awombama bae imghanga, ila iwatamu iwo iwombama mghanga. Sitsile bae kuwakema iwanu iwanoghile, ila wane nzambi.”
Iwanafunzi wa Yohane ne iwanang'ina wa Mafarisayo wang'ali wofunga ukuja. Iwanu wangi wamtsila Yesu wamghutsa, “Ebali iwanang'ina wa Yohane ne iwanang'ina wa Mafarisayo wofunga ukuja, lekeni iwanang'ina wako ng'awofunga ukuja bae?”
Yesu kawedika, “Apfi, iwanu iwakemighwe kune ichihungo cha kukwela wodaha kufunga ukuja aku mmale yokwela kabaho hamwe nawo? Ng'awodaha bae kufunga ukuja.
Lekeni ichipindi chakutsa mmale iyokwela katsosolighwa kulawa kuna wawo, na baho watsofunga ukuja.
Kuduhu imunu iyoghana chilaka mne lighwanda lya sambi na kuchidapfalitsa mne lighwanda lya ghumwande, ang'atenda apfo, chilaka cha sambi chitsolihinya lighwanda lya ghumwande na hanu hadegheke hatsakongetseka.
Na kuduhu imunu iyoghuma idipfai ya sambi mne imikoba ye ngotsi ya ghumwande. Ka kotenda apfo, dipfai ya sambi itsoitula imikoba ayo, dipfai itsokwitika ne imikoba itsohinyika. Ila koghuma dipfai ya sambi mne imikoba ya sambi!”
Litsuwa limwe lya sabato, Yesu na wanafunzi wake wang'ali wobita mne imighunda ye uhemba. Hawang'ali woghenda, iwanang'ina wake wandusa kukwanyula imikungwi ye uhemba.
Mafarisayo wamlongela Yesu, “Lola! Ebali wotenda ichinu ichighomighwe mne litsuwa lya Sabato?”
Yesu kawedika, “Pfii ng'amsomile bae pfatendile Daudi na wayaghe hawakalile ne nzala?
Mne ghamatsuwa ghe Imtambika mkulu Abiyatari, Daudi tsakengila mne ing'anda ye Imulungu, kaja pfighate ipfilapfighwe kwe Imulungu, pfighate apfo tsapfibamighwa pfijighwe ne iwapfilongotsi we inambiko waliyeka. Pfipfila kaweng'a wayaghe.”
Kuya Yesu kawalongela, “Litsuwa lya Sabato likighwa kwaajili ye iwanu, na si iwanu bae kwaajili ye Litsuwa lya Sabato.”
Imwana we Imunu ka Imtwatsa wa Litsuwa lya Sabato.
Kuya Yesu kaghenda keli mne ing'anda ye ukulombela. Aho kukala ne imunu yane ghumoko ighuholole.
Iwanu wamwenga wang'ali wobama imbuli ya kumghoghela Yesu. Apfo wamlolesa ka ang'amhonetse imunu ayo mne Litsuwa lya Sabato.
Yesu kamlongela imunu ayo, “Utse hano hambele.”
Kuya kawaghutsa iwanu, “Apfi chihi chinoghile cha kutenda mna litsuwa lya Sabato, kutenda ghanoghile au ghehile? Kuukombola ughima au kuukoma?” Lekeni wawo ng'awalongile chinu chochose bae.
Kawalolesa iwanu kwa maya, baho kona usungu mmoyo mwake, kwa usughu we imimoyo yawo. Kuya kamlongela imunu yula, “Ugholose ghumoko ghwako.” Naye kaghugholosa, na ghumoko ghwake ghuhona.
Apfo Mafarisayo walawa kunze mwe ing'anda ye Imulungu, wetingana ne iwanu wa Herodi wandusa kubama inzila ya kumkoma Yesu.
Yesu ne iwanang'ina wake waghenda kune ghumto Galilaya na iwanu wengi tsawamuwinza, walawila Galilaya na Yudeya.
Hawahulike ghose ghatendile, iwanu wengi wamtsila kulawa Yudeya, Yerusalemu, Idumeya ne ipfijiji ipfili kumwambu mwa ghumto Yoridani ne imiji ya Tiro na Sidoni.
Kwaapfila iwanu wakala wengi, Yesu kawalongela iwanang'ina wake wamwikile ghoya mnumbwi, ili iwanu waleke kumsoghelela.
Kwaapfila tsakawahonetsa iwanu wengi, iwatamu wose wang'ali womsoghelela habehi wamkinde.
Ne iwanu wane ipfinyamkela chila hawamwonile, waghwa hasi hambele hake, wakemelela, “Ghweghwe kwa Imwana we Imulungu.”
Yesu kawaghoma ipfinyamkela waleke kumlongela imunu wowose ka yeye tsanani.
Yesu kagheluka kuchidunda, kawakema awala iyawabamile mwenyegho, nawo wamghendela.
Naye kawasaghula iwanu kumi na weli, kawakema watumighwa. Kawalongela, “Niwasaghula mwemwe mkale na nene. Kuya nitsowatuma mghende mkawapetele iwanu.
Namwe mtsakuwa na ukulu wa kulapfa ipfinyamkela.”
Awano iwo iwanu kumi na weli iyawasaghule. Simoni, yakemighwe na Yesu taghwa lingi Petiri,
Jakobu na ndughu yake Yohane, iwana wa Sebedayo Yesu tsakaweng'a taghwa Boanerige, mana yake iwana wa mdumo,
Andereya na Filipi, na Batalomeyo, na Matei, na Tomasi, na Jakobu imwana wa Alifayo, na Tadei, na Simoni Mkananayo,
na Yuda Isikarioti, iyamhunduke Yesu.
Kuya Yesu kaghenda ukaye, iwanu wengi wetingana keli mbaka Yesu ne iwanang'ina wake ng'awadahile bae ukuja.
Wandughu tsake hawahulike agho, waghenda kumsola kwaapfila tsawalonga, “Kana lukwale.”
Na iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso gha Musa iwalawile Yerusalemu walonga, “Kana Belisebuli! Imkulu we ipfinyamkela iyo iyomwing'a ingupfu ya kulapfa ipfinyamkela.”
Yesu kawakema, kawalongela kwa imifano, “Apfi Setani kodahatse kumlapfa Setani?
Undewa wowose ung'eghola wenyegho, ambe wakughwa.
Ka ing'anda yeghola yenyegho, ing'anda ayo itsakughwa.
Apfo ka undewa wa Setani weghola iwenyegho, utsakughwa na kutsigha.
“Kuduhu imunu iyodaha kwingila mng'anda mwe imunu yane ingupfu na kusola ipfinu pfake, mbaka tanu amwohe imunu ayo. Baho katsodaha kupfisola ipfinu pfake.
“Nowalongela ghendo, iwanu watsoleghusighwa nzambi tsawo na ghamaligho ghawo ghose kwe Imulungu.
Lekeni imunu wowose iyomligha Ghumuhe ghwe Imulungu ng'odaha bae kuleghusighwa nzambi ayo, kwaapfila katenda nzambi ya ghamatsuwa ghose.”
Yesu tsakalonga apfi kwaapfila iwanu wang'ali wolonga, “Kana chinyamkela.”
Kuya mai wake Yesu ne iwandughu tsake wapfika. Wema kunze, wamtuma imunu mng'anda amkeme.
Iwanu tsawamtsunguluka Yesu. Nawo wamlongela, “Mai wako na ndughu tsako wakunze, wokubama ghweghwe.”
Yesu kawedika, “Apfi mai wangu nani na ndughu tsangu tsina nani?”
Kuya kawalola iwanu iwamtsunguluke, kalonga “Awano hano iwo mai wangu na ndughu tsangu!
Imunu wowose iyotenda aghala ghobama Imulungu, ayo iyo ndughu yangu na lumbu wangu na mai wangu.”
Yesu kandusa keli kulangulitsa mmbalimbali mwa tsimbu lya Galilaya. Iwanu wengi iwetingane wamtsunguluka mbaka kengila mne mnumbwi na kukala amo. Ne iwanu wose wakala mmbalimbali mwe tsimbu.
Tsakawalangulitsa ipfinu pfingi kwe imifano, na mne ghamalangulitso ghake kawalongela.
“Mtegheletse, Imunu iyohanda tsimbeghu tsakaghenda kumitsa tsimbeghu.
Hang'ali yomitsa, tsimbeghu tsimwenga tsilaghalila mnzila, pfideghe watsa, watsija.
Tsingi tsilaghalila mne ghamabwe ghane lidongo chidogho. Tsimbeghu tsota himahima, kwaapfila lidongo tsachidogho.
Litsua halilawile, liilakatsa imimeya kwaapfila imitsisi ng'aighendese hasi bae.
Tsimbeghu tsingi tsilaghalila mne tsimiwa, tsikula na tsihinyighwa na tsimiwa, apfo ng'atseleke bae.
Lekeni tsimbeghu tsingi tsilaghalila mne lidongo linoghile. Imimeya yota, ikula na yeleka tsimbeghu, ingi makumi madatu, ingi makumi sita ne ingi miya imwe.”
Kuya Yesu kalonga, “Imunu yane ghamaghutwi gha kuhulika, yahulike.”
Yesu hayakalile aliyeka, iwanang'ina kumi na weli ne iwanu wangi wamghutsa imbuli ayo ilonga choni.
Yesu kawalongela, “Mwemwe mwing'ighwa imbuli ifisighwe ya Undewa we Imulungu. Lekeni awala iwali kunze, wohulika ipfinu kwe imifano
ili, ‘Walole, lekeni waleke kwona, wahulike, lekeni waleke kumanya. wang'amanyile, wang'oyile kwe Imulungu, naye yang'awaleghusila nzambi tsawo.’ ”
Kuya Yesu kawaghutsa, “Apfi mwemwe ng'ammanyile bae mbuli ino? Lelo mtsomanyatse imbuli yoyose?
Imunu iyohanda kohanda Imbuli ye Imulungu.
Iwanu wangi weghala na tsimbeghu itsilaghalile mnzila. Hawohulika Imbuli ye Imulungu, Setani kakutsa na kuisola imbuli ihandighwe mghati mwawo.
Iwanu wangi weghala na tsimbeghu itsilaghalile mne ghamabwe. Baho hawohulika imbuli ye Imulungu, woibokela kwa kudeng'elela.
Lekeni kwaapfila wahela imitsitsi, wodudumila chidogho. Ukughaya au ukughanzika kung'alawila kwaajili ye imbuli ye Imulungu, baho woileka.
Iwanu wangi weghala na tsimbeghu itsilaghalile mne tsimiwa. Wohulika imbuli,
lekeni Sang'ano tse isi ino na kubama tsimali na kusulukila ipfinu pfingi, pfakwingila mghati mwawo na kuihinya imbuli ye Imulungu, ng'aikweleka bae.
Lekeni iwanu wangi weghala na tsimbeghu itsilaghalile mne lidongo linoghile. Wohulika imbuli ye Imulungu, woitoghola na wakweleka, wangi selasini, wangi sitini, na wangi miya imwe.”
Yesu kaghendelela kulonga, “Apfi kuna imunu iyoghala chitasa mng'anda na kuchighubika ne ichiha au kuchika kumpfungu mwe lusatsi? Apfi ng'ochika hanu ha kwikila chitasa, bae?
Kwaapfila ichinu chochose ichipfisighwe chitsakoneka, ne ichinu chochose ichighubikighwe chitsoghubulighwa.
Yane ghamaghutwi gha kuhulika, yahulike.”
Pfipfila kawalongela, “Mtegheletse ghoya chamuhulika! Ghamalaghitso ghamuwahighila iwanu wangi, Imulungu katsowahighila ghamalaghitso ghagho, kuya mtsakongetsighwa.
Kwaapfila imunu yane ichinu katsakongetsighwa ne imunu yalihela ichinu, katsobokighwa hata ichinu chidodo chayenacho.”
Yesu kaghendelela kulonga, “Undewa we Imulungu weghala pfino. Imunu kopwililisa tsimbeghu kumghunda.
Nechilo kowasa, nemisi kameso. Tsimbeghu tsakota na kukula, naye ng'omanya bae ichitendeka.
Lidongo lyenyegho lyotenda imimeya ikule na kweleka, tanu yotula, yolapfa imbelewele, kuya yakweleka.
Uhemba hauwela, imunu ayo kosenga kwa sengo yake, kwaapfila ichipindi cha kupfuna chipfika.”
Yesu kalonga keli, “Apfi Undewa we Imulungu weghala ne ichinu chachi? Apfi tutsolonga kwe imbuli yachi?
Weghala ne imbeghu ya haladali, imbeghu ndodo kubita tsimbeghu tsose itsihandighwa mne isi.
Lekeni ing'ahandighwa, yokula na yakuwa mmeya mkulu kubita imimeya yose mne mghunda, nayo yakuwa na ghamaputila makulu ng'ani mbaka wapfideghe wodaha kutsenga ipfibali mne ghamaputila ghake.”
Yesu kawapetela iwanu imbuli yake kwa mbuli nyingi itsighalile na tsino, kawalongela ka pfawadahile kuhulika.
Ng'alongile nawo bae ichinu chochose bila ye imbuli. Lekeni hawakalile ne iwanang'ina wake waliyeka, kawalongela chila ichinu.
Litsuwa alyo nemihe, Yesu kawalongela iwanang'ina wake, “Tuloke kumwambu kwa tsimbu.”
Tsawawaleka iwanu, iwanang'ina wengila mne mnumbwi mwakalile Yesu, wamsola woka naye. Pfipfila tsakukala na minumbwi ingi.
Inyahemu ilawila na ghamawimbi ghautowa mnumbwi mbaka ghwandusa kumema ghamatsi.
Yesu tsakakala kuchughu kwa mnumbwi kawasila ghumto. Iwanang'ina wake wamlamsa, wamlongela, “Mlangulitsi, apfi ng'aukona usungu bae, ka twetwe twotsama?”
Yesu kalamka, kalikembela libeho na kaghalongela ghamawimbi, “Nyamala!”, kuya libeho linyamala na kukala kutindiwala.
Kuya kawalongela iwanang'ina wake, “Ule mpfuka? Pfii, mng'ali ng'amtoghola bae?”
Nawo wapfuka ghendo, weghutsa, “Ayu munu wachi, libeho na ghamawimbi ghose ghomhulikitsa?”
Yesu ne iwanang'ina wake wapfika kumwambu kwa tsimbu Galilaya mne isi ya Gerasi.
Baho Yesu hayalawile mne mnumbwi, ketingana ne imunu yane ichinyamkela yalawile kune tsikaburi.
Imunu ayo tsakakala kune tsikaburi na kuduhu imunu yadahile kumwoha keli hata kwe iminyororo.
Kwaapfila tsakohighwa ghamoko na ghamaghulu ghake, lekeni tsakadumla iminyororo na kubena tsimingu itsili mmaghulu mwake. Na kuduhu imunu yane ingupfu yadahile kumghogha.
Imisi ne ichilo tsayang'ali yakwanga mne tsikaburi na mpfidunda, aku kokemelela na kwighanaghana kwa ghamabwe.
Hayamwonile Yesu kwa kutali, kamtsumila, kamtowela maghoti hambele hake.
Kalila kwa litsi likulu, kalonga, “Yesu Imwana we Imulungu iyali kuchanya ng'ani ubama choni kuna nene? Kwa taghwa lye Imulungu, nokulomba uleke kunidununza!”
Kalonga apfo kwaapfila Yesu tsakamlongela, “Chinyamkela, lawa mne imunu yuno!”
Kuya Yesu kamghutsa, “Taghwa lyako nani?” Naye kamwidika “Taghwa lyangu Kingili, mana twawengi.”
Kuya kamlomba Yesu aleke kuwawinga kunze kwe isi ila pfinyamkela awo.
Tsakukala na kingili kulu lye iwangubi wakuja habehi na chidunda.
Apfo ipfinyamkela wamlomba Yesu, “Utughale kune iwangubi, utulekelele twingile mna wawo.”
Yesu kawalekelela, ne ipfinyamkela awo wamlawa imunu ayo na kwingila mne iwangubi. Likingili lyose lye iwangubi 2,000 watsumila kune tsimbu na kutsama mne ghamatsi.
Iwadimi we iwangubi watsuma na kuwalongela iwanu mne ghumji na mne imighunda. Ne iwanu waghenda kulola achila ichilawile.
Hawapfikile kwa Yesu, wamwona imunu yula yakalile na likingili lye ipfinyamkela kakala hasi, kapfala ghamaghwanda ghake na tsimbutsi tsake tsimuyila, iwanu wose wapfuka.
Ne iwanu iwonile ichinu acho wawalongela iwanu ichinu ichimlawile imunu ayo ne iwangubi.
Kuya iwanu wamlomba Yesu yoke mne ghumji ghwawo.
Yesu hayakalile kodina mne mnumbwi, imunu iyakalile ne ipfinyamkela kamlomba Yesu woke wose.
Lekeni Yesu kalema, kamlongela, “Ghenda ukaye kune iwandughu tsako na uwalongele pfakutendele Imtwatsa na pfakwonele libatsi.”
Apfo imunu ayo koka Dekapoli kuwalongela achila Yesu chamtendele. Ne iwanu wose iwahulike tsawakangawala.
Yesu hayalokile keli kumwambu kwe tsimbu, likingili lye iwanu litingana na limtsunguluka aho hambalimbali ha tsimbu.
Kuya imkulu yumwe we ing'anda ya ukulombela iyakemighwe Yairo tsakatsa, hayamwonile Yesu, keghwisa mmaghulu mwake,
kamlomba “Imwanangu mdodo pinga koghula ng'ani. Nokulomba utse, umwikile ghamoko ghako ahone na yawe mghima.”
Apfo Yesu kaghenda naye. Na likingili lye iwanu limuwinza na kumkunughitsa kunughitsa.
Baho tsakukala ne ipinga yumwe yane utamu we kulawa idamu kwa miyaka kumi na mili.
Ipinga ayo tsakadununzika ghendo kughenda kwe iwaghanga na kaghisa ipfinu pfake pfose, lekeni ng'apatile ng'apfu bae na kaghendelela kughula.
Ipinga ayo hayahulike mbuli tsa Yesu, kabita mne likingili, kamghendela Yesu kwa kuchughu na kukinda ghwanda lyake,
na kelongela imwenyegho “Ning'akinda ghwanda lyake nitsohona.”
Hayakindile lighwanda lyake, bahala idamu ileka kumlawa, naye kamanya mne lukuli lwake ka utamu wake uhona.
Bahala Yesu kamanya ingupfu imlawa, apfo kahunduka mne kingili na kughutsa, “Apfi imunu wachi yakindile lighwanda lyangu?”
Iwanang'ina wake wamwidika “Kwakona iwanu pfawokukunughitsa kunughitsa, kuya kwotughutsa ‘Apfi imunu wachi yanikindile?’ ”
Lekeni Yesu kaghendelela kulolesa yamwone imunu wachi iyatendile ichinu acho.
Ipinga ayo kamanya ichinu ichimlawile, apfo kamghendela, kodedema kwa kupfuka na kamghwila mmaghulu mwake, kuya kamlongela ghose.
Yesu kamlongela “Imwanangu, ukutoghola kwako kukuhonetsa. Ughende tseghamba na utamu wako uhone.”
