Yesu hayang'ali yolonga apfo, iwanu wangi watsa kulawa mne ing'anda ya Yairo, imkulu we ing'anda ya ukulombela wamlongela, “Imwanagho ma kafa, ebali kwoghendela kumdesa imlangulitsi?”
Yesu hayahulike ichinu chawalongile, kabetsa, kamlongela imkulu we ing'anda ya ukulombela, “Leka kupfuka, ghweghwe toghola.”
Kuya Yesu ng'abamile bae imunu wowose amuwinze, ila kaghenda na Petiri, Jakobu na Yohane, ndughu yake Jakobu.
Hawapfikile mne ing'anda ya Yairo, Yesu tsakona tsogho na kahulika iwanu wolila.
Yesu kengila mng'anda kawalongela, “Ebali mwotenda tsogho na kulila? Imwana ng'afile bae ila kawasa.”
Lekeni wamseka, apfo kawalapfa kunze, kawasola aba na mai wa imwana ayo ne iwanang'ina wake iyakalile nawo, wengila mne chiheleto chawasile imwana.
Kamkinda ghumoko kamlongela “Talita kumi!” mana yake, “Mwana mdodo pinga, nokulongela lamka!”
Bahala imwana kenuka na kandusa kughenda (imwana ayo tsakakala na miyaka kumi na mili). Ichinu achi hachilawile, iwanu wakangawala ghendo.
Yesu kawakanya ghendo waleke kumlongela imunu wowose ichinu ichilawile, kuya kawalongela wamwing'e imwana yula ichijo yaje.
Yesu kalawa hanu aho kaghenda kune ghumji ghwake ne iwanang'ina wake wamuwinza.
Mne litsuwa lya Sabato, kandusa kulangulitsa mne Ing'anda ye ukulombela, iwanu wengi iwamhulikitse wakangawala. Waghutsa, “Angu aghapatile kwani agha ghose? Ne ihekima yachi yeng'ighwe yuno mbaka atende ipfinu pfa kukangawatsa?”
Ayuno si yula msongola mibiki bae imwanaghe Mariya, ne iwandughu tsake tsina Jakobu, Yosefu, Yuda na Simoni, na lumbu tsake ng'awalibaha bae na twetwe? Apfo wamlema.
Yesu kawalongela, “Manabii wohulikitsighwa chila hanu, ila ng'awohulikitsighwa bae mne imiji yawo na mghati mwa iwandughu tsawo, na mkaye mwawo iwenyegho.”
Yesu ng'adahile bae kutenda pfinu pfa kukangawatsa ako, ila kawekila ghamoko iwatamu chidogho, kawahonetsa.
Yesu tsakakangawala ng'ani kwa ukulema kwawo kutoghola.
Kuya Yesu kanga mne ipfijiji apfila kuwalangulitsa iwanu. Kawakema hamwe iwanang'ina wake kumi na weli, kawatuma weliweli na kaweng'a ukulu wa kuwalapfa ipfinyamkela.
Kuya kawalongela, “Mleke kusola ichinu chochose kwaajili ya ghumwanza, ila ing'weku iliyeka. Mleke kusola pfighate, imikoba ya ghamaghwanda wala sendi.
Mpfale imikwabatsa, mleke kughala lighwanda lingi.
Ing'anda yoyose yamtsakwingila, mkale baho mbaka hamtsakuka.
Na hanu hohose iwanu hawolema kuwabokela au kuwategheletsa, mlawe hanu aho na mkung'use litimbwisi mmaghulu mwenu ka ukalangama kuna wawo.”
Apfo tsawoka na kuwapetela iwanu watsileke nzambi tsawo.
Tsawalapfa ipfinyamkela wengi na kuwabaka ghamafuta iwatamu wengi, wawahonetsa.
Imndewa Herodi kahulika mbuli atso, kwaapfila taghwa lya Yesu tsalimanyika chila hanu. Iwanu wangi walonga, “Yohane Mbatitsa katsilihuka. Ndo mana kana ngupfu tsa ukutenda ipfinu pfa kukangawatsa.”
Lekeni wangi walonga, “Ayuno Eliya.” Na wangi walonga, “Ayuno nabii ka wala manabii wa ghumwande.”
Herodi hayahulike apfo, kalonga, “Yohane iyanimghanile litwi katsilihuka!”
Kwaapfila Herodi imwenyegho tsakalaghitsa Yohane yaghoghighwe, yekighwe mne chifungo. Tsakatenda apfo kwaajili ya Herodiya mwehe wake, ipinga ayo tsakakala mwehe wa ndughu yake Filipi.
Yohane Mbatitsa tsakaghendelela kumlongela Herodi, “Ng'apfinoghile bae ghweghwe kumkwela mwehe wa ndughu yako.”
Naye Herodiya tsakamhila Yohane na kabama amkome. Lekeni ng'adahile bae kwaajili ya Herodi.
Herodi tsakampfuka Yohane kwaapfila kamanya Yohane kakala imunu yanoghile na yenzeluke, apfo yang'ali yomlolesa. Tsayang'ali yonoghela kumhulikitsa, hata ka tsayang'ali yoghanzika ng'ani hayomalitsa kumhulikitsa.
Litsuwa limwe, Herodiya tsakapata nafasi mne ichihungo cha kwelekighwa kwa Herodi. Herodi tsakawatendela ichihungo iwatawala, iwakulu we asikali na ipfilongotsi we isi ya Galilaya.
Neghe Herodiya hayengile tsakapfina, kamdeng'elesa Herodi ne iwahenza wake. Apfo imndewa kamlongela imwana ayo, “Unilombe ichinu chochose chaubama, nitsokwing'a.”
Kelaha, “Nitsokwing'a chochose chaubama, hata ka inusu ya undewa wangu!”
Kuya imwana ayo kaghenda kumghutsa mai wake, “Nilombe choni?” Naye kamwidika, “Lomba litwi lya Yohane Mbatitsa.”
Imwana ayo katsuma mbaka kwa imndewa kamlomba, “Nobama ungaye litwi lya Yohane Mbatitsa mne lungo!”
Imndewa kona usungu ng'ani, lekeni ng'adahile bae kulema, kwaapfila tsakelaha hambele he iwahenza wake.
Bahala imndewa kamlaghitsa asikali, kamlongela aghale litwi lya Yohane. Asikali kaghenda mne chifungo, kamghana litwi Yohane.
Kuya kaghala litwi alyo mne lungo, kamwing'a imwana ayo. Naye kamwing'a mai wake.
Iwanang'ina wa Yohane hawahulike apfi, waghenda kulusola lukuli lwake, walutsika.
Iwatumighwa woya na wetingana kwa Yesu, wamlongela aghala ghose ghawatendile na kulangulitsa.
Yesu kawalongela, “Leka tughende tuliyeka hanu halihela imunu tukabwihile.” Kalonga apfo kwaapfila tsakukala ne iwanu wengi iwang'ali wakutsa na ukuka, mbaka Yesu ne iwanang'ina wake ng'awadahile bae kupata nafasi ya ukuja ichijo.
Apfo woka waliyeka mne mnumbwi, waghenda hanu halihela imunu.
Lekeni iwanu iwawonile hawang'ali wakuka, tsawamanya. Apfo watsuma kwa mghulu kulawa mne imiji yose, kuya walongola kupfika.
Yesu hayalawile mne mnumbwi, kona mtingano mkulu ghwe iwanu, kawonela libatsi kwaapfila tsawoneka ka iwang'olo iwalihela mdimi. Apfo kandusa kuwalangulitsa ipfinu pfingi.
Mihe haipfikile, iwanang'ina wake wamghendela wamlongela, “Hanu hano hana nyika iliyeka, na litsua liswa.
Waleke woke kune imighunda ne ipfijiji, ili wakeghulile ichijo iwenyegho.”
Lekeni kawedika, “Mwemwe muweng'e ichijo waje.” Wamghutsa, “Apfi kwotubama tughende tukawaghulile pfighate pfa sendi miya mbili tuweng'e waje?”
Kawaghutsa, “Mna pfighate pfingapi? Mghende mkalole.” Hawamanyile, wamlongela “Kuna pfighate pfitano ne iwasomba weli.”
Kuya Yesu kawalongela iwanang'ina wake, wawalongele iwanu wose weghole mne makingili, wakale hasi mne mitsani imibisi.
Apfo wakala mne makingili ghe iwanu, hano miya, hano hamsini.
Kuya Yesu kasola pfighate pfila pfitano ne iwasomba weli, kalola kulanga, kapfibaliki kuya kapfibena pfighate pfila. Kaweng'a iwanang'ina wake waweng'e iwanu. Pfipfila kawagholela iwanu wose iwasomba wala weli.
Iwanu wose waja weghuta,
ne iwanang'ina wake wadondola pfighate ne iwasomba yawakalile wamemetsa pfiseghe kumi na pfili.
Iwamale iwajile wakala 5000.
Bahala Yesu kawalongela iwanang'ina wake wengile mne mnumbwi wamlongolele kughenda Betisaida. Yeye tsayang'ali kowaagha iwanu woke.
Hayamalitse kuwaagha iwanu, kaghenda mlughongo kulomba.
Mihe haipfikile, mnumbwi ghukala mghati mwe tsimbu naye kakala aliyeka kunze kwe tsimbu.
Tsakawona iwanang'ina wake woghaya mne mnumbwi, kwaapfila libeho ling'ali lyowatowa kwa ingupfu. Habehi na kucha, kawaghendela, yang'ali yoghenda mchanya mwe ghamatsi. Kabama awalute,
nawo hawamwonile koghenda mchanya mwe ghamatsi, tsawepfikitsa tsakakala mtsimu. Walila kwa litsi likulu,
kwaapfila wose tsawamwona na wang'ali wopfuka. Bahala Yesu kawalongela, “Nene! Mleke kupfuka.”
Kuya kengila mne mnumbwi hamwe nawo, na libeho linyamala, iwanang'ina wake wakangawala ghendo.
Kwaapfila ng'awamanyile bae mbuli tsa pfighate, imimoyo yawo tsaikala mikomu.
Waloka tsimbu, wapfika mne isi ya Genesareti, baho wemitsa imnumbwi ghwawo.
Hawalawile mne mnumbwi, bahala iwanu wamtanga Yesu.
Apfo watsuma mne isi yose, wandusa kuwasola iwatamu mne ghamasatsi na kuwaghala hanu hohose kuwahulike Yesu kabaho.
Na chila hanu kwayaghendile, mne ipfijiji, imiji au kumighunda, waweka iwatamu mne ghamasoko. Wamlomba awaleke wakinde hata mindo ya lighwanda lyake, na wose iwamkindile tsawahona.
Mafarisayo wangi na iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso iwalawile Yerusalemu, wetingana hambele ha Yesu.
Wawona iwanang'ina wake wamwenga wakuja ichijo bila kwohopfugha ghamoko ghawo.
Mafarisayo na Wayahudi wose ng'awakuja bae ichijo mbaka wahopfughe ghamoko ghawo mbaka mne pfipfughumu, tsawakinda ichihendo cha iwabala wawo.
Hawolawa kusoko ng'awakuja ichinu chochose mbaka wachihopfughe. Pfipfila tsawakinda ipfihendo pfingi ka kuhopfugha ipfikombe, ghamabigha na pfiha.
Apfo awala Mafarisayo na iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso wamghutsa Yesu, “Ebali iwanang'ina wako ng'awokinda bae ipfihendo pfa iwabala, ila wakuja kwa ghamoko ghehile?”
Yesu kawedika, “Isaya tsakatabili pfinoghile kuna mwemwe, mwemwe iwang'enye, ka pfandike. ‘Iwanu wano wonihulikitsa kwa imilomo yawo, lekeni imimoyo yawo yakutali na nene.
Wonitamanila hela, wolangulitsa ghamalaghitso ghe iwanu, ka ghamalaghitso ghe Imulungu!’
“Mleka ghamalaghitso ghe Imulungu, mwokinda ipfihendo pfe iwanu.”
Kuya kawalongela, “Pfinogha! Mna inzila inoghile ya kulema ghamalaghitso ghe Imulungu ili mkinde ipfihendo pfenu.
Musa tsakalonga, ‘Uwahulike aba wako na mai wako,’ na ‘Imunu wowose iyomligha aba wake au mai wake katsokufa.’
Lekeni mwemwe mwolangulitsa, ka imunu kana ichinu cha kumwapfila aba wake au mai wake lekeni kolonga, ‘Ichinu achi Koribani’ mana yake, nzawadi kwe Imulungu,
apfo ng'obamighwa keli kumwapfila aba wake au mai wake.
Apfo mwoibetsa imbuli ye Imulungu kwe ipfihendo pfenu pfambokele. Na mwotenda ipfinu pfingi ka apfo.”
Kuya Yesu kalikema keli kingili lila lye iwanu, kawalongela, “Mnitegheletse mwemwe wose, mmanye.
Kuduhu ichinu ichikwingila mghati mwe imunu kulawa kunze ichidaha kumtenda yehe. Lekeni ichilawa mghati mwe imunu, acho chomtenda imunu yehe.
Imunu yane ghamaghutwi gha kuhulika na yahulike.”
Halilekile kingili lye iwanu na kwingila mng'anda, iwanang'ina wake wamghutsa mana ye imbuli ayo.
Yesu kawalongela, “Apfi namwe mwahela tsimbutsi? Angu ng'ammanya bae ka kuduhu ichinu ichimwingila imunu kulawa kunze chimtende yehe?
Kwaapfila ng'achimwingila bae mne ghumoyo ila chakwingila munda, kuya cholawa kunze kwe lukuli lwake.” Kwa ukulonga apfi, Yesu kapfitenda ipfijo pfose “pfinogha.”
Kaghendelela kulonga, “Ichinu ichimlawa imunu, acho chomtenda yehe.
Kwaapfila mne ghumoyo ghwe imunu, gholawa mawatso ghehile, utsinzi, ubapfi, ukukoma, dong'o,
ughoni, ughutsu, ufisadi, chepfu, maligho, kwighoda, chidandali ne ubotsi.
Agho ghose ghehile gholawa mghati mwe imunu, nagho ghomtenda imunu yehe.”
Yesu kalawa hanu aho, kaghenda mne ghumji ghwa Tiro. Ako kengila mne ing'anda na ng'abamile bae imunu wowose amanye, lekeni ng'adahile bae kwipfisa.
Ipinga yumwe iyakalile ne imwana pinga yane ichinyamkela, kahulika mbuli tsa Yesu. Apfo kamghendela, kamghwila mmaghulu mwake.
Ipinga ayo tsakakala Mgiriki, iyelekighwe mne ghumji ghwa Sirofoinike. Kamlomba Yesu amlapfe mwanaghe ichinyamkela.
Lekeni Yesu kamwidika, “Tanu waleke iwana weghute. Ng'apfinoghile bae kusola ichijo che iwana na kuwasila wambwa.”
Ipinga ayo kamwidika, “Imtwatsa, lekeni hata wambwa iwali hasi mwe imetsa wakuja ipfijo pfawalekile iwana.”
Yesu kamlongela ipinga yula, “Kwa apfo pfawidike, uke ukaye, ichinyamkela kamlawa imwanagho.”
Apfo ipinga yula koka ukaye, kampfika imwanaghe kawasa mne lusatsi na ichinyamkela kamlawa.
Kuya Yesu koka mne ghumji ghwa Tiro, kaghenda Galilaya kwa kubitila Sidoni na mne ghumji ghwa Dekapoli.
Iwanu wangi wamghalila imunu chitsiwi na iyang'adahile bae ukulonga pfinoghile, wamlomba Yesu amwikile ghamoko imunu ayo.
Apfo Yesu kamseghetsa imunu ayo hambali ne iwanu. Keka pfidole pfake mne ghamaghutwi ghe imunu ayo. Kuya kabwalula ghamate na kaludonza lulimi lwake.
Yesu kalola kulanga, kahumula kwe ingupfu, kamlongela imunu ayo, “Epfata!” (mana yake, “Ghubuka!”).
Bahala ghamaghutwi ghe imunu yula ghaghubuka, lulimi lwake luleghela, kandusa kulonga pfinoghile.
Kuya Yesu kawalaghitsa waleke kumlongela imunu wowose. Lekeni ka pfayaghendelele kuwaghoma, waghendelela kulalatsa mbuli ayo.
Iwanu wakangawala ghendo. Walonga, “Katenda ghoya chila ichinu. Hata pfitsiwi kowatenda wahulike, na pfibubu walonge!”
Mne ghamatsuwa agho, kingili lingi likulu litingana. Kwaapfila tsawakala wahela ichijo, Yesu kawakema iwanang'ina wake, kawalongela,
“Nowonela libatsi iwanu wano, kwaapfila wakala na nene kwa ghamatsuwa madatu bila ukuja.
Ning'awalongela woke mmakaye mwawo ne inzala, wodaha kutsilika mnzila, kwaapfila wangi wolawa kutali.”
Iwanang'ina wake wamghutsa, “Apfi hano kunyika imunu kodaha kupata kwani ichijo chokuweng'a iwanu wose wano waghute?”
Yesu kawaghutsa, “Mna pfighate pfingapi?” Wamwidika, “Saba.”
Yesu kawalongela iwanu wakale hasi. Kasola pfighate pfila saba, kapfibaliki, kapfibena na kuweng'a iwanang'ina wake waweng'e iwanu, nawo watenda pfipfo.
Pfipfila tsawakala ne iwasomba wadowado chidogho. Yesu kawabaliki pfipfila na kuwalongela iwanang'ina wake waweng'e iwanu.
Iwanu waja na kwighuta. Kuya iwanang'ina wake wadondola pfiseghe saba ipfimemile ipfijo ipfisighale.
Iwanu iwajile tsawakala elufu nne. Kuya Yesu kawaagha,
bahala kengila mne mnumbwi ne iwanang'ina wake, kaghenda mne ghumji ghwa Dalamanuta.
Mafarisayo wangi wamghendela na wandusa kumghutsa. Wamghetsa, wabama chitango kulawa kulanga.
Tsakwona usungu mne ghumoyo ghwake, kalonga, “Ebali mweleko ghuno ghwobama ichitango? Nowalongela ghendo, ng'awatsakwing'ighwa ichitango chochose.”
Kuya kawaleka, kengila mne mnumbwi, kaloka kaghenda kumwambu.
Iwanang'ina tsawesemwa kughala pfighate, wakala na chighate chimwe chiliyeka mne mnumbwi.
Yesu kawakanya, kawalongela, “Mwalangitse ne hamila ya Mafarisayo na ya Herodi!”
Wandusa kwilongela iwenyegho, “Kalonga apfi kwaapfila twahela chighate.”
Yesu tsakamanya chawang'ali wolonga. Kawaghutsa, “Ebali mwelongela iwenyegho, kwaapfila mwahela chighate? Mng'ali ng'ammanya au kutanga? Apfi imimoyo yenu mikomu?
Mna tsinenge ng'amkwona bae, na mna ghamaghutwi ng'amhulika bae? Na ng'amkumbuka bae
hanibenile pfighate pfila pfitano na kuweng'a wala iwanu elufu tano? Apfi tsamdondole pfiseghe pfingapi ipfimemile pfihande ipfisighale?” Wamlongela, “Kumi na pfili.”
“Na hanibenile pfighate pfila saba na kuweng'a iwanu elufu nne, apfi mdondole pfiseghe pfingapi ipfimemile pfihande ipfisighale?” Wamwidika “Saba.”
Kawaghutsa, “Pfii ng'ana mmanye bae?”
Tsawapfika Betisaida, iwanu wangi wamghalila Yesu ichifita, wamlomba amkinde.
Kamkinda ghumoko ichifita yula, kamlapfa kunze kwe chijiji. Kuya kambwalulila ghamate mnenge, kamwikila ghamoko ghake, kamghutsa, “Kwodaha kwona ichinu chochose?”
Imunu ayo kalola kuya kalonga, “Nakwona iwanu, wakoneka ka imibiki itsunguluka.”
Yesu keka keli ghamoko mne tsinenge tse imunu ayo. Kuya tsinenge tsake tsifughuka, naye kona pfinoghile ipfinu pfose.
Yesu kamlongela aghende ukaye yake na kamghoma kwingila mne ipfijiji na kuwalongela iwanu.
Yesu ne iwanang'ina wake waghenda mne ipfijiji pfa Kaisariya Filipi. Mnzila Yesu kawaghutsa, “Apfi iwanu wolonga nene nili nani?”
Wamwidika, “Wangi wolonga ghweghwe kwa Yohane Mbatitsa, wangi wolonga kwa Eliya na wangi wolonga kwa yumwe wa manabii.”
Kuya Yesu kawaghutsa, “Namwe mwolonga nene nili nani?” Petiri kamwidika “Ghweghwe kwa Kiristu.”
Yesu kawakanya “Mleke kumlongela imunu wowose mbuli tsangu.”
Kuya kandusa kuwalangulitsa iwanang'ina wake. “Imwana we Imunu kobamighwa adununzike ng'ani na kulemighwa ne iwabala, watambika wakulu, ne iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso. Na kobamighwa akomighwe ne atsilihuke mne litsuwa lya kadatu.”
Tsakawalongela imbuli ayo bila kupfisa, apfo Petiri kamsola Yesu mmbalimbali, kandusa kumkembela.
Lekeni Yesu kahunduka, kawalolesa iwanang'ina wake na kumkembela Petiri, “Soghela hano Setani! Kwaapfila ng'aukwalangula bae mbuli tse Imulungu, ila kokwalangula mbuli tse iwanu.”
Kuya Yesu kawakema iwanang'ina wake na kingili lye iwanu kawalongela, “Imunu wowose iyobama kuniwinza, yeleme imwenyegho, asole msalaba ghwake aniwinze.”
Kwaapfila imunu wowose iyobama kuukombola ughima wake, katsowaghisa, ila imunu wowose iyowaghisa ughima wake kwaajili ya nene na kwaajili ye Imbuli Inoghile katsoukombola.
Apfi iwanu wobweda choni ka wopata isi yose lekeni wakwaghisa ughima wawo?
Kuduhu ichinu chawodaha kulapfa waupate keli ughima wawo.
Imunu ang'ambonela chinyala nene na mbuli tsangu mne iwanu wa mweleko ghuno ghwa nzambi na utsinzi, Imwana we Imunu katsomwonela chinyala hatsakutsa mne utunitso wa Aba wake hamwe ne wamalaika wahenzeluka wa kulanga.
Kaghendelela kulonga, “Nowalongela ghendo, iwanu wamwenga iwemile hano ng'awatsakufa bae mbaka wawone Undewa we Imulungu iukutsa kwe ingupfu.”
Matsuwa sita hambele, Yesu kawasola Petiri, Jakobu na Yohane, kaghenda nawo mchidando hanu halihela imunu. Baho Yesu kaghaluka chihanga, hambele hawo.
Na ghamaghwanda ghake ghawa matselu ng'ani, kuduhu imunu wowose mne isi iyodaha kughatsapfa ghamaghwanda ghawe matselu apfo.
Kuya Eliya na Musa walawila hambele hawo, walonga na Yesu.
Petiri kamlongela Yesu, “Mlangulitsi, pfinogha twetwe tukale hano. Leka tutsenge pfibumbulika pfidatu, chimwe cha kwako, chimwe cha Musa na chimwe che Eliya.”
Ng'amanyile bae cha kulonga, kwaapfila wose tsawang'ali wopfuka ng'ani.
Kuya liwingu lilawila, liwaghubika, na litsi lilawila mne liwingu. “Ayuno imwanangu yanoghele, mumtegheletse!”
Bahala hawalolese mmbalimbali ng'awamwonile imunu wowose hamwe nawo, ila Yesu yaliyeka.
Hawakalile wohulumka kulawa mchidando, Yesu kawalaghitsa waleke kumlongela imunu wowose ghawonile, mbaka Imwana we Imunu hatsotsilihuka kulawa mne lifwa.
Watoghola chayalongile, lekeni weghutsa, “Kutsilihuka kulawa mne lifwa mana yake choni?”
Kuya wamghutsa Yesu, “Ebali iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso wolonga Eliya kobamighwa tanu yatse?”
Yesu kawedika, “Ona, tanu Eliya kakutsa kwika chila ichinu pfinoghile. Ebali lelo yandikighwa Imwana we Imunu kobamighwa yadununzike na kulemighwa?
Lekeni nowalongela, Eliya katsa na wamtendela ghose ghawabamile, ka mbuli tsake pfatsandikighwe.”
Hawawapfikile iwanang'ina wangi, wona mtingano mkulu we iwanu liwatsunguluka ne iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso wehisanya nawo.
Bahala iwanu wose hawamwonile Yesu wakangawala ng'ani, wamtsumila kumlamsa.
Yesu kawaghutsa iwanang'ina wake, “Apfi mwehisanya nawo choni?”
Imunu yumwe mne kingili lye iwanu kamwidika, “Mlangulitsi, nikughalila imwanangu kana ichinyamkela iyamtedile awe chibubu.
Na chila hayomnighula, komghwisa hasi, na imwana kolawa lihofu mne mlomo, koghegheda ghamatsino ghake kuya koghoghodala. Niwalomba iwanang'ina wako wamlapfe ichinyamkela, lekeni ng'awadahile bae.”
Yesu kawedika, “Mwemwe lukolo ing'alutoghola! Nikale namwe mbaka tsuwachi? Mnighalile imwana ayo!”
Wamghalila imwana ayo. Ichinyamkela hamwonile Yesu, bahala kamghwisa imwana ayo chisala, imwana kaghwa hasi na kwibulughitsa, kalapfa lihopfu mne mlomo.
Yesu kamghutsa aba we imwana ayo, “Angu imwana yuno kapfino kulawa tsuwachi?” Kamwidika, “Kulawa udodo wake.
Komghwisagha mne ghumoto au mne ghamatsi ili yamkome. Lekeni ka kwodaha kutenda ichinu, utwonele libatsi ne utwapfile.”
Yesu kalonga, “Ka kwodaha! Ghose ghodahika kwe imunu iyotoghola.”
Bahala aba we imwana yula kakemelela kalonga, “Notoghola, ila unyapfile nitoghole ghendo!”
Yesu halyonile kingili lye iwanu lyakongetseka hambele hake, kamkembela ichinyamkela ayo, “Ghwe ichinyamkela we ububu ne utsiwi, nokulongela ulawe mne imwana yuno na uleke kumwingila keli!”
Ichinyamkela kakemelela, kamghwisa chisala imwana ayo, kamlawa. Na imwana tsakoneka ka kafa, na iwanu wengi walonga, “Kafa!”
Lekeni Yesu kamkinda ghumoko imwana ayo, kamwapfila kwinuka, naye kenuka.
Yesu hayengile mng'anda, iwanang'ina wake wamghutsa hawakalile naye waliyeka, “Ebali twetwe ng'atudahile bae kumlapfa ichinyamkela yula?”
Yesu kawedika, “Ichinyamkela ka yuno ng'odaha bae kulawa kwa inzila yoyose, ila kwa kulomba kuliyeka.”
Yesu na iwanang'ina wake woka hanu hala waghenda Galilaya. Yesu ng'abamile bae imunu wowose amanye kwayali,
kwaapfila yang'ali yowalangulitsa iwanang'ina wake. Kawalongela, “Imwana we imunu katsoghelighwa mne ghamoko ghe iwanu, nawo watsomkoma. Ghamatsuwa madatu hambele, katsotsilihuka.”
Lekeni ng'awaimanyile bae imbuli ayo na wapfuka kumghutsa.
Hawafikile Kaperinaumu, wengila mng'anda na Yesu kawaghutsa iwanang'ina wake, “Ichinu chachi chamng'ali mwisongela mnzila?”
Lekeni ng'awamwidike bae, kwaapfila wang'ali wesongela yuhi yali mkulu.
Yesu kakala hasi, kawakema iwanang'ina wake kumi na weli, kalonga, “Imunu wowose yobama kuwa wa mwanduso, kobamighwa yawe wa utsighilo, na yawe imtumwa wa wose.”
Kuya kamsola imwana mdodo, kamwika mghati mwawo, kawalongela,
“Imunu wowose iyombokela imwana mdodo ka yuno kwa taghwa lyangu, kombokela nene. Ne imunu iyombokela nene, kombokela yula iyanitumile.”
Yohane kamlongela Yesu, “Mlangulitsi, tumwona imunu kolapfa ipfinyamkela kwa taghwa lyako. Tumghoma kwaapfila ng'olawila bae mne kingili lyetu.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Mleke kumghoma. Haduhu imunu iyodaha kutenda ipfinzonza kwa taghwa lyangu na baho kulonga mbuli tsangu pfihile.
Kwaapfila imunu wowose yali ubali wetu, ayo kamiyetu.
Nowalongela ghendo, imunu wowose iyoweng'a ichikombe cha ghamatsi kwaapfila mwemwe mwa iwanu wa Kiristu, katsobokela ghweko lyake.
“Imunu wowose iyowahonza wadodo wano iwonitoghola watende ghehile, ng'apfu imunu ayo yohighwe libwe lya kusaghila msingo mwake na kwasighwa mne ibahali.
Ka ghumoko ghwako ghwokuhonza utende ghehile, ghughane. Ng'apfu kwingila kune ughima na ghumoko ghumwe, kubita kwingila jehanamu na ghamoko meli.
Ako membele iwowaja ng'awakufa bae, na ghumoto ighuwalakatsa ng'aghutsimika bae.
Ka mghulu ghwako wokuhonza utende ghehile, ghughane. Ng'apfu kwingila kune ughima na mghulu ghumwe, kubita kuwa na ghamaghulu meli na kwasighwa jehanamu.
Ako membele iwowaja ng'awakufa bae, na ghumoto ighuwalakatsa ng'aghutsimika bae.
Na ka inenge yako yokuhonza utende ghehile, ing'ole. Ng'apfu kwingila kune Undewa we Imulungu na inenge imwe, kubita kuwa na tsinenge mbili na kwasighwa jehanamu.
Ako membele wake ng'awakufa bae, na ghumoto ghwake ng'aghutsimika bae.
“Chila imunu katsodeghetetsighwa kwa ghumoto ka inyama pfaighumighwa imunyu.
“Imunyu inogha, lekeni ka ihinyika, itsoghumighwa choni mbaka ikolele keli? “Muwe ne imunyu mghati mwenu, na mkale tseghamba.”
Kuya Yesu koka hanu hala kaghenda kune chijiji cha Yudeya na kuloka ghumto Yoridani. Kuya kingili lye iwanu limtsila, naye kawalangulitsa ka pfatsowele.
Mafarisayo wangi wamghendela, wamghetsa kwa kumghutsa, “Apfi pfinogha imunu kumleka mwehe wake?”
Yesu kawedika, “Apfi Musa yalaghitse choni?”
Wedika, “Musa kalonga, twodaha kwandika talaka na kuwaleka.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Musa kandika apfo kwaapfila imimoyo yenu misughu.
Lekeni kulawa mwanduso, ‘Imulungu kalumba mmale ne ipinga.’
‘Apfo, immale katsomleka mai wake na aba wake, naye katselunga na mwehe wake,
nawo watsokuwa lukuli lumwe na si weli keli bae, ila lukuli lumwe.’
Apfo chayalungile Imulungu, imunu yaleke kuchibaghula.”
Hawoyile keli mng'anda, iwanang'ina wake wamghutsa Yesu imbuli ayo.
Kawedika, “Imunu wowose iyomleka mwehe wake na kukwela ipinga yungi komtendela utsinzi mwehe wake.
Pfipfila, ipinga yomleka immale wake na kukwelighwa ne immale yungi komtendela utsinzi immale wake.”
Iwanu wamwenga wamghalila Yesu iwana wadowado yawekile ghamoko, lekeni iwanang'ina wake wawakembela.
Yesu honile apfi tsakona usungu, kawalongela, “Muwaleke iwana wadowado watse kuna nene, mleke kuwaghoma kwaapfila Undewa wa Imulungu wa iwana ka wano.
Nowalongela ghendo, imunu wowose yolema kuubokela Undewa we Imulungu ka imwana mdodo, ng'atsowingila bae.”
Kawasola iwana awo, kawekila ghamoko, kawabaliki.
Yesu hayang'ali yakuka, imunu yumwe kamtsumila, kamtowela maghoti, kamghutsa. “Mlangulitsi yunoghile, nitende ichinu chachi niubokele ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose?”
Yesu kamghutsa, “Ebali unikema nene ninogha? Kuduhu imunu yanoghile ila Imulungu yaliyeka.
Kwoghamanya ghamalaghitso. ‘Uleke kukoma, Uleke utsinzi, Uleke ubapfi, Uleke kulonga ughutsu, Uleke ung'enye, Uwahulikitse aba wako na mai wako.’ ”
Imunu ayo kamwidika, “Mlangulitsi, agho ghose nighakinda kulawa udodo wangu.”
Yesu kamlola, kamnoghela, kamlongela, “Kuhungukighwa na ichinu chimwe, ghenda ukautse pfose pfaulinapfo uweng'e sendi iwahingwa, naghwe kutsakuwa ne utajiri kulanga. Kuya utse uniwinze.”
Hayahulike apfo, kaghudubuka koka kwa usungu kwaapfila tsakakala na mali nyingi.
Yesu kalola mmbalimbali, kawalongela iwanang'ina wake, “Itsakuwa pfikomu kwe imunu tajiri kwingila mne Undewa we Imulungu.”
Iwanang'ina wake wakangawala hawahulike mbuli atso. Lekeni Yesu kalonga keli, “Iwanangu, itsakuwa pfikomu kwingila mne Undewa wa Imulungu!
Pfikomu kwa imunu tajiri kwingila mne undewa wa Imulungu kubita imnyama yokemighwa ngamiya kwingila mne litobo lya sindano.”
Iwanang'ina wakangawala ghendo, weghutsa, “Lelo yuhi iyodaha kukombolighwa?”
Yesu kawalola, kalonga, “Kwe imunu ng'aidahika bae, lekeni kwe Imulungu si pfipfo bae, ghose ghodahika kwe Imulungu.”
Petiri kamlongela, “Tuleka chila chinu tukuwinza ghweghwe!”
Yesu kawedika, “Nowalongela ghendo, imunu wowose yalekile kaye yake au iwandughu tsake au lumbu tsake, aba wake au mai wake au iwanaghe au imighunda kwaajili ya nene ne Imbuli Inoghile,
katsobokela ketseketse mne ghamatsuwa ghano. Katsobokela kaye, iwandughu, lumbu, mai, iwana, ne imighunda na kudununzika na mne ghamatsuwa ighakutsa katsobokela ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose.
Lekeni awala iwalongole watsakuwa kuchughu ne iwali kuchughu watsolongola.”
Yesu ne iwanang'ina wake wang'ali wogheluka woghenda Yerusalemu, Yesu kawalongola, iwanang'ina wake wakangawala ne iwanu iwakalile womuwinza wose wapfuka. Yesu kawasola keli iwanang'ina wake kumi na weli mmbalimbali, kawalongela aghala ighatsomlawila.
Kawalongela, “Mtegheletse, twoghenda Yerusalemu, ako Imwana we Imunu katsakwing'ighwa kwa pfilongotsi we inambiko na iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso. Nawo watsomuhigha yafe na kwing'ighwa kwa Iwanu si Wayahudi bae.
Watsombetsa, watsombwalulila ghamate, watsomfapula ne ipfiboko, na ghamatsuwa madatu hambele, katsotsilihuka.”
Kuya Jakobu na Yohane, iwana wa Sebedayo wamghendela Yesu, wamlongela, “Mlangulitsi kuna ichinu twobama ututendele twetwe.”
Kawaghutsa, “Chinu chachi?”
Wamwidika, hautsokala mne chighoda chako che Undewa mne utunitso wako, twobama tukale naghwe, yumwe ubali wako wa kujilo na yungi ubali wako wa kumoso.
Yesu kawedika, “Ng'ammanyile bae chamlomba. Apfi mwodaha kunwela ichikombe chanikunwela nene au kubatitsighwa ubatitso wanibatitsighwa nene?”
Wamwidika, “Twodaha.” Yesu kawalongela, “Mtsochinwela ichikombe chanikunwela nene na kubatitsighwa ubatitso wanibatitsighwa.
Lekeni imbuli ya kukala ubali wangu wa kujilo au wa kumoso si yangu bae kuweng'a. Hanu aho watsokala awala iwasaghulighwe ne Imulungu.”
Iwanang'ina wala kumi hawahulike achila chawalombile Jakobu na Yohane wawonela maya.
Yesu kawakema wose hamwe, kawalongela, “Mwomanya awala iwakwoneka iwakulu we iwanu iwali si Wayahudi bae wowatawala kwe ingupfu. Na iwakulu awo wana ukulu kune iwanu.
Lekeni kuna mwemwe ileke kuwa apfo, imunu wowose iyobama kuwa mkulu kuna mwemwe kobamighwa yawe imtumwa,
imunu wowose iyobama kuwa mkulu kobamighwa yawe imtumwa wa wose.
Kwaapfila Imwana we Imunu, ng'atsile bae kutumikighwa, ila katsa kutumikila na kulapfa ughima wake kwa kuwakombola iwanu wengi.”
Kuya wapfika Yeriko, Yesu ne iwanang'ina wake hamwe na kingili lye iwanu hawang'ali wakuka mne ghumji, ichifita yumwe iyakemighwe Batimayo imwana wa Timayo kakala mmbalimbali mwe inzila kolomba.
Naye hayahulike Yesu Mnatsareti kobita, kandusa kukemelela, “Yesu, Imwana wa Daudi! Mbonele libatsi.”
Iwanu wengi wamkembela, wamlongela yenyamale, lekeni kaghendelela kukema, “Imwana wa Daudi, mbonele libatsi!”
Yesu kema, kalonga, “Mlongeleni yatse.” Apfo wamkema, wamlongela, “Wighangamitse! Winuke kokukema.”
Kalyasa lighwanda lyake, kadaluka kamghendela Yesu.
Yesu kamghutsa, “Kwobama nikutendele choni?” Ichifita ayo kamwidika, “Mlangulitsi, nobama kwona.”
Yesu kamlongela, “Ghenda, ukutoghola kwako kukuhonetsa.” Bahala kadaha kwona, kuya kamuwinza Yesu mnzila.
Hawapfikile habehi na Yerusalemu, habehi ne imiji ya Betifage na Betaniya, kune Chidunda cha Mitseituni, Yesu kawatuma iwanang'ina wake weli walongole.
Kawalongela, “Mghende mne ichijiji ichili hambele henu, hamtsokwingila, mtsomwona imwana we ipunda kohighwa, naye yang'ali kudinighwa ne imunu. Mumdohole, mumghale hano.
Imunu wowose ang'awaghutsa, ‘Ebali mtenda apfo?’ mumlongele, ‘Imtwatsa kombama, kuya katsomuyitsa sambi.’ ”
Iwanang'ina wala woka, wamwona imwana we ipunda kohighwa hane libani. Hawang'ali womdohola,
iwanu wangi iwemile hala wawaghutsa, “Mtenda choni? Mwomdohola imwana we ipunda?”
Wawedika ka Yesu pfayawalongele ne iwanu awo wawaleka woke naye.
Wamghala imwana we ipunda ayo kwa Yesu, kuya weka ghamaghwanda ghawo mchanya mwake, Yesu kakala mchanya mwake.
Iwanu wengi wanzasa ghamaghwanda ghawo mnzila, ne iwanu wangi wabena imiputila mne imighunda, wainzasa mnzila.
Ne iwanu iwamlongolele na awala iwamuwinzile wakemelela walonga, “Mumtunitse Imulungu! Yabalikiighwe iyakutsa kwa taghwa lye Imtwatsa!
Imulungu ubaliki Undewa iukutsa wa mndewa wetu Daudi. Mumtunye Imulungu yali kuchanya ng'ani!”
Yesu kengila Yerusalemu, kaghenda mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu. Kalola mmbalimbali chila hanu, lekeni kwaapfila litsua tsaliswa, kaghenda Betaniya ne iwanang'ina wake kumi na weli.
Nemitondo yake hawang'ali wolawa Betaniya, Yesu tsakakala na nzala.
Kaghwona ghumbiki ghwa mtini kwa kutali ghune imitsani mingi. Kaghenda kulola ka kodaha kupata tini. Lekeni hayapfikile ng'apatile bae tini ila imitsani iliyeka, kwaapfila msimu wa tini tsaghung'ali.
Kuya Yesu kaghulongela ghumbiki, “Kulawa lelo na kughendelela, kuduhu imunu iyatsokuja keli ghamatunda ghako.” Ne iwanang'ina wake wamuhulika hayalongile apfo.
Hawapfikile Yerusalemu, Yesu kengila mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu, kandusa kuwawinga awala iwang'ali wohutsa na kughula mghati mwe Ing'anda ye Imulungu. Katsibidula tsimetsa tse iwanu iwotsibena tsisendi na pfighoda pfe iwanu iwohutsa iwanjiwa,
kawaghoma kusola ichinu chochose mghati mwe Ing'anda ye Imulungu.
Kuya kawalangulitsa, “Apfi ng'ayandikighwe bae, ‘Ing'anda yangu itsokemighwa ing'anda ya ukulombela ye iwanu we isi tsose?’ Lekeni mwemwe mwoitenda mango ye iwabapfi!”
Wapfilongotsi we inambiko na iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso hawahulike apfi, wandusa kubama inzila ya kumkoma Yesu. Lekeni wang'ali wompfuka, kwaapfila iwanu wose wang'ali wokangawala kwa ghamalangulitso ghake.
Mihe haipfikile, Yesu ne iwanang'ina wake woka mne ghumji agho.
Nemitondo yake, hawang'ali woghenda waghwona ghumtini ghula ghunyala kulawa msina.
Petiri kakumbuka chayalongile Yesu, kamlongela, “Mlangulitsi, ulole! Imbiki ghughulighite ghunyala!”
Yesu kedika, “Mumtoghole Imulungu.
Nowalongela ghendo, imunu wowose ang'achilongela chidunda chino, ‘Ghenda wiyase mwibahali’ na ka ng'akwalangula mne ghumoyo ghwake na kutoghola chayalongile chitsolawila, chitsotendeka kwaajili yake.
Apfo nowalongela, hamlomba na kulomba ghoghose, mtoghole ka mwoghabokela, nagho ghatsokuwa ghenu.
Na hamlomba, ka kuna imunu kakutendela pfihile, umleghusile ghamatotso ghake, naye Aba wenu yali kulanga katsowaleghusila nzambi tsenu.”
Lekeni ka ng'amuwaleghusila ghamatotso ghawo, naye Aba wenu yali kulanga ng'atsowaleghusila nzambi tsenu bae.
Wapfika keli Yerusalemu, na Yesu hayang'ali koghenda ghenda mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu, pfilongotsi we inambiko, iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso ne iwabala wamghendela.
Wamghutsa, “Kwa ukulu wachi kotenda ipfinu pfino? Na yuhi iyakwing'ile ukulu uno wa kutenda ghano?”
Yesu kawedika, “Na nene nowaghutsa imbuli imwe, mnyidike, nani nitsowalongela kwa ukulu wachi notenda ghano ghose.
Mnilongele, ubatitso wa Yohane ulawa kulanga au kwe iwanu?”
Weghutsa, walonga, “Tung'alonga ‘Ulawa kulanga’ katsotughutsa, ‘Ebali lelo ng'amtoghole?’
lekeni tung'alonga, ‘Ulawa kwe iwanu.’ ” Wawapfuka iwanu, kwaapfila iwanu wose tsawamanya Yohane tsakakala nabii.
Apfo wamwidika, “Ng'atumanyile bae.” Yesu kawalongela, “Na nene siwalongela bae yuhi iyangaile ukulu wa kutenda ghano.”
Yesu kandusa kulonga nawo kwa imbuli, “Imunu yumwe tsakahanda mitsabibu mne mghunda. Kuya kaghutsengela luwa, kahimba hanu ha ukukamila na kutsenga chilingilo. Keka wemilitsi, kuya koka isi ya kutali.
Ghumsimu ghwa kupfuna tsabibu haghupfikile, kamtuma imtumwa wake akasole tsabibu.
Lekeni wemilitsi wamghogha, wamtowa, wamuwinga bila kumwing'a chinu.
Kuya imunu ayo kamtuma imtumwa yungi. Ayo wamtowa mwitwi na kumtendela pfihile.
Kamtuma yungi, ayo naye wamkoma. Kawatuma iwatumwa wangi wengi, wangi wawatowa na wangi wawakoma.
Yakalile imunu yumwe yaliheka wa kumtuma, naye iye imwanaghe iyamnoghele ng'ani. Kalonga, ‘Ayu wa ukumambulitsa nakwona watsomhulikitsa, kwaapfila ka mwanangu.’
Lekeni wemilitsi wala welongela, ‘Ayu ambe mhala mghunda ghuno. Leka tumkome ili mghunda ghuno ghuwe ghwetu!’
Wamghogha, wamkoma, wamwasa kunze kwe mghunda.”
Yesu kaghutsa, “Imunu yane mghunda yatsotendatse? Katsakutsa kuwakoma wemilitsi wose na kuweng'a iwanu wangi mghunda aghwo.
Ng'amsomile bae liandiko ililonga. ‘Libwe lyawalilemile iwotsenga, Alyo liwa libwe kulu lya haghati.
Imbuli ino ilawa kwe Imtwatsa, nayo yotukangawatsa!’ ”
Tsawabama kumghogha kwaapfila tsawamanya ka imbuli yailongile kawalonga wawo, ila wawapfuka iwanu. Apfo wamleka yaliyeka, woka.
Hambele, wawatuma Mafarisayo wangi ne iwanu wa kingili lya Herodi kuna Yesu ili wamteghe ghayolonga.
Wamghendela, walonga, “Imlangulitsi, twokumanya ghweghwe kwa imunu yulongesa ghendo, na ng'aupfuka bae ukulu we imunu, wala ng'aulola ipfihanga pfe iwanu. Lekeni kwoilangulitsa ghendo inzila ye Imulungu. Utulongele, apfi pfinogha au ng'apfinoghile bae kuliha kodi kwa Kaisari? Tumlihe au tuleke kumliha?”
Lekeni Yesu kamanya ung'enye wawo. Kawaghutsa, “Ule mwobama kunitegha? Ngalileni sendi ayo niyone.”
Wamghalila sendi ayo. Naye kawaghutsa, “Angu ichihanga chino na taghwa lino lya nani?” Wamwidika, “Pfa Kaisari.”
Kuya Yesu kawalongela, “Mmwing'e Kaisari pfa Kaisari na mmwing'e Imulungu pfe Imulungu.”
Kuya Masadukayo, iwanu iwolonga kuduhu ukutsilihuka kulawa mne lifwa wamghendela Yesu wamghutsa,
“Mlangulitsi, Musa tsakatwandikila pfino, ka imunu indughu yake kafa, naye kamleka mwehe iyalihela iwana, ndughu we imunu ayo kobamighwa amkwele chitsuka ayo ili amwelekele ndughu yake iwana.
Tsakukala ne iwandughu saba. Imkulu wawo kakwela, naye kafa bila kuleka imwana wowose.
Ndughu wa keli kamkwela chitsuka ayo, naye kafa bila kweleka imwana. Ilawila pfipfo kwa ndughu wa kadatu.
Iwandughu wose saba wafa na ng'awalekile imwana bae. Kuya mwehe yula naye kafa.
Lelo iwanu hawatsotsilihuka kulawa mne lifwa, angu mwehe ayo yakuwa wa nani kwaapfila wose saba tsawamkwela?”
Yesu kawedika, “Mwemwe mwakwagha kwaapfila ng'ammanya bae Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka wala ngupfu ye Imulungu.
Iwanu iwafile hawatsotsilihuka, ng'awatsokwela wala kukwelighwa bae, watsakuwa ka wamalaika wa kulanga.
Kwe imbuli ya ukutsilihuka kwe iwanu iwafile, apfi ng'amsomile bae imbuli ya libagho ilikwaka mne ichitabu cha Musa, Imulungu pfayalongile na Abrahamu, ‘Nene na Imulungu wa Abrahamu, na Imulungu we Isaka na Imulungu wa Yakobu.’
Yeye si Imulungu we iwanu iwafile bae, ila we iwanu waghima. Apfo mwagha ghendo!”
Imlangulitsi yumwe wa ghamalaghitso katsa kawahulika wodawala. Hayonile Yesu kawedika ghoya kamghutsa, “Mne ghamalaghitso ghose, lihi laghitso kulu kubita ghose?”
Yesu kedika, “Laghitso kulu alino. ‘Mtegheletse mwemwe Waisiraeli! Imtwatsa Imulungu wetu ka Imtwatsa yumwe yaliyeka.
Mnoghele Imulungu wako kwa ghumoyo ghwako ghwose na kwa muhe wako wose na kwa tsimbutsi tsako tsose na kwa ngupfu tsako tsose.’
Na laghitso lya keli, ‘Mnoghele imunu wa habehi yako, ka pfawinoghela imwenyegho.’ Kuduhu laghitso kulu kubita agha meli.”
Imlangulitsi ayo wa ghamalaghitso kamlongela Yesu, “Mlangulitsi, kwidika ghoya. Kulongesa ghendo, Imulungu ka yumwe na kuduhu imulungu yungi ila yeye.
Na kumnoghela Imulungu kwa ghumoyo ghwako ghwose na kwa tsimbutsi tsako tsose na kwa ngupfu tsako tsose, na kumnoghela imunu wa habehi yako ka pfawinoghela ghwe imwenyegho pfinogha ghendo kubita kumlapfila Imulungu inambiko.”
Yesu hayonile kedika kwa ihekima, kamlongela, “Ng'uli kutali bae na Undewa we Imulungu.” Kulawa baho, kuduhu imunu iyaghetsile kumghutsa Yesu imbuli yoyose.
Yesu hayang'ali yolangulitsa mne ing'anda ye Imulungu, kawaghutsa, “Ebali iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso wolonga Kiristu kaimwana wa Daudi?
Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka tsakamlongotsa Daudi, naye kalonga, ‘Imtwatsa kamlongela Imtwatsa wangu, Ukale ghumoko ghwangu ghwa kujilo mbaka niweke iwehile wako hasi ha ghamaghulu ghako.’
“Daudi imwenyegho tsakamkema ‘Imtwatsa.’ Apfi Kiristu yodahatse kuwa imwanaghe?” Iwanu wengi wamhulikitsa kwa kudeng'elela.
Yesu hayang'ali yolangulitsa kalonga, “Mwalangitse na iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso. Wonoghela kupfala ghamaghwanda matali na kulamsighwa mmasoko.
Na wosaghula ipfighoda ipfili hambele mne tsing'anda tsa ukulombela na kukala hanu hanoghile mne ipfihungo.
Wakuja mne tsing'anda tse pfitsuka, kwa kwilangusa wanogha, wolomba bila kwipfa. Awo watsohighighwa ng'ani.”
Yesu tsakakala habehi na chinu cha kwikila sadaka, kalola iwanu pfawoghela tsisendi. Matajiri wengi walapfa sendi nyingi.
Kuya katsa chitsuka yumwe mhingwa kaghela sendi mbili.
Yesu kawakema iwanang'ina wake kalonga, “Nowalongela ghendo, chitsuka yuno keka nyingi kubita wose.
Wose walapfa tsimali tsawo itsiswelele, lekeni chitsuka yuno kalapfa pfose pfalinapfo.”
Yesu hayang'ali yolawa kunze kwe ing'anda ye Imulungu, yumwe wa imwanang'ina wake kamlongela, “Mlangulitsi, ulole ghamabwe na tsing'anda pfatsinoghile!”
Yesu kamwidika, “Apfi kwotsona tsing'anda tsino ng'ulu? Ng'alitsolekighwa libwe mchanya mwe libwe lingi, chila limwe litsakwasighwa hasi.”
Yesu tsakakala mchidando mwa Chidunda cha Mitseituni, kumwambu kwe ing'anda ye Imulungu. Petiri, Jakobu, Yohane ne Andereya wamghutsa hawakalile waliyeka.
“Utulongele, agha ghose ghatsolawila tsuwachi? Na kutsakuwa na chitango chachi agha ghose haghatsolawila?”
Yesu kawalongela, “Mwalangitse, imunu aleke kuwaghutsukila.
Iwanu wengi watsakutsa kwa taghwa lyangu, watsolonga, ‘Nene nayeye!’ na watsowaghutsukila iwanu wengi.
Namwe hamtsohulika ng'ondo na mbuli tsa ng'ondo, mleke kupfuka. Ipfinu apfo pfobamighwa pfilawile, ila utsighilo ung'ali kutsa.
Iwanu we isi watsetowa ne iwanu wa isi ingi, undewa utsetowa ne undewa ungi, ne isi itsoking'isika chila hanu, na kutsolawila nzala ng'ulu. Agha ghose ghatsakuwa ka mwanduso wa usungu we kweleka.
“Namwe mwalangitse! Mtsoghoghighwa na kughalighwa mne libaratsa. Mtsotowighwa mne tsing'anda tsa ukulombela. Mtsakwima hambele he iwabala na iwandewa kwaajili yangu kuwalongela mbuli tsinoghile.
Na Imbuli Inoghile ye Imulungu yobamighwa kupetighwa mne tsiisi tsose.
Hawatsowaghogha na kuwaghala kune libaratsa, mleke ukwalangula cha ukulonga. Mlonge chochose chila chamtsakwing'ighwa, kwaapfila si mwemwe bae yamlonga, ila Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka.
Ndughu katsomlapfa ndughu yake yakomighwe, na aba katsomlapfa imwanaghe yakomighwe. Iwana watsowalema na kuwakoma aba na mai tsawo.
Iwanu wose watsowahila kwa taghwa lyangu, ila ayula yoghendelela mbaka usighilo katsokombolighwa.
“Hamtsakwona lideso lima hanu hang'alibamighwa kwima bae. (Imunu iyosoma amanye) Awala iwali mne isi ya Yudeya watsumile mpfidunda.
Imunu wowose iyali mkano aleke kuhulumka hasi, au kwingila mng'anda kulapfa ichinu chochose kunze.
Na yula iyali kumghunda aleke kuya ukaye kusola ghamaghwanda ghake.
Watsoghaya ng'ani iwapinga wane tsiinda ne iwapinga iwakong'etsa mne ghamatsuwa agho!
Mlombe agho ghaleke kulawila msimu wa chipfeghetsi!
Kwaapfila ghamatsuwa agho kutsakuwa na maghayo ighang'ali ghalawile kulawa mwanduso, Imulungu hayalumbile isi yose, mbaka sambi, na ng'aghatsolawila keli!
Na ka Imtwatsa ng'ahungutse bae ghamatsuwa agho, kuduhu imunu ang'adahile kukombolighwa. Lekeni kwaajili ye iwanu wake iyawasaghule, kahungutsa ghamatsuwa agho.
“Mne ghamatsuwa agho, imunu wowose ang'awalongela, ‘Lola, Kiristu kahano!’ au ‘Kakula!’ Mleke kumtoghola.
Kwaapfila watsolawila tsina Kiristu wa ughutsu na manabii wa ughutsu. Watsotenda ipfinzonza ne ipfitango na kuwaghutsukila hata wala iwasaghulighwe ne Imulungu, ka yodahika.
Mwalangitse! Niwalongela chila ichinu ichitsolawila.
“Lekeni mna ghamatsuwa agho ahala maghayo aghatsomala, litsua litsakuwa ne ichisi, lwetsi ng'alutsolapfa ghumwanga bae,
tsinondo tsitsolaghala kulawa mlanga, na ngupfu tsa kulanga tsitsohighitsighwa.
Baho iwanu watsomwona Imwana we Imunu kakutsa mne ghamawingu kwe ingupfu ng'ulu na utunitso.
Naye katsowatuma wamalaika wake kuwasola awala iyawasaghule mne isi yose, kulawa ubali umwe mbaka ubali ungi!
“Mwilangulitse imbuli ino kulawa mne mbiki ghwa mtini. Ghamaputila ghake haghakuwa madeke na kwandusa kutula, mwomanya chihangatsi cha habehi.
Pfipfila hamtsakona agha ghose gholawila, mmanye Imwana we Imunu kahabehi ghendo.
Nowalongela ghendo, iwanu wa mweleko ghuno ng'awatsoluta bae mbaka agha ghose ghalawile.
Kulanga ne isi pfitsoluta, ila mbuli tsangu ng'atsitsoluta bae.
“Kuduhu iyomanya litsuwa lila wala saa ila. Hata wamalaika wa kulanga wala Imwana ng'awomanya, ila Imulungu yaliyeka iyomanya.
Mwalangitse, mkale meso kwaapfila ng'ammanya bae itskughwa tsuwachi.
Yeghala ne imunu yokile na kuwaleka iwatumwa wake, chila yumwe ne isang'ano yake. Kuya kamlaghitsa imkalitsi wa libani akale meso.
Apfo mkale meso, kwaapfila ng'ammanya bae yane ing'anda yatsakuya tsuwachi, kakuya nemihe, nechilo, ijogholo hayatsakwika, au nemitondotondo.
Ka kakuya kwa kwidukitsa, aleke kuwapfika muwasa.
Achino chaniwalongela, niwalongela iwanu wose. ‘Mwalangitse!’ ”
Tsaghakalile matsuwa meli ng'ana ichihungo che Ipasaka na pfighate ipfilihela hamila chipfike. Iwakulu we inambiko na iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso wabama inzila ya kumghogha Yesu chinyelenyele na kumkoma.
Walonga, “Tuleke kumghogha mne ichihungo che Ipasaka, hela iwanu watsotenda tsogho.”
Yesu tsakakala Betaniya mng'anda mwa Simoni, imunu iyang'ali yoghula ukoma. Hawakalile mmetsa wakuja ichijo cha nemihe, ipinga yumwe iyaghalile ichupa ya ghamafuta ighonung'ila gha bei ng'ulu katsa. Kaipfughula na kamwitila Yesu mwitwi.
Iwanu iwakalile aho tsawona maya, welongela, “Ule kakwaghitsa ghamafuta gha bei ng'ulu?
Ghamafuta ghano ghang'autsighwe kwa bei ng'ulu na sendi weng'ighwe iwahingwa!” Kuya wamkembela ipinga ayo.
Yesu kalonga, “Mlekeni! Ule mumdesa? Yeye kanitendela ichinu chinoghile.
Iwahingwa mwinawo ghamatsuwa ghose, na mwodaha kuwapfila pfopfose pfambama. Lekeni ng'amtsakuwa na nene bae ghamatsuwa ghose.
Ipinga ayu katenda achila chayadahile. Kalongola kulubaka lukuli lwangu, lukale ghoya kwa kutsikighwa.
Nowalongela ghendo, hanu hohose imbuli inoghile haitsopetighwa mne isi, chayatendile ipinga ayu chitsolongighwa kwa kumkumbuka yeye.”
Yuda Isikarioti, yumwe wa wala iwanang'ina kumi na weli, kaghenda kwe ipfilongotsi we inambiko ili amhunduke Yesu kuna wawo.
Nawo hawahulike wadeng'elela kwa achila chayalongile, wamlongela watsomwing'a sendi. Apfo kabama nzila ya ukumhunduka Yesu.
Mne litsuwa lya mwanduso lye Ichihungo cha Pfighate ipfilihela hamila na litsuwa lya kumkoma imwana we ing'olo we Ipasaka, iwanang'ina wake wamghutsa, “Apfi ubama tughende kwani tukakwikile ichijo cha Ipasaka?”
Yesu kawatuma iwanang'ina wake weli, kawalongela, “Mghende kune ghumji, mtsetingana ne imunu iyaghalile chiya cha ghamatsi. Mmuwinze
mbaka kune ing'anda iyatsakwingila, kuya mumlongele imunu yane ing'anda, Imlangulitsi koghutsa, ‘Chilikwani chiheleto cha iwahenza, ili ndiye Ipasaka ne iwanang'ina wangu?’
Kuya katsowalangusa chiheleto chikulu cha uchanya ichikighwe ghoya. Mtwikile amo.”
Iwanang'ina tsawoka, waghenda kune ghumji, kuya tsawona ka Yesu pfawalongele. Apfo wachitenga ichijo che Ipasaka.
Kuya haipfikile nemihe, Yesu kapfika ne iwanang'ina wake kumi na weli.
Bahala hawang'ali wakuja mmetsa, Yesu kalonga, “Nowalongela ghendo, imunu yumwe kulawa kuna mwemwe iyakuja na nene, katsonihunduka.”
Iwanang'ina waghanzika, chila yumwe kamghutsa, “Angu nene?”
Yesu kawedika, “Yumwe kulawa mna mwemwe kumi na weli, iyopfabika chighate chake mne bakuli na nene.
Imwana we Imunu katsakufa ka pfayandikighwe. Lekeni katsoghaya imunu yula yomhunduka Imwana we Imunu. Ing'awile ng'apfu kwa imunu yula ka ng'elekighwe bae!”
Hawang'ali wakuja, Yesu kasola chighate, kachibaliki, kachimegha, kaweng'a iwanang'ina wake kawalongela, “Msole, aluno lukuli lwangu.”
Kuya kasola chikombe, kachibaliki, kaweng'a, wose wachinwela.
Kawalongela, “Aino idamu yangu ya lilaghano iikwitika kwaajili ye iwanu wengi.
Nowalongela ghendo, sitsakunwa keli bae dipfai ya mitsabibu mbaka litsuwa lila lyanitsakunwa ingi mne Undewa we Imulungu.”
Hawamalitse kwimba wila, waghenda kune Chidunda cha Mitseituni.
Yesu kawalongela, “Mwemwe wose mtsotsuma na kundeka, ka pfayandikighwe, ‘Nitsomtowa mdimi, ne iwang'olo watsopwililika.’
Lekeni hanitsotsilihuka kulawa mne lifwa, nitsowalongola Galilaya.”
Petiri kamlongela, “Hata wose wang'akuleka, nene sikuleka bae!”
Lekeni Yesu kamwidika, “Nokulongela ghendo, leloli nechilo, ijogholo ng'ana yeke lwa keli, kutsonibela mala ndatu.”
Lekeni Petiri kaghendelela kulonga, “Hata ka nobamighwa nife naghwe, mbe, sikubela bae!” Ne iwanang'ina wangi wose walonga pfipfo.
Tsawapfika hanu hokemighwa Getisemane, Yesu kawalongela iwanang'ina wake, “Hanighenda kulomba, mwemwe mkale hano.”
Kawasola Petiri, Jakobu na Yohane, naye kandusa kughanzika na kwona usungu ng'ani mne ghumoyo ghwake.
Kawalongela, “Usungu uli mne ghumoyo ghwangu mkulu ng'ani, wodaha kunikoma. Mkale hano na mkale meso.”
Kaghenda hambele chidogho, keghwisa hasi, kalomba, ka yodahika aleke kubitila mne ichipindi chila cha kudununzika.
Kalomba, “Aba wangu, ipfinu pfose pfodahika kuna ghweghwe. Uchilapfe chikombe cha kudununzika kuna nene, lekeni si ka pfanibama nene bae, ila pfaubama ghweghwe.”
Kuya koya keli kawapfika iwanang'ina wake wadatu wawasa. Naye kamlongela Petiri, “Simoni, kuwasa? Ng'udahile bae kukala meso hata kwa saa imwe?”
Kuya kawalongela iwanang'ina wose, “Mkale meso, mlombe mleke kughetsighwa na ghehile. Ghumoyo ghwobama kutenda ghanoghile, lekeni lukuli lwahela ingupfu.”
Kaghenda keli kulomba akuno kolonga ghaghala.
Kuya koya keli kawapfika iwanang'ina wake wawasa, ng'awadahile bae kufumbula tsinenge tsawo. Nawo ng'awamanyile bae chakumlongela Yesu.
Hayoile lwakadatu, kawalongela, “Mng'ali mwowasa na kubwihila? Lamkeni lelo! Ichipindi chipfika, Imwana we Imunu sambi kakwing'ighwa mne ghamoko ghe iwanu wane nzambi.
Mwinuke! Tughende! Mlole, ayuno hano imunu yonihunduka nene!”
Yesu hayang'ali yolonga, Yuda, yumwe we iwanang'ina wake kumi na weli, tsakapfika. Katsa na kingili lye iwanu iwakindile imimaghe ne ipfilungu. Tsawatumighwa na ipfilongotsi we inambiko, iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso ne iwabala.
Yuda kaling'a ichitango kingili alyo. “Imunu yanitsomnonela iyo yamumbama. Mumghoghe, mumghale na mumlolese aleke kutsuma.”
Bahala Yuda hayapfikile, kamghendela Yesu kalonga, “Mlangulitsi!” kuya kamnonela.
Apfo, wamkinda, wamghogha Yesu.
Lekeni imunu yumwe mne iwanu iwemile hala, kalapfa limaghe lyake kamtowa imtumwa we Ichilongotsi we Inambiko, kamghana ghutwi lyake.
Yesu kawalongela, “Pfii mtsa hano ne imimaghe ne ipfilungu kunighogha ka nene nambapfi?
Chila litsuwa tsanahamwe namwe, nolangulitsa mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu, ng'amnighoghile bae. Lekeni leka Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka ghatimilike.”
Kuya iwanang'ina wose wamleka, watsuma.
Na imsongolo yumwe iyeghubike ligholole yang'ali yomuwinza Yesu. Hawabamile kumghogha,
kalileka ligholole lyake, katsuma chidako.
Kuya wamghala Yesu mne ing'anda ye Ichilongotsi we Inambiko, baho ipfilongotsi we inambiko, iwabala ne iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso wose wetingana hamwe.
Petiri yang'ali yomuinzilitsa Yesu kwa kutali, kengila mne luwa lya Ichilongotsi we Inambiko, kakala ne iwakalitsi, na yang'ali yakota ghumoto.
Iwakulu we inambiko ne iwanu wose mne libaratsa wabama ukalangama wamwing'e maghomba Yesu ili wadahe kumkoma, lekeni ng'awadahile bae kuupata.
Iwanu wengi walonga ughutsu kuna Yesu, lekeni ukalangama wawo ng'awighalile bae.
Iwanu wamwenga wenuka, walonga ukalangama wa ughutsu,
“Tsatumhulika kolonga, ‘Nitsoihinya Ing'anda ino ye Imulungu iitsengighwe kwa ghamoko na litsuwa lya kadatu nitsotsenga ingi ing'aitsengighwe kwa ghamoko ghe iwanu.’ ”
Hata apfo, ukalangama wawo ng'awighalile bae.
Ichilongotsi we Inambiko kenuka hambele he iwanu kamghutsa Yesu, “Pfii kwahela chakwidika mne ukalangama uno iwaulapfile hano?”
Lekeni Yesu kenyamala, ng'alongile bae. Ichilongotsi we Inambiko kamghutsa keli, “Apfi ghweghwe kwa Kiristu, Imwana we Imulungu Yetunyighwe?”
Yesu kalonga, “Ona nene. Wose mtsomwona Imwana we Imunu kakala mne ghumoko ghwa kujilo ghwe Imulungu yane Ingupfu, kakutsa mne ghamawingu gha kulanga.”
Baho Ichilongotsi we Inambiko kadegha lighwanda lyake, kaghutsa, “Lelo twobama wakalangama wangi wachi?
Ambe mumhulika pfayamlighile Imulungu! Mwemwe mkwonatse?” Wose wamhigha yakomighwe.
Iwanu wangi wandusa kumbwalulila Yesu ghamate, wamghubika tsinenge tsake, wamtowa, wamlongela, “Utange, yuhi yakutowile!” Pfipfila iwakalitsi wamsola, wamtowa.
Petiri hayang'ali kamne luwa, ipinga yumwe imtumwa we Imtambika mkulu katsa.
Hayamwonile Petiri kakota ghumoto, kamtsodolela tsinenge, kalonga, “Pfipfila naghwe tsa kwahamwe na Yesu Mnatsareti.”
Lekeni Petiri kabela, “Simmanyile bae, wala sichimanyile bae chaulonga.” Kuya kalawa kunze mbaka hachikuta, ijogholo keka.
Imtumwa yula hayamwonile keli hala, kawalongela iwanu iwemile hala. Ayuno naye yumwe wawo.
Petiri kabela keli. Hambele chidogho, awala iwemile hala wamghendela. Wamlongela, “Ghweghwe kwa yumwe wawo ghendo, kwaapfila ghweghwe kwa Mgalilaya.”
Petiri kandusa kwilighita na kwilaha kuna wawo, “Simmanyile bae imunu yamlonga mbuli tsake.”
Bahala ijogholo keka lwakeli, kuya Petiri kakumbuka imbuli ila Yesu iyamlongele, “Ijogholo ng'ana yeke lwa keli, kutsonibela mala ndatu.” Kandusa kulila.
Nemitondotondo, ipfilongotsi we inambiko wetingana hamwe ne iwabala, iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso na libaratsa lyose, walamla kumghala Yesu kwa Pilato. Apfo wamwoha, wamghala na wamwing'a Pilato.
Pilato kamghutsa Yesu, “Apfi ghweghwe kwaimndewa wa Wayahudi?” Yesu kamwidika, “Ona, ka ghweghwe pfaulonga.”
Iwakulu we inambiko wamghutsukila Yesu maghomba mengi.
Apfo, Pilato kamghutsa Yesu keli, “Ng'ukwidika chochose bae? Tegheletsa ghamaghomba ghawo ghose kuna ghweghwe.”
Lekeni Yesu kalema kwidika keli, Pilato kakangawala.
Chila Ichihungo che Ipasaka, Pilato tsakatsowela kumlekelela imunu yumwe yohighwe yobamighwa ne iwanu.
Ichipindi acho kukala ne imunu yumwe yakemighwe Baraba, wamwika mne chifungo hamwe ne iwanu iwatendile hengele na iwakomile iwanu mna tsogho kulu.
Na kingili lye iwanu limghendela Pilato na limlomba awatendele ka pfayatendagha.
Naye Pilato kawaghutsa, “Apfi, mwobama nimlekelele Imndewa wa Wayahudi?”
Pilato kamanya ghendo ka pfilongotsi we inambiko wamghala Yesu kuna yeye kwaapfila wamwonela chepfu.
Lekeni ipfilongotsi we inambiko wawaswangitsa iwanu wamlombe Pilato amlekelele Baraba ihanu ha Yesu.
Pilato kawaghutsa iwanu awo, “Kuya mwobama nimtende choni imunu yamumkema Imndewa wa Wayahudi?”
Iwanu wose wakemelela walonga, “Mkondeke mna msalaba!”
Pilato kawaghutsa, “Apfi atendile choni chihile?” Walonga keli kwa kukemelela, “Mkondeke mna msalaba!”
Pilato kabama kuwadeng'eletsa iwanu, apfo kamlekelela Baraba. Kuya kalaghitsa Yesu yafapulighwe ipfiboko, kuya wamkondeke mna msalaba.
Asikali wamghala Yesu mghati mwe ing'anda ye imkulu we isi ya Yudeya, wawakema hamwe wayawo wose.
Wampfatsa Yesu lighwanda lya langi ya tsambarau, wabota litaji lya mihonga, walika mwitwi mwake.
Kuya wandusa kumlamsa, “Mbukwa Imndewa wa Wayahudi!”
Waghendelela kumtowa ne ng'weku mwitwi mwake na kumbwalulila ghamate. Watowa ghamaghoti, wamwinamila.
Kuya hawamalitse kumbetsa, wamtsula lighwanda lya langi ya tsambarau wampfatsa ghamaghwanda ghake. Kuya wamlapfa kunze wamkondeka mne msalaba.
Hawakalile mnzila, wetingana ne imunu iyakemighwe Simoni, imunu wa Kirene, aba wawo Alekisanda na Lufo. Imunu ayo tsayang'ali yolawa kumghunda koghenda mne ghumji. Asikali wambama aghughale msalaba ghwa Yesu.
Kuya wamghala Yesu hanu hokemighwa Goligota, mana yake, “Hanu ha Pala lya Litwi.”
Wamwing'a idipfai ihanganyighwe na manemane, lekeni Yesu kalema kuinwa.
Kuya wamkondeka mna msalaba, wegholela ghamaghwanda ghake kwa ukwasa hasi tsisimbi walole yuhi yapate lighwanda.
Ikala saa ndatu nemitondo hawamkondeke Yesu mna msalaba.
Wandika lighomba lyake apfino. “IMNDEWA WA WAYAHUDI.”
Kuya wamkondeka Yesu hamwe na wabapfi weli mne misalaba, yumwe kune ghumoko ghwake ghwa kujilo na yungi kune ghumoko ghwake ghwa kumoso.
Apfo ghatimila Ghamaandiko igholonga, “Tsakekighwa hamwe iwanu wehile.”
Iwanu iwang'ali woluta hanu hala wahighitsa ghamatwi ghawo, wamligha Yesu, walonga, “Ambe ghweghwe kudaha kuimwagha Ing'anda ye Imulungu na kuitsenga kwa ghamatsuwa madatu!
Hulumka lelo mna msalaba, wihonetse mwenyegho!”
Pfipfila ipfilongotsi we inambiko na iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso wamligha Yesu, walonga, “Kawahonetsa iwanu wengi lekeni ng'odaha bae kwihonetsa imwenyegho!
Leka tumlole ayu Kiristu, Imndewa wa Isiraeli, sambi ahulumke mna msalaba, na twetwe tutsomtoghola!” Kuya, iwanu wala weli iwakondekighwe mne misalaba hamwe na Yesu pfipfila wamligha.
Haipfikile saa sita nemisi, isi yose ighubikighwa ne ichisi ichikalile kwa masaa madatu.
Saa tisa nemisi, Yesu kakemelela, “Eloi, Eloi, lama Sabakitani” mana yake, “Imulungu wangu, Imulungu wangu, mbona kundeka?”
Iwanu wangi iwemile hala hawahulike apfo walonga, “Tegheletsa, komkema Eliya!”
Imunu yumwe katsuma, keka isiki mne lidodoki, kalika mne lubiki, kamwing'a Yesu yainwe. Kuya kalonga, “Tubete tulole ka Eliya kakutsa kumhulumsa mna msalaba.”
Yesu kalila kwa kukemelela, kuya kafa.
Lipanziya likalile mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu lidegheka mabwende meli kulawa kuchanya mbaka hasi.
Imbala yumwe wa asikali iyemile hambele ha msalaba kona Yesu pfayafile, kalonga, “Imunu yuno tsakakala Imwana we Imulungu ghendo!”
Iwapinga wamwenga tsawalola kwa kutali. Wamwenga wawo tsa Mariya Magidalena, Mariya iyali mai wawo tsina Jakobu mdodo na Yose, na Salome.
Yesu hayang'ali Galilaya, iwapinga awo tsawamuwinza wamtumikila. Iwapinga wamwenga iwalawile naye Yerusalemu pfipfila tsawabahala.
Ipfika nemihe ya litsuwa lya kwiyandaa, (tsa tsuwa limwe likalile kupfika tsuwa lya sabato).
Yosefu iyolawila mne ghumji ghwa Arimataya, imunu wa libaratsa iyahulikitsighwe ng'ani kapfika. Imunu ayo yang'ali yokalitsa ukutsa kwa undewa we Imulungu. Yosefu kamghendela Pilato bila kumpfuka, kamlomba amwing'e lukuli lwa Yesu.
Pilato tsakakangawala hayahulike ma Yesu kafa. Kamkema imbala wa asikali kamghutsa ka Yesu kafa mwande.
Baho hayahulike apfo kulawa kwe imbalayo, Pilato kamlongela Yosefu alusole lukuli lwa Yesu.
Yosefu kaghula isanda, kahulumsa lukuli lwa Yesu, kalupfatsa isanda na kulwika mne likabuli ilihimbighwe mne libambalawe. Kuya, kabimbilisa libwe kulu hambele ha libani.
Mariya Magidalena na Mariya mai wake Yose wona hanu halwikighwe lukuli lwa Yesu.
Litsuwa lya Sabato halimalile, Mariya Magidalena, Mariya mai wake Jakobu na Salome waghula ghamafuta, waghenda kulubaka lukuli lwa Yesu.
Nemitondo Jumapili litsua halilawile, waghenda kune likabuli.
Hawang'ali wamnzila weghutsa, “Yuhi yatsolibimbilisa libwe lili mne libani lye likabuli?”
Lekeni hawalolile, walyona libwe lila likulu libimbilisighwa.
Apfo wengila mne likabuli, wamwona imunu yapfalile lighwanda tselu, nawo wakangawala.
Imunu yula kawalongela, “Mleke kukangawala, mwombama Yesu Mnatsareti yawambighwe. Ng'alibaha bae, katsilihuka! Mlole hanu hawamwikile.
Lelo mghende mkawalongele iwanang'ina wake na Petiri, ‘Yesu kowalongola Galilaya, baho mtsomwona ka pfawalongele.’ ”
Apfo walawa kunze mwe likabuli, watsuma aku wodedema na kukangawala. Ng'awamlongele imunu wowose bae imbuli ayo kwaapfila tsawapfuka.
Yesu hayatsilihuke kulawa mne lifwa lupfilipfili mne litsuwa lya Jumapili, kamlawila Mariya Magidalena iyamlapfile ipfinyamkela saba.
Naye kaghenda kuwalongela wayaghe awala iwakalile na Yesu, iwang'ali wakona usungu na kulila.
Hawahulike Yesu katsilihuka na ipinga ayo kamwona, ng'awatoghole bae.
Hambele Yesu kawalawila iwanang'ina wake weli aku kana chihanga chingi, hawang'ali woghenda kumghunda.
Nawo woya wawalongela wayawo. Lekeni nawo ng'awatoghole bae.
Hambele chidogho Yesu kawalawila iwanang'ina kumi na yumwe hawang'ali wakuja. Kawakembela kwaapfila ng'awang'ali wotoghola bae na wasughu kuwatoghola awala iwamwonile kamghima.
Apfo kawalongela, “Mghende mne isi yose muwapetele Imbuli Inoghile wapfilumbe wose.
Imunu wowose iyotoghola na kubatitsighwa, katsokombolighwa, ila imunu wowose iyolema kutoghola katsohighighwa.
Na ipfitango pfino pfoghenda hamwe na awala iwotoghola, Kwa taghwa lyangu watsolapfa ipfinyamkela, na watsolonga kwa lugha ya sambi.
Hata wang'akinda iwanzoka na kunwa sumu ng'awatsolaghighwa bae. Watsowekila ghamoko ghawo iwatamu, nawo watsohona.”
Yesu hayamalitse kulonga ne iwanang'ina wake, kasolighwa kulanga, kakala ghumoko ghwa kujilo ghwe Imulungu.
Kuya iwanang'ina wala waghenda chila hanu kupeta Imbuli Inoghile. Ne Imtwatsa kasang'ana nawo, kalangusa ka kahamwe nawo kwe ipfitango ipfighalile ne Imbuli ayo.
Imkulu Teofili, Iwanu wengi tsawandusa ukwandika pfawadahile tsimbuli tse ipfinu ipfitendeke mghati mwetu.
Tsawandika ipfinu pfatulongelighwe ne iwanu iwonile ipfinu pfino kulawa mwanduso, ne iwanu wawala iwalongile tsimbuli tsinoghile.
Aghweye Imkulu, kwaapfila imwenyegho nipfibama ipfinu pfino pfose kulawa mwanduso, tsambona pfinogha ukukwandikila ghoya ipfinu pfilawile.
Notenda pfino naghwe umanye ukweli wose we ipfinu pfaulangusilighwe.
Mna matsuwa ghala Herodi hayakalile imndewa wa Yudeya, tsakukala na mlapfa nambiko yumwe yakemighwe Sakariya, kolawila mna walapfa nambiko wa Abiya. Mwehe wake kakemighwa Elisabeti naye kolawa mne lukolo lwe Aruni, mlapfa nambiko.
Wose weli wakala wanogha kwe Imulungu, aku wakinda ghendo ghamalaghitso ghose ghe Imtwa.
Wose tsawahela iwana kwaapfila Elisabeti yang'ali ng'akweleka bae, na wose tsawalala ghendo.
Litsuwa limwe Zakariya kakala mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu kotenda isang'ano yake ya kutambika, tsaikala nzamu yake.
Zakariya tsakasaghulighwa kwa kwasa simbi, ka watambika pfawang'ali wotendagha. Apfo kengila mng'anda mwe Imtwatsa akadusule ubani.
Ne ichipindi che kupfukitsa ubani pfachitsile, iwanu wose wakala wolomba kunze.
Kuya malaika we Imtwatsa, kamlawila, kema ubali wa kujilo wa hanu hala kupfukitsila ubani.
Sakariya hamwonile, keduka kuya kapfuka.
Imalaika kamlongela, “Uleke kupfuka, Sakariya! Imulungu kahulika chaumlombile. Mwehe wako katsokwelekela imwana immale naghwe kutsomkema Yohane.
Kutsosekelela ng'ani na kudeng'elela, ne iwanu wengi watsodeng'elela kwa ukwelekighwa kwake!
Katsakuwa imunu imkulu hambele he Imtwatsa. Ng'atsakunwa bae idipfai wala mbwali. Ghumuhe ghwe Imulungu katsommemetsa kulawa litsuwa lya ukwelekighwa kwake.
Katsowoyitsa iwanu wengi we Isiraeli woye kwe Imtwatsa Imulungu wawo.
Katsolongola hambele he Imtwatsa, katsakuwa ne ingupfu na ghumuhe ka nabii Eliya. Tsina aba watsowanoghela keli iwana wao, katsowoyitsa iwanu ing'awohulika woye mne ukwalangula kunoghile ka iwanu iwomuhulika Imulungu, katsowatenda iwanu weyandae kumbokela Imtwatsa.”
Sakariya kamghutsa imalaika, “Nitsomanyatse ka ichinu chino chakuwa apfo? Nene nilala na mwehe wangu pfipfila kalala”
Imalaika kamwidika, “Nene na Gaburieli. Nakwima hanu he Imulungu, iyanitumile nonge naghwe, na nikulongele imbuli ino inoghile.
Kwitsenyamala tulu kwaapfila ng'ughatoghola bae aghano ighatsolawila mna msimu wake, ng'utsodaha bae ukulonga mbaka aghano ghanikulongele haghotsolawila.”
Iwanu iwang'ali wombeta Sakariya wetsina hayang'ali yokawa mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu.
Baho halawile kunze, ng'adahile bae ukulonga nawo, apfo wamanya kona ghamaono mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu. Kalonga nawo kwa ghamoko ghake, kwaapfila ng'adahile bae ukulonga.
Matsuwa ghake gha kusang'ana aghamalile, Sakariya koya ukaye.
Aghabitile matsuwa mengi mwehe wake kakinda inda. Tsakepfisa mng'anda kwa miyetsi mitano.
Tsakalonga, “Apfi pfipfo pfanendele Imulungu mna matsuwa ghala hambonele libatsi kunenda ndeke kona keli ichinyala mne iwanu!”
Mna ghumwetsi ghwa sita ghwe inda ya Elizabeti Imulungu kamtuma malaika yokemighwa Gaburieli aghende mne ghumji ghwa Natsareti mne isi ya Galilaya,
kwe imwali iyalapfighwe tsengele ne immale yakemighwe Yosefu, yalawile mne lukolo lwa Mndewa Daudi. Imwaliyo tsakakemighwa Mariya.
Malaika tsakamtsila imwaliyo kamlongela, “Haulamke! Imtwatsa kahamwe naghwe, naye kakubaliki!”
Mariya hayahulike mbuli ayo, tsakalangula mne ghumoyo ghwake, naye kakangawala imbuli ino ina mana yachi.
Malaika kamlongela, “Mariya, uleke kupfuka! Imulungu kakutendela uluso.
Kutsokinda inda na kutsakweleka imwana immale, kutsomwing'a taghwa Yesu.
Katsakuwa mkulu na katsokemighwa Imwana we Imulungu yali Kuchanya Ng'ani. Imtwatsa Imulungu katsomwing'a chighoda cha undewa che imbala wake Daudi.
Katsokuwa imndewa we iwana wa Yakobu ghamatsuwa ghose, ne undewa wake ng'autsomala bae!”
Mariya kalonga ne malaika, “Nene na-mwali sina niwase bae ne immale. Kuya lelo itsakuwatse?”
Malaika kamwidika, “Ghumuhe Mwenzeka katsokutsila, na ngupfu tse Imulungu tsitsokughubika. Apfo imwana mwenzeluka katsakwelekighwa, katsokemighwa Imwana we Imulungu.
Kwomkumbuka ndughu yako Elizabeti. Tsailongighwa ng'atsokweleka bae iwana, lekeni sambi kana inda ya miyetsi sita, pfipfo pfayali mnzehe.
Kwaapfila kuduhu ichinu Imulungu ng'ochidaha bae kuchitenda.”
Mariya kalonga; “Nene na imtumwa we Imtwatsa, nendelighwe ka pfaulongile.” Kuya malaika ayo koka.
Matsuwa ghaghala Mariya katsumka kaghenda mne ghumji ighuli mne pfidunda pfa isi ya Yudeya.
Ako kengila mne ing'anda ya Sakariya, kamlamsa Elisabeti.
Elisabeti hayahulike Mariya komlamsa, imwana kadaluka munda mwake. Elisabeti kamemetsighwa na Ghumuhe ghwe Imulungu,
kalonga kwa kukemelela, “Kubweda kubita iwapinga wose, ne imwana yutsomweleka kabalikiighwa!
Ebali chinu chino chindawila nene, mbaka mai we Imtwatsa wangu yanyangile nene?
Hanihulike kwondamsa, imwana kadaluka munda mwangu kwa ndeng'elelo.
Ng'apfu ghweghwe yutoghole ka ghatsolawila aghala ghayakulongele Imtwatsa”
Mariya kalonga, “Ghumoyo ghwangu ghomtoghola Imtwatsa;
ghumoyo ghwangu ghwomdeng'elela Imulungu iyali Mkombotsi wangu,
kwaapfila kaukumbuka udodo we imtumwa wake! Kulawa sambi na kughendelela iwanu wose watsong'ema na imunu iyebwedile
kwaapfila Imulungu yane Ngupfu kanendela makulu. Taghwa lye Imulungu lyenzeluka.
Kowonela libatsi iwanu wala iwompfuka. libatsi lyake lyokala lweleko mbaka lweleko lungi
Tsakatenda ipfinu pfikulu kwa ghumoko ghwake. Kawapwililisa iwanu iweghodile mne imimoyo yawo.
Kawahulumsa iwandewa kulawa kune ipfighoda pfawo pfa undewa, na kawenula iwali mbughilambughila.
Kawaghutisa wane inzala kwa pfinu pfinoghile, na kawawinga matajiri ghamoko ghaliyeka.
Kamwapfila imtumwa wake Isiraeli, na ng'esemwile bae kumlangusa libatsi lyake.
Kakumbuka kumwonela libatsi Abrahamu na lukolo lwake ghamatsuwa ghose!”
Mariya kakala na Elizabeti kwa miyetsi midatu, kuya koya ukaye yake.
Matsuwa gha Elisabeti tsaghapfika ukweleka imwana, naye keleka imwana immale.
Iwanu wali habehi yake ne iwandughu tsake hawahulike Imulungu pfamwonele libatsi sideke, wose wadeng'elela naye.
Imwana hapfikile matsuwa manane, watsa kumwingitsa ngoma. Wabama kumwing'a taghwa Sakariya, taghwa lya aba wake.
Kuya mai wake kalonga, “Bae! Taghwa lyake katsokemighwa Yohane!”
Walonga, “Pfii mbona kwahela ndughu iyokemighwa taghwa lino mlukolo lwako!”
Kuya walonga kwa ghamoko na aba wake wamghutsa taghwa lyachi kobama imwanaghe yakemighwe.
Sakariya kalomba chibao cho kwandikila, kuya kandika, “Taghwa lyake Yohane.” Wose wakangawala!
Bahala Zakariya kadaha ukulonga keli, kandusa ukumtunya Imulungu.
Iwanu wali habehi yake wapfuka, na mbuli tse ipfinu pfino tsenela kwose kune ipfidunda pfe isi ya Yudeya.
Chila imunu yahulike imbuli ino kalangula, keghutsa, “Pfii imwana yuno atsakuwa mwana wachi?” Kwaapfila ingupfu ye Imtwatsa yakwoneka ghendo ikala naye.
Sakariya aba wake Yohane kamemesighwa na Ghumuhe ghwe Imulungu, naye katabili imbuli kulawa kwe Imulungu.
“Lekani tumtunye Imtwatsa, Imulungu wa Isiraeli! Kwaapfila kawatsila iwanu wake na kuwakombola.
Katwing'a twetwe Mkombotsi yane ngupfu, mtsukulu wa imtumwa wake Daudi.
Ka pfalongile kulawa ghumwande kubitila manabii wake wahenzeluka.
kutukombola kulawa kwe iwehile wetu, na kulawa kune ingupfu ya wose iwotwihila.
Tsakalonga katsowonela libatsi iwabala wetu na katsokumbuka lilaghano lyake lyenzeluke.
Kelighita ghendo kwa Abrahamu imbala wetu
katsotukombola kulawa kwe iwanu iwotwihila. Na katwapfila tudahe kumsang'anila bila kupfuka,
tuwe wenzeluka na tuwe iwanu wanoghile hambele hake, matsuwa ghose gha ughima wetu.
Ghweghwe imwanangu, kutsokemighwa nabii we Imulungu yali Uchanya ng'ani. Kutsomlongolela Imtwatsa umgholosele inzila yake.
Kuwalongela iwanu wake watsokombolighwa kwa kuleghusighwa nzambi tsawo.
Imulungu wetu kana libatsi na ghumoyo ghunoghile. Katsowamwemwesela ghumwanga ghwa ukombotsi kulawa kulanga.
Ghutsowamwemwesela iwanu wose iwali mne ichisi na sisila lya ifwa aghalongotse maghulu ghetu mne nzila iili tseghamba.”
Imwana kakula na kongetseka ingupfu mmuhe. Kakala kunyika mbaka litsuwa hawalawilile iwanu wa Isiraeli.
Ghamatsuwa ghala Agusto, Imndewa wa Roma, tsakalaghitsa iwanu wose wa undewa wa Roma wapetighwe.
Aluno lwa mwanduso kwe iwanu kupetighwa, Kurenio hawile mkulu we isi ya Siriya.
Kuya, chila imunu kaghenda kune ghumji ghwake kwandikighwa taghwa lyake.
Yosefu kalawa ghumji ghwa Natsareti ighuli mna isi ya Galilaya, kaghenda ghumji ghwa Betilehemu ighuli mna isi ya Yudeya, hanu helekighwe mndewa Daudi. Yosefu kaghenda ako kwaapfila kalawila mne lukolo lwa Daudi.
Kaghenda na Mariya kupetighwa, ipinga yamlapfile tsengele, yakalile ne inda.
Hawang'ali wa Betilehemu, litsuwa lyake lya ukweleka lipfika,
keleka imwanaghe chaudele, kampfatsa pfibwende. Kuya kamuwasitsa mne ichibumbulika hanu hawajilagha iwanyama, kwaapfila ng'awapatile bae hanu ho kukala mne ing'anda ya iwahenza.
Mna isi iila tsakukala na wadimi iwang'ali wokalitsa imipfugho yawo nechilo.
Imalaika we Imtwatsa kawalawila, ne utunitso we Imtwatsa uwamwemwesela, nawo wapfuka ghendo.
Lekeni malaika ayo kawalongela, “Mleke ukupfuka! Niwaghalila imbuli inoghile, iitsowadeng'eletsa iwanu wose.
Leloli kune ghumji ghwa Daudi kelekighwa Mkombotsi wenu; yeye iyo Kiristu, Imtwatsa!
Achino chitsakuwa chitango kuna mwemwe. Mtsomwona imwana mdodo, wampfatsa ipfibwende, wamuwatsisa hanu ho kujila iwanyama.”
Bahala, kingili kulu lye iwamalaika litingana ne malaika ayo, wamtunya Imulungu, walonga,
“Utunitso kwe Imulungu yali uchanya ng'ani kulanga, na tseghamba kwe iwanu iwali mne isi yose iwanoghelighwe naye”
Iwamalaika awo hawoyile kulanga, wadimi welongela, “Tukeni Betilehemu tukalole acho ichilawile, chatulongele Imtwatsa.”
Apfo watsuma, wawapfika Mariya na Yosefu, na ayula imwana mdodo kawasitsighwa hanu ho ukujila iwanyama.
Wadimi awo hawamwonile imwana yula, wawalongela mbuli tse imwana tsawalongile malaika.
Wose iwahulike agho, wakangawala na mbuli tsawalongile wadimi.
Lekeni Mariya kagheka agha ghose mna ghumoyo ghwake na kaghatonga ng'ani.
Awala iwadimi woya kunyika, wamtunya Imulungu na kumwimbila kwa ghose ghawahulike na ghawonile, ghose ghalawila ka malaika pfawalongele.
Mne litsuwa lya nane, litsuwa lya kumwingitsa ngoma imwana halipfikile, kakemighwa taghwa lyake Yesu. Taghwa alyo tsakeng'ighwa na malaika ahala mai wake ng'ana ame inda.
Ghamatsuwa tsaghapfika gha Yosefu na Mariya kutenda ichihendo cha kudeghetetsighwa ka Ghamalaghitso gha Musa pfagholaghitsa. Apfo wamsola imwana, waghenda naye kune ghumji ghwa Yerusalemu kumwika hambele he Imtwatsa,
ka pfayandikighwe mne Ghamalaghitso ghe Imtwatsa Imulungu; “Chila imwana immale chaudele alapfighwe kwe Imtwatsa.”
Kuya tsawaghenda ili watambike, walapfe njiwa weli au makinda meli ka Ghamalaghitso ghe Imtwatsa pfagholaghitsa.
Ako Yerusalemu tsakukala na imunu yumwe taghwa lyake Simoni. Imunu ayo tsakakala kanogha na kompfuka Imulungu. Ayo yang'ali yobetetsa ukutsa kwa ukombotsi wa Isiraeli, naye tsakakala na Ghumuhe ghwe Imulungu.
Ghumuhe ghwe Imulungu kamlongela ng'atsakufa bae mbaka amwone Kiristu yasaghulighwe ne Imtwatsa.
Kuya Ghumuhe ghwe Imulungu kamlongotsa Simoni kaghenda kune Ing'anda ye Imulungu. Kuya aba na mai wake Yesu wamghala imwana wawo mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu wamtendele ka pfaibamighwe mne ichihendo cha Ghamalaghitso gha Musa.
Simoni kamsola imwana Yesu mna ghamoko ghake, kuya kamtunya Imulungu, kalonga,
“Sambi Imtwatsa, mlekelele imtumwa wako, yoke tseghamba, ka pfulongile.
Kwa tsinenge tsangu niwona ukombotsi wako,
uutendile woneke kuna iwanu wose,
Ghumwanga ighutsowamwemwesela iwanu wose iwali si Wayahudi bae, na litsoghala utunitso kwe iwanu wako wa Isiraeli.”
Aba wake na mai wake Yesu wang'ali wokangawala na mbuli tse imwana tsayalongile Simoni.
Simoni kawabaliki, kamlongela Mariya, mai wake Yesu, “Imwana yuno kasaghulighwa ne Imulungu kwa ukwagha na ukukombolighwa kwe iwanu wengi mne isi ya Isiraeli. Kuya katsakuwa chitango kulawa kwe Imulungu, ichitsolemighwa ne iwanu wengi.
Kuya ukwalangula mne imimoyo ye iwanu wengi kutsoghubulighwa mwatsi. Naghwe imwenyegho, usungu ka lipanga ilitema utsouhoma ghumoyo ghwako.”
Tsakukala na nabii yumwe pinga, kakala mnzehe ghendo, tagwa lyake Ana, neghe Fanuweli, wa lukolo lwa Aseri. Ipinga ayo tsakakala na immale wake kwa miyaka saba kulawa kukwelighwa kwake.
Kuya tsakakala chitsuka mbaka matsuwa ghala ghawile mnzehe wa miyaka semanini na mine. Na matsuwa agho ghose kakala mne ing'anda ye Imulungu, ang'ali yofunga ukuja na ukulomba chilo na misi.
Saa iila ipinga ayo kalawila, kamlongela Imulungu mighede, kawalongela imbuli ye imwana yula kwe iwanu wose yawang'ali woubetela ukombotsi wa Yerusalemu.
Yosefu na Mariya hawaghamalitse ghose ighobamighwa na Ghamalaghitso ghe Imtwatsa Imulungu, tsawoya ukaye yawo Natsareti, mne ghumji ghwa Galilaya.
Imwana kakula, kongetseka ngupfu, kamema ihekima, na uluso we Imulungu ukala hamwe naye.
Chila mwaka mne chihungo cha pasaka, welesi wake wang'ali woghendagha Yerusalemu.
Yesu hapfikile miyaka kumi na mili, tsawaghenda naye kune ichihungo ka pfawatendagha.
Hawamalitse ichihungo, na hawang'ali wakuya ukaye yawo, Yesu tsakakala kuchugho Yerusalemu, aku welesi wake ng'awamanyile bae.
Tsawepfikitsa ka tsawawose mne ghumwanza, waghenda ghumwanza ghwa tsuwa limwe. Kuya wandusa kumbama mna iwandughu tsawo na sale tsawo.
Ng'awamwonile bae, apfo woya Yerusalemu kumbama.
Mna litsuwa lya kadatu, wampfika mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu mghati mwe iwalangulitsi wa Chiyahudi, ang'ali yowategheletsa na ukuwaghutsa.
Wose watsihulike mbuli tsake wakangawala na tsimbutsi tsake na apfila pfawedike.
Weletsi wake hawamwonile wakangawala ng'ani. Mai wake kamghutsa, “Mwanangu, ebali ututenda apfi? Nene na aba wako tung'ali tukubama kwa usungu.”
Yesu kawedika, “Angu mnibamila choni? Ng'ammanyile bae nene nibamighwa nikale mne ing'anda ya Aba wangu?”
Lekeni wao ng'awamanyile bae imbuli yawalongele ina mana yachi.
Kuya, koya nawo mbaka Natsareti ako ang'ali yowahulikitsa. Mai wake keka ipfinu pfose mne ghumoyo ghwake.
Na Yesu kakula na kongetseka ihekima na utali, na kumnoghelesa Imulungu ne iwanu.
Ghumwaka ghwa kumi na tano ghwa undewa wa Mndewa Tiberi, Pontiyo Pilato tsakakala mkulu wa isi ya Yudeya, Herodi tsakakala mkulu wa Galilaya, na ndughu yake Filipi tsakakala mkulu wa Ituleya na isi ya Tilakoniti, na Lusaniya tsakakala mkulu wa Abilene.
Anasi na Kayafa tsawakala iwakulu we inambiko. Mna matsuwa agho, imbuli ye Imulungu tsaimtsila Yohane, imwana wa Sakariya akula kunyika.
Apfo, Yohane kanga isi yose iibakane na ghumto Yoridani. Kawapetela iwanu watsileke nzambi tsawo na wabatitsighwe, ili Imulungu awaleghusile nzambi tsawo.
Ka pfayandikighwe mne ichitabu cha nabii Isaya, “Litsi lye imunu lyokema kulawa kunyika, ‘Mmwikile ghoya Imtwatsa nzila yake, mgholose nzila yake.
Chila lwanda lutsomemetsighwa, chila chidunda na sughulu pfitsomwaghaluka, hanu hapfeduke hatsogholosighwa nzila itsihile tsitsogholosighwa na kukala ghoya.
Na iwanu wose watsowona ukombotsi we Imulungu!’ ”
Kuya iwanu wamghendela Yohane ili awabatitse, naye kawalongela, “Mwemwe iwana we nzoka! Yuhi yawalongele mwodaha kuhepa ukuhighighwa ne Imulungu?
Mtende aghala igholangusa ka mtsileka nzambi tsenu. Mleke kwilongela, ‘Abrahamu aba wetu!’ Nowalongela, kulawa mne ghamabwe ghano Imulungu kodaha kumlapfila Abrahamu iwana.
Kuya, hoya ikighwa ghoya msina mwe mibiki, apfo chila mbiki yang'aghukweleka ghamatunda ghanoghile ghutsoghanighwa na kwasighwa mna ghumoto.”
Kingili lye iwanu limghutsa, “Lelo tutandetse?”
Yohane kawedika, “Imunu yane ghamaghwanda meli yamwing'e yula yalihela lighwanda, na yane ichijo yatende pfipfo.”
Nawo iwasola kodi watsa wabatitsighwe, wamghutsa, “Imlangulitsi, twetwe tutende choni?”
Nae kawalongela, “Mleke kusola kodi kubita pfamlaghitsighwe.”
Nawo asikali wamghutsa, “Na twetwe tutende choni?” Naye kawedika, “Mleke kuboka ipfinu pfe imunu wowose na mleke kumbangitsila imunu wowose. Mwenele na achila chamulihighwa.”
Iwanu wang'ali wololela ipfinu ipfitsolawila, wandusa kwalangula mna imimoyo yawo mbuli tsa Yohane, pfii ayu ka Kiristu?
Baho Yohane kawalongela wose, “Nene nowabatitsa mwemwe kwa ghamatsi, lekeni kakutsa yane ngupfu kubita nene, nene sidaha bae kumdoholela mitsabi ye imikwabatsa yake. Ayo katsowabatitsa kwa Ghumuhe ghwe Imulungu na kwa ghumoto ghwa kuhigha.
Ayo kana lungo mne ghamoko ghake, abetele uhemba wake, awike hamwe mne ikano yake na katsolakatsa mikumvi mne ghumoto ing'aghutsimika bae.”
Apfo kwa mbuli tsingi, Yohane tsayang'ali yowapetela iwanu Imbuli Inoghile.
Lekeni Yohane tsakamkembela Herodi, mkulu wa Galilaya, kwaapfila kamkwela Herodiya, mwehe wa ndughu yake, ne ipfinu pfingi pfihile pfatendile Herodi.
Kuya Herodi kongetsa ichinu chingi chihile kwa kumwika Yohane mne ligheretsa.
Iwanu wose hawamalile kubatitsighwa, kuya Yesu kabatitsighwa. Na hang'ali yolomba, ililanga lighubuka,
na Ghumuhe ghwe Imulungu ghumuhulumkila mne lukuli ka lwe injiwa. Litsi kulawa kulanga lilonga, “Ghweghwe kwa Imwanangu yuninoghela, nonoghelighwa naghwe.”
Yesu handuse isang'ano yake tsakana miyaka ka selasini. Iwanu tsawepfikitsa yeye kakala imwana wa Yosefu, imwana wa Heli.
Heli tsakakala imwana wa Matati, iyakalile imwana wa Lawi, imwana wa Meliki, imwana wa Yani, imwana wa Yosefu,
iyakalile imwana wa Matatia, imwana wa Amosi, imwana wa Nahumu, imwana wa Hesili, imwana wa Nagai,
iyakalile imwana wa Mahati, imwana wa Matatia, imwana wa Semeyi, imwana wa Yoseki, imwana wa Yuda,
iyakalile imwana wa Yohaneni, imwana wa Resa, imwana wa Serubabeli, imwana wa Setieli, imwana wa Neri,
imwana wa Meliki, imwana we Adi, imwana wa Kosamu, iyakalile imwana we Elimadamu, imwana we Eri,
iyakalile imwana wa Yoshua, imwana wa Eliyetseri, imwana wa Yorimu, imwana wa Matati, imwana wa Lawi,
iyakalile imwana wa Simoni, imwana wa Yuda, imwana wa Yosefu, imwana wa Yonamu, imwana we Eliyakimu,
iyakalile imwana wa Maleya, imwana wa Mena, imwana wa Matata, imwana wa Natani, imwana wa Daudi,
iyakalile imwana wa Yese, imwana wa Obedi, imwana wa Boasi, imwana wa Salimoni, imwana wa Nasoni,
iyakalile imwana wa Aminadabu, imwana we Adimini, imwana we Arini, imwana wa Hesironi, imwana wa Peresi, imwana wa Yuda,
iyakalile imwana wa Yakobu, imwana we Isaka, imwana we Abrahamu, imwana wa Tera, imwana wa Nahori,
iyakalile imwana wa Serugi, imwana wa Reyu, imwana wa Pelegi, imwana wa Eberi, imwana wa Sala,
iyakalile imwana wa Kainamu, imwana wa Arifakisadi, imwana wa Shemu, imwana wa Nuhu, imwana wa Lameki,
iyakalile imwana wa Metusela, imwana wa Enoki, imwana wa Yaredi, imwana wa Mahalaleli, imwana wa Kainamu,
iyakalile imwana wa Enosi, imwana wa Seti, imwana wa Adamu, iyakalile imwana we Imulungu.
Yesu kalawa mne ghumto Yoridani kamema Ghumuhe ghwe Imulungu, na Ghumuhe haghwo ghumlongotsa mbaka kunyika.
Ako kaghetsighwa na Setani kwa matsuwa alubaini. Mne agho, ng'ajile bae chinu chochose, na matsuwa agho haghamalile tsakona nzala.
Setani kamlongela; “Ka ghweghwe kwe Imwana wa Imulungu, ulilongele libwe lino liwe chighate.”
Lekeni Yesu kamwidika, “Yandikighwa, ‘Imunu ng'odaha bae kuwa mghima kwa kuja chighate chiliyeka.’ ”
Bahala Setani kamlongotsa Yesu mbaka kuchanya, kamlangusa undewa wose uli mne isi yose.
Setani kamlongela, “Nitsokwing'a undewa na ukulu mne pfinu pfose pfino, kwaapfila pfose pfamne ghamoko ghangu, na nene nodaha kumwing'a imunu wowose yanimbama.”
“Nitsokwing'a ipfinu pfose pfino ka kutsonitambikila.”
Yesu kamwidika, “Yandikighwa, ‘Umtambikile Imtwatsa Imulungu wako, ne umsang'anile yeye yaliyeka!’ ”
Kuya Setani kamlongotsa mbaka kune ghumji ghwa Yerusalemu, mchiswili mwe Ing'anda ye Imulungu. Kamlongela, “Ka ghweghwe kwa Imwana we Imulungu, wilaghatse kulawa hano mbaka hasi.
Kwaapfila yandikighwa, ‘Imulungu katsowalaghitsa wamalaika wake wakulolese.
Nawo watsokukinda mne ghamoko ghao, uleke kwikwala ghumghulu ghwako mne libwe.’ ”
Lekeni Yesu kamwidika, “Ilongighwa, ‘Uleke kumghetsa Imtwatsa Imulungu wako.’ ”
Setani hayamalitse kumghetsa Yesu kwa chila chinu, kamleka chidogho.
Kuya Yesu koya mne isi ya Galilaya kamema ingupfu ya Ghumuhe ghwe Imulungu. Mbuli tsake tsenela Galilaya na mne tsiisi itsili habehi.
Yang'ali yolangulitsa mne tsing'anda tsawo tsa ukulombela na iwanu wose wamtunya.
Kuya Yesu koya Natsareti hanu hayalelighwe. Mne Litsuwa lya Sabato, kaghenda mne ing'anda ye ukulombela ka pfayatsowele. Kema na kusoma Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka.
Keng'ighwa ichitabu cha nabii Isaya. Kachipfughula, kahona hanu handikighwe,
“Ghumuhe ghwe Imtwatsa ghwa hachanya hangu, kwaapfila kanisaghula nene niwaghalile wahingwa imbuli inoghile. Kanituma niwapetele iwohighwe ka watsolekelighwa, ne ipfifita watsokona. Na kuwalekelela iwanu iwoghaya.
Na kuwalongela ka matsuwa ghapfika ghe Imtwatsa kuwakombola iwanu wake.”
Yesu kachighubika ichitabu, kamwing'a imtumwa, kuya kakala hasi. Iwanu wose mne ing'anda ye ukulombela wamtsodolela tsinenge.
Naye kawalongela, “Ighandikighwe leloli ghatimila mne ghamaghutwi ghenu.”
Wose wamtoghola, wakangawala na mbuli tsinoghile tsalongile. Walonga, “Angu ayu si imwana wa Yosefu bae?”
Yesu kawalongela, “Nomanya mwodaha kunilongela imbuli ino, ‘Imghanga, wihonetse imwenyegho! Ghose ghatuhulike ghutendile akula Kaperinaumu, pfipfila ghatende hano ukaye yako’ ”
Kaghendelela kulonga, “Nowalongela ghendo, nabii ng'otogholighwa bae ukaye yake.
“Mnitegheletse! Nowalongelani ghendo tsakukala na pfitsuka wengi mne isi ya Isiraeli mna matsuwa gha nabii Eliya. matsuwa agho imvula ng'aitowile bae kwa miyaka midatu na miyetsi sita, apfo tsakukala ne inzala ng'ulu mne isi yose.
Eliya ng'atumighwe bae kwe chitsuka wowose, lekeni katumighwa kwe chitsuka yumwe iyakalile Sarefati mne isi ya Sidoni.
Mna matsuwa gha nabii Elisha tsakukala ne iwanu wengi mne isi ya Isiraeli iwoghula ukoma. Kuduhu imunu wowose yahonile, lekeni Naamani yaliyeka, imunu wa isi ya Siria.”
Iwanu wose mne Ing'anda ye ukulombela hawahulike apfi wona maya ng'ani.
Wenuka, wamghala Yesu kunze kwa ghumji, na wamghala mchidando mwe chidunda, hanu ihatsengighwe kaye tsawo. Wabama wamwase kulwanda,
lekeni kabita mghati mwe kingili, koka.
Kuya Yesu kahulumka Kaperinaumu, ghumji ghwa Galilaya. Na mne litsuwa lya Sabato kandusa kuwalangulitsa iwanu.
Tsawakangawala kwa malangulitso ghake, kwaapfila ghalangulitse tsa ghana ngupfu.
Mne ing'anda ye ukulombela tsa kuna imunu yane ichinyamkela yehile, kakemelela kalonga,
“Ubama kututenda choni, Yesu wa Natsareti? Kutsa kutukoma? Nokumanya ghweghwe kwa Imtumighwa Mwenzeluka we Imulungu!”
Yesu kamkembela ichinyamkela, “Winyamale, umlawe imunu yuno!” Kuya ichinyamkela kamghwisa hasi imunu ayo hambele hawo, kamlawa bila kumlagha.
Iwanu wose wakangawala ng'ani, welongela, “Ahino mbuli yachi lelo? Imunu yuno kodaha na kana ngupfu tsa kuwakembela ipfinyamkela, nawo womuhulika!”
Apfo mbuli tsa Yesu tsenela mne isi yose ya Galilaya.
Yesu kalawa mne ing'anda ye ukulombela, kaghenda mne ing'anda ya Simoni. Mai wake mwehe wa Simoni yang'ali yoghula homa kali ng'ani, wamlomba Yesu amuhonetse mai ayo.
Apfo kaghenda kema habehi na mai ayo, kaukembela utamu. Nawo utamu umlawa, bahala kenuka, kandusa kuwatumikila.
Litsuwa haling'ali lyotsama, iwanu wamghalila Yesu iwanu iwang'ali woghula chila utamu, naye keka ghamoko ghake mwa chila mtamu, kawahonetsa wose.
Ipfinyamkela tsawawalawa iwanu wengi na kudama, “Ghweghwe kwe Imwana wa Imulungu!” Yesu kawakembela na kuwaghoma kulonga, kwaapfila tsawammanya yeye kakala Kiristu.
