Lupfilipfili Yesu kaghenda kunze kwe ghumji hanu halihela imunu. Iwanu wandusa kumbama, na hawamwonile wabama kumghoma aleke kuka.
Lekeni kawalongela, “Pfipfila nobamighwa kuwapetela iwanu Mbuli Inoghile ye Undewa we Imulungu kune imiji ingi, kwaapfila acho chicho Imulungu chanitumile kuchitenda.”
Apfo kaghendelela ukuwapetela iwanu mne tsing'anda tse ukulombela mne isi yose ya Yudeya.
Litsuwa limwe Yesu tsakema mmbalimbali mwa tsiwa Genesareti, baho iwanu wammemela na kumkunughitsa kunughitsa, wategheletsa Imbuli ye Imulungu.
Kayona minumbwi mili mmbalimbali mwe tsimbu, ilekighwe na iwalowa somba iwang'ali wohopfugha nyapfu tsao.
Yesu kengila mne mnumbwi ghumwe ghwa Simoni, kamlongela aghusoghetse mnumbwi chidogho kulawa mmbalimbali mwe tsimbu mbaka mne ghamatsi. Kuya kakala hasi na kalangulitsa mtingano ghwe iwanu aku kamne mnumbwi.
Hayamalitse kulonga, kamlongela Simoni, “Usoghetse mnumbwi ghupfike haghatighati, kuya utsase nyapfu tsako mne ghamatsi upfule iwasomba.”
Simoni kamwidika, “Imtwatsa! Tusang'ana ichilo chose ng'atupatile ichinu bae. Lekeni kwaapfila kulonga apfo, notsasa!”
Watsasa nyapfu tsao na wapfula iwasomba wengi ng'ani mbaka nyapfu tsao tsandusa kudegheka.
Apfo wawabengutsa wayawo iwakalile mne mnumbwi ghungi watse wawapfile. Wapfika, waweka iwasomba mne minumbwi yose mili mbaka ibama kutsama.
Simoni Petiri hayonile achila ichilawile, kamtowela Yesu maghoti kalonga, “Ughende Imtwatsa! Nene ne imunu yane nzambi!”
Simoni na weyaghe wakangawala kwe iwasomba wengi wawalowile.
Pfipfila weyaghe Simoni, Jakobu na Yohane, iwanaghe Sebedayo nawo wakangawala. Yesu kamlongela Simoni, “Uleke kupfuka, kulawa sambi na kughendelela kutsowapfula iwanu.”
Waikwegha minumbwi yawo mbaka mmbalimbali mwe tsimbu, waleka chila ichinu, wamuwinza Yesu.
Yesu hang'ali mne ghumji ghumwe, tsakatsa imunu yane ukoma lukuli lwose. Imtamu ayo hamwonile Yesu, keghwisa hasi, kalomba “Imtwatsa, ka kwobama, kwodaha kunitenda nihone!”
Yesu kagholosa ghumoko, kamkinda, kalonga, “Nobama; Uhone!” Bahala ukoma umlawa.
Yesu kamlongela, “Uleke kumlongela imunu wowose. Lekeni ughende, wilanguse kwe imbala we inambiko ne ulapfe inambiko ka Musa pfawalongele, iwanu wose wamanye ka ghweghwe kuhona.”
Lekeni mbuli tsa Yesu tsongetseka kwenela mne isi yose, na iwanu wengi wapfika kumtegheletsa na wambama awahonetse utamu wawo.
Lekeni Yesu tsakaghenda hanu halihela imunu, ako kalomba.
Litsuwa limwe Yesu yang'ali yolangulitsa. Mafarisayo wangi na iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso iwalawile mne imiji ya Galilaya, Yudeya na Yerusalemu tsawakala bahala. Ngupfu ye Imtwatsa tsaikala naye kwa kuwahonetsa iwatamu.
Iwanu wangi wapfika, wamduta machela mne lutsatsi imunu yaholole, wabama wamghale mng'anda, hambele ha Yesu.
Lekeni ng'awadahile bae, kwaapfila tsahana iwanu wengi sideke. Apfo wamghala, wamwika mchiswili, wafumla kuya wahulumsa machela mbaka haghatighati he iwanu awo, hayali Yesu.
Yesu honile ukutoghola kwawo, kamlongela imunu yaholole, “Sale yangu, nzambi tsako tsileghusighwa.”
Iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso na Mafarisayo wandusa kwighutsa, “Ayuno imunu wachi iyomligha Imulungu? Yuhi iyodaha kuleghusa nzambi? Angu si Imulungu yaliyeka iyodaha kuleghusa nzambi!”
Yesu kamanya chawang'ali wakwalangula, kawaghutsa, “Mkwalangula choni mne imimoyo yenu?
Chihi chibewe; kulonga ‘Nzambi tsako tsileghusighwa’ au kulonga ‘Winuke ughende?’
Nobama mmanye, Imwana we Imunu kana uwetso wa kuleghusa nzambi mne iisi.” Apfo kamlongela imunu yaholole, “Nokulongela, winuke usole chilagho chako uye ukaye!”
Bahala imunu ayo kenuka hambele hawo, kasola chilagho chake. Koka ukaye yake aku komtunya Imulungu.
Iwanu wose wakangawala ghendo! Wapfuka na wamtunya Imulungu, walonga, “Leloli tupfona ipfinu pfa kukangawatsa!”
Haghamalile agho, Yesu kalawa kunze kamwona imunu iyosola kodi yakemighwe Lawi kakala mne ing'anda ya kulihila kodi. Yesu kamlongela, “Uniwinze.”
Lawi kenuka, kaleka chila chinu kamuwinza.
Kuya Lawi kamtendela Yesu chihungo chikulu mne ing'anda yake, na kingili kulu lye iwanu iwasola kodi ne iwanu wangi tsawabahala.
Lekeni Mafarisayo wangi na iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso wangi iwalawile mne kingili lyawo wawanung'unikila iwanang'ina wa Yesu, “Ebali mwakuja na kunwa hamwe ne iwanu iwasola kodi na wane nzambi?”
Yesu kawedika, “Iwanu iwaghima ng'awombama bae imghanga, ila awala iwatamu iwo iwombama imghanga.
Sitsile bae kuwakema iwanu iwanoghile, ila wane nzambi wadahe kutsileka.”
Iwanu wangi wamlongela Yesu, “Iwanang'ina wa Yohane wafungagha ukuja na kulomba, na iwatumighwa wa Mafarisayo wotenda pfipfo. Lekeni iwanang'ina wako wakuja na kunwa!”
Yesu kedika, “Apfi mwodaha kuwaghoma iwanu iwakemighwe kune chihungo cha kukwela waleke ukuja ahala imunu yokwela ang'ali nawo?
Lekeni litsuwa lyakutsa imunu yokwela hatsosolighwa kulawa mna wawo, na baho watsofunga ukuja.”
Kuya Yesu kawalongela imbuli ino, “Kuduhu imunu iyodegha ichiraka kulawa mne lighwanda lya sambi na kuchika mne lighwanda lya ghumwande. Ka kotenda apfo, katsolidegha lighwanda lya sambi, na ichiraka kulawa mne lighwanda lya sambi ng'achitsolingana bae na lighwanda lya ghumwande.
Na kuduhu imunu iyoghuma dipfai ya sambi mne imikoba ye ingotsi ya ghumwande. Kwaapfila ka kotenda apfo, dipfai ya sambi itsoitula imikoba hayo, dipfai itsakwitika na imikoba itsohinyika.
Lekeni dipfai ya sambi yobamighwa ighumighwe mne imikoba ya sambi!
Kuduhu imunu iyakunwa dipfai ya ghumwande na kuya abame dipfai ya sambi, kwaapfila kolonga, ‘Ya ghumwande inogha.’ ”
Litsuwa limwe lya sabato Yesu ang'ali yobita mne imighunda ya uhemba. Iwanang'ina wake wandusa kukwanyula mikungwi ya uhemba, waifighisa mne ghamoko ghawo waja.
Mafarisayo wangi waghutsa, “Ebali mwotenda ichinu ichighomighwe mne litsuwa lya Sabato?”
Yesu kawedika, “Apfi ng'amsomile bae achila chatendile Daudi na wayaghe hawakalile ne inzala?
Daudi tsakengila mne ing'anda ye Imulungu, kasola pfighate ipfilapfighwe kwe Imulungu kapfija. Pfipfila kaweng'a wayaghe. Ghamalaghitso ghomghoma imunu wowose kupfija pfighate apfo, ila ipfilongotsi we inambiko waliyeka iwabamighwe kupfija.”
Kuya Yesu kawalongela, “Imwana we Imunu kana ukulu mne Litsuwa lya Sabato.”
Mne Litsuwa lingi lya Sabato, Yesu tsakaghenda kulangulitsa mne ing'anda ya ukulombela. Mne ing'anda ila ye ukulombela tsakukala ne imunu yaholole ghumoko ghwa ukujila.
Iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso wangi na Mafarisayo tsawabama imbuli ya kumghoghela Yesu. Apfo wamlolesa ka ang'amuhonetse imunu mne Litsuwa lya Sabato.
Lekeni Yesu kamanya chawang'ali wakwalangula, kamlongela imunu ayo yaholole ghumoko, “Utse wime hano.” Imunu ayo kenuka, kema hala.
Kuya Yesu kawalongela, “Nowaghutseni mwemwe, apfi mna Litsuwa lya Sabato pfinogha kutenda ghanoghile au kutenda ghehile? Kuukombola ughima we imunu au kuukoma?”
Kawalolesa iwanu wose iwali hala, kuya kamlongela imunu ayo, “Ugholose ghumoko ghwako.” Katenda ka Yesu pfamlongele, na ghumoko ghwake ghuhonetsighwa.
Lekeni iwanu wona maya wandusa kwilongela iwenyegho ichinu chachi wamtendele Yesu.
Mna matsuwa agho Yesu kagheluka kuchidunda, kakala meso chilo chose komlomba Imulungu.
Nemitondo haipfikile, Yesu kawakema iwanang'ina wake. Kawasaghula iwanang'ina kumi na weli kulawa mumula mne kingili lyawo, kaweng'a taghwa iwatumighwa.
Simoni, Yesu kamwing'a taghwa lya keli Petiri, na ndughu yake Andereya, Jakobu, Yohane, Filipi, Batalomeyo.
Matei na Tomasi na Jakobu imwana we Alifayo na Simoni iyakemighwe Zelote,
Yuda imwana wa Jakobu na Yuda Isikarioti, yamhunduke Yesu.
Yesu hayahulumke kuchidunda na iwatumighwa wake, kema mlwanda na kingili kulu lye iwanang'ina wake. Iwanu wengi tsawabahala iwalawile tsiisi tsose tsa Yudeya, Yerusalemu na walawile mne tsiisi tsa kumwani tsa Tiro na Sidoni.
Iwanu awo watsa kumtegheletsa Yesu na kuhonetsighwa matamu ghawo. Pfipfila iwanu wala iwadununzighwe ne ipfinyamkela watsa wahonetsighwa.
Iwanu wose tsawabama kumkinda Yesu, kwaapfila ingupfu ing'ali imlawa na iwahonetsa wose.
Yesu kawalola iwanang'ina wake kalonga, “Mbweda mwemwe wahingwa, kwaapfila Undewa we Imulungu iwo wenu!
Mbweda mwemwe yamne nzala sambi, kwaapfila mwitseghuta! Mbweda mwemwe yamlila sambi, kwaapfila mtsosekelela!
“Mbweda ka iwanu watsowahila, watsowabaghula na watsowaligha na watsolonga mwemwe mwiha, kwaajili ye Imwana we Imunu!
Deng'eleleni na kubigha agho haghotsolawila kwaapfila ghweko lyenu kulu likighwa kulanga. Apfo pfipfo iwabala wawo pfawawatendele manabii.
Lekeni mtsoghaya mwemwe matajili, kwaapfila mwemwe ma tsambokela ughima unoghile!
Mtsoghaya mwemwe yamwighutile sambi, kwaapfila hambele mtsakona inzala! Mtsoghaya mwemwe yamsekelela sambi, kwaapfila hambele mtsoghanzika no kulila!
Mtsoghaya ka iwanu wose watsowatogholani mwemwe! Kwaapfila apfo pfipfo iwabala wawo pfawawatendele manabii wa ughutsu.
“Lekeni nowalongela mwemwe yamnihulika, muwanoghele iwehile wenu, muwatendele ghanoghile iwanu wala iwowehila.
Muwabaliki iwanu wala iwowalighita, na muwalombele kwe Imulungu iwanu wala iwowatendela ghehile.
Ka imunu wowose kakutowa mna likanza limwe, pfipfila mleke akutowe likanza liyaghe, ka imunu kolisola likoti lyako, pfipfila mleke asole lighwanda lyako.
Mwing'eni chila imunu cholomba, ka imunu wowose kakuboka ichinu chako, uleke kumlongela akuyitsile.
Muwatendele iwanu wangi achila chambama mwemwe wawatendele.
“Mng'awanoghela iwanu wala iwomnoghelani mwemwe, apfi uluso wachi wamlangusa? Hata ‘iwanu wane nzambi’ pfipfila wowanoghela iwanu wala iwowanoghela!
Mng'awatendela ghanoghile iwanu wala iwowatendela ghanoghile, apfi uluso wachi wamlangusa? Pfipfila ‘iwanu wane nzambi’ wotenda pfipfo!
Mng'awakopesha iwanu wala yamuwalolela watsomuyitsilani, apfi uluso wachi wamlangusa? Pfipfila ‘iwanu wane nzambi’ wowakopesha wayawo, na kuwalolela wawoyitsile.
Lekeni wanogheleni iwowahila mwemwe na muwatendele ghanoghile, muwakopeshe iwanu na mleke kulolela ka watsowoyitsila. Kuya ghweko lyenu litsakuwa kulu, na mtsakuwa iwana we Imulungu iyali Kuchanya Ng'ani. Kwaapfila yeye kanogha kwe iwanu yang'awolonga mighede ne iwanu wehile.
Muwe na libatsi, ka Aba wenu pfali na libatsi.
“Mleke kuwahigha wayenu, ne Imulungu ng'atsowahighani bae. Mleke kuwadununza wayenu, ne Imulungu ng'atsowadununzani bae. Muwalekele wayenu, ne Imulungu katsowalekeleni.
Muweng'e iwanu wangi, ne Imulungu katsomwing'ani. Namwe mtsobokela ichipimo chimemile mbaka chakwitika. Kwaapfila ichipimo chamtumila kwe iwanu wangi, Imulungu katsochitumila chicho kuna mwemwe.”
Kuya Yesu kawalongela imbuli ino, “Imunu chifita ng'odaha bae kumlongotsa chifita miyaghe, ka katsotenda apfo, wose weli watsakughwila mwikolongo.
Kuduhu mwanang'ina mkulu kubita mlangulitsi wake. Lekeni chila mwanang'ina iyamalitse ghamalangulitso ghake, kakuwa ka imlangulitsi wake.
“Ebali kwochona chibanzi ichili mnenge mwa miyagho, lekeni ng'aulyona bae biki ili mnenge mwako?
Apfi kwodaha kumlongela ndughu yako, ‘Ndughu yangu, leka nikulapfe chibanzi chili mnenge mwako,’ naghwe ghumwenyegho ng'ulyona bae biki ilili mnenge mwako? Ghweghwe kwa mng'enye! Tanu ulilapfe libiki lili mnenge mwako, kuya kutsolola ghoya na kuchilapfa chibanzi chili mnenge mwa ndughu yako.”
“Mbiki ghunoghile ng'aghukweleka bae ghamatunda ghehile, pfipfila kuduhu mbiki ghuhile ighwukweleka ghamatunda ghanoghile.
Chila mbiki ghwomanyika kwa ghamatunda ighukweleka, iwanu ng'awobawa bae mapela mne tsimiwa au ukubawa fifi mne miyonga.
Imunu yanoghile kolapfa ipfinu pfinoghile kulawa hanu hanoghile ipfikighwe mne ghumoyo ghwake, imunu yehile kolapfa ipfinu pfihile kulawa hanu hehile ipfikighwe mne ghumoyo ghwake. Kwaapfila imunu kolonga achila ichimemile mne ghumoyo ghwake.”
“Ebali mwonikema ‘Mtwatsa, Mtwatsa’ aku ng'amtenda bae achila chaniwalongele mchitende?
Nitsowalangusa kakonekatse imunu wowose yula iyonitsila nene na kutsitegheletsa mbuli tsangu na kutenda ka pfobamighwa.
Ayu keghala ne imunu yatsengile ing'anda kwa kuhimba ng'ani mne libambalawe, na kutsenga ing'anda ayo mchanya mwake. Imvula ng'ulu haitowile ghamatsi ng'aghadahile bae kuyughitsa ing'anda, kwaapfila itsengighwa ghoya.
Lekeni imunu iyotegheletsa mbuli tsangu na ng'otenda ka pfobamighwa, ayu keghala ne imunu yatsengile ing'anda mne msanga, bila ukuhimba ng'ani. Imvula ng'ulu haitowile, ghamatsi ghayughitsa ing'anda na kuighwisa, ne ing'anda yose ibomoka.”
Yesu hayamalitse ukulonga ipfinu pfino kwe iwanu, kaghenda Kaperinaumu.
Ako tsakukala ne imkulu yumwe we asikali miya imwe wa Roma, naye kakala ne imtumwa wake iyamnoghele ng'ani. Na imtumwa ayo ang'ali yoghula chidogho yafe.
Imkulu ayo hayahulike mbuli tsa Yesu, kawatuma iwabala wangi wa Wayahudi wamlombe Yesu atse amhonetse imtumwa wake.
Wamghendela Yesu, wamlomba ng'ani, walonga, “Umwapfile imunu yuno,
kwaapfila kowanoghela iwanu wetu, naye iyo iyatutsengele ing'anda ye ukulombela.”
Apfo Yesu kaghenda nawo. Hapfikile habehi ne ing'anda ye imkulu ayo, imkulu ayo kawatuma sale tsake wamlongele Yesu, “Imtwatsa, uleke kwitsupfa kutsa kuno. Nene sinoghile bae ghweghwe kwingila mng'anda mwangu.
Ndo mana tsambona nene sinoghile bae kukutsila ghweghwe. Lekeni ulonge imbuli iliyeka, imtumwa wangu katsohona.
Kwaapfila nene imwenyegho na imunu yane ukulu, nina asikali iwali hasi hangu. Ning'amlongela yumwe, ‘Ghenda!’ naye koghenda, na ning'amlongela yungi, ‘Itsa!’ naye kakutsa, na ning'amlongela imtumwa wangu, ‘Tenda achino!’ naye kochitenda.”
Yesu hahulike apfo, kakangawala, kawahundukila iwanu iwelongotse naye, kawalongela, “Nowalongela ghendo, sina mbone bae imunu iyotoghola ka imunu yuno, hata mne isi ya Isiraeli!”
Kuya iwanu wala hawoyile ukaye kwe imkulu wa asikali wa Roma wampfika imtumwa yula kahona.
Hambele chidogho, Yesu kaghenda mne ghumji ighukemighwe Naini na iwanang'ina wake, aku kelongotsa na iwanu wengi.
Kuya hapfikile habehi na libani kulu lye ghumji, kulawila iwanu waghala lukuli lwa msongolo iyapfile, yeye tsamwana nyalimwe wa ipinga iyali chitsuka. Iwanu wengi iwalawile ghumji ghula tsawakala hamwe na ipinga ayo.
Imtwatsa hayamwonile ipinga ayo, kamwonela libatsi, kamlongela, “Uleke kulila.”
Kuya kaghenda kakinda machela, ne iwanu iwaghalile machela tsawema. Yesu kalonga, “Imsongolo, nokulongela, winuke!”
Imsongolo yula iyafile kenuka kandusa ukulonga. Kuya Yesu kamwing'a mai we imsongolo yula.
Iwanu wose wapfuka na wamtunya Imulungu. Walonga, “Nabii mkulu katulawila mghati mwetu. Imulungu katsa kuwapfila iwanu wake.”
Mbuli atsino tsa Yesu tsenela mne isi yose ya Yudeya na tsiisi tsose itsili habehi.
Iwanang'ina wa Yohane wamlongela Yohane agha ghose. Naye kawakema iwanang'ina wake weli
kawatuma waghende kwe Imtwatsa wamghutse, “Apfi ghweghwe kwa yuyula yulongighwe na Yohane katsakutsa au tumbete imunu yungi?”
Hawapfikile kwa Yesu, walonga, “Yohane Mbatitsa katutuma tukughutse, ‘Apfi ghweghwe kwa yuyula yulongighwe na Yohane katsakutsa au tumbete munu yungi?’ ”
Ichipindi chichila, Yesu kawahonetsa iwatamu wengi ng'ani, kawalapfa ipfinyamkela na kawatenda ipfifita wengi wone.
Yesu kawedika iwanang'ina wa Yohane, “Mghende mkamlongele Yohane aghala ghamwonile na kughahulika; ipfifita sambi wakwona, ipfimbete woghenda, wane ukoma wohona, ipfitsiwi wohulika, iwanu iwafile wotsilihulighwa na mbuli tsinoghile tsopetighwa kwe wahingwa.
Kabweda imunu yula yang'onyihila nene.”
Hambele iwasenga wa Yohane hawokile, Yesu kandusa kuwalongela iwanu mbuli tsa Yohane, “Hamghendile kunyika, apfi mghendile kulola choni? Kululola lusinde ppfaluyughisighwa na libeho?
Apfi tsamghendile kulola choni? Imunu yapfalile lighwanda linoghile? Iwanu iwopfala ghamaghwanda ghanoghile na wane ughima unoghile wokala mne tsing'anda tse iwandewa!
Mnongele, apfi tsamghendile kulola choni? Nabii? Ona, lekeni tsamwona pfinu pfingi kubita nabii.
Kwaapfila Yohane iyo yuyo iyandikighwe mna Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka, ‘Imulungu tsakalonga, nitsomtuma imtumighwa wangu akulongole, katsoigholosa nzila yako.’ ”
Kuya Yesu kawalongela, “Yohane kambala kubita imunu wowose, lekeni imunu wowose yali mdodo mne Undewa wa Imulungu kambala kumbita Yohane.”
Iwanu wose, na iwasola kodi, hawahulike agho wamtoghola Imulungu, kwaapfila tsawabatitsighwa na Yohane.
Lekeni Mafarisayo na iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso tsawalema aghala ghayawalaghitse Imulungu watende, kwaapfila ng'awabatitsighwe na Yohane bae.
Yesu kaghendelela kulonga, “Apfi iwanu wa mweleko ghuno weghala ne chinu chachi? Weghala na choni?
Weghala ne iwana iwakalile kusoko. Wekema wenyegho kwa wenyegho, ‘Tuwatowela chimbeta, ng'ampfinile bae, tuwembila uwila we usungu, ng'amlilile bae!’
Yohane Mbatitsa tsakatsa, ng'ajile bae ichijo na ng'anwile bae imbwali, mwemwe mlonga, ‘Yohane kana chinyamkela!’
Imwana we imunu katsa, kakuja na kakunwa, namwe mlonga, ‘Imunu yuno kakujisa na kopatika sideke, sale wa iwasola kodi na wane nzambi!’
Lekeni ihekima yoneka inogha kwe iwanu wose yawaitoghole.”
Mfarisayo yumwe tsakamkema Yesu atse kuja naye ichijo cha nemihe. Yesu kaghenda mne ing'anda ya Mfarisayo ayo, kakala hasi yaje ichijo.
Mne ghumji ghula, tsakukala ne ipinga yane nzambi. Hayahulike Yesu kakuja mne ing'anda ya Mfarisayo ayo, ipinga ayo katsa na ichupa inoghile imemile ghamafuta ighonung'ila ghoya.
Kema habehi na ghamaghulu gha Yesu, kolila na ghamasotsi ghake ghamlaghalila Yesu. Kuya kabaghusa ghamaghulu gha Yesu kwa tsimvili tsake, kaghanonela na kabaka ghamafuta aghala, mmaghulu mwa Yesu.
Mfarisayo ayo honile pfino, kelongela imwenyegho, “Imunu yuno ang'awile nabii, ang'amtangile ipinga yuno iyamkindile ka imunu wachi, ang'ammanyile kana nzambi!”
Yesu kamlongela, “Simoni, nina chinu nobama nikulongele” Simoni kedika, “Ona mlangulitsi, nongele.”
Yesu kandusa kulonga, “Tsahana wanu weli iwatsime sendi kwe imunu iyakwatsima iwanu tsisendi. Yumwe katsima elufu tano na yungi katsima hamsini.
Mna wose weli, kuduhu yalihile sendi, apfo imunu iyakwatsima wanu tsisendi kawalekela wose. Apfi mne wano weli yuhi yatsomnoghela ng'ani imunu iyakwatsima iwanu tsisendi?”
Simoni kamwidika, “Nopfikitsa imunu yula yalekelighwe tsisendi nyingi.” Yesu kalonga, “Kulonga ghoya.”
Kuya Yesu kamhundukila ipinga ayo, kamlongela Simoni, “Apfi kwomwona ipinga hayu? Nitsa mng'anda mwako, ng'ungaile bae ghamatsi gha kuhopfugha ghamaghulu ghangu, lekeni ipinga ayu kahopfugha ghamaghulu ghangu kwa ghamasotsi ghake na kaghabaghusa kwa tsimvili tsake.
Ng'uninonele bae, lekeni kulawa hayengile ipinga ayu kaghendelela kughanonela ghamaghulu ghangu.
Ng'ubakile bae litwi lyangu ghamafuta, lekeni ipinga ayu kaghabakatsa ghamaghulu ghangu kwa ghamafuta ighonung'ila ghoya.
Nokulongela, kwaapfila nzambi tsake nyingi tsileghusighwa, apfo kaninoghela ng'ani. Lekeni imunu yalekelighwe chidogho konoghela chidogho.”
Kuya Yesu kamlongela ipinga ayo, “Nzambi tsako tsileghusighwa.”
Iwanu wangi iwakalile hala wandusa kwilongela, “Ayu imunu wachi mbaka yaleghuse nzambi?”
Yesu kamlongela ipinga hayo, “Ukutoghola kwako kukukombola. Ughende tseghamba.”
Matsuwa ghaghala, Yesu tsakanga mne tsikaye na mna imiji, kuno kowapetela iwanu imbuli inoghile ye undewa we Imulungu. Na wala Iwanang'ina kumi na weli waghenda na Yesu,
naye tsakelongotsa ne iwapinga wangi iwalapfighwe ipfinyamkela na kuhonetsighwa matamu. Iwapinga awo tsawakala Mariya iyakemighwe Magidalena, yalapfighwe ipfinyamkela saba,
na Yoana, mwehe wake Kusa, imkulu mne libaratsa lya Herodi, na Susana, na iwapinga wangi wengi. Wawo tsawalapfa pfinu pfawo wamwapfile Yesu ne iwanang'ina wake.
Iwanu wamghendela Yesu kulawa chila kaye, iwanu hawatingane hamwe, Yesu kawalongela imbuli ino,
“Imunu tsakaghenda kuhanda tsimbeghu. Hang'ali yomitsa tsimbeghu mne mghunda, tsingi tsilaghalila mnzila. Iwanu watsibayugha na pfideghe watsija.
Tsingi tsilaghalila mne lidongo lili mbambalawe, hatsotile, tsinyala kwaapfila tsakuduhu ghamatsi mne lidongo.
Tsingi tsilaghalila mwibagho, tsikula hamwe, na libagho litsikoma tsimbeghu hatso.
Na tsingi tsilaghalila mne lidongo linoghile, tsikula na kweleka imitama, chila imwe ghana limwe.” Yesu hayalongile apfi, kakemelela, “Imunu yane ghamaghutwi gha kuhulika, yahulike!”
Iwanang'ina wake wamghutsa Yesu imbuli ino ina mana yachi?
Yesu kawedika, “Mwemwe mtendighwa mmanye mbuli tse undewa we Imulungu. Lekeni kwe iwanu wangi, nolonga kwe tsimbuli, walole lekeni waleke kwona, wategheletse lekeni waleke kumanya.”
“Aino mana ye imbuli ino. Mbeghu yolangusa imbuli ye Imulungu.
Tsimbeghu itsilaghalile mnzila tsolangusa iwanu iwohulika imbuli ye Imulungu, lekeni Setani kakutsa na kuisola imbuli kulawa mne imimoyo yawo, ili waleke kutoghola na kukombolighwa.
Tsimbeghu itsilaghalile mne lidongo lili mbambalawe tsolangusa iwanu iwohulika imbuli ye Imulungu na kuibokela kwa kudeng'elela, lekeni ng'aitsama bae mghati mwe imimoyo yawo. Woitoghola kwe ichipindi chidodo, lekeni mne ichipindi cha kughetsighwa na Setani, webaghula.
Tsimbeghu itsilaghalile mwibagho tsolangusa iwanu iwohulika imbuli ye Imulungu lekeni pfawoghendelela, imbuli ye Imulungu yohinyighwa na maghayo, ndeng'elelo, na tsimali tse isi. Iwanu awo ng'awokweleka ghamatunda ghakomale bae.
Lekeni tsimbeghu itsilaghalile mne lidongo linoghile tsolangusa iwanu iwohulika imbuli ye Imulungu, woibokela na woitoghola kwe imimoyo yawo na wodudumila mbaka wokweleka ghamatunda.”
“Iwanu ng'awotuwitsa bae ichitasa na kuchighubika na chiha au kuchika kumpfungu mwe lutsatsi. Lekeni iwanu wochika hanu ha kwikila chitasa ili iwanu iwakwingila wadahe kughona ghumwanga.
Kwaapfila ichinu chochose ichipfisighwe chitsakuwa mwatsi, na ichinu chochose ichighubikighwe chitsomanyika na kughalighwa mne ghumwanga.
“Apfo mwalangitse pfamuhulikitsa, kwaapfila imunu yenacho katsakongetsighwa, ne imunu yalihela ichinu katsobokighwa hata achila chopfikitsa kenacho.”
Mai wake ne iwandughu tsake Yesu wamtsila, lekeni ng'awadahile bae kupfika habehi naye, kwaapfila iwanu tsawengi sideke.
Imunu yumwe kamlongela Yesu, “Mai wako na ndughu tsako wema kunze, wobama wakwone.”
Yesu kedika, “Mai wangu na ndughu tsangu, iwo wala iwohulika imbuli ye Imulungu na kuitoghola.”
Litsuwa limwe Yesu kengila mne mnumbwi ne iwanang'ina wake, kawalongela, “Tuloke kumwambu mwe tsimbu.” Apfo wandusa ghumwanza.
Hawang'ali mne ghumwanza, Yesu kawasa. Bahala, nyahemu ng'ulu ng'ani tsailawila mne tsimbu na mnumbwi wandusa kumema ghamatsi, apfo wose tsawabama watsame.
Iwanang'ina wake wamghendela wamlamsa, “Mtwatsa, Mtwatsa! Twotsama!” Yesu kalamka, kalikembela libeho ne inyahemu, napfo pfinyamala. Litsimbu linyamala tulu.
Kuya Yesu kawaghutsa iwanang'ina wake, “Kulikwani ukutoghola kwenu?” Lekeni wakangawala, wapfuka, welongela, “Ayu imunu wachi? Kokembela libeho ne inyahemu, napfo pfomhulikitsa?”
Yesu ne iwanang'ina wake waghendelela na ghumwanza, wapfika mne isi ya Gerasi, ili kumwambu mwe tsimbu Galilaya.
Yesu hayang'ali yohulumka mne mnumbwi, kaghenda mmbalimbali mwe tsimbu, ketingana ne imunu yane ipfinyamkela. Imunu ayo ng'apfalile bae ghamaghwanda kwa ghamatsuwa mengi, na ng'akalile bae mng'anda, lekeni ang'ali yokala kune tsikaburi.
Hamwonile Yesu, tsakalila na kamghwila mmaghulu, kuya kakemela, “Yesu, Imwana we Imulungu Iyali Kuchanya Ng'ani! Apfi kwobama unitende choni? Nokulomba uleke kunidununza!”
Imunu yuno kalonga apfino kwaapfila Yesu tsakawakembela ipfinyamkela wamlawe. Chinyamkela ayo ang'ali yomghoghagha. Hata ka iwanu tsawamwoha ghamoko na ghamaghulu ghake ne minyololo, yeye kaibema minyololo ayo, na ipfinyamkela wamghalagha mbaka kunyika.
Yesu kamghutsa, “Taghwa lyako nani?” Naye kamwidika, “Taghwa lyangu ‘Likingili’,” kwaapfila tsakana ipfinyamkela wengi.
Ipfinyamkela wamlomba Yesu aleke kuwaghala mne lipondo lyang'alitsigha.
Habehi na hanu hala tsahana kingili lye iwangubi iwang'ali wakuja mlughongo. Apfo pfinyamkela wamlomba Yesu awalekelele wawengile iwangubi awo, naye Yesu kawaleka wawengile.
Ipfinyamkela wamlawa imunu ayo wengila mne iwangubi. Likingili lyose lye iwangubi litsumila kulwanda mwe tsimbu Galilaya, wafa mne ghamatsi.
Wadimi we iwangubi hawonile achila ichilawile, watsuma na kutsilonga mbuli atso mne ghumji na mne ipfijiji.
Iwanu waghenda kulola achila ichilawile, hawapfikile kwa Yesu, wampfika imunu yahonetsighwe ipfinyamkela kakala mmaghulu mwa Yesu, kapfala ghamaghwanda, na tsimbutsi tsake tsimuyila keli. Iwanu wose tsawapfuka.
Iwanu wala iwonile chinu chino wawalongela iwanu apfila imunu yane ipfinyamkela pfayahonetsighwe.
Kuya iwanu wose we isi ya Gerasi wamlomba Yesu yoke kwaapfila tsawapfuka ghendo. Apfo Yesu kengila mne mnumbwi yoke.
Imunu yahonetsighwe ipfinyamkela kamlomba Yesu, “Leka nighende na ghweghwe.” Lekeni Yesu ng'atoghole bae kughenda naye, kamlongela,
“Uye ukaye ukawalongele iwanu achila chayakutendele Imulungu.” Apfo kaghenda muisi mwose, kawalongela iwanu achila Yesu chayamtendele.
Yesu hayoile ubali ungi wa tsimbu, iwanu wambokela kwa kudeng'elela kwaapfila wose tsawang'ali wombeta.
Kuya katsa imunu yumwe yakemighwe Yairo, iyakalile mkulu we Ing'anda ya ukulombela. Keghwisa mmaghulu mwa Yesu, kamlomba aghende ukaye yake,
kwaapfila imwanaghe ipinga nyalimwe yane miyaka kumi na mili yang'ali yobama yafe. Yesu hayang'ali yoghenda, iwanu wammemela chila hanu.
Pinga yumwe yadununzike kwa utamu wa kulawa idamu kwa miyaka kumi na mili, hata ka tsakaghisa mali tsake tsose kwa waghanga, tsakuduhu imunu yadahile kumhonetsa, tsakakala mne iwanu awo.
Pinga ayo tsakatsa kuchisogho kwa Yesu kakinda pindo lya ghwanda lyake. Bahala idamu ileka kumlawa.
Yesu kaghutsa, “Angu yuhi yanikindile?” Iwanu wose wabela. Petiri kalonga, “Imtwatsa, iwanu wakutsunguluka na wakumemela!”
Lekeni Yesu kalonga, “Kuna imunu kang'inda, nimanya kwaapfila ngupfu tsangu tsindawa.”
Ipinga hayonile ng'odaha bae kwipfisa, tsakatsa aku koghudema, keghwisa mmaghulu mwa Yesu. Kamlongela Yesu hambele he iwanu iwali hala ichinu ichimtendile amkinde na bahala pfayahonetsighwe.
Yesu kamlongela ipinga ayo, “Mwanangu, ukutoghola kwako kukuhonetsa. Ughende tseghamba.”
Yesu hang'ali yolonga, tsakatsa imunu kulawa mne ing'anda ya Yairo. Kamlongela Yairo, “Uleke kumtsupfa Imlangulitsi.”
Lekeni Yesu haulike apfo kamlongela Yairo, “Uleke kupfuka, ghwe toghola na imwanagho katsohonetsighwa.”
Hapfikile ukaye kwa Yairo, kawaghoma iwanu waleke kwingila naye mng'anda, lekeni Petiri, Yohane, Jakobu, aba wa imwana yula iyafile na mai wake.
Wanu wose wang'ali womlila imwana iyafile akuno weyayana. Yesu kawalongela, “Mleke kulila, imwana ng'afile bae, ila kawasa!”
Iwanu wose wamseka Yesu kwaapfila tsawamanya imwana kafa.
Yesu kaghukinda ghumoko ghwe imwana iyafile, kamlongela, “Mwanangu, lamka!”
Imwana iyafile ughima wake umuyila, na bahala kalamka. Kuya Yesu kawalongela wamwing'e imwana yula ichijo.
Aba wake na mai wake tsawakangawala, lekeni Yesu kawaghoma kumlongela imunu wowose achila ichilawile.
Yesu tsakawakema hamwe iwanang'ina wake kumi na weli, kaweng'a ingupfu na uwetso wa kulapfa ipfinyamkela na kuhonetsa watamu.
Kuya kawatuma kuwapetela iwanu mbuli tsa Undewa we Imulungu na kuwahonetsa iwatamu.
Kawalongela, “Mne ghumwanza mleke kusola ichinu chochose, mleke kusola ng'weku wala ghumkoba wala ichijo wala sendi wala maghwanda meli.
Ing'anda yoyose yamkwingila, mkale mmo mbaka hamkuka mne ghumji aghwo.
Iwanu wang'alema kuwabokela, hamlawa mne ghumji aghwo, mkung'use litimbwisi mmaghulu mwenu, chiwe ichitango ka walema kumuhulikitsani.”
Iwanang'ina wake waghenda mne ipfijiji pfose, aku wopeta Imbuli Inoghile na wowahonetsa iwanu chila hanu.
Herodi hakalile mndewa wa Galilaya, kahulika ipfinu pfose ipfitendighwe na Yesu. Naye kapfuka kwaapfila iwanu wangi tsawang'ali wolonga Yohane mbatitsa katsilihuka,
wangi walonga Eliya kalawila, na wangi walonga nabii yumwe wa ghumwande katsilihuka.
Herodi kalonga, “Yohane tsanimghana litwi, apfi ayu nani iyanihulika mbuli tsake?” Naye tsakabama amwone.
Iwatumighwa wake hawoyile wamlongela Yesu chila ichinu chawatendile. Naye kawasola iwanang'ina wake waliyeka, kaghenda nawo mne ghumji ighukemighwe Betisaida.
Iwanu hawamanyile kwaghendile, tsawamuwinza. Yesu kawabokela, kalonga nawo mbuli tse Undewa we Imulungu na kawahonetsa iwanu iwabamile kuhonetsighwa.
Litsua haling'ali lyikuswa, iwanang'ina kumi na weli wamghendela Yesu wamlongela, “Walongele iwanu waghende mne ipfijiji na kaye itsili mne imighunda tsa habehi kubama ichijo na hanu ha kuwasa, kwaapfila twakunyika.”
Lekeni Yesu kawedika, “Mwemwe iwenyegho muweng'e ichijo waje.” Wamwidika, “Twetwe tuna pfighate pfitano ne iwasomba weli waliheka. Pfii kwobama tughende tukawaghulile iwanu wose wano?”
Hanu hala hana wamale elufu tano. Yesu kawalongela iwanang'ina wake, “Muwalongele iwanu wakale mne makingili, na chila kingili wanu hamsini.”
Kuya iwanang'ina watenda apfo, iwanu wose wakala hasi.
Yesu kasola pfighate pfitano ne iwasomba weli, kalola kulanga, kapfibaliki. Kuya kamegha pfighate ne iwasomba, kaweng'a iwanang'ina wake waweng'e iwanu.
Iwanu wose tsawaja weghuta. Ne iwanang'ina wadondola pfihindi pfe pfighate ne iwasomba ipfimemile Pfiseghe kumi na pfili.
Litsuwa limwe Yesu ang'ali yolomba aliyeka. Iwanang'ina wake wamtsila, naye kawaghutsa, “Apfi iwanu wolonga nene nani?”
Nawo wamwidika, “Iwanu wamwenga wolonga ghweghwe kwa Yohane Mbatitsa, wangi wolonga kwa Eliya, wangi wolonga kwa-yumwe wa manabii wa ghumwande yoyile mne ughima.”
Naye kawaghutsa, “Namwe mwolonga nene nani?” Petiri kamwidika, “Ghweghwe kwa Kiristu yulawile kwe Imulungu.”
Kuya Yesu kawakanya waleke kumlongela imunu wowose ichinu chino.
Pfipfila tsakawalongela, “Imwana we Imunu kobamighwa yadununzike ng'ani na kulemighwa ne iwabala, ipfilongotsi we inambiko ne iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso. Katsokomighwa, kuya mne litsuwa lya kadatu katsotsilihuka.”
Kuya kawalongela wose, “Imunu wowose iyobama kuniwinza nene yeleme imwenyegho na yaghale msalaba ghwake, aniwinze.
Imunu wowose iyobama kuukombola ughima wake katsowaghitsa, lekeni wowose iyowaghisa ughima wake kwa kuniwinza nene katsoukombola.
Apfi imunu yobweda choni ka ang'apata chila chinu ichili muisi mwose, aku kowaghisa ughima wake?
Imunu wowose iyombonela chinyala nene na ghamalangulitso ghangu, Imwana we Imunu katsomwonela chinyala hatsakutsa mne utunitso wake, na mne utunitso wa aba wake, na we malaika wahenzeluka.
Nowalongela ghendo, wangi iwemile hano ng'awatsakufa bae mbaka wawone Undewa we Imulungu.”
Aghabitile matsuwa manane kulawa halongile ipfinu pfino, Yesu kawasola Petiri, Yohane, na Jakobu, wagheluka kuchidunda kulomba.
Yesu hang'ali yolomba, uhanga wake ughalamka na ghwanda lyake liwa tselu chwee.
Bahala iwanu weli wang'ali wolonga naye. Iwanu awo tsawakala Musa na Eliya,
woneka mne utunitso wa kulanga na walonga na Yesu mbuli tsa lifwa lyake ilitsolawila Yerusalemu.
Petiri na wayaghe tsawawasa ghendo, na hawalamke wona utunitso wa Yesu ne iwanu weli wema naye.
Iwanu awo hawang'ali wakuka, Petiri kamlongela Yesu, “Mtwatsa, pfinogha twetwe tukale hano. Leka tutsenge pfibumbulika pfidatu, chimwe chako, chimwe cha Musa na chimwe cha Eliya.” Petiri ng'amanyile bae yang'ali yolonga choni.
Petiri hang'ali yolonga apfo, liwingu lilawila liwaghubika, ne iwanang'ina wapfuka liwingu pfaliwaghubike.
Litsi lilonga kulawa mne liwingu, “Ayuno mwanangu yanimsaghule, mtegheletseni yeye!”
Litsi halinyamale, Yesu tsakakala aliyeka. Iwanang'ina wenyamala na ng'awamlongele imunu wowose bae ichinu chawonile ghamatsuwa agho.
Haipfikile nemitondo, Yesu na iwanang'ina wadatu wahulumka kuchidunda, na iwanu wengi wetingana naye.
Imunu yumwe iyakalile mna mtingano ghula ghwe iwanu kakemelela, “Mlangulitsi! Nokulomba umlole imwanangu, imwanangu nyalimwe!
Ichinyamkela komghogha na komtenda adamilile, komtenda yaghwe chisala na lihofu lomlawa mne mlomo, na ng'omlekelela bae himahima!
Niwalomba iwanang'ina wako wamlapfe ichinyamkela, lekeni ng'awadahile bae.”
Yesu kamwidika, “Ka! Pfii mwemwe mweleko ing'aghutoghola na iwaghile! Apfi ng'ale namwe na kuwadudumila mbaka tsuwachi?” Kuya kamlongela imunu ayo, “Nighalile hano imwanagho.”
Imsongolo hang'ali yomghendela Yesu, ichinyamkela kamghwisa hasi chisala. Yesu kamkembela ichinyamkela, kamhonetsa imsongolo ayo na kamuhitsa imsongolo ayo kwa aba wake.
Iwanu wose wakangawala kwa uwetso mkulu we Imulungu. Iwanu hawang'ali wokangawala kwa ghose ghayatendile Yesu, kawalongela iwanang'ina wake,
“Mleke kwisemwa achino chaniwalongela! Imwana we Imunu katsoghalighwa mna ghamoko ghe iwanu.”
Lekeni iwanang'ina wake ng'awamanyile bae mana ye imbuli ino, kwaapfila ipfisighwa waleke kuimanya; nawo wapfuka kumghutsa Yesu imbuli ino.
Iwanang'ina wa Yesu wandusa kwihisanya yuhi yatsakuwa imkulu mna wawo.
Yesu hamanyile ukwalangula kwawo, kamsola imwana mdodo kamwika habehi naye.
Kuya kawalongela iwanang'ina wake, “Imunu wowose iyombokela imwana yuno kwa taghwa lyangu kombokela nene. Ne imunu wowose iyombokela nene, pfipfila kombokela iyanitumile. Kwaapfila imunu wowose yali mdodo mna mwemwe katsakughwa mkulu mna mwemwe.”
Yohane kamlongela Yesu, “Mtwatsa, tumwona imunu kolapfa ipfinyamkela kwa taghwa lyako na tumghoma kutenda apfo, kwaapfila ng'elongotsagha na twetwe bae”
Yesu kamlongela Yohane ne iwanang'ina wangi, “Mleke kumghoma, kwaapfila imunu wowose iyowatoghola mwemwe kahamwe namwe.”
Ghamatsuwa gha Yesu gha kuya kulanga aghapfikile habehi, Yesu kabama aghende Yerusalemu.
Kawalongotsa iwatumighwa iwaghendile mne tsikaye tsa Samariya kumwikila ghoya chila ichinu.
Lekeni iwanu wa Samariya ng'awambokele bae, kwaapfila tsawamanya koghenda Yerusalemu.
Iwanang'ina wake, Jakobu na Yohane hawonile apfo, wamghutsa Yesu, “Mtwatsa, apfi kwobama twetwe tukeme ghumoto ghuhulumke kulawa kulanga ghuwalakatse wose, ka Eliya pfayatendile?”
Yesu kawahundukila kawakembela.
Kuya Yesu ne iwanang'ina wake waghenda kuna kaye tsingi.
Hawang'ali mnzila, imunu yumwe kamlongela Yesu, “Nitsokuwinza hanu hohose utsoghenda.”
Yesu kamlongela, “Wambwa wa kumuhulo wana tsimango ne iwapfideghe wana pfibali, lekeni Imwana we Imunu kahela hanu ha kuwasitsa litwi lyake na kubwihila.”
Yesu kamlongela imunu yungi, “Niwinze!” Lekeni imunu yula kalonga, “Imtwatsa, leka tanu mbuye ukaye nikamtsike aba wangu.”
Yesu kamwidika, “Leka iwanu iwafile wawatsike wayawo, ila ghweghwe ghenda upete Undewa we Imulungu.”
Imunu yungi kalonga, “Imtwatsa, nitsokuwinza lekeni leka tanu nikawalongele iwandughu tsangu nakuka.”
Yesu kamlongela, “Imunu wowose iyokwaluka kulima na kuya kolola kuchisogho ng'obamighwa mne Undewa we Imulungu.”
Kuya Imtwatsa kawasaghula iwanu wangi sabini na weli na kawatuma weliweli wamlongolele chila kaye na chila hanu abamile kughenda.
Kawalongela, “Ghamapfuno mengi, lekeni iwosang'ana wadodo. Mumlombe Imtwatsa wa ghamahuno awatume watenda isang'ano mne mghunda ghwake.
Mghende! Nowatuma mwemwe ka iwang'olo mghati mwe wambwa wa kumuhulo.
Mleke kusola ghumfuko au ghumkoba au imikwabatsa. Na mleke kulamsa imunu wowose mnzila.
Na ing'anda yoyose yamtsakwingila, tanu mlonge, ‘Mkale tseghamba mne ing'anda ino.’
Ka imunu yobama kukala tseghamba kabaho, katsakuwa tseghamba. Ka kuduhu imunu yobama kukala tseghamba, mwemwe mtsokala tseghamba.
Mkale mne ing'anda hayo, mje na mnwe chochose chamkwing'ighwa; kwaapfila mtenda isang'ano kobamighwa yeng'ighwe sendi tsake. Mkale mne ing'anda iyampfikile na mleke kulawa mne ing'anda ayo na kughenda ing'anda ingi.
Ka mwakwingila mne ghumji ne iwanu wowabokela, diyeni achila chamtsakwing'ighwa.
Muwahonetse iwatamu iwali hao muwalongele, ‘Undewa we Imulungu wa habehi yenu.’
Lekeni ka mwakwingila mne ghumji ne iwanu wolema kuwabokela, biteni mna nzila tsawo mlonge,
‘Hata litimbwisi lya ghumji ghwenu ilinanahile mmaghulu mwetu twowakung'usilani mwemwe, chiwe chitango ka mlighitighwa, Lekeni mmanye pfino, Undewa wa Imulungu wa habehi ghendo’
Nowalongela ghendo, mne litsuwa lya kuhigha Imulungu katsoghuhigha ng'ani ghumji agho kubita ghumji ghwa Sodoma!”
“Ghweghwe Kolasini kutsoghaya! Ghweghwe Betisaida kutsoghaya! Kwaapfila ka ipfinu pfa kukangawatsa ipfitendeke hano pfing'atendeke Tiro na Sidoni, iwanu iwali hala wang'apfalile maghwanda gha ghamaghuniya na wang'abakale lipfu kulangusa waleka nzambi tsawo.
Mne litsuwa lya kuhigha Imulungu katsoyonela libatsi imiji ya Tiro na Sidoni kubita mwemwe.
Naghwe Kaperinaumu! Apfi kutsakwinulighwa mbaka kulanga? Bae! Kutsakwasighwa mbaka kutsimu!”
Yesu kawalongela iwanang'ina wake, “Imunu iyowategheletsa mwemwe, konitegheletsa nene; ne imunu iyowalema mwemwe, kondema nene. Ne imunu iyondema nene, komlema yula iyanitumile!”
Hambele iwanu wala sabini na weli woya wodeng'elela ng'ani, walonga, “Mtwatsa, kwa taghwa lyako tuwakembela ipfinyamkela nawo watenda ka pfatubamile kutenda!”
Yesu kawedika, “Nimwona Setani kaghwa ka lumwesa kulawa kulanga.
Mtegheletse! Niweng'ani ukulu mwemwe, apfo mwodaha kuwabajugha wanzoka ne iwainge; mtsakuwa na ukulu kwa iwehile wenu wose. Kuduhu ichinu chitsowalagha.
Lekeni mleke kudeng'elela kwaapfila ipfinyamkela wowapfukani, ila mdeng'elele kwaapfila mataghwa ghenu ghandikighwa kulanga.”
Isaa iila Yesu kadeng'elela ng'ani na Ghumuhe ghwe Imulungu. Kuya kalonga, “Aba, Imtwatsa wa kulanga ne iisi, nolonga mighede kwaapfila kupfipfisa ipfinu pfino kwe iwanu wane ihekima na iwomanya; na kupfilangusa kwe iwana wadodo! Ona, Aba, apfi pfipfo pfaubamile.”
Kaghendelela kuwalongela iwanu, “Aba wangu kangaya nene ipfinu pfose. Kuduhu imunu iyommanya Imwana ila Aba, na kuduhu imunu iyommanya Aba ila Imwana, ne iwanu wala iwasaghulighwe kulangusighwa ne Imwana.”
Kuya Yesu kawahundukila iwanang'ina wake kalonga nawo waliyeka, “Wabalikiighwa iwanu wala iwakona ipfinu pfamkwona mwemwe!
Kwaapfila nowalongela, manabii ne iwandewa wengi tsawabama wone achino chamkona mwemwe, lekeni ng'awadahile bae kwona; na kutegheletsa achino chamtegheletsa, lekeni ng'awadahile bae kutegheletsa.”
Mlangulitsi wa Ghamalaghitso kema amghetse Yesu, kamghutsa, “Mlangulitsi, apfi nobamighwa nitende choni ili niubokele ughima wa matsuwa ghose?”
Yesu kamwidika, “Apfi Ghamalaghitso gholongatse? Apfi kwoghamanyatse?”
Imunu ayo kamwidika, “Mnoghele Imtwatsa Imulungu wako kwa ghumoyo ghwako ghwose, kwa muhe wako ghwose, kwa ngupfu tsako tsose na kwa tsimbutsi tsako tsose; na mnoghele miyagho ka pfawinoghela imwenyegho.”
Yesu kamwidika, “Kwidika ghoya. Tenda apfo naghwe kutsakuwa na ughima.”
Lekeni imunu ayo kabama kwilangusa kanogha, apfo kamghutsa Yesu, “Yuhi imunu wa habehi yangu?”
Yesu kamwidika, “Tsahana imunu yumwe yalawile Yerusalemu koghenda Yeriko. Wabapfi wamghogha, wamwibila ipfinu pfake, wamtowa chidogho yafe.
Baho kalawila mtambika kohulumka mna inzila iila, lekeni hamwonile imunu yula yatowighwe, kabita mmbalimbali.
Pfipfila Mlawi hapfikile na kumwona imunu yatowighwe, naye kabita mmbalimbali.
Lekeni Msamariya yumwe ang'ali yobita inzila iila kampfika imunu yula. Hamwonile, kamwonela libatsi.
Kamghendela, kambakatsa ghamafuta ne idipfai mne ipfilonda pfake kuya kapfoha kwa pfibwende. Kuya kamwika mne ipunda wake, kamghala mne ing'anda ya kuwasa iwahenza, kamng'otsola.
Litsuwa liwinzile Msamariya yula kamwing'a sendi imunu yane ing'anda, kamlongela, ‘Mlolese imunu yuno. Hanikuya, nitsokuyitsila chochose chutumile.’ ”
Yesu kamghutsa, “Mkwonatse, apfi mne iwanu awo wadatu, yuhi imunu wa habehi ne imunu iyatowighwe na wabapfi?”
Imlangulitsi wa Ghamalaghitso kamwidika, “Imunu yula yamwonele libatsi.” Yesu kamwidika, “Naghwe ghenda ukatende ka pfatendile Msamariya.”
Yesu ne iwanang'ina wake hawang'ali woghenda, kengila mne ichijiji chimwe. Ipinga yumwe yakemighwe Marita kambokela ukaye yake.
Ipinga ayo tsakana ndughu yake iyakemighwe Mariya, iyakalile hasi habehi na ghamaghulu ghe Imtwatsa. Naye ang'ali yotegheletsa malangulitso ghake.
Marita ang'ali yoghaya na tsing'onde nyingi. Apfo, kamghendela Yesu, kamghutsa, “Imtwatsa, apfi ng'ukwona bae ndughu yangu kandekela ng'onde tsose nisang'ane nene niliyeka? Mlongele yatse yanyapfile!”
Imtwatsa kamwidika, “Marita! Kwokwalangula no ukughaya kwa ipfinu pfingi,
lekeni ichinu chimwe chiliheka ichibamighwa, na Mariya kasaghula ichinu ichinoghile, na ng'atsobokighwa bae.”
Litsuwa limwe Yesu tsakakala hanu hamwe kolomba. Hayamalitse kulomba, imwanang'ina wake yumwe kamlongela, “Imtwatsa, utulangulitse kulomba ka Yohane pfayawalangulitse iwanang'ina wake.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Hamlomba, mlonge apfi, ‘Aba wetu, taghwa lyako lienzeluka litogholighwe, Undewa wako utse.
Utwing'e ichijo chetu cha chila litsuwa.
Utuleghusile nzambi tsetu, ka pfatumleghusila chila yumwe yatutendele ghehile. Na uleke kutwingitsa mne kughetsighwa.’ ”
Kuya Yesu kawalongela iwanang'ina wake, “Tulonge yumwe wenu kaghenda mne ing'anda ya sale yake nechilo ne ukulonga, ‘Sale yangu, nokulomba ungaye ichijo,
kwaapfila sale yangu yali mne ghumwanza katsa ukaye yangu, na nene nahela ichijo cha kumwing'a!’
Na tulonge sale yako yali mng'anda kokwidika, ‘Leka nibwihile! Libani lihindighwa, nene ne iwanangu tuwasa. Sidaha bae kulamka na kukwing'a ichinu chochose!’
Nowalongela hata ka ng'atsolamka bae na kukwing'a ichijo kwaapfila ghweghwe kwa sale yake, hambele katsolamka na kukwing'a chila ichinu ichaubamile kwaapfila ng'awonile bae chinyala kughendelela kumlomba.”
“Apfo nowalongela, mlombe namwe mtsakwing'ighwa, mbame namwe mtsopata, mghong'onde libani namwe mtsofughulighwa.
Kwaapfila imunu wowose iyolomba katsobokela, ne imunu wowose iyobama katsopata, ne imunu wowose iyoghonga libani katsofughulighwa.
Aba wachi mna mwemwe iyomwing'a imwanaghe inzoka, ka imwanaghe kamlomba isomba?
Au ang'amlomba lifinga, katsomwing'a inge?
Ka mwemwe imwihile, mwomanya kuweng'a ipfinu pfinonoghile iwanenu, apfi Aba wenu yali kulanga ng'atsoweng'a bae Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka iwanu wala iwomlomba?”
Yesu ang'ali yomlapfa ichinyamkela chibubu, na ichinyamkela hayalawile, imunu yula kandusa ukulonga, iwanu wakangawala.
Lekeni iwanu wangi walonga, “Ambe Belisebuli, imkulu we ipfinyamkela iyo iyomwing'a yeye ngupfu tsa kuwalapfa ipfinyamkela!”
Iwanu wangi wabama kumghetsa Yesu, apfo wamlomba Yesu atende chitango kulangusa ka kana ingupfu kulawa kulanga.
Lekeni Yesu kamanya chawang'ali wakwalangula, apfo kawalongela, “Undewa wowose iwighola wenyegho kwa wenyegho ng'autsakwima bae. Na ing'anda ing'awa na maghomba itsakughwa.
Ka Setani keghola imwenyegho, apfi undewa wake utsakwimatse? Nolonga pfino kwaapfila mwemwe mwolonga nolapfa ipfinyamkela kwa tsingupfu tsa Belisebuli.
Ka nene nowalapfa ipfinyamkela kwa ngupfu tsa Belisebuli, apfi iwanu wenu wowalapfa ipfinyamkela kwa ngupfu tsa nani? Iwanu wenu wenyegho watsowahigha mwemwe mtotsa.
Lekeni ka nolapfa ipfinyamkela kwa ngupfu tse Imulungu, lelo undewa we Imulungu uwatsila.
“Imunu yane ngupfu hayoikalitsa ing'anda yake kwa mghowa, ipfinu pfake ng'apfisolighwa bae.
Lekeni imunu yungi yane ngupfu kumbita yeye hatsomghendela na kumuhuma, katsomboka mghowa ghwehuwile na kupfighola ipfinu pfambokile.
“Imunu wowose ka ng'ali hamwe na nene bae, ayo konibela. Ne imunu wowose yang'onyapfila nene ukukunga, ayo kopwililisa.”
“Ichinyamkela hayomlawa imunu, koghenda mne isi isakale kubama hanu ho kubwihila. Ka ng'apatile bae hanu ho kubwihila, kelongela imwenyegho, ‘Nitsakuya keli mne ing'anda yangu yaniilekile.’
Apfo kakuya keli na kuipfika ing'anda yake itsengighwa pfinoghile.
Kuya koghenda kuwasola ipfinyamkela wangi saba wane ngupfu kubita yeye. Nawo wakutsa kukala mghati mwe imunu ayo. Na ughima we imunu ayo wakuwa wiha kubita aho mwanduso.”
Yesu hang'ali yolonga ipfinu pfino, ipinga yumwe kulawa mne kingili kamlongela Yesu, “Kabweda ipinga iyakweleke na iyakwong'etse.”
Lekeni Yesu kamwidika, “Wabweda ghendo iwanu wala iwoitegheletsa Imbuli ye Imulungu na kuikinda.”
Iwanu hawang'ali wakwongetseka, Yesu kaghendelela kulonga, “Aghuno mweleko ghwihile, ghwobama ichitango. Ng'amtsakwing'ighwa bae ichitango chochose, ila ichitango chila cha Yona.
Kwaapfila ka Yona pfayawile ichitango kwe iwanu wa Ninawi, pfipfila Imwana we Imunu katsakuwa ichitango kwe iwanu wa mweleko ghuno.
Mne litsuwa lya kuhigha, Malikiya wa Seba katsakwima na kuwahigha iwanu wa mweleko uno, kwaapfila yeye tsakalawa mne isi yake kaghenda kutegheletsa ghamahala gha ihekima ghe Mndewa Selemani, na hano hana mkulu kubita Imndewa Selemani.
Mne litsuwa lya kuhigha, iwanu wa Ninawi watsakwima na kuwahigha iwanu wa mweleko ghuno, kwaapfila wawo tsawatsileka nzambi tsawo hawamhulike Yona. Nowalongela ghendo, imunu mkulu kubita Yona kabaha!”
“Kuduhu imunu iyotuwa ichitasa na kuchipfisa au kuchighubika kwa chiha. Lekeni kochika hanu ha kwikila chitasa, ili iwanu iwakwingila mghati wadahe kwona ghumwanga.
Tsinenge tsako tsaichitasa cha lukuli lwako. Ka tsinenge tsako tsakona, lukuli lwako lwose lwenela ghumwanga. Lekeni ka ng'atsikona bae, pfipfila lukuli lwako lwose lwenela chisi.
Walangitse ghumwanga ighuli mlukuli mwako, ghuleke kuwa ichisi.
Apfo, ka lukuli lwako lwose lwenela ghumwanga, na kuduhu ichisi, lukuli lwose lutsong'ala ghendo ka ichitasa pfachikumwemwesela kwa ghumwanga ghwake.”
Yesu hayamalitse kulonga, Mfarisayo yumwe kamlomba Yesu aghende naye ukuja. Apfo Yesu kengila mng'anda, kakala hasi kaja.
Mfarisayo ayo kakangawala hayamwonile Yesu kakuja bila kuhopfugha ghamoko ghake.
Kuya Imtwatsa kamlongela, “Mwemwe Mafarisayo mwohopfugha ichikombe ne isahani kwa kunze, lekeni mghati mwenu mmema ukuboka na ukwiha.
Mwawabotsi! Apfi ayula iyalumbile kunze, si yuyula bae iyalumbile mghati?
Lekeni muweng'e wahingwa ipfinu ipfili mghati mwe ipfikombe na tsisahani tsenu, na chila chinu chitsonogha kuna mwemwe.
“Mtsoghaya mwemwe Mafarisayo! Kwaapfila mwomlapfila Imulungu tsaka tse bwasi ne itsimbogha tsose ka mnapfu ne imitsani ingi, lekeni mwoleka kutenda ghanoghile kwe iwanu na mwoleka kumnoghela Imulungu. Mwobamighwa tanu muwe iwanu we haki na iwomnoghela Imulungu, bila kughaleka agho ghangi.
“Mtsoghaya mwemwe Mafarisayo! Kwaapfila mwonoghela kukala mne ipfighoda pfili hambele mne tsing'anda tsa ukulombela, na kulamsighwa kusoko.
Mtsoghoya, kwaapfila mweghala ne tsikabuli ing'atsikonekagha bae, na iwanu wobita mchanya akuno ng'awomanya bae”
Mlangulitsi yumwe wa Ghamalaghitso kalonga, “Mlangulitsi, pfulonga pfino pfipfila kwotuligha na twetwe!”
Yesu kamwidika, “Pfipfila mwemwe yamlangulitsa Ghamalaghitso mtsoghaya! Kwaapfila mwowatwika iwanu imitsigho mitito ng'ani, nayo ng'aidutika bae. Na mwemwe wenyegho ng'amuikinda bae hata kwa kugholosa chidole chimwe cha pfidole pfenu.
Mtsoghaya kwaapfila mwowatsengela tsikabuli manabii wala iwakomighwe ne iwabala wenu.
Mwemwe wenyegho mwotoghola aghala ghawatendile iwabala wenu, tsawawakoma manabii, namwe mwowatsengela tsikabuli tsawo.
Apfo, Hekima ye Imulungu tsailonga, ‘Nitsowatuma manabii ne iwatumighwa, wangi watsokomighwa na wangi watsowingighwa.’
Apfo mweleko ghuno ghutsohighighwa kwa kuwakoma manabii wose kulawa isi hailumbighwe,
kulawa kukomighwa kwa Abeli mbaka kukomighwa kwa Sakariya, iyakomighwe mghati mwe hanu he ukulapfila inambiko na hanu henzeluke. Ona, nowalongela lukolo luno lutsohighighwa kwa kuwakoma awo wose!”
“Mtsoghoya mwemwe yamlangulitsa Ghamalaghitso! Kwaapfila mpfisa ufughulo wa libani lye ing'anda ya kumanyila. Namwe iwenyegho ng'amwingile bae, na mwowakima iwanu wala iwang'ali wakwingila!”
Yesu hayokile hanu hala, Mafarisayo na iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso wandusa kumghobola kwa kumghutsa ipfinu pfingi,
wabama wamghoghe kwa ichinu chochose chatsolonga.
Iwanu wengi tsawetingana mbaka wang'ali webajugha, tanu Yesu kandusa kulonga ne iwanang'ina wake, “Mwalangitse ne hamila ya Mafarisayo ya ung'enye.
Chochose ichighubikighwe chitsoghubulighwa, na chochose ichifisighwe chitsomanyika.
Chochose chamlongile mchisi chitsohulikighwa mne ghumwanga, na chochose chamwinong'onetse mng'anda, chitsolongighwa mwatsimwatsi mchiswili.”
“Nowalongela sale tsangu, mleke kuwapfuka iwanu wala iwolukoma lukuli, lekeni ng'awodaha bae kutenda ichinu chochose chihile.
Nitsowalangusa yuhi wa kumpfuka. Mumpfuke Imulungu, hayomalitsa kukoma kodaha kumwasa imunu jehanamu. Nowalongela, mumpfuke yeye!”
“Apfi pfideghe watano ng'awoghulighwa bae kwa sendi mbili? Lekeni kuduhu yumwe wao yosemwighwa ne Imulungu.
Hata tsimvili tsili mne mwitwi mwenu tsipetighwa. Mleke kupfuka kwaapfila mwemwe mnogha ng'ani kubita iwapfideghe wengi!”
“Nowalongela ghendo, imunu wowose iyonitoghola nene hambele he wanu, Imwana we Imunu naye katsomtoghola hambele he malaika we Imulungu.
Lekeni imunu iyondema nene hambele he iwanu, naye Imwana we Imunu katsomlema hambele he malaika we Imulungu.”
“Imunu wowose iyomlonga pfihile Imwana we Imunu katsolekelelighwa, lekeni imunu wowose iyomligha Ghumuhe ghwe Imulungu ng'atsolekelelighwa bae.
Hamtsoghalighwa mne tsing'anda tsa ukulombela, kwe iwatawala ne kwe iwakulu, mleke kupfuka chokulonga na chakwidika.
Kwaapfila Ghumuhe ghwe Imulungu katsowalangulitsa chambamighwa kulonga.”
Imunu yumwe kulawa mne iwanu iwemile hala kamlongela Yesu, “Mlangulitsi, mlongele ndughu yangu twigholele ipfinu pfatuleke aba wetu.”
Yesu kamwidika, “Sale yangu, angu yuhi yanyikile nene niwe mlamutsi au niwe mghola pfinu pfenu?”
Yesu kaghendelela kuwalongela wose, “Mwalangitse ne ubwa! Kwaapfila ughima we imunu ng'aulawa bae mna pfinu pfingi pfali napfo!”
Kuya Yesu kawalongela imbuli ino; “Tsahana imunu yumwe tajiri tsa yane na mghunda ghunoghile ghumwelekele pfijo pfingi.
Apfo kefikitsa mmoyo mwake, ‘Nahela hanu ha kwikila pfijo pfangu. Lelo nitendatse?’
Kalonga, ‘Nitsotenda apfino; nitsotsimwagha kano tsangu na kutsenga tsingi ng'ulu ng'ani. Amo nitsakwika imitama yangu ne ipfinu pfangu pfingi.
Kuya nitselongela mwenyegho; 'Ghwe ghumoyo ghwangu! Kwinapfo ipfinu pfingi kwa miyaka mingi. Bwihila ghwe; uje, unwe na udeng'elele!’
Lekeni Imulungu kamlongela imunu tajiri, ‘Kwambotsi ghweghwe! Chilo chichino ughima wako utsobamighwa! Pfinu pfawikile pfitsakuwa pfa nani?’ ”
Yesu kalonga, “Apfi pfipfo pfapfitsakuwa kwe imunu wowose yeikile utajiri imwenyegho, lekeni ng'akwika bae utajiri kwe Imulungu.”
Kuya Yesu kawalongela iwanang'ina wake, “Mleke kughaya na ukwalangula kwe ichijo chambama ili mkale waghima, au ghamaghwanda ghambama kwa ng'uli tsenu.
Kwaapfila ughima unogha kubita ichijo na lukuli lunogha kubita maghwanda.
Mlole iwabondwa; ng'awahanda bae wala, ng'awopfuna bae, wala wahela kano, lekeni Imulungu kowang'itsa! Mwemwe mnogha ng'ani kubita wapfideghe!
Apfi yuhi mna mwemwe kwa kwidununza kodaha kwongetsa litsuwa limwe mne ughima wake?
Ka ng'amdaha bae kutenda chinu chidodo ka chino, ebali mwopfidununzikila pfinu pfingi?
Mlole ghamaluwa pfaghokula; ng'aghosang'ana bae wala ng'aghefoghosa bae. Lekeni nowalongela hata mndewa Selemani na tsimali tsake tsose ng'apfalile bae pfinoghile ka luwa limwe mne ghamaluwa ghano.
Ka Imulungu koipfatsa imitsani ya kumghunda leloli lya baha, na ilupfi lyakwasighwa mmoto, apfi ng'atsowatendela mengi bae? Pfii mwemwe yamtoghola chidogho!
“Mleke ukwalangula mtsakuja choni au mtsakunwa choni.
Kwaapfila iwanu yang'awammanyile Imulungu wopfihamela ipfinu apfo. Na Aba wenu iyali kulanga komanya ipfinu pfambama.
Lekeni muubame undewa wake ne ipfinu pfino mtsakwing'ighwa.
“Mwemwe wanang'ina wangu, mleke kupfuka, kwaapfila Aba wenu kanoghelwa kuweng'ani undewa.
Muutse ipfinu pfenu muweng'e tsisendi iwahingwa. Mwitendele imikoba yang'ailalagha bae, na mwike utajiri wenu kulanga, hanu hang'autsohunguka bae. Aho haduhu mbapfi iyodaha kwiba na haduhu mswa iyodaha kuuhinya.
Kwaapfila hane utajiri wako, ghumoyo ghwako ghutsakuwa baho.”
“Mwohe misipi mne pfuno pfenu, ne ipfitasa pfenu pfiwe pfakwaka.
Muwe ka watumwa iwombeta imkulu wawo iyakuya kulawa kune ichihungo cha kukwela. Hakuya na kugong'onda libani, baho wompfughulila.
Wabweda iwatumwa wala imkulu wawo hakuya kowapfika wameso. Nowalongela ghendo, imkulu ayo katseyoha msipi mchuno, katsokala nawo mchijo na kuwasang'anila.
Itsakuwa ghoya kwe iwatumwa wala imtwatsa wawo ka katsowapfika weyandaa, hata ang'oya nechilo ng'ani.
Lekeni mmanye apfino; Ka imunu yane ing'anda ang'amanyile lisaa atsakutsa mbapfi, ang'akalile meso. Wala tsang'oileka bae ing'anda yake ibenighwe ne mbapfi.
Pfipfila namwe mwobamighwa mwiyandae, kwaapfila Imwana we Imunu katsakutsa lisaa mwemwe ng'amumbetela.”
Petiri kamghutsa, “Imtwatsa, apfi kwotulongela twetwe tuliyeka imbuli ino au kowalongela iwanu wose?”
Imtwatsa kamwidika, “Apfi yuhi imtumwa mwenyepfale na yane ihekima? Imtumwa yula imtwatsa wake yamwikile kuwatawala iwatumwa wangi, na kuweng'a ichijo chawo mne ichipindi chinoghile.
Itsakuwa ghoya kwe imtumwa yula imtwatsa wake hayatsokuya katsompfika kotenda apfo.
Nowalongela ghendo, imkulu ayo katsomwika imtumwa yula kupfitawala ipfinu pfake pfose.
Lekeni imtumwa yula ang'elongela imwenyegho, ‘Imtwatsa wangu ng'atsakuya sambi bae’ kuya kakwandusa kuwatowa iwatumwa wose iwamale ne iwapinga, naye kakuja na ukunwa mbaka kopatika.
Imtwatsa we imtumwa yula katsakutsa mne litsuwa lila imtumwa ayo ng'olimanya bae na mne saa lila ng'alilolele bae, na mkulu ayo katsomghana imtumwa wake mne pfihindi pfili na kumwika hane iwanu iwalemile kutoghola.
“Na imtumwa yula iyomanya aghala ghayobama imtwatsa wake aghatende, lekeni ng'okala ghoya bae wala ng'oghatenda bae, imtumwa ayo katsotohighwa ng'ani.
Lekeni imtumwa yula ng'amanyile bae ipfinu pfayabamighwe ne imkulu wake apfitende, naye katenda pfihile, imtumwa ayo katsotowighwa chidogho. Imunu wowose iyeng'ighwe pfingi, kuna yeye pfitsobamighwa pfingi. Na kwe imunu wowose iyeng'ighwe pfingi ng'ani pfitsobamighwa pfingi ng'ani kuna yeye.
“Nitsa ukwasa ghumoto muisi, na tsanibama ma ghuwe ghutuwitsighwa!
Ninawo ubatitso wa maghayo nobamighwa niubokele, na nene noghaya ng'ani mbaka umale!
Apfi mwopfikitsa nitsa kuitenda iisi ikale tseghamba? Bae! Sitsile kuwatenda iwanu wakale tseghamba, ila kuwaghola iwanu.
Kulawa sambi iwanu watano wali mne kaye imwe watsesonga, wadatu kwa weli na weli kwa wadatu.
Tsina tate watsesonga ne iwana wawo, ne iwana watsesonga na aba tsawo. Tsina mai watsesonga ne iwana wawo ne iwana watsesonga na mai tsawo. Mai wakwe watsesonga na wakamwana wawo, na wakamwana watsesonga na wakwe tsawo.”
Yesu kawalongela iwanu, “Hamkwona liwingu lyakutsa ubali ukuswela litsuwa, baho mwolonga, imvula itsotowa, na kuya imvula yotowa.
Na hamkwona libeho kulawa ubali wa kuhisi, mwolonga, ‘Kutsakuwa na lijoto,’ na yakuwa pfipfo.
Mwawang'enye! Mwodaha kulola muisi na mlanga na kulonga imvula itsotowa au litsuwa litsakwalika. Pfii ng'amdaha bae kughamanya matsuwa ghano gha sambi?
“Ebali mwemwe iwenyegho ng'amdaha bae kwilamlila chinu chihi ichinoghile?
Ka imunu yane lighomba naghwe kokughala mne ing'anda ya kuhighila. Mnzila utende pfaudaha wighongole naye ng'ana wingile mne libalatsa. Ka si pfipfo bae, mlamutsi katsokughala kwa asikali, na asikali watsokwika mchifungo.
Nokulongela, ng'autsolawa bae mbaka ulapfe sendi yako ya mwisho!”
Ichipindi chichila tsahana iwanu iwampetele Yesu mbuli tsa Wagalilaya iwakomighwe na Pilato hawang'ali womlapfila Imulungu inambiko.
Yesu kawedika, “Apfi mwemwe mwopfikitsa Wagalilaya wala tsawana nzambi kubita Wagalilaya wangi kwaapfila tsawadununzika pfino?
Bae! Nowalongela ka ng'amtsileka nzambi tsenu, pfipfila namwe mwose mtsakufa ka pfawapfile wao.
Kuya pfii iwanu wala kumi na wanane iwafile kwa chilingilo ichiwaghwile ako Siloamu? Apfi mwopfikitsa iwanu wala wakala na nzambi kubita iwanu wangi iwokala Yerusalemu?
Bae! Nowalongela ka ng'amtsileka nzambi tsenu, pfipfila namwe wose mtsakufa.”
Kuya Yesu kawalongela imbuli ino, “Tsakukala ne imunu yumwe yane mbiki wa matunda mne mghunda wake wa mitsabibu. Kaghenda kubama litunda mne mbiki awo, lekeni ng'apatile bae.
Apfo kamlongela mkalitsi wa mghunda aghwo, ‘Lola, kwa miyaka midatu tsaning'ali nikutsa hano kubama matunda mne mbiki ghuno, sipatile chinu bae. Ghughane! Ebali ghughendelele kulihinya lidongo?’
Lekeni mkalitsi wa mghunda kamwidika, ‘Imtwatsa, ghuleke kwa ghumwaka ghuno ghumwe, na nene nitsoghuhimbila na kughwikila imboleya.
Kuya ghung'eleka ghamatunda itsakuwa ghoya! Lekeni ka ng'aghutsakweleka, kutsoghughana.’ ”
Mna Litsuwa lya Sabato Yesu ang'ali yolangulitsa mne ing'anda ya ukulombela.
Baho tsahana ipinga yumwe yane ichinyamkela iyamtendile yaghule kwa miyaka kumi na nane. Tsakapfeduka na ng'adahile bae kwigholosa.
Yesu hamwonile, kamkema, kamlongela, “Mai kuhonetsighwa utamu wako!”
Kuya Yesu kamwikila ghamoko ipinga ayo, bahala kagholoka na kamtunya Imulungu.
Imkulu we ing'anda ya ukulombela tsakona maya kwaapfila Yesu kamhonetsa mai ayo mne Litsuwa lya Sabato, apfo kawalongela iwanu, “Mwinagho ghamatsuwa sita gha kusang'ana. Mtse mna ghamatsuwa agho mhonetsighwe, mleke kutsa mne Litsuwa lya Sabato!”
Imtwatsa kedika, “Mwa wang'enye! Apfi yumwe wenu ng'odaha bae kumdohola ing'ombe au ipunda wake kulawa hanu ha ukujila mne Litsuwa lya Sabato na kumlongotsa aghende kunwa ghamatsi?
Ipinga yuno kaimwana wa Abrahamu, iyaghoghighwe na Setani kwa miyaka kumi na nane. Lelo pfii ng'apfinoghile bae kumdohola mne Litsuwa lya Sabato?”
Yesu halongile apfi, iwehile wake tsawona chinyala, lekeni iwanu tsawang'ali wodeng'elela kwa ipfinu pfa kukangawatsa ipfitendighwe na Yesu.
Kuya Yesu kawaghutsa, “Apfi Undewa we Imulungu wighala na choni? Apfi nitumile imbuli yachi?
Wighala ne imbeghu ndodo ya haladali iyaisolile imunu yumwe na kuihanda kumghunda. Imbeghu ila ikula na kuwa mbiki mkulu, na iwapfideghe watsenga ipfibali mna ghamaputila ghake.”
Yesu kawaghutsa keli, “Apfi nitumile imbuli yachi mmanye Undewa we Imulungu? Wighalile na choni?
Wighala ne hamila iyaisolile ipinga yumwe na kaitipfa ne usaghe mwingi na usaghe wose usasuka.”
Kuya Yesu kaghendelela na ghumwanza ghwake kughenda Yerusalemu. Hayang'ali mnzila, kabitila mne imiji ne ipfijiji, kawalangulitsa iwanu ako.
Imunu yumwe kamghutsa Yesu, “Mtwatsa, apfi watsokombolighwa iwanu chidodo waliyeka?” Yesu kawedika,
“Mtende pfamdaha kwingila mng'anda kubitila mne libani lisisili, kwaapfila iwanu wengi watsobama kwingila mng'anda lekeni ng'awatsodaha bae.
Imunu yane ing'anda katsakwima na kulihinda libani. Namwe mtsakwima kunze na ukwandusa kughong'onda libani na ukulonga, ‘Imtwatsa tupfughulile.’ Lekeni yeye katsowedika, ‘Siwamanyile bae kwamlawa kwani!’
Kuya mtsomwidika, ‘Twetwe twa awala yatujile na ukunwa naghwe, na tsakutulangulitsa mne isi yetu!’
Lekeni katsolonga keli, ‘Siwamanyile bae kwamlawa kwani. Laweni hano, mwemwe mwose yamtendile ghehile!’
Mtsolila na kugheghedula ghamatsino hamtsomwona Abrahamu, Isaka, Yakobu ne manabii wose wamne undewa we Imulungu, lekeni mwemwe mwasighwa kunze!
Iwanu watsakutsa kulawa ubali wa kwalilawila litsua ne ubali wa kwalikuswela litsuwa, na kulawa ubali wa kuchanya na kuhisi, watsokala mne chihungo wakuja mne undewa we Imulungu.
Kuya iwanu iwawile wa usighilo watsakuwa wa mwanduso, ne iwanu iwawile wa mwanduso watsakuwa wa usighilo.”
Matsuwa ghaghala Mafarisayo wangi wamghendela Yesu, wamlongela, “Ughende hanu hangi kwaapfila Herodi kobama akukome.”
Yesu kawedika, “Mghende mumlongele ayu yumbwa wa kumuhulo, ‘Leloli na ilupfi nolapfa ipfinyamkela na kuwahonetsa iwanu, na mne litsuwa lya kadatu nitsomalitsa isang'ano yangu.’
Hata apfo, nobamighwa leloli na ilupfi na ikacha nighendelele na ghumwanza ghwangu kwaapfila ng'apfinoghile bae nabii kukomighwa kunze kwa Yerusalemu!
“Ghwe Yerusalemu! Ghwe Yerusalemu! Kwowakoma manabii na kuwatowa kwa ghamabwe iwatumwa we Imulungu iwatumighwe kuna ghweghwe! Mara nyingi tsambama kuwakunga iwanagho ka ng'uku pfowaghubika pfitsiya wake kwa ghamabawa ghake, lekeni ghweghwe ng'aubamile bae!
Mlole, mlekelighwa ing'anda yenu. Nowalongela, ng'amtsombona keli bae mbaka mlonge, ‘Kabalikiighwa ayula iyakutsa kwa taghwa lye Imtwatsa.’ ”
Litsuwa limwe lya Sabato, Yesu tsakaghenda kuja mne ing'anda ye imkulu wa Mafarisayo. Iwanu wang'ali wamlolesa ng'ani Yesu.
Imunu yapfimbile lukuli kaghenda hambele ha Yesu.
Yesu kawaghutsa iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso na Mafarisayo, “Apfi pfinogha kumhonetsa imunu mne Litsuwa lya Sabato au ng'apfinoghile bae?”
Lekeni ng'awalongile chinu bae. Apfo Yesu kamkinda imtamu ayo, kamhonetsa, kamleka yoke.
Kuya Yesu kawaghutsa, “Ka yumwe wenu kana imwana au ing'ombe kaghwila mchisima mne Litsuwa lya Sabato, apfi ng'odaha bae kumkwegha alawe kunze?”
Lekeni ng'awadahile bae kumwidika.
Yesu halolile iwahenza wangi pfawang'ali wosaghula ipfighoda ipfili hambele, kawalongelela wose imbuli ino,
“Ka imunu kakulongela utse mne ichihungo cha kukwela, uleke kukala mne ipfighoda pfa hambele. Kwaapfila imunu yungi mkulu kubita ghweghwe kodaha kutsa,
ne imunu iyawakemile wose mtse katsokutsila na kukulongela, ‘Winuke akale yuno.’ Kuya kutsakona ichinyala na kughenda kukala mne ipfighoda ipfili kuchughu.
Lekeni ghweghwe utende apfi, haupfika mne chihungo, ughende kukala mne ipfighoda ipfili kuchughu, ili mwenyekaye hatsakutsa yakulongele, ‘Sale yangu, winuke, utse ukale mne ipfighoda ipfili hambele.’ Kuya kutsotogholighwa ne iwanu wose iwakalile naghwe.
Kwaapfila imunu wowose yetenda imwenyegho mkulu katsotendighwa mdodo, ne imunu wowose yetenda imwenyegho mdodo katsotendighwa mkulu.”
Kuya Yesu kamlongela imunu yula iyamlongele atse, “Ka kwowatendela iwanu ichihungo, uleke kuwakema sale tsako au iwandughu tsako au iwanu matajiri iwali habehi naghwe. Ung'atenda apfi, nawo watsokukema ughende mmakaye mwawo, apfo watsokuliha ka ghweghwe pfauwatendele.
Lekeni ka kwotenda ichihungo, uwakeme wahingwa, pfimbete, iwanu waholole, na pfifita,
naghwe kutsobalikiighwa, kwaapfila ng'awatsodaha bae kukuliha. Imulungu katsokuliha mne litsuwa lya kutsilihulighwa iwanu iwanoghile.”
Imunu yumwe iyakalile na Yesu haulike apfi, kamlongela Yesu, “Kabweda ghendo imunu yula yatsakuja ichijo che chihungo mne Undewa we Imulungu!”
Yesu kamwidika, “Imunu yumwe tsayang'ali yotenda chihungo chikulu, kawakema iwahenza wengi watse.
Ichihungo hachipfikile, imunu yula kamtuma imtumwa wake kuwalongela iwanu iyawakemile watse, ‘Mtse, kwaapfila sambi chila ichinu chitandighwa.’
Lekeni wose walema kupfika kwaapfila chila imunu tsakakala ne isang'ano yake. Imunu wa mwanduso kamlongela imtumwa ayo, ‘Nighula mghunda nobama nighende nikaghukaghule, Sikutsa bae.’
Imunu yungi kalonga, ‘Nighula iwang'ombe kumi, sambi noghenda kuwaghetsa. Sikutsa bae.’
Pfipfila imunu yungi naye kalonga, ‘Nikwela sambi, apfo sidaha kutsa bae.’
“Imtumwa yula koya ukaye kamlongela imtwatsa wake mbuli tsose. Hahulike apfo, yane kaye kaghudubuka kamlongela imtumwa wake, ‘Ghenda himahima mne ipfijiji ne kaye uwalongele wahingwa, iwanu iwaholole, pfifita na pfimbete watse.’
Imtumwa ayo kalonga, ‘Mtwatsa, tsanenda ka pfaulaghitse, lekeni hanu ha kukala iwanu hang'ali habaho.’
Apfo imtwatsa kamlongela imtumwa wake, ‘Ghenda mne tsinzila na mne ipfijiji uwalongele iwanu watse, ng'anda yangu imeme.
Nowalongela, mne iwanu wose yaniwakemile watse, kuduhu hata yumwe yatsolanza ichijo che ichihungo changu!’ ”
Baho iwanu wengi tawelongotsa na Yesu, naye Yesu kawahundukila kawalongela,
“Ka imunu wowose konitsila na ng'omhila bae aba wake na mai wake, mwehe wake ne iwanaghe, iwandughu tsake na lumbu tsake na ng'ouhila bae ughima ghwake, ng'odaha bae kuwa mwanang'ina wangu.
Na imunu wowose yang'oduta msalaba ghwake na kuniwinza nene, ayo ng'odaha bae kuwa mwanang'ina wangu.”
“Ka yumwe wenu kobama atsenge chilingilo, tanu kokala hasi kopeta sendi tsenatso, kulola kana sendi tsa kumalitsila isang'ano.
Kwaapfila ka kandusa kutsenga ghumsingi, na ng'odaha bae kughumalitsila, iwanu wose iwolola chatendile watsomseka.
Kuya watsolonga, ‘Imunu yuno kandusa kutsenga lekeni ng'adahile bae kumalitsa isang'ano.’
“Ka mndewa koghenda ne iwanu miya imwe kwitowa na mndewa yungi yane iwanu elufu ishirini tanu katsokala hasi na ukwalangula ka kodaha kwitowa ne mndewa ayo.
Ka ng'odaha bae, katsowatuma iwatumwa wake waghende kwa mndewa ayo hang'ali kutali wamlombe waleke kwitowa.
Pfipfila ka imunu ng'odaha bae kuleka chila chinu chenacho ng'odaha bae kuwa mwanang'ina wangu.
“Imunyu inogha, lekeni ka ihinyika, apfi utsoitendatse inoghe keli?
Ng'ainogha bae kuika mne mghunda wala kuitipfa ne imboleya, itsakwasighwa. Imunu yane ghamaghutwi gho kuhulika, yahulike!”
Litsuwa limwe iwasola kodi na wane nzambi wamghendela Yesu kumhulikitsa.
Lekeni Mafarisayo na iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso wandusa kwilongela, “Imunu yuno kawabokelagha iwanu wane nzambi na kuja nawo!”
Kuya Yesu kawalongela imbuli ino.
“Imunu wachi mna mwemwe yane iwang'olo miya imwe na ng'olo wake yumwe ang'agha, apfi ng'atsowaleka bae wala tisini na tisa akula koyodimila na kughenda kumbama yula yaghile mbaka amwone?
Na hayomwona katsodeng'elela na kumwika mmahegha mwake,
na kumghala ukaye. Kuya katsowakema sale tsake ne iwanu iwali habehi naye na kulonga, ‘Mdeng'e na nene, kwaapfila nimwona ing'olo wangu yaghile.’
Pfipfila nowalongela kutsakuwa na ndeng'elo ng'ulu kulanga kwe imunu yumwe yane nzambi kutsileka nzambi tsake kubita iwanu wala tisini na tisa iwebona wanogha aku ng'awobama bae kutsileka nzambi tsawo.”
“Au ka ipinga kana sendi kumi, na sendi imwe yagha. Apfi ng'atsotuwa bae ichitasa, na kusegha ing'anda yake na kuibama chila hanu mbaka ayone?
Na hayatsoyona sendi ila, katsowakema sale tsake ne iwanu iwali habehi naye na kuwalongela, ‘Mdeng'e na nene kwaapfila niyona sendi yangu yaghile!’
Pfipfila nowalongela, malaika we Imulungu watsodeng'elela kwe imunu yumwe yane nzambi kutsileka nzambi tsake.”
Yesu kaghendelela kuwalongela, “Tsakukala ne imunu yumwe yawile ne iwana weli.
Imwana mdodo kamlongela aba wake, ‘Aba, ungolele pfinu pfutsongaya.’ Apfo aba kawagholela ipfinu pfake.
Ghamatsuwa chidogho hambele, imwana mdodo kautsa ipfinu pfake. Kuya koka ukaye yawo, kaghenda isi ya kutali, ako katsipwilisa sendi tsake kwa pfinu pfihile.
Sendi tsake hatsimalile, inzala ng'ulu ilawila mna isi ila yose, naye kakala kahela ichinu.
Apfo kaghenda kulomba isang'ano kwe imunu we isi ila, imunu yula kamlaghitsa aghende mne mghunda ghwake akadime wangubi.
Tsakasulukila kuja imibangu yawajile iwangubi, lekeni kuduhu imunu yamwing'ile ichijo.
Tsimbutsi tsake hatsimuyile, keghutsa imwenyegho, ‘Aba wangu kana iwanu wengi we isang'ano iwakuja na kuleka ichijo, na nene nahano noghanzika kwe inzala!
Nitsakwinuka na kuya kwa aba wangu na kumlongela, Aba, nimtendela Imulungu nzambi, na pfipfila nikutendela ghweghwe nzambi.’
Sibamighwa bae kukemighwa imwanagho, unende niwe ka yumwe we iwanu wako we isang'ano.”
Apfo kenuka koya kwa aba wake. “Lekeni hang'ali kakutali, aba wake kamwona kamwonela libatsi; kamtsumila imwanaghe, kamkumbatila, na kamnonela.
“Imwana kamlongela aba wake, ‘Aba wangu, nimtendela nzambi Imulungu na ghweghwe pfipfila. Sibamighwa bae kukemighwa mwanagho.’
Lekeni aba wake kawakema iwatumwa wake kawalongela, ‘Himahima! Mghalileni gholole linoghile mumpfatse. Na ipete mna ichidole chake ne imikwabatsa mmaghulu mwake.
Mumghale imwana we ing'ombe yanenehe. Leka tutende ichihungo na tudeng'elele.
Kwaapfila imwanangu tsakafa, lekeni sambi kamghima, tsakagha, lekeni sambi koneka.’ Apfo wandusa kudeng'elela.
“Ichihungo haching'ali chighendelela, imwanaghe mbala tsaka kumghunda. Hapfikile habehi ne ing'anda, kahulika tsingoma ne iwanu wobigha.
Apfo kamkema imtumwa yumwe, kamghutsa, ‘Angu hano hana choni?’
Imtumwa ayo kamwidika, ‘Mdodo wako koya ukaye aba wako kamkomela imwana we ing'ombe yanenehe kwaapfila koya mghima!’
“Imwana imbala kaghudubuka, kalema kwingila mng'anda. Apfo Aba wake kalawa kunze kamlomba engile mng'anda.
Lekeni kamwidika aba wake, ‘Lola, nikusang'anila miyaka yose ino na silemile bae aghala ghaundaghitse nitenda. Lekeni ng'ungaile bae hata imwana we imene nideng'elele sale tsangu!
Lekeni imwanagho ayu kahondola mali tsako na mapinga pfiweghe, na hoile ghweghwe kumkomela imwana we ing'ombe yanenehe!’
Aba wake kamwidika, ‘Mwanangu, matsuwa ghose ghweghwe kwa hamwe na nene, ne ipfinu pfose pfaninapfo pfako.
Lekeni twobamighwa tudeng'elele na kusekelela, kwaapfila mdodo wako tsakafa, lekeni sambi kamghima; tsakagha, lekeni sambi koneka’ ”
Yesu kawalongela iwanang'ina wake, “Tsahana imunu yumwe yane mali nyingi, naye tsakana mtunza mali wake. Imunu ayo tsakahulika ka mtunza mali wake kapwililitsa mali tsake hela.
Apfo kamkema mng'anda kamghutsa, ‘Angu mbuli tsachi tsanihulike tsikulonga ghweghwe? Nipetele ipfinu pfose pfubokele na pfulapfile, kwaapfila ng'udaha bae kuwa keli mtunza mali wangu.’
Mtunza mali kelongela mmoyo, ‘Mtwatsa wangu katsoniwinga mne isang'ano. Apfi nitsotendatse? Nahela ingupfu ya kulima, na nakwona chinyala kulomba.
Sambi nomanya chinu chachi chanitsotenda ili hanitsowingighwa mne isang'ano yangu, iwanu wanibokele mmakaye mwawo.’
“Apfo kawakema iwanu wose iwodahighwa na imtwatsa wake. Kamghutsa ayula yalongole kutsa, ‘Apfi, mtwatsa wangu yokudahi sendi ngapi?’
Kamwidika, ‘Pfiya miya imwe pfa ghamafuta gha tsaituni.’ Mtunza mali ayo kamlongela, ‘Sola cheti chako, kala hasi, wandike pfiya miya tano.’
Kuya kamghutsa imunu wa keli, ‘Naghwe, udahighwa choni?’ Kamwidika, ‘Maghuniya elufu imwe gha ngano.’ Mwimilitsi kamlongela, ‘Sola cheti chako wandike maghuniya miya nane.’
“Imtwatsa kamtunya mtunza mali yula yehile kwaapfila katenda ipfinu kwa kukengela. Kwaapfila iwanu iwali mne isi ino wakengela mna kutenda ipfinu pfawo kubita iwanu iwali mne ghumwanga.”
“Nowalongela, mtsitendele tsimali itsili muisi kwipatila sale tsenu wenyegho, ili hatsitsomala, mbokelighwe nawo mne chibumbulika cha ghamatsuwa ghose.
Imunu wowose iyotogholighwa mne ichinu chidodo katsotogholighwa mne ichinu chikulu, ne imunu wowose yang'atogholighwa mne ichinu chidodo pfipfila ng'atsotogholighwa bae mne ichinu ichikulu.
Kuya ka ng'amtogholighwe bae kwika tsimali tsili mne isi, apfi yuhi iyatsowatoghola kwika tsimali tsa kweli?
Ka ng'amtogholighwe bae mna tsimali tse imunu yungi, yuhi yatsoweng'a mwemwe tsimali tsenu iwenyegho?
“Kuduhu imtumwa iyodaha kuwasang'anila iwatwa weli. Kwaapfila katsomwihila yumwe na kumnoghela yungi; katsolunga na yumwe na kumbetsa yungi. Ng'amdaha bae kumtumikila Imulungu na sendi.”
Mafarisayo iwonoghela tsisendi hawahulike apfo, tsawambetsa Yesu.
Yesu kawalongela, “Mwemwe mwelangusa kwe iwanu mnogha, lekeni Imulungu koimanya imimoyo yenu. Kwaapfila ichinu ichikwoneka chinogha kwe iwanu, kwe Imulungu chakoneka chiha.
“Ghamalaghitso gha Musa na mbuli tsa manabii tsipetighwa mbaka mne ichipindi cha Yohane Mbatitsa. Kulawa ichipindi acho, mbuli tsinoghile tse Undewa we Imulungu tsipetighwa, na chila imunu kakwingila kwe ingupfu.
Pfibewe kwe ililanga ne isi ukwagha, kubita kuhunguka ichinu chidodo mne Ghamalaghitso.
“Immale wowose iyomleka mwehe wake na kumkwela ipinga yungi kotenda utsinzi, ne immale iyomkwela ipinga iyalekighwe kotenda utsinzi.”
“Tsahana imunu yumwe tajiri yang'ali yopfala maghwanda gha tsambalau ighaghulighwe kwa sendi nyingi, chila litsuwa yeye yang'ali yohondola pfijo pfinoghile.
Hane ha libani lyake likulu, tsakekighwa imunu yumwe mhingwa yakemighwe Lazali yane ipfilonda pfingi,
yabamile kuja ipfijo ipfilaghale kulawa mmetsa mwe tajiri. Na iwambwa wamghendela wamlambita ipfilonda pfake.
“Hambele, Lazali kafa kuya kasolighwa ne wamalaika mbaka mmambagha mwa Abrahamu. Imunu tajiri pfipfila naye kafa kuya katsikighwa.
Akula kutsimu, ang'ali yodununzika ng'ani, kalola kuchanya, kamwona Abrahamu kwa kutali hamwe na Lazali iyakalile mmambagha mwake.
Apfo kamkema kwa ukukemelela, ‘Aba Abrahamu, mbonele libatsi! Umtume Lazali achike ichidole chake mne ghamatsi aluhotse lulimi lwangu, kwaapfila nene namne usungu mkulu mne ghumoto ghuno!’ ”
“Lekeni Abrahamu kamwidika, ‘Wikumbuke mwanangu, mne ughima wako tsakubokela apfila ipfinoghile na Lazali tsakabokela ipfihile. Lekeni sambi Lazali kabahano kodeng'elela, naghwe kwodununzika.
Hata apfo, mghati mwetu na mwemwe kwikighwa kolongo kulu, ili imunu iyobama kuloka kulawa kuno kutsa kuna mwemwe aleke kudaha, pfipfila kuduhu imunu iyodaha kuloka kulawa kuna mwemwe kutsa kuna twetwe!’
Imunu tajiri kalonga, ‘Kuya nokulomba aba wangu, umtume Lazali aghende mne kaye ya aba wangu,
amo mna ndughu tsangu watano. Mlekelele aghende akawalongele waleke kutenda ka pfanitendile, ili waleke kutsa hanu hano ha kudununzika.’ ”
“Abrahamu kamwidika, ‘Ndughu tsako wenao Musa na manabii, leka wawategheletse wawo.’
Tajiri kalonga, ‘Bae aba wangu. Lekeni ka imunu yatsilihuke kowaghendela, watsotsileka nzambi.’
Abrahamu kamlongela, ‘Ka ng'awowategheletsa Musa na manabii, ng'awatsotegheletsa hata ang'atsilihuka imunu.’ ”
Kuya, Yesu kawalongela iwanang'ina wake, “Pfitsolawila ghendo ipfinu ipfimuhonza imunu atende nzambi, lekeni katsoghaya imunu yula yatsotenda pfilawile.
Ing'awile ng'apfu kwe imunu ayo yohighwe libwe lya kusaghila msingo na yasighwe mne ibahali, kubita kumtenda yumwe we iwadodo wano atende nzambi.
Mwalangitse! Ka ndughu yako kakutendela ghehile, umlonge, ang'atoghola totso lyake, umlekelele.
Ang'akutendela ghehile mala saba kwa tsuwa limwe, na ang'akutsila mala saba na kukulongela, ‘Nileka,’ naghwe mlekelele.”
Iwatumighwa wamlongela Imtwatsa, “Utwongetsele ukutoghola.”
Imtwatsa kalonga, “Ukutoghola kwenu kung'awile kudodo ka imbeghu ya haladali, mng'adahile kughulongela mbiki ghuno ghwa mkuyu; ‘Ng'oka, wikehande mwibahali!’ naghwo ghung'awahulikitse.”
“Tulonge yumwe wenu kana imtumwa iyolima kumghunda au iyodima iwang'olo. Apfi hayakuya kulawa kumghunda, katsomlongela imtumwa ayo, ‘Utse tanu, ukale hasi, uje ichijo?’
Bae! Katsomlongela, ‘Nyambikile ichijo, na wanduse kunisang'anila mbaka hanitsomalitsa kuja na kunwa, kuya naghwe uje na unwe!’
Apfi kutsomlongela mighede imtumwa ayo kwaapfila katenda aghala ghalaghitsighwe?
Pfipfila namwe mng'amalitsa kutenda chila chinu chambamighwe kutenda, mwobamighwa kulonga, ‘Twetwe twa iwatumwa iwali si chinu bae. Tutenda pfatubamighwa kutenda.’ ”
Yesu hang'ali kamnzila koghenda Yerusalemu, kabitila mghati mwa Samariya na Galilaya.
Hang'ali yakwingila mne ichijiji chimwe, tsaketingana ne iwakoma kumi, wema kutali.
Wakemelela, “Yesu, Imtwatsa, twonele libatsi!”
Hawonile kawalongela, “Mghende mkelanguse kwa wakulu we inambiko.” Hawang'ali woghenda, tsawahona.
Yumwe mna wawo honile kahona, koya kuchughu, aku komtunya Imulungu kwa kukemelela.
Keghwisa hasi hane maghulu gha Yesu kamlongela mighede. Ayo tsakakala Msamariya.
Yesu kalonga, “Apfi si iwanu kumi bae iwahonile? Lelo awala tisa walikwani?
Ng'oneke yungi iyoyile na kumtunya Imulungu ila imhenza ayu aliyeka?”
Kuya Yesu kamlongela imunu ayo, “Winuke uke, Ukutoghola kwako kukuhonetsa!”
Mafarisayo hawamghutsile Yesu, Undewa we Imulungu utsakutsa tsuwachi, kawedika, “Undewa we Imulungu ng'aukutsa kwa kwoneka kwa tsinenge bae.
Kuduhu imunu iyatsodaha kulonga, ‘Wa hano au wa hala.’ Kwaapfila Undewa we Imulungu wa mghati mwenu.”
Kuya kawalongela iwanang'ina wake, “Ghamatsuwa ghakutsa mtsobama kwona litsuwa limwe lya ghamatsuwa ghe Imwana we Imunu, lekeni ng'amtsolyona bae.
Na iwanu watsowalongela, ‘Mlole, kahala!’ Au ‘Mlole kahano!’ Lekeni mwemwe mleke kuwawinza.
Kwaapfila ka lumwesa pfalulawila kulanga na kumwemwesa ubali umwe mbaka ubali ungi, apfo pfipfo Imwana we Imunu pfatsakuwa mne litsuwa lyake.
Lekeni tanu yadununzike ng'ani na kulemighwa ne iwanu wa mweleko ghuno.
Na ka pfaiwile mne ghamatsuwa gha Nuhu, pfipfila itsakuwa pfipfo mne ghamatsuwa ghe Imwana we Imunu.
Iwanu tsawaghendelela kuja na kunwa, kukwela na kukwelighwa mbaka Nuhu hengile mne safina. Kuya mafuriko ghatsa na kuwakoma wose.
Itsakuwa pfipfo ka pfailawile mne ghamatsuwa gha Lutu. Iwanu tsawaghendelela kuja na kunwa, kughula na kuutsa, kuhanda tsimbeghu na kutsenga.
Lekeni litsuwa lila Lutu hokile Sodoma, ghumoto na ghamabwe igholakatsa ghalaghala hasi kulawa kulanga na kuwalakatsa wose.
Itsakuwa pfipfo mne litsuwa lila Imwana we Imunu hatsoghubulighwa.”
“Mna litsuwa alyo, imunu iyali mchiswili aku ipfinu pfake pfa mng'anda, aleke kuhulumka kupfisola, pfipfila iyali kumghunda aleke kuya kuchughu.
Mkumbuke ighampatile mwehe wa Lutu.
Imunu wowose iyobama kuukombola ughima wake katsowaghisa, na wowose iyowaghisa ughima wake, katsoukombola.
Nowalongela, litsuwa alyo nechilo iwanu weli watsowasa hamwe, yumwe katsosolighwa na yungi katsolekighwa.”
Iwapinga weli watsotwanga hamwe, yumwe katsosolighwa na yungi katsolekighwa.
Iwanu weli watsakuwa kumghunda, yumwe katsosolighwa, na yungi katsolekighwa.
Baho iwanang'ina wake wamghutsa, “Kwani Mtwatsa?” Naye kawedika, “Hane ghumtsogha, maghengele watsetinganila baho.”
Kuya Yesu kawapetela iwanang'ina wake imbuli kuwalangulitsa ka wobamighwa kulomba matsuwa ghose, waleke kwipfa.
Kalonga, “Mne ghumji ghumwe tsakukala na mlamutsi, ayo ng'ampfukile bae Imulungu wala ng'awanoghele iwanu bae.
Pfipfila tsakukala ne chitsuka yumwe mne ghumji agho iyang'ali yomghendelagha kumlomba bila kwipfa mlamutsi ayo, ‘Utulamle nene na mwihile wangu.’
Kwa matsuwa mengi mlamutsi ayo kalema kumwapfila chitsuka ayo. Lekeni hambele kalonga, ‘Hata ka nene simpfuka bae Imulungu wala siwanoghela iwanu bae,
lekeni kwaapfila chitsuka ayu konitsupfa, nitsomlamulila, hela koghendelela kunitsila na kunenda nyipfe!’ ”
Kuya Imtwatsa kaghendelela kulonga, “Muhulikitse pfalongile mlamutsi ayu yehile.
Pfii lelo Imulungu ng'atsowalamulila bae iwanu wala iyawasaghule, iwomlilila chilo na misi? Apfi katsokawa kuwapfila?
Nowalongela katsowapfila hima! Hata apfo Imwana we Imunu hatsakutsa, apfi katsopfika iwanu wotoghola mne iisi?”
Kuya Yesu kawalongela imbuli ino iwanu wala iweghoda na kuwabetsa wangi.
“Iwanu weli waghenda kune ing'anda ye Imulungu kulomba. Yumwe Mfarisayo na yungi imunu iyosola kodi.
Ayo Mfarisayo kema, kalomba mne ghumoyo ghwake, ‘Mighede, Ghwe Imulungu, kwaapfila nene si ka iwanu wangi bae, iwoboka, iwotenda ghehile, watsinzi, wala si ka ayu msola kodi.
Nene noleka ukuja ghamatsuwa meli mne ghamatsuwa saba, nolapfa tsaka ye ipfinu pfose pfanipata!’
“Lekeni ayula msola kodi kema kutali, wala ng'alolile bae kulanga. Lekeni ketowa mmambagha mwake kwa usungu, kalonga, ‘Ghwe Imulungu, umbonele libatsi, nene mtenda ghehile.’ ”
Nowalongela, “Ayu msola kodi koka ukaye yake akuno katogholighwa ne Imulungu kubita ayula yungi. Kwaapfila imunu wowose yetenda imwenyegho mkulu katsotendighwa mdodo, na imunu wowose yetenda imwenyegho mdodo katsotendighwa mkulu.”
Iwanu tsawamghalila Yesu iwana wadodo awekile ghamoko. Iwanang'ina wake hawonile apfi, wawakembela.
Lekeni Yesu kawakema iwana wamghendele, kalonga, “Muwaleke iwana wadodo wanitsile, mleke kuwaghoma. Kwaapfila undewa we Imulungu wa iwanu ka wano.
Nowalongela ghendo, imunu wowose yang'aubokela undewa we Imulungu ka imwana mdodo, ng'atsakwingila bae mne undewa awo.”
Na mkulu yumwe wa Chiyahudi kamghutsa Yesu, “Mlangulitsi yunoghile, nitende choni ili nidahe kupata ughima wa matsuwa ghose?”
Yesu kamghutsa, “Mbona kwonikema ninogha? Kuduhu yanoghile lekeni Imulungu aliyeka.
Kwoghamanya ghamalaghitso. ‘Uleke utsinzi, uleke kukoma, uleke kulonga ughutsu, wategheletse aba wako na mai wako.’ ”
Kamwidika, “Agho ghose nighakinda kulawa udodo wangu.”
Yesu haulike apfo kamlongela, “Kuhungukighwa na ichinu chimwe. Utsa pfose pfawinapfo na sendi uwagholele wahingwa, naghwe kutsakuwa na utajiri kulanga. Kuya utse uniwinze.”
Lekeni imunu ayo haulike apfi, kwona usungu ng'ani kwaapfila tsakakala tajiri ng'ani.
Yesu hamwonile kakona usungu, kalonga, “Pfikomu ng'ani kwa matajiri kwingila mne undewa we Imulungu!
Kwaapfila pfibewe kwa ngamiya kwingila mne litobo lye isindano kubita tajiri kwingila mne undewa we Imulungu!”
Awala iwahulike apfo waghutsa, “Lelo yuhi yodaha kukombolighwa?”
Yesu kedika, “Ichinu ing'achidahika kwe iwanu, kwe Imulungu chodahika.”
Kuya Petiri kalonga, “Lola! Twetwe tupfileka ipfinu pfetu pfose twokuwinza ghweghwe.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Nowalongela ghendo, imunu wowose iyalekile ing'anda yake au mwehe wake au iwandughu tsake au iwamweleke au iwanaghe kwaajili ya undewa we Imulungu,
katsobokela pfingi mna matsuwa agha, na ughima wa matsuwa ghose mne chipindi ichikutsa.”
Yesu tsakawasola awala kumi na weli kawalongela, “Mlole! Twoghenda Yerusalemu, na chila chinu chandikighwe na manabii che Imwana we Imunu chitsolawila.
Kwaapfila katsakwikighwa mne ghamoko ghe iwanu iwali si Wayahudi bae. Nawo watsombetsa, watsomligha, watsombwalulila ghamate,
watsomfapula pfiboko, kuya watsomkoma. Mne litsuwa lya kadatu katsotsilihuka.”
Lekeni iwanang'ina ng'awamanyile bae ichinu acho. Tsawapfisighwa mana ye imbuli ayo, na ng'awatangile ighalongighwe.
Yesu hapfikile habehi na Yeriko, imunu yumwe ichifita tsakakala mmbalimbali mwe inzila kolomba.
Haulike iwanu wobita, kaghutsa, “kuna choni?”
Wamlongela, “Yesu wa Natsareti kobita.”
Naye kakemelela, “Yesu, Mtsukulu wa Daudi, mbonele libatsi!”
Wanu wala iwalongole wamkembela wamlongela anyamale, lekeni yeye kaghendelela kukemelela, “Mtsukulu wa Daudi, mbonele libatsi!”
