Yesu kema kalaghitsa wamghale imunu ayo hana yeye. Hapfikile habehi, Yesu kamghutsa,
“Kwobama nikutendele choni?” Kedika, “Imtwatsa, nobama mbone.”
Yesu kamlongela, “Wone! Kutoghola kwako kukuhonetsa!”
Bahala ichifita ayo kadaha kona, kamuwinza Yesu, aku komtunya Imulungu. Iwanu wose hawonile apfo, nawo pfipfila wamtunya Imulungu.
Yesu tsakengila mne ghumji ghwa Yeriko na yang'ali yobita mghati mwa ghumji agho.
Na ako kukala ne imunu yumwe taghwa lyake Sakayo, imkulu we iwasola kodi, naye tsakakala tajiri.
Tsakabama amwone Yesu yalitse, lekeni ng'adahile bae kwaapfila tsahana iwanu wengi, naye tsakakala mghuyi.
Apfo katsuma, kawalongolela iwanu, kadina mchanya mwe mkuyu ili amwone Yesu, kwaapfila katsobitila inzila iila.
Yesu hapfikile hanu hala, kalola mchanya, kamlongela Sakayo, “Sakayo, hima uhulumke, kwaapfila leloli nobamighwa nisinde mng'anda mwako.”
Apfo Sakayo kuhulumka himahima kambokela kwa kudeng'elela.
Iwanu wose hawonile apfo, wandusa kunung'unika na ukulonga, “Kaghenda kukala kwa ‘imunu yane nzambi.’ ”
Lekeni Sakayo kema, kamlongela Yesu, “Lola Imtwatsa, nene nitsoweng'a wahingwa inusu ye ipfinu pfangu, na ka nimboka imunu wowose ichinu, nitsomuyitsila mala nne.”
Yesu kamlongela, “Leloli ukombotsi upfika mne ing'anda ino, kwaapfila ayu naye kamtsukulu wa Abrahamu.
Mana Imwana wa Imunu katsa kubama na kukombola iwanu iwaghile.”
Hawahulike agho, Yesu kaghendelela kuwalongela imbuli, kwaapfila tsakakala habehi na Yerusalemu, nawo tsawapfikitsa ka undewa we Imulungu wahabehi kulawila.
Apfo kalonga, “Imunu yumwe wa lukolo lwa chindewa tsakaghenda mne isi ya kutali akabokele undewa kuya yoye ukaye.
Apfo kawakema iwanu kumi kulawa mne iwatumwa wake, kaweng'a tsisendi kawalongela, ‘Mtsitendele ng'onde ya kuchuutsa pfinu mbaka hanitsakuya.’
Lekeni iwanu wa ghumji ghwake wamuhila, wawatuma iwanu wamghendele wakalonge, ‘Ng'atumbama bae imunu yuno atutawale.’ ”
“Haubokele undewa, tsakoya kalaghitsa iwatumwa yaweng'ile sendi wakemighwe ili amanye chawapatile.
Wamwanduso katsa, kalonga, ‘Mtwatsa sendi yako yungayile yeleka pfibughulu kumi.’
Kamlongela, ‘Ghoya, mtumwa yunoghile. Kwaapfila kutogholighwa mna chinu chidodo, kwakuwa mkulu mne imiji kumi!’
Na wa keli katsa, kalonga, ‘Mndewa, sendi yako tsungayile tseleka pfibughulu pfitano!’
Naye kamlongela, ‘Naghwe kutsakuwa mkulu mne imiji mitano.’
“Kuya mtumwa yungi kalonga, ‘Mtwatsa, sendi yako ino tsaniifidika mne chitambala.
Mana tsanikupfuka kwaapfila ghweghwe kwa imunu mkali. Kosola ipfinu pfang'upfikile, na kupfuna achila ng'auchihandile bae.’
Mtwatsa wake kamlongela, ‘Nitsokuhigha kwa achila chulongile, ghwe imtumwa wihile! Tsakumanya nene ne imunu mkali, nosola apfila si pfikile bae na nopfuna apfila sipfihandile bae,
ebali ng'awikile bae sendi yangu kubengi, na hanikuya niibokele kuno yongetseka.’
“Kuya kawalongela iwemile habehi, ‘Mbokeni sendi ayo, mkamwing'e yula yane kumi.’
Nawo wamlongela, ‘Mtwatsa, ma kenatso kumi!’
Naye kawedika, ‘Nowalongela chila yane chinu katsakongetsighwa, lekeni ayula yalihela chinu, hata chila chenacho katsobokighwa.
Sambi awala iwehile wangu iwolema nene ndeke kuwa mndewa wawo, waghaleni hano na muwakome aku nene nolola.’ ”
Yesu hamalitse kulonga apfo, kawalongolela kaghenda Yerusalemu.
Hapfikile habehi na Betifage na Betaniya, kune chidunda ichikemighwa Mitseituni, kawatuma iwanang'ina wake weli,
kawalongela, “Mghende mne tsikaye tsila tsamtsilola. Hamkwingila mna tsikaye atso, mtsomwona imwana we ipunda kohighwa, ng'ana yadinighwe ne imunu bae. Mumdohole mumghale hano.
Imunu wowose ang'awaghutsa, ‘Ebali mwumdohola?’ Mumlongele, ‘Mtwatsa kombama.’ ”
Na awala iwatumighwe waghenda wapfika ka Yesu pfawalongele.
Hawang'ali womdohola imwana we ipunda, iwenyegho wawaghutsa, “Ebali mwomdohola imwana we ipunda?”
Nawo wedika, “Mtwatsa kombama.”
Kuya wamghala kwa Yesu, watandika maghwanda ghao mmughongo mwa imwana we ipunda wamdinitsa Yesu mchanya mwake.
Na hang'ali yoghenda, iwanu watandika maghwanda ghawo mnzila.
Hapfikile habehi na mhulumko ghwa chidunda cha Mitseituni, mtingano mkulu ghwe iwanang'ina wake wandusa kudeng'elela na kumtunya Imulungu kwa kukemelela, kwa aghala makulu ghawonile.
Walonga, “Kebweda Imndewa iyakutsa kwa taghwa lye Imtwatsa! Kulanga kukale tseghamba, ne utunitso kuchanya kulanga!”
Mafarisayo wamwenga iwakalile mna mtingano ghula wamlongela Yesu, “Mlangulitsi, uwalonge iwanang'ina wako wenyamale!”
Yesu kawedika, “Nowalongela, hawano wang'enyamala, ghamabwe ghano ghatsolapfa litsi.”
Hapfikile habehi na Yerusalemu na kughwona ghumji, kaghulilila,
kalonga, “Ung'amanyile leloli ipfinu ipfighala tseghamba! Lekeni sambi pfifisighwa mnenge mwako.
Kwaapfila ghamatsuwa ghatsokutsila, iwehile wako hawatsotsenga maboma, watsokupfingilila na kukubanyabanya chila ubali.
Watsokuhonda ghweghwe ne iwanagho mghati mwa mibanda yako. Ng'awatsokulekela libwe limwe mchanya mwe libwe, kwaapfila ng'umanyile bae ichipindi cha ukutsa kwe Imulungu.”
Kuya Yesu kengila kune ing'anda ye Imulungu, kandusa kuwawinga kunze iwanu iwang'ali woutsa ipfinu.
Kawalongela, “Yandikighwa, ‘Ing'anda yangu itsakuwa ng'anda ya ukulombela.’ Lekeni mwemwe muitenda iwe mango ya wabapfi.”
Chila litsuwa Yesu tsakalangulitsa mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu. Iwakulu we inambiko, iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso ne iwakulu we iwanu tsawabama wamkome,
lekeni ng'awapatile bae nzila ya kumkomela, kwaapfila iwanu wose wang'ali womuhulikitsa.
Litsuwa limwe Yesu hayang'ali yolangulitsa mne ing'anda ye Imulungu, na kuwapetela imbuli inoghile. Iwakulu we inambiko ne iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso ne iwabala wamtsila
wamghutsa, “Utulongele, kwe ukulu wachi kwotenda ipfinu pfino? Kuya yuhi yakwing'ile ukulu uno?”
Kawedika, “Na nene nitsowaghutsa imbuli imwe; nilongeleni,
ubatitso wa Yohane ulawa kulanga au kwe iwanu?”
Lekeni wawo welongetsa iwenyegho, na walonga, “Tung'alonga ulawa kulanga, katsotughutsa, ‘Ebali ng'amumtoghole bae Yohane?’
Na tung'alonga ulawa kwe iwanu, iwanu wose watsotutowa kwa ghamabwe, kwaapfila wose wamtoghola Yohane kughwa kakala nabii.”
Apfo wedika, “Ng'atumanyile bae ulawile kwani.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Na nene siwalongela bae kwe ukulu wachi notenda ipfinu pfino.”
Yesu kaghendelela kuwalongela iwanu imbuli ino. “Imunu yumwe tsakahanda sabibu mne mghunda wake. Keka iwakulima, kuya koka kukala mne isi ingi kwa matsuwa mengi.
Msimu wa kuhuna haghupfikile, kamtuma imtumwa kwe iwakulima ili wamgholele ghamatunda gha mitsabibu. Lekeni iwakulima wala wamtowa na wamuwinga ghamoko ghaliyeka.
Kamtuma imtumwa yungi. Ayo naye wamtowa na wamtendela pfinu pfa chinyala na kumuyitsa ghamoko ghaliyeka.
Kamtuma na wa kadatu. Ayu naye wamlagha na kumuwinga.
Kuya, yula yane mghunda kalonga, ‘Nitende choni? Nitsomtuma imwanangu iyanimnoghele. Ayu watsompfuka ghendo.’
Lekeni awala iwakulima hawamwonile, welongetsa iwenyegho, ‘Hayuno iyo muhala mghunda, leka tumkome na uhala wake uwe wetu!’
Apfo wamlapfa kunze mwa mghunda wa mitsabibu, wamkoma.” Kuya Yesu kawaghutsa, “Apfi imunu yane mghunda katsowatenda choni iwakulima wala?
Katsakutsa kuwakoma iwakulima awo, na kuweng'a iwanu wangi mghunda awo.” Iwanu hawahulike imbuliyo walonga, “Mbe! Agho ghaleke kulawila!”
Lekeni Yesu kawatsodolela tsinenge, kalonga, “Kuya Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka ghano choni? ‘Libwe iwalilemile iwotsenga, Alyo liwa libwe kulu lya haghatighati?’
Imunu wowose iyokughwa mna libwe awo katsobeneka-beneka, ne imunu wowose litsomghwila litsomhonda ghendo.”
Iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso ne Watambika wakulu tsawabama wamghoghe Yesu bahala, kwaapfila wamanya ka imbuli ila walongighwa wawo. Lekeni tsawawapfuka iwanu.
Apfo wakala wobama ichipindi chinoghile. Wawatuma iwanu iwetendile wanogha, wamghoghe Yesu kwa kumghutsa mbuli, ili wadahe kumghala kwe imkulu we undewa wa Roma.
Iwanu awo wamghutsa, “Imlangulitsi, twomanya ghweghwe kwolonga na kwolangulitsa ipfinu pfinoghile, ng'aulola bae ukulu we imunu, lekeni kwolangulitsa inzila ye Imulungu kwe ukweli.
Apfi pfinogha kumwing'a kodi Kaisari au ng'apfinoghile bae?”
Lekeni Yesu kamanya ukwiha kwawo, kawalongela,
“Nilanguseni isendi. Ina uhanga wa nani na taghwa lya nani?” Wamwidika, “Wa imndewa Kaisari.”
Apfo Yesu kawalongela, “Ipfinu pfa Kaisari mmwing'e Kaisari, ne ipfinu pfe Imulungu mwing'eni Imulungu.”
Ng'awadahile bae kumghogha kwe achila chialongile hambele he iwanu. Na wakangawala pfaawedike, wanyamala.
Masadukayo iwalongagha kuduhu kutsilihuka. Wamwenga wamtsila Yesu na kumghutsa,
“Imlangulitsi, Musa tsakatwandikila. ‘Imunu ang'afiwa na ndughu yake yane mwehe, lekeni kahela imwana, imunu ayo yamkwele ipinga ayo, ili yamwelekele ndughu yake iwana.’
Tsakukala ne iwandughu saba. Wa mwanduso kakwela mwehe, naye kafa ng'alekile iwana bae.
Na wa keli kamsola ipingayo, naye kafa ng'alekile iwana.
Kuya wa kadatu kamkwela, na pfipfila wose saba, wafa ng'awalekile iwana bae.
Mwiso ipinga yula naye kafa.
Lelo mne litsuwa lya kutsilihuka kakuwa mwehe wa yuhi? Kwaapfila tsakakwelighwa na wose saba.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Iwanu wa ghamatsuwa ghano wokwela na kukwelighwa.
lekeni awala iwasaghulighwe watsilihuke kulawa mne lifwa na wawe ne ugima, ng'awatsokwela bae wala kukwelighwa.
Ng'awatsakufa keli bae, kwaapfila watsokuwa ka wamalaika. Nawo wa iwana we Imulungu kwaapfila watsilihuka kulawa mne lifwa.
Lekeni, kulonga iwanu iwafile watsotsilihuka, hata Musa tsakalangusa apfo mne imbuli ya chibagho ichikwaka, baho hayalongile Imtwatsa ka Imulungu we Abrahamu, ne Imulungu we Isaka ne Imulungu wa Yakobu.
Naye si Imulungu wa iwanu iwafile bae, lekeni yeye ka Imulungu wa wene ughima. Kwaapfila wose wokala waghima kuna yeye.”
Wangi we iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso walonga, “Imlangulitsi kulonga ghoya!”
Nawo ng'awadahile bae kumghutsa keli imbuli.
Kuya Yesu kawalongela, “Angu pfii iwanu wolonga Kiristu ka Imwana we Daudi?
Kwaapfila Daudi imwenyegho kolonga mne ichitabu cha Tsaburi, ‘Imtwatsa tsakamlongela Imtwatsa wangu, Ukale mne ubali wangu wa kujilo.
Mbaka niwatende iwanebe wako wawe hasi ha ghamaghulu ghako. ka chighoda cha kwikila maghulu’
Daudi kamkema ‘Imtwatsa,’ Pfii lelo yadahe kuwa imwanaghe?”
Ne iwanu wose hawakalile wamtegheletsa, Yesu kawalongela iwanang'ina wake,
“Mkale meso ne iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso, iwonoghelwa ukwanga kuno wapfala ghamaghwanda matali na kulamutsighwa mmasoko, na kukala mne ipfighoda pfili ambele mne tsing'anda tse ukulombela na mne ipfihungo.
Iwebagha mna tsing'anda tse pfitsuka na kwe ung'enye wolomba kwe ichipindi chitali. Awano watsohighighwa ng'ani.”
Yesu kenula meso, kawona wane tsimali pfowoghela sadaka tsawo mne chinu cha kwikila sadaka.
Pfipfila kamwona chitsuka yumwe mhingwa koghela sendi mbili.
Kawalongela, “Nowalongela ghendo, chitsuka ayu kalapfa kubita wose.
Kwaapfila wose walapfa sadaka itsisidile mna tsimali tsawo, lekeni chitsuka ayu mne uhingwa wake kalapfa pfose pfakalile napfo.”
Ne iwanang'ina wangi wakala wolonga imbuli ye ing'anda ye Imulungu, pfaitsengighwe kwa ghamabwe ghanoghile na nosa itsilapfighwe ne iwanu kumwing'a Imulungu. Lekeni Yesu kalonga,
“Agha ghose ghamkona, ghamatsuwa ghatsakutsa, ghatsobomolighwa libwe mchanya mwe libwe lingi, chila limwe litsakwatsighwa hasi.”
Iwanu wamghutsa Yesu, “Mlangulitsi, ipfinu apfo pfitsolawila tsuwachi? Ne ichitango chitsokughwa choni ichipindi ipfinu apfo pfa habehi kutsa?”
Kedika, “Mwalangitse, mleke kughutsukighwa. Kwaapfila wengi watsakutsa kwa taghwa lyangu, wolonga, ‘Nene iyo imwenyegho,’ ne, ‘Ichipindi cha habehi.’ Mwemwe mleke kuwawinza.
Na mng'ahulika imbuli ye ing'ondo na kughaya, mleke kupfuka, kwaapfila ipfinu apfo pfobamighwa tanu pfilawile, lekeni umwisho ng'aukukutsa hima bae.”
Kuya Yesu kawalongela, “Iwanu wa isi ino wetsotowa ne iwanu wa isi ila, ne undewa utsotowa ne undewa.
Kutsolawila imidedemo mikulu ye isi, ne inzala ne utamu chila hanu. Na kutsolawila ipfinu pfa kupfukighwa, ne ipfitango pfikulu kulawa kulanga.
Lekeni agho ghose ng'ana ghalawile, watsowaghogha na kuwadununza. Watsowaghala mna tsing'anda tse ukulombela, na mne pfifungo, na watsowaghala kwe wandewa na kwe iwatawala kwaajili ya taghwa lyangu.
Kubitila agho mtsowapetela Imbuli Inoghile.
Lekeni mne imimoyo yenu, mleke ukwalangula pfamtsowedika.
Kwaapfila nene nitsoweng'a imbuli ye ukulonga na nzewele. Kuduhu iwanebe wenu watsodaha kuilema wala kwisonga agho ghamlongile.
Namwe mtsohundukighwa hata na welesi wenu, iwandughu tsenu ne iwanu wa habehi namwe na sale tsenu. Nawo watsowakoma wangi wenu.
Iwanu wose watsowahila kwaajili ya taghwa lyangu.
Lekeni ng'aitsokwagha hata imvili imwe ya ghamatwi ghenu.
Kwa kududumila kwenu mtsobokela ughima.
“Hamtsolyona ghumji ghwa Yerusalemu litsungulukighwa ne asikali, baho mmanye kughwa ukuhinyighwa kwake kwa habehi.
Baho wali mne isi ye Yudeya watsumile kupfidunda, ne iwali mghati mwe ghumji watsumile kunze, na wose iwali mne imighunda waleke kwingila mna ghumji.
Kwaapfila hagho ghatsokughwa ghamatsuwa gha kuhighighwa ili ghose ighandikighwe ghalawile.
Watsoghaya ng'ani iwapinga wane inda ne iwoghwaghwisa mne ghamatsuwa hagho! Kwaapfila kutsokughwa na kughaya ng'ani mne isi, ne Imulungu katsowahigha iwanu we isi ino.
Watsokomighwa kwa limaghe, na watsosolighwa mateka ne isi tsose. ghumji ghwa Yerusalemu ghutsobajughighwa ne iwanu iwali si Wayahudi bae, mbaka ichipindi che iwanu iwali si Wayahudi bae hachitsotimila.
“Kuya kutsokughwa ne ipfitango mne litsua, mne ghumwetsi na mne tsinondo. Mne isi kutsokughwa na kughaya kwaajili ya kupfuka litsi lye ibahali na ghamawimbi ghake.
Iwanu watsotsilika kwa kupfuka, kwa kubetetsa ighakutsa mne isi yose, kwaapfila ipfinu pfa kulanga pfitsohighisika.
Baho watsomwone Imwana we Imunu kakutsa mne libingu ne ingupfu ne utunitso mkulu.
Na baho ipfinu apfo hapfitsokwandusa kulawila, msangalale. Mwinule ghamatwi ghenu kwaapfila ukombotsi wenu wahabehi.”
Kuya Yesu kawalongela imbuli. “Loleni ghumtini ne imibiki yose.
Hamkwona imitsani yake yochipula, mwomanya kughwa chiangatsi chahabehi.
Namwe pfipfila hamkwona ipfinu apfo pfolawila, mmanye undewa we Imulungu wahabehi.
“Nowalongela ghendo, iwanu wa mweleko uno ng'awatsoluta bae mbaka ipfinu apfo pfilawile.
Lilanga ne isi tsitsoluta, lekeni mbuli tsangu ng'atsitsoluta mbe.
“Mwalangitse! Imimoyo yenu ileke kughoghighwa ne kuja ng'ani, kupatika na kughaya kwaajili ye ughima uno, na litsuwa lila liwatsile kwa kuwadukitsa ka ghumtegho pfaughogha.
Kwaapfila litsowatsila iwanu wose iwokala mne uhanga we isi yose.
Apfo mkale meso ghamatsuwa ghose, mlombe mdahe ukukomboka mne hagho ghose ghatsolawila, na kwima hambele he Imwana we Imunu.”
Chila litsuwa Yesu kakala kolangulitsa mne ing'anda ye Imulungu na nechilo koghenda kune chidunda cha Mitseituni na kukala ako.
Ne iwanu wose wakala wolamka nemitondotondo na kughenda mne ing'anda ye Imulungu kumtegheletsa.
Ichihungo cha pfighate pfilihela hamila, ichikemighwe Ichihungo che Ipasaka chikala chahabehi.
Na ipfilongotsi we inambiko na iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso wang'ali wobama inzila ya kumkoma Yesu, lekeni wang'ali wowapfuka iwanu.
Kuya Setani kamwingila Yuda yakemighwe Isikarioti, yumwe wa wala iwanang'ina kumi na weli.
Naye kaghenda kwa ipfilongotsi we inambiko ne iwakulu wa iwanu iwokalitsa ing'anda ye Imulungu, kalonga nawo pfatsodaha kumhunduka Yesu.
Nawo wadeng'elela na watoghola kumwing'a sendi.
Yuda katoghola na kandusa kubama uleghelo wa ukumhunduka Yesu ichipindi kuduhu kingili lye iwanu.
Litsuwa tsalipfika lye Ichihungo cha Pfighate ipfilihela hamila. Pfipfila likala litsuwa lya kukomighwa kwe iwang'olo we Ichihungo che Ipasaka.
Apfo Yesu kawatuma Petiri na Yohane, kawalongela, “Mghende mkatutengele ichijo ili tuje Ipasaka.”
Nawo wamghutsa, “Kobama tukakutengele kwani?”
Kawedika, “Baho hamkwingila mne ghumji, mtsetingana ne immale yaghalile libigha lya ghamatsi. Mmuwinze mbaka mne ing'anda yatsakwingila.
Na mtsomlongela yane ing'anda, ‘Imlangulitsi koghutsa, chilikwani chiheleto che iwahenza, ndiye Ipasaka hamwe ne iwanang'ina wangu?’
Naye katsowalangusa chiheleto chikulu cha uchanya, ichikwighwe ghoya. Namwe mtenge ichijo amo.”
Waghenda wachipfika chila ichinu ka Yesu pfawalongele, nawo watenga ichijo cha Ipasaka.
Isaa haipfikile, Yesu kawasola iwatumighwa wake kakala nawo mchijo.
Kawalongela, “Nosulukila kuja ichijo chino che Ipasaka na mwemwe ng'ana nidununzike!
Nowalongela ghendo, sitsakuja keli bae mbaka Pasaka haitsolawila mne Undewa we Imulungu.”
Yesu kasola ichikombe che dipfai, kalonga, “Mighede ghwe Imulungu.” Kuya kawalongela, “Mchisole mwose mchisole.
Nowalongela kulawa sambi sitsoinwa bae idipfai ino mbaka Undewa we Imulungu utse.”
Kuya kasola chighate, kalonga, “Mighede Imulungu.” Kachibena, kaweng'a, kalonga, “Aluno lukuli lwangu lwamwing'ighwe mwemwe. Mtende pfino kwa kung'umbuka nene.”
Pfipfila, hawamalitse kuja ichijo cha nemihe, kaweng'a ichikombe kalonga, “Achi ichikombe cha lilaghano lya sambi lye Imulungu ilili mne idamu yangu, iimwitikilani mwemwe.
Lekeni ghumoko ghwa ayula yatsonihunduka ghwa hamwe na nene mmetsa!
Imwana we Imunu katsakufa ka pfailamlighwe, lekeni katsoghaya ng'ani imunu yula iyomhunduka!”
Wandusa kwighutsa iwenyegho, yuhi mna wawo yatsotenda ichinu acho.
Pfipfila wandusa kwihisanya yuhi mna wawo yatsakuwa mkulu kubita wose.
Yesu kawalongela, “Iwandewa wa iwanu iwali si Wayahudi bae wowatawala iwanu kwe ingupfu, na wala wane ukulu mna wawo wokemighwa ‘Sale tse iwanu.’
Lekeni kuna mwemwe si pfipfo bae. Yali mkulu na yawe ka mdodo kubita wose, na chilongotsi yawe ka imunu iyotumikila.
Kwaapfila yuhi yali mkulu? Yula iyokala mmetsa, au yula iyakwika ichijo? Ambe yula iyokala mmetsa? Lekeni nene namghati mwenu ka imunu iyosang'ana.”
“Namwe mkala na nene mne ukughetsighwa kwangu.
Na nene nomwing'ani undewa, ka apfila aba wangu pfangahile nene.
Mdahe ukuja ne ukunwa mmetsa mwangu mne undewa wangu, na kukala mne ipfighoda pfa undewa na kughahigha ghamakabila kumi na meli gha Isiraeli.”
Yesu kalonga, “Simoni, Simoni, ukale meso! Setani tsakabama kuwabeta mwemwe ka uhunga.
Lekeni nikulombela ghweghwe Simoni, ukutoghola kwako kuleke kuhunguka, naghwe hautsombuyila keli uwapfile iwandughu tsako.”
Petiri kamlongela, “Imtwatsa, nene nitoghola kughenda na ghweghwe mchifungo na hata ukukomighwa.”
Yesu kamlongela, “Nokulongela Petiri, leloli jogholo ng'ana yeke ghweghwe kutsonibela mala ndatu, ka ng'unimanyile bae!”
Kuya Yesu kawaghutsa, “Pfii hala haniwatumile aku mwahela ghumfuko au mkoba au pfilatu, tsamuhungukighwa na chinu?” Walonga, “Bae! Ng'atuhungukighwe na chinu bae.”
Kawalongela, “Lekeni sambi yane ghumfuko aghusole, na yane mkoba pfipfila aghusole. Naye yalihela lipanga autse lighwanda lyake ne aghule limwe.
Kwaapfila Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka aghala igholonga. ‘Naye katsopetighwa ne iwanu wehile’ ghotimila. Nowalongela, hagho ghose ighandikighwe kwaajili ya nene ghobamighwa ghatimile.”
Iwanang'ina walonga, “Mtwatsa, lola, hano hana mimaghe mili.” Kawalongela, “Ona.”
Yesu kaghenda kune Chidunda cha Mitseituni ka pfatsowele, na wanang'ina wake wamuwinza.
Hawapfikile ako, kawalongela, “Mlombe mleke kwingila mne ukughetsighwa.”
Kuya kawaleka, kaghenda utali wa imunu kudaha ukwasa libwe. Katowa ghamaghoti, kalomba,
“Ghwe Aba, ung'abama uchilapfe ichikombe chino kuna nene. Lekeni si ka pfanibama nene bae, lekeni ka pfubama ghweghwe.”
Baho malaika kamlawila, kamwing'a ingupfu.
Naye kwaapfila pfakalile mne usungu, tsakalomba ng'ani. Lijasho lyake tsalikala ka ghamadondwe gha idamu gholaghala hasi.
Hamalitse kulomba, kawaghendela iwanang'ina wake. Kawapfika wawasa, kwaapfila tsawana usungu.
Kawalongela, “Pfii mbona muwasa? Mlamke mlombe, mleke kwingila mne ukughetsighwa.”
Yesu hang'ali yolonga, kingili lye iwanu litsa aku lyongotsighwa na Yuda, yakalile yumwe mna iwanang'ina wake kumi na weli. Kamghendela Yesu, kamnonela.
Lekeni Yesu kamghutsa, “Yuda, kwomhunduka Imwana we Imunu kwa kumnonela?”
Na wala iwakalile habehi naye hawonile ighatsolawila, walonga, “Mtwatsa, tuwateme na ghamapanga?”
Na yumwe mna wawo kamtowa imtumwa we Mtambika mkulu, kamsepula ghutwi lyake lya kujilo.
Lekeni Yesu kalonga, “Mleke kutenda keli!” Kamkinda ghutwi lyake, kamhonetsa.
Kuya Yesu kawalongela ipfilongotsi we inambiko, iwakulu we iwanu, iwokalitsa ing'anda ye Imulungu, ne iwabala iwamtsile yeye, “Pfii mtsa na ghamapanga ne ipfilungu ka nene na mbapfi?
Ghamatsuwa ghose tsanikala na mwemwe mne ing'anda ye Imulungu ng'amnighoghile bae. Lekeni aino iyo isaa yenu, na utawala wa chisi.”
Kuya wamghogha Yesu, waghenda naye mne ing'anda ye Imtambika mkulu. Petiri kamuwinza kwa kutali.
Na hawabwinile ghumoto haghati he chibwalu cha libaratsa, wakala hamwe. Petiri naye kakala nawo.
Na imtumwa yumwe ipinga kamwona Petiri kakala mne ghumwanga. Kamlola ghoya, kalonga, “Imunu yuno naye tsakakala na Yesu!”
Lekeni Petiri kabela, kalonga, “Ghwe ipinga ghwe, nene simmanyile bae.”
Hambele chidogho, imunu yungi kamwona Petiri, naye kalonga, “Ghweghwe naghwe kwa yumwe wawo.” Lekeni Petiri kalonga, “Aka, si nene bae!”
Kuya ibita isaa imwe, imunu yungi kalonga, “Ayu tsakakala naye ghendo, kwaapfila naye Mgalilaya!”
Petiri kalonga, “Ghwe imunu ghwe, chulonga sichimanyile bae!” Baho hang'ali yolonga, jogholo keka.
Imtwatsa kahunduka, kamlola Petiri. Naye Petiri kakumbuka imbuli iyamlongele Imtwatsa, “Leloli jogholo ng'ana yeke ghweghwe kutsonibela mala ndatu, ka ng'unimanyile bae!”
Petiri kalawa kunze, kalila kwa usungu.
Iwanu iwang'ali womkalitsa Yesu wandusa kumbetsa na kumtowa.
Wamtowa aku wamghubika tsinenge, wamghutsa, “Utange! Yuhi yakutowile?”
Kuya walonga mbuli nyingi tsa ukumligha.
Nemitondo haipfikile, iwabala, ipfilongotsi we inambiko na iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso tsawetingana hamwe, wamghala Yesu kune libalatsa lyawo.
Walonga, “Tulongele ka ghweghwe kwa Kiristu.” Yesu kawalongela, “Ning'awalongela, mwemwe ng'amtsotoghola bae,
na ning'awaghutsa, ng'amtsakwidika.
Lekeni kulawa sambi na kughendelela, Imwana we Imunu katsokala ubali wa kujilo we Imulungu yane Ingupfu.”
Kuya wose wamghutsa, “Apfi ghweghwe kwa Imwana we Imulungu?” Naye kawedika, “Mwemwe mwolonga nene iyo yuyo.”
Walonga, “Lelo twobama ukalangama ungi? Twetwe tuwenyegho tuhulika chalongile!”
Kuya wose wenuka wamghala Yesu kwa Pilato.
Wandusa kumlapfila maghomba, walonga, “Tumwona imunu yuno kowaghisa iwanu wetu. Kawaghoma kuliha kodi kwa mndewa wa Roma, kuya kolonga yeye iyo Kiristu, imndewa.”
Pilato kamghutsa, “Ghweghwe kwa mndewa wa Wayahudi?” Yesu kamwidika, “Ona, ka ghweghwe pfulonga.”
Kuya Pilato kawalongela Wakulu we Inambiko na mtingano we iwanu, “Sonile bae totso lye imunu yuno.”
Lekeni wawo wakomangitsa ghendo, “Kwa ghamalangulitso ghake kowasongetsa iwanu iwali Yudeya yose wehisanye na undewa wa Roma. Kandusila Galilaya mbaka akuno.”
Pilato hahulike agho, kaghutsa ka Yesu imunu wa Galilaya.
Hamanyile ka Yesu kolawila isi iyoitawala Herodi, kamghala kwa Herodi, iyakalile Yerusalemu ghamatsuwa agho.
Herodi hamwonile Yesu, kadeng'elela ng'ani kwaapfila kwa ghamatsuwa mengi tsaang'ali yobama amwone. Kwaapfila tsakahulika mbuli tsake, na ang'ali yomlolela Yesu yatende pfinu pfa kukangawatsa.
Apfo Herodi kamghutsa mbuli nyingi, lekeni Yesu ng'amwidike bae.
Wakulu we inambiko na Walangulitsi wa Ghamalaghitso tsawema hala, wamlapfila Yesu maghomba kwe ingupfu.
Herodi ne asikali wake wamtendela Yesu pfihile na wambetsa. Kuya wampfatsa lighwanda linoghile wamuyitsa kwa Pilato.
Kulawa baho Herodi tsakawa sale wa Pilato. Kwaapfila ghumwande tsawang'ali wehila.
Pilato kawakema hamwe Iwakulu we Inambiko, iwabala, ne iwanu,
kuya kawalongela, “Mumghala imunu yuno kuna nene ka imunu iyowaghitsa iwanu wehisanye na undewa wa Roma. Nene nilamla mbuli tsake akuno mwemwe mwolola, lekeni sonile bae chochose chihile mne maghomba ghamlongile kuna yeye.
Naye Herodi pfipfila katuyitsila twetwe munu yuno, kwaapfila ng'onile bae totso lyake. Apfo, imunu ayu ng'atendile chochose bae ichimtenda akomighwe.
Apfo nitsomtowa kuya nitsomlekelela.”
Kwaapfila Herodi tsakabamighwa amlekelele mwohighwa yumwe mne chihungo.
Iwanu wose wakemelela lumwe, “Umkome imunu ayu! Utulekelele Baraba!”
Baraba tsakakala imunu yekighwe mchifungo kwa kutenda hengele na ukukoma mne ghumji.
Pilato tsakabama kumlekelela Yesu, apfo kalonga nawo keli.
Lekeni wakemelela, “Muwambe mna msalaba! Muwambe mna msalaba!”
Kawalongela lwakadatu, “Ebali? Atendile choni chihile? Sonile bae totso lyolyose lihile ilimtenda yakomighwe. Apfo nitsompfapula, kuya nomlekelela.”
Lekeni wakemelela ng'ani, wabama Yesu yawambighwe mna msalaba. Na kwa kukemelela kwawo wamtenda Pilato atoghole.
Apfo Pilato kalamla chawabamile chitendeke.
Kamlekelela ayula yawambamile, ayula yekighwe mchifungo kwa hengele na ukukoma, kamlapfa Yesu yakomighwe ka pfawabamile.
Hawang'ali womghala, watingana ne imunu yumwe yakemighwe Simoni, imunu wa Kirene, iyang'ali iyolawa kumghunda. Wamghogha wamtwika msalaba yaughale kuchughu kwa Yesu.
Iwanu wengi wamuwinza, hamwe ne iwapinga iwang'ali womlilila na ukunyanyana.
Lekeni Yesu kawahundukila kawalongela, “Iwapinga wa Yerusalemu, mleke kundilila nene, ila mwililile iwenyegho na iwanenu.
Kwaapfila ghamatsuwa ghakutsa hawatsolonga, ‘Wabweda iwapinga iwalihela iwana, ing'aweleke iwana na yang'awakong'ese bae.’
Kuya watsopfilongela pfidunda, ‘Tughwileni!’ na pfidunda, ‘Tughubikeni!’
Kwaapfila ka iwanu wotenda pfinu pfino kwa mbiki mbisi, itsokuwatse kwa mbiki iusakale?”
Iwanu wangi iwabapfi pfipfila waghalighwa wakomighwe hamwe na Yesu.
Hawapfikile hanu hakemighwe “Bombwe lya Litwi,” baho wamuwamba Yesu na awala iwanu wehile mne misalaba, yumwe ubali wake wa kujilo na yungi ubali wake wa kumoso.
Yesu kalonga, “Aba, wonele libatsi kwaapfila ng'awamanyile bae chawotenda.” Nawo wegholela ghamaghwanda ghake kwa kutowa simbi.
Iwanu tsawema baho wolola, iwakulu wa Wayahudi hawang'ali wombetsa. Walonga, “Tsakawakombola iwanu wangi, leka yekombole imwenyegho, ka yeye Kiristu, Imkombotsi iyasaghulighwe ne Imulungu!”
Asikali pfipfila wambetsa. Wamghendela wamwing'a isiki,
wamlongela, “Ka ghweghwe kwa imndewa wa Wayahudi, wikombole umwenyegho!”
Mchanya mwa msalaba wake tsakukala ne ichitango chino. “Ayuno iyo Imndewa wa Wayahudi.”
Mbapfi yumwe mna awala iwabapfi iwawambighwe kamligha Yesu, kalonga, “Pfii ghweghwe si Kiristu bae? Wikombole imwenyegho kuya utukombole na twetwe!”
Lekeni ayula mbapfi yungi kamkembela miyaghe kalonga, “Ghweghwe! Ng'umpfuka Imulungu bae, naghwe kuhighighwa ka yeye?
Nene na ghweghwe tuhighighwa kwa haki, apfo twobokela maliho gha aghala ghatutendile. Lekeni imunu ayu ng'atendile bae chochose chihile.”
Kuya kalonga, “Ghwe Yesu ghwe, hautsakutsa mne undewa wako, uleke kunisemwa.”
Yesu kamlongela, “Nokulongela ghendo, leloli kutsokala na nene kulanga.”
Tsaikala saa sita, kung'ali ne ichisi muisi mwose mbaka saa tisa
Kuya lipatsiya lye ing'anda ye Imulungu lidegheka pfihindi pfili.
Baho Yesu kakemelela, kalonga, “Aba, mne ghamoko ghako nakwika muhe wangu!” Hayalongile apfo, kafa.
Yula imkulu we asikali ghana limwe wa chilumi honile ighalawile, kamtunya Imulungu, kalonga, “Kweli imunu ayu tsakanogha!”
Iwanu wose iwetingane kulola ipfinu apfo, hawonile ighalawile, waghenda mmakaye mwawo, wetowatowa mmambagha mwawo kwa usungu.
Lekeni awala wose iwammanyile wema kwa kutali, wolola ipfinu apfo. Mghati mwawo tsawakala iwapinga iwamuwinzile Yesu kulawa Galilaya.
Tsakukala ne imunu yumwe, taghwa lyake Yosefu yolawila Arimataya mne ghumji ghwa Yudeya. Imunu yuno tsakanogha, na mtenda ghanoghile naye yang'ali yobetetsa Undewa we Imulungu. Hata ka tsakakala yumwe mne iwakulu we libalatsa lya Wayahudi, ng'atoghole bae chawatendile weyaghe.
<range>
Imunu ayo kaghenda kwa Pilato, kalomba lukuli lwa Yesu.
Kaluhulumsa, kalupfatsa sanda, kalwika mne likabuli ilisongolighwe mbambalawe, nalyo ng'ana litsikighwe imunu bae.
Tsaikala Ijumaa, litsuwa lya ukwiyandaa, na litsuwa lya Sabato tsalyahabehi kwandusa.
Na awala iwapinga iwatsile na Yesu kulawa Galilaya wamuwinza Yosefu na walyona likabuli na lukuli lwa Yesu halwikighwe.
Kuya woya akaye watanda ghamafuta ighonung'ila ghoya. Mne litsuwa lya Sabato wabwihila ka pfailaghitsighwe.
12Litsuwa lya Jumapili lupfilipfili, iwapinga wasola ghamanukato ighawatandile na waghenda kune likabuli.
Walifika libwe lya kughubikila likabuli libingilisighwa hambalimbali mwe likabuli.
Wengila mne likabuli, lekeni ng'awonile bae lukuli lwe Imtwatsa Yesu.
Hawang'ali wokangawala kwa chinu acho, bahala iwanu weli iwapfalile ghamaghwanda ghang'alile ng'ani wema habehi nawo.
Wapinga wala wapfuka ng'ani na kwinamila hasi. Baho iwanu wala wawalongela, “Ule mumbama imunu mghima mne iwanu iwafile?
Yesu ng'alibaha bae, katsilihuka! Mkumbuke chayawalongele hayakalile mne isi ya Galilaya.
‘Imwana we Imunu kobamighwa aghoghighwe ne iwanu wane nzambi, nawo watsomuwamba mna msalaba, na litsuwa lya kadatu katsotsilihuka.’ ”
Kuya iwapinga wala wakumbuka imbuli haila yawalongele.
Hawoyile kulawa mne likabuli, wawalongela mbuli atso iwanang'ina wala kumi na yumwe wa Yesu ne iwanu wangi.
Iwapinga iwalongile mbuli atso kwe iwatumighwa wa Yesu tsawakala Mariya Magidalena, Yoana, na Mariya mai wake Jakobu, ne iwapinga wangi welongotse nawo.
Lekeni iwatumighwa wa Yesu wayona imbuli ilongighwe ne iwapinga wala yahela mana, apfo ng'awatoghole bae.
Lekeni Petiri kalawa na kutsuma mbaka mne likabuli. Hayafikile, kenama na kusungulila mghati, baho kayona isanda iliyeka. Kuya koya ukaye aku kakangawala kwa aghala ighalawile.
Mne litsuwa lilila, iwanu weli iwamwinzile Yesu wakala woghenda mne ichitobogha ichikemighwe Emau, utali wa maili saba kulawa Yerusalemu.
Wakala welongetsa wao kwa wao kwa aghala ghose ighalawile.
Baho hawakalile welongetsa na kwighutsa, Yesu imwenyegho kalawila na kelongotsa nawo.
Wamwona, lekeni ng'awammanyile bae.
Kawaghutsa, “Mwoghenda mwelongetsa choni?” Nawo wema na wanyamala, pfihanga pfawo pfonesa usungu.
Imunu yumwe mne iwanu awo, yakemighwe Kileopa, kamwidika, “Pfii, ghweghwe kwa mhenza uliyeka mne ghumji ghwa Yerusalemu, ng'una umanye bae ipfinu pfilawile ako mne ghamatsuwa agha?”
Kawaghutsa, “Ipfinu pfachi?” Nawo wedika, “Ipfinu ipfimlawile Yesu wa Natsareti. Imunu ayo kakala nabii iyodaha kutenda na kulangulitsa hambele he Imulungu ne iwanu wose.
Iwakulu we inambiko ne iwakulu wetu tsawamghala kwe iwakulu wa Chirumi yahighighwe ukufa, nawo wamuwamba mna msalaba;
tsatulolela yeye iyo iyatsowakombola Waisiraeli. Lekeni leloli litsuwa lya kadatu kulawa ipfilawile ipfinu apfo.
Pfipfila, iwapinga wangi kulawa mne kingili lyetu tsawatutenda tukangawale. Lupfilipfili tsawaghenda mne likabuli,
lekeni ng'awalufikile bae lukuli lwake. Woya na kutulongela walawilighwa ne wamalaika iwawalongele Yesu kakala mghima.
Kuya iwanu wamwenga iwalongotsagha na twetwe tsawaghenda mne likabuli, nawo wapfika ka iwapinga pfawalongile, ng'awamwonile bae.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Mbona, mwawabotsi pfino! Na imimoyo yenu mikomu kutoghola ghose ighalongighwe ne manabii!
Pfii, ng'aibamighwe bae Kiristu kudununzika apfi, na hambele kwingila mne utunitso wake?”
Kuya kawalongela ghoya ipfinu pfose ipfimlangusa yeye imwenyegho mne Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka, kwandusila mne ipfitabu ipfiandikighwe na Musa na kughendelela mne ipfitabu pfe manabii wose.
Baho hawatsifikile tsikaye tsiwang'alii wotsighendela, Yesu katenda ka kolumbilila.
Lekeni wamlomba ghendo, “Ukale na twetwe, kwaapfila litsuwa liswa, na chilo chakwingila.” Apfo kaghenda, kakala nawo.
Hayakalile hasi na kuja ichijo hamwe nawo, kasola chighate, kalonga mighede kwe Imulungu, kachibena, kaweng'a.
Bahala, tsinenge tsawo tsipfumbuka nawo wammanya, naye kagha mnenge mwawo.
Tsaweghutsa, “Apfi imimoyo yetu ng'aili yakwaka bae hayakalile kotulongela mnzila na kutulongela ghoya Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka?”
Bahala woka na kuya Yerusalemu. Wawafika iwanang'ina kumi na yumwe wa Yesu, ne iwanu wangi iwakalile, nawo wetingana hamwe
wolonga, “Imtwatsa katsilihuka ghendo! Kamlawila Simoni!”
Kuya iwanu wala weli wawalongela achila ichiwalawile mnzila, na pfawamtangile Yesu hayachimeghile chighate.
Hawang'ali wowalongela apfo, Yesu imwenyegho kema hamwe nawo, kawalongela, “Mkale tseghamba!”
Weduka na kupfuka, wapfikitsa waghwona ghumtsimu!
Lekeni kawalongela, “Mbona mwoghaya? Ebali mwoghanzika mne imimoyo yenu?
Mlole ghamoko na ghamaghulu ghangu na mmanye nene na-mwenyegho! Mnikinde mwone; kwaapfila ghumtsimu ghwahela lukuli ne imipate ka pfimmbona.”
Hayakalile kolonga apfo, kawalangusa ghamoko na ghamaghulu ghake.
Hawang'ali ng'awodaha bae kutoghola kwa kudeng'elela na kukangawala ng'ani, Yesu kawaghutsa, “Mna ichijo chochose hano?”
Wamwing'a chihindi cha isomba yokighwe.
Kachisola, kachija wose womlolesa.
Kuya kawalongela, “Aghano ghagho malonga ghangu ghaniwalongele, ahala hanikalile hamwe na namwe. Tsaibamighwa ghatendeke aghala ghose ghanyandikighwe nene mne Ghamalaghitso gha Musa na mne ipfitabu pfa manabii na Tsaburi.”
Kuya katsimwemwesela tsimbutsi tsawo wadahe kughamanya Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka.
Kawalongela, “Yandikighwa apfi, Kiristu katsodununzika na litsuwa lya kadatu katsotsilihuka.
Iwanu wose watsopetelighwa kwa taghwa lyake watsileke nzambi tsawo, naye Imulungu katsowaleghusila nzambi tsawo, kwandusila Yerusalemu.
Namwe mwa-wakalangama we ipfinu pfino.
Na nene imwenyegho nitsowaghalila ayula Aba wangu yalongile katsomtuma. Lekeni mwemwe mbete mne bululu mbaka mtsokwing'ighwa ila ingupfu kulawa uchanya.”
Kuya kawalongotsa kunze mwe ghumji ghwa Yerusalemu mbaka Betaniya, naye kenula uchanya ghamoko ghake, kawabaliki.
Hayang'ali yowabaliki, kawaleka, kasolighwa kughenda kulanga.
Nawo wamtowela ghamaghoti, kuya woya Yerusalemu kuno wodeng'elela
Waghendelela kukala hane Ing'anda ye Imulungu na kumtunya Imulungu.
Aho mwanduso ng'ana pfinu pfose pfilumbighwe yumwe yakemighwe Imbuli tsakabaho. Imbuli ayo tsakakala ne Imulungu, naye tsakakala Imulungu.
Yeye tsakakala ne Imulungu kulawa mwanduso.
Kubitila yeye pfinu pfose tsapfilumbighwa, kuduhu ichinu ichilumbighwe bila yeye.
Yeye tsakakala mwanduso wa ughima, na ughima awo tsaukala ghumwanga kwe iwanu.
Ghumwanga ghomwemwesela ichisi, na ichisi ng'achidaha bae kughutsima.
Tsakulawila imunu yumwe iyatumighwe ne Imulungu, taghwa lyake Yohane.
Yohane tsakatsa kuwalongela iwanu mbuli tse ghumwanga, ili iwanu wose wahulike, waghutoghole.
Yeye imwenyegho ng'awile bae ghumwanga, ila katsa kuwalongela iwanu imbuli ye ghumwanga.
Aghuno ghukala ghumwanga ghwa kweli, ghumwanga ighung'ali ghukutsa muisi kumwemwesela iwanu wose.
Imbuli tsakakala muisi, na hata ka Imulungu tsakalumba isi kubitila yeye, iwanu ng'awamtangile bae.
Tsakatsa ukaye yake, lekeni iwanu wake ng'awambokele bae.
Bali iwanu wose iwambokele, awala iwamtoghole, kawatenda wadahe kuwa iwana we Imulungu.
Iwana ing'awelekighwe bae kwa uwetso we iwanu, wala kwe ngupfu tsa lukuli au unoghelo we iwanu, ila kwa uwetso we Imulungu.
Na Imbuli ayo kawa imunu, naye kakala hamwe na twetwe. Na twetwe tuwona utunitso wake, utunitso we Imwana nyalimwe, iyatsile kulawa kwa Aba, kamema uluso na ukweli.
Yohane tsakalonga mbuli tsake. Tsakakemelela, “Ayuno iyo iyaniwalongele, ‘Ayo iyakutsa kuchughu kwangu mkulu kubita nene kwaapfila tsakabaha ng'ana nene nyelekighwe.’ ”
Kwa ukutimila kwa uluso wake twetwe twose tubokela ng'ani.
Imulungu tsakatwing'a Ghamalaghitso kubitila Musa, lekeni uluso na ukweli pfakutsa kubitila Yesu Kiristu.
Kuduhu imunu wowose iyamwonile Imulungu. Ila Imwana yaliyeka, yeghalile ne Imulungu iyelungile na Aba, iyo iyatulongele mbuli tse Imulungu.
Auno iwo ukalangama wa Yohane, iwakulu wa Wayahudi wa Yerusalemu hawawatumile iwatambika wakulu na Walawi waghende kwa Yohane, kumghutsa yeye tsakakala nani.
Yohane tsakatoghola na ng'alemile bae kuwedika mwatsimwatsi, tsakalonga, “Nene sili Kiristu bae, iyokombola iwanu.”
Wamghutsa, “Lelo ghweghwe uli nani? Pfii ghweghwe kwa Eliya?” Yohane kawedika, “Mbe, si nene bae.” Wamghutsa keli, “Lelo ghweghwe kwa ayula Nabii iyalongighwe katsakutsa?” Kawedika, “Bae.”
Kuya wamghutsa, “Lelo ghweghwe uli nani? Ghweghwe mwenyegho ulongatse? Tulongele lelo, na twetwe tukawalongele yawatutumile tukughutse.”
Yohane kawedika ka pfayalongile nabii Isaya, “Nene na ‘litsi lye imunu iyokema kunyika, Muigholose inzila ye Imtwatsa!’ ”
Kuya Mafarisayo wangi iwatumighwe
wamghutsa Yohane, “Ka ghweghwe si Kiristu, wala Eliya, wala ayula Nabii, ule kwobatitsa?”
Yohane kawedika, “Nene nobatitsa kwa ghamatsi, lekeni mghati mwenu kuna yumwe yang'amummanyile.
Ayo iyo yuyo iyakutsa kuchughu kwangu. Nene sibamighwa bae hata kudohola imitsabi ya imikwabatsa yake.”
Agha ghose ghalawila Betaniya, kumwambu kwa ghumto Yoridani, Yohane kwang'ali yobatitsa.
Litsuwa lya keli Yohane kamwona Yesu komtsila, kalonga, “Mlole! Imwana Ing'olo we Imulungu iyosola nzambi tse isi yose!
Ayuno iyo yuyo yanilongile mbuli tsake, haniwalongele pfino, ‘Imunu iyakutsa kuchughu kwangu mkulu kubita nene kwaapfila tsakabaha nene ng'ana nyelekighwe.’
Nene imwenyegho tsasimmanyile bae, ila nitsa kubatitsa kwa ghamatsi, ili iwanu wa Isiraeli wammanye.”
Kuya Yohane kalapfa ukalangama, “Nimwona Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka kohulumka kulawa kulanga ka injiwa, kakala mchanya mwake.
Nene tsasimmanyile bae, lekeni ayula iyanitumile kubatitsa kwa ghamatsi kanongela, ‘Imunu yutsomwona Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka komhulumkila na kukala mchanya mwake, ayo katsobatitsa kwa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka.’ ”
Kuya Yohane kalonga, “Nichona chinu acho, na nene nowalongela ghendo, ayuno iyo yuyo Imwana we Imulungu.”
Litsuwa iliwinzile, Yohane tsakabahala keli ne iwanang'ina wake weli.
Hayamwonile Yesu koluta, kalonga, “Mlole! Imwana Ng'olo we Imulungu!”
Iwanang'ina weli hawamuhulike Yohane kolonga apfi, wamuwinza Yesu.
Yesu kahunduka, kawona womuwinza, kawaghutsa, “Angu mbama choni?” Wedika, “Rabi, angu ukala kwani?” Rabi mana yake Mlangulitsi.
Kawedika, “Mtse mwone.” Waghenda, wona hanu hang'ali yokala Yesu. Tsaikala ka saa kumi nemihe. Nawo wakala na Yesu nemihe yose ila.
Andereya, ndughu yake Simoni Petiri, kakala yumwe mna iwanu iwahulike achila chayalongile Yohane, na iwamuwinzile Yesu.
Bahala, Andereya kambama ndughu yake Simoni, kamlongela, “Tumwona Mkombotsi iyasaghulighwe ne Imulungu!” Ayo iyo Kiristu.
Kuya Andereya kamsola Simoni kamghala kwa Yesu. Yesu kamlola kalonga, “Ghweghwe kwa Simoni imwana wa Yohane. Kutsokemighwa Kefa.” Kefa kwa Chigiriki Petiri, Petiri mana yake bambalawe.
L itsuwa liwinzile Yesu kalamla kughenda Galilaya. Kamwona Filipi, kamlongela, “Niwinze!”
Filipi, tsakakala imunu wa isi ya Betisaida, isi yawang'ali wokala Andereya na Petiri.
Filipi kamwona Nasanaeli, kamlongela, “Tumwona imunu yula iyandikighwe mbuli tsake na Musa mne chitabu cha Ghamalaghitso, pfipfila manabii wandika mbuli tsake. Ayo iyo Yesu wa Natsareti, imwana wa Yosefu.”
Nasanaeli kaghutsa, “Apfi yodahika ichinu chochose chinoghile chilawile Natsareti?” Filipi kamwidika, “Utse wone.”
Yesu hamwonile Nasanaeli komtsila, kalonga, “Ayuno ka Muisiraeli ghendo, mghati mwake mduhu ughutsu.”
Nasanaeli kamghutsa, “Angu unimanyiletse?” Yesu kamwidika, “Ng'ana Filipi yakukeme, tsanikwona haukalile hasi mwe mkuyu.”
Kuya Nasanaeli kalonga, “Mlangulitsi, ghweghwe kwa Imwana we Imulungu! Ghweghwe kwa Imndewa wa Isiraeli!”
Yesu kalonga, “Kwotoghola kwaapfila tsanikulongela nikwona kukala hasi he mkuyu? Kutsakwona makulu kubita agho.”
Kuya kaghendelela kuwalongela, “Nolongesa ghendo, mtsakona lilanga lyopfughuka ne wamalaika we Imulungu wogheluka na kuhulumka mchanya mwe Imwana we Imunu.”
Litsuwa lya kadatu hambele, tsakukala ne ichihungo cha ukukwela ako Kana mne isi ya Galilaya. Na mai wake Yesu tsakabaho.
Yesu ne iwanang'ina wake pfipfila tsawakemighwa mne ichihungo acho.
Idipfai haimalile, mai wake kamlongela, “Wahela idipfai.”
Yesu kamwidika, “Mai, uleke kunongela cho kutenda isaa yangu ng'ana ipfike bae.”
Mai wake Yesu kawalongela iwatumwa, “Mtende chochose chowalongelani.”
Baho tsahana mabigha sita gha ghamatsi, ighekighwe kwaajili ye ichihendo cha Wayahudi cha ukwihopfugha. Chila bigha lyodaha kumema pfiya ishilini mbaka selasini.
Yesu kawalongela iwatumwa, “Mghamemetse ghamabigha ghamatsi.” Nawo waghamemetsa.
Kuya kawalongela, “Mdeghe, mmwing'e imkulu we ichihungo.” Nawo watenda ka pfawalongele,
nae imkulu we ichihungo kalanza ghamatsi ighaghaluke idipfai. Ng'amanyile bae kwailawile, lekeni iwatumwa iwadeghile ghamatsi tsawamanya. Kuya imkulu ayo kamkema imunu iyokwela hambalimbali,
kamlongela, “Chila imunu tanu kolapfa idipfai inoghile. Kuya wahenza hawomalitsa kunwa ng'ani, kolapfa idipfai ihile. Lekeni ghweghwe kuika idipfai inoghile mbaka sambi!”
Yesu katenda chinu chino cha kukangawatsa cha mwanduso ako Kana, mne isi ya Galilaya. Ako kalangusa utunitso wake, ne iwanang'ina wake wamtoghola.
Hambele Yesu na mai wake, hamwe na ndughu tsake ne iwanang'ina wake wahulumka Kaperinaumu. Wakala ako matsuwa chidogho.
Ipasaka ya Wayahudi haikalile habehi, Yesu kagheluka Yerusalemu.
Mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu, Yesu kawapfika iwanu woutsa wang'ombe, iwang'olo ne iwanjiwa, ne iwanu wangi wakala hane tsimetsa wobena tsisendi.
Yesu kabota ichiboko che lutsabi, kawawinga iwanu wose mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu, hamwe ne iwang'olo ne wang'ombe. Pfipfila katsibidula tsimetsa tse iwobena tsisendi na kutsipwililisa sendi tsawo.
Kuya kawalongela iwanu iwang'ali woutsa iwanjiwa, “Pfilapfeni hano pfinu pfino! Ule ing'anda ye Aba wangu mwoitenda ghulilo?”
Iwanang'ina wake wakumbuka ichandikighwe, “Imulungu, unoghelo wangu kwe ing'anda yako wakwaka mghati mwangu ka ghumoto.”
Kuya iwakulu wa Wayahudi wamghutsa Yesu, “Apfi kwodaha kutenda chinu chachi cha kukangawatsa kutulangusa ka kuna uwetso wa ukutenda agha ghose?”
Yesu kawedika, “Muimwaghe Ing'anda ino ye Imulungu, nene nitsoitsenga keli kwa ghamatsuwa madatu!”
Wayahudi wamwidika, “Ing'anda ino ye Imulungu itsengighwa kwa miyaka alubaini na sita, naghwe utsoitsengatse kwa matsuwa madatu?”
Lekeni Ing'anda ye Imulungu iyang'ali yoilonga Yesu tsaikala ulukuli lwake.
Apfo, hayatsilihuke, iwanang'ina wake wakumbuka achila chayalongile. Kuya waghatoghola Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka na watoghola mbuli tsila tsayalongile Yesu.
Yesu hayang'ali Yerusalemu mne Ichihungo che Ipasaka, iwanu wangi wona pfinu pfa kukangawatsa pfayang'ali yotenda, wamtoghola.
Lekeni Yesu tsang'awatoghole bae, kwaapfila tsakawamanya iwanu wose.
Ng'abamile bae imunu wowose amlongele mbuli tse iwanu, kwaapfila Yesu tsakamanya ighali mghati mwe imimoyo yawo.
Tsakukala ne imkulu yumwe wa Mafarisayo, imunu we libalatsa lya Wayahudi iyakemighwe Nikodemu.
Chilo chimwe, kamghendela Yesu, kamlongela, “Mlangulitsi, twokumanya ghweghwe kwa mlangulitsi yulawile kwe Imulungu. Kwaapfila kuduhu imunu wowose iyodaha kutenda pfinu pfa kukangawatsa pfautenda ka Imulungu ng'ali hamwe naye bae.”
Yesu kamwidika, “Nokulongela ghendo, kuduhu imunu iyodaha kuwona undewa we Imulungu ka ng'elekighwe lwa keli.”
Nikodemu kamghutsa, “Apfi imunu imbala yodahatse kwelekighwa keli? Ng'aidahika ghendo imunu kwingila munda mwa mai wake na kwelekighwa keli!”
Yesu kamwidika, “Nokulongela ghendo, kuduhu imunu iyodaha kwingila mne undewa we Imulungu ka ng'elekighwe bae kwa ghamatsi na kwa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka.
Imunu kakwelekighwa kwa lukuli kulawa kwa aba wake na mai wake, ila kakwelekighwa kwa muhe kulawa kwa Ghumuhe.
Uleke kukangawala kwaapfila nokulongela wose mwobamighwa mwelekighwe keli.
Libeho lyoduma kokose kwalibama, kohulika litsi lyake. Lekeni ng'umanya bae kwalilawile kwani wala kwalighenda kwani. Apfi pfipfo pfaili kwa chila imunu yelekighwe na Ghumuhe.”
Nikodemu kamghutsa, “Angu ghano ghodahatse kulawila?”
Yesu kamwidika, “Ghweghwe kwa mlangulitsi mkulu wa Waisiraeli, angu naghwe ng'utsimanyile bae mbuli tsino?
Nokulongela ghendo, twolonga ipfinu pfatumanya na twowalongela ipfinu pfatwonile, lekeni mng'ali mwolema usenga wetu.
Ng'amtoghole bae haniwalongele mbuli tse ipfinu ipfili muisi, apfi mtsotogholatse ning'awalongela mbuli tse ipfinu ipfili kulanga?”
Kuduhu imunu iyaghendile kulanga ila Imwana we Imunu, iyatsile kulawa kulanga.
Ka Musa pfayachinule ichinyagho chila che inzoka kwa lubiki kunyika, pfipfila Imwana we Imunu kobamighwa yenulighwe,
ili chila imunu iyomtoghola awe ne ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose.
Kwaapfila Imulungu tsakainoghela isi yose mbaka kamlapfa Imwanaghe nyalimwe, ili chila imunu iyomtoghola aleke kwagha ila yawe na ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose.
Kwaapfila Imulungu ng'amtumile bae Imwanaghe muisi, yaihighe, ila yaikombole kubitila yeye.
Imunu wowose iyomtoghola ng'atsohighighwa bae, lekeni imunu wowose iyolema kumtoghola ayo ma kahighighwa, kwaapfila ng'amtoghole bae Imwana nyalimwe we Imulungu.
Apfi pfipfo pfamtsohighighwa, Ghumwanga ghutsa muisi, lekeni iwanu wanoghela ichisi kubita ghumwanga, kwaapfila ghawotenda gheha.
Iwanu wose iwotenda ghehile woghuhila ghumwanga, ng'awakutsa bae mne ghumwanga, kwaapfila wopfuka aghala ghehile ghawotenda ghatsakoneka.
Lekeni awala iwotenda ghanoghile wakutsa mne ghumwanga, ili aghala ghawotenda ghoneke mwatsi ka ghatendighwa kwa kumuhulikitsa Imulungu.
Hambele Yesu ne iwanang'ina wake waghenda mne isi ya Yudeya, ako kakala nawo, na tsakawabatitsa iwanu.
Pfipfila Yohane yang'ali yobatitsa Ainoni habehi ne Salemu, kwaapfila hanu aho tsahana ghamatsi mengi. Iwanu wang'ali womghendela, naye yang'ali yowabatitsa.
Ghamatsuwa agho Yohane tsakakala ng'ana yohighwe mchifungo.
Iwanang'ina wangi wa Yohane na Myahudi yumwe wang'ali weghutsaghutsa kwa mbuli ya ukuhopfugha ghamaghulu na ghamoko.
Apfo wamghendela Yohane, wamlongela, “Mlangulitsi, imunu yula iyakalile naghwe kumwambu kwe tsiwa Yoridani, ayula yutulongele mbuli tsake, sambi kobatitsa na iwanu wose womghendela.”
Yohane kawedika, “Kuduhu imunu iyodaha kubokela ichinu ka ng'eng'ighwe bae ne Imulungu iyali kulanga.
Mwemwe iwenyegho mwa iwakalangama haniwalongele, ‘Nene si Kiristu Mkombotsi bae, ila nene nitumighwa nimlongole.’
Iyali na pinga iyokwelighwa, ayo iyo immale iyomkwela. Sale wake immale iyokwela kombeta na komtegheletsa, kodeng'elela hayohulika litsi lyake. Sambi ndeng'elo yangu itimila.
Yeye kobamighwa awe mkulu, nene nobamighwa niwe mdodo.”
Ayula iyolawila kulanga ka mkulu kubita wose. Imunu wa iisi kolawa muisi, na kolonga mbuli tse isi, ila iyolawila kulanga ka mkulu kubita wose.
Yeye kolonga chayonile na chayahulike, lekeni kuduhu imunu iyotoghola mbuli tsalongile.
Lekeni imunu wowose iyotoghola usenga wake, katsolonga Imulungu kolongesa.
Iyatumighwe ne Imulungu kolonga mbuli tse Imulungu, kwaapfila Imulungu kommemesa Ghumuhe ghwake Mwenzeluka.
Aba komnoghela Imwanaghe na kagheka ghose mmoko mwake.
Imunu wowose iyomtoghola Imwana kakuwa ne ughima wa matsuwa ghose, lekeni imunu wowose iyomlema Imwana ng'atsakuwa ne ughima bae, ila katsokala mne maya ye Imulungu.
Mafarisayo tsawahulika ka Yesu yang'ali yowatenda iwanu wengi wawe iwanang'ina na kuwabatitsa kubita Yohane,
lekeni Yesu ng'abatitse bae iwanu, ila iwanang'ina wake iwo iwabatitse.
Yesu hayahulike apfi, kalawa Yudeya koya Galilaya,
mne ghumwanza ghwake tsakabamighwa kubitila Samariya.
Tsakapfika Samariya hanu hakemighwe Sikari, habehi na mghunda ghula Yakobu ghwamwing'ile Yosefu, imwanaghe.
Baho tsakukala na chisima cha Yakobu, kwaapfila Yesu tsakepfa kwa ghumwanza ghwake, apfo kakala hasi habehi ne chisima. Tsaikala nemisi.
Ipinga yumwe Msamariya tsakatsa kudegha ghamatsi, Yesu kamlongela, “Ungaye ghamatsi nuwe.”
Iwanang'ina wake tsawaghenda mkaye kughula ichijo.
Ipinga ayo kamwidika, “Ghweghwe kwa Myahudi, nene na Msamariya. Ule kwonomba ghamatsi?” Tsakalonga apfi kwaapfila Wayahudi na Wasamariya ng'awajagha hamwe bae.
Yesu kamwidika, “Ung'amanyile ichinu chayolapfa Imulungu na nani iyokulomba ghamatsi gho ukunwa, ung'amlombile, naye ang'akwing'ile ghamatsi ighoghala ughima.”
Ipinga ayo kalonga, “Imtwatsa, kwahela chinu cha kudeghela ghamatsi, ne chisima chighendesa. Lelo utsoghapata kwani ghamatsi ghe ughima?
Apfi ghweghwe kwa mbala kubita aba wetu Yakobu iyatwing'ile chisima chino, yeye mwenyegho ne iwanaghe ne iwanyama wake tsawanwa ghamatsi ghe chisima chino?”
Yesu kamwidika, “Imunu wowose iyakunwa ghamatsi ghano, katsakona ng'ilu keli,
lekeni imunu wowose iyakunwa ghamatsi ghanimwing'a nene, ng'atsakona ng'ilu keli. Ghamatsi ghanimwing'a nene ghatsakuwa mbwibwi iilapfa ghamatsi gha ughima mghati mwake na ghatsomwing'a ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose.”
Ipinga ayo kamlongela, “Mtwatsa ngaya ghamatsi agho ndeke kwona ng'ilu keli, kuya ndeke kutsa hano keli kudegha ghamatsi.”
Yesu kamlongela, “Ghenda ukamkeme mmale wako, utse naye.”
Ipinga ayo kamwidika, “Nahela mmale.” Yesu kamlongela, “Kolonga ghoya haulonga kwahela mmale.
Kwaapfila tsakukwelighwa ne iwamale watano, na mmale yauli naye sambi si mmale wako bae. Chaulongile kulongesa ghendo.”
Ipinga ayo kalonga, “Imtwatsa, nakwona ghweghwe kwa nabii.
Iwabala wetu tsawamtamanila Imulungu hane lughongo luno, lekeni mwemwe Wayahudi mwolonga twobamighwa tumtamanile Imulungu ako Yerusalemu.”
Yesu kamlongela, “Mai utoghole, ghamatsuwa ghakutsa iwanu ng'awatsomtamanila bae Aba hane lughongo luno wala ako Yerusalemu.
Mwemwe Wasamariya ng'amummanyile bae yamumtamanila, lekeni twetwe Wayahudi twommanya yatumtamanila, kwaapfila ukombotsi wolawa kwa Wayahudi.
Lekeni matsuwa ghakutsa na sambi ghabaha iwanu iwotamanila kweli watsomtamanila Aba kwa kulongotsighwa na Ghumuhe na kweli, kwaapfila womtamanila ka Aba pfayobama.
Imulungu ka Ghumuhe, apfo iwanu wake iwomtamanila wamtamanile kwa Ghumuhe na ukweli.”
Ipinga ayo kamlongela, “Nomanya Masiya iyokemighwa Kiristu kakutsa, na hatsakutsa katsotulongela ghoya chila chinu.”
Yesu kamwidika, “Nene yanilonga naghwe, iyo yuyo.”
Iwanang'ina wake Yesu tsawoya, wakangawala kumpfika Yesu kolonga ne ipinga ayo. Lekeni kuduhu imunu yamghutsile, “Apfi ubama choni?” au “Ule ulonga ne ipinga?”
Kuya ipinga ayo kachileka chiha chake cha ghamatsi, koya ukaye, kawalongela iwanu,
“Mtse mmwone imunu iyanongele ipfinu pfose pfanendile. Apfi ayu kodaha kuwa Kiristu?”
Apfo iwanu walawa mkaye mwao wamghendela Yesu.
Ichipindi chichila iwanang'ina wake wang'ali womlomba Yesu, “Mlangulitsi tanu diya!”
Lekeni Yesu kawedika, “Nene nina ichijo ing'amchimanyile bae.”
Kuya iwanang'ina wake wandusa kwighutsa, “Pfii hana munu iyamghalile chijo?”
Yesu kawalongela, “Ichijo changu chicho chino, kusang'ana aghala ghayobama iyanitumile na kuimalitsa ing'onde yangaile niisang'ane.
Mwemwe mwolonga, ‘Ing'ali miyetsi mine, kuya ghamatsuwa gha mapfuno ghopfika.’ Nowalongela, mwinule tsinenge mlole imighunda! Ghamatsawo ghakomala, ghobamighwa ghapfunighwe!
Imunu iyopfuna kobokela maliho na kolunda hamwe ghamatsawo kwaajili ya ughima wa matsuwa ghose, ili imunu iyohanda na imunu iyopfuna wadeng'elele hamwe.
Iwanu hawolonga, ‘Yumwe kohanda, yungi kopfuna’ wolongesa.
Nimtumani kupfuna mne imighunda yang'amlimile bae, iwanu wangi wasang'ana namwe mwobweda kwa isang'ano yawo.”
Wasamariya wengi wa kaye ila wamtoghola Yesu kwa achila chalongile ipinga ayo, “Kanongela ipfinu pfose pfanendile.”
Apfo Wasamariya wamghendela Yesu, wamlomba akale nawo, Yesu kakala nawo matsuwa meli.
Iwanu wengi tsawatoghola kwa mbuli tsa Yesu.
Wamlongela ipinga ayo, “Sambi tutoghola, si kwa achila chulongile bae, ila kwaapfila twetwe iwenyegho tumuhulika, twomanya imunu yuno kweli ka Mkombotsi we iisi yose.”
Haghamalile matsuwa meli Yesu kaghenda Galilaya.
Kwaapfila Yesu imwenyegho tsakalonga, “Nabii ng'otogholighwa bae mne isi yake.”
Yesu hapfikile Galilaya, iwanu wambokela kwaapfila nawo tsawaghenda mne Ichihungo cha Ipasaka ako Yerusalemu, na waghona ghose ghatendile Yesu mne ichihungo acho.
Kuya Yesu kengila keli mne ghumji ghwa Kana ako Galilaya, hanu haghaluse ghamatsi kuwa idipfai. Baho tsakukala ne chilongotsi yane imwana iyoghula ako Kaperinaumu.
Chilongotsi ayo hayahulike Yesu kapfika ako Galilaya kulawa Yudeya, kamghendela kamlomba aghende akamhonetse imwanaghe, iyang'ali habehi ukufa.
Yesu kamlongela, “Mwemwe ng'amtoghola mbaka mwone ipfitango na pfihulo.”
Chilongotsi ayo kamwidika, “Mtwatsa tuke ng'ana mwanangu yafe.”
Yesu kamwidika, “Ghweghwe ghenda, imwanagho katsohona.” Chilongotsi ayo katoghola chalongile Yesu, koka ukaye.
Hang'ali mnzila, ketingana ne iwatumwa wake, wamlongela imwanaghe kahona.
Kawaghutsa, “Imwana handuse kuhona saa ngapi?” wamwidika, “Ligholo saa saba nemisi.”
Kuya aba ayo tsakamanya ka isaa iila Yesu yamlongele, “Imwanagho katsohona.” Apfo yeye na kaye yake wamtoghola Yesu.
Apfino tsapfikala pfihulo pfa keli pfatendile Yesu halawile Yudeya kughenda Galilaya.
Hambele, Yesu kagheluka Yerusalemu kune ichihungo cha Wayahudi.
Ako Yerusalemu, habehi na libani likulu ilikemighwe Libani lye Iwang'olo tsahana tsimbu ilikemighwe Betisada kwa Chihebulaniya, tsimbu alyo tsa lya habehi na pfibwalu pfitano.
Iwanu wengi iwatamu tsawakala mne pfibwalu apfo, pfifita, pfimbete, ne iwanu iwaholole. Tsawang'ali wobeta ghamatsi ghatibuke,
kwaapfila malaika we Imtwatsa ang'ali yohulumkagha mne ghamatsi na kughatibula. Imtamu iyakwandusa kwingila mne ghamatsi ighatibulighwe, tsakahonetsighwa utamu wowose iyali nawo.
Imunu yumwe iyakalile hala, tsakakala mtamu kwa miyaka selasini na nane.
Yesu hamwonile mtamu ayo kawasa hala, tsakamanya ka yang'ali yoghula kwa matsuwa mengi, apfo kamghutsa mtamu ayo, “Pfii kwobama uhone?”
Mtamu yula kamwidika, “Mtwatsa, nahela imunu wa kunyingitsa mne litsimbu ghamatsi haghotibulighwa. Hanibama kwingila, imunu yungi konongolela.”
Kuya Yesu kamlongela, “Winuke! Sola chilagho chako uke.”
Bahala imunu yula kahona, kasola chilagho chake, koka. Ichinu chino tsachilawila mne Litsuwa lye Sabato,
apfo Iwakulu wa Wayahudi wamlongela imunu yahonile, “Leloli Litsuwa lya Sabato, ghamalaghitso ghoghoma kuchighala chilagho chako.”
Lekeni imunu ayo kawedika, “Imunu iyanihonetse kanongela, ‘Sola chilagho chako uke.’ ”
Wamghutsa, “Angu munu wachi iyakulongele usole chilagho chako uke?”
Lekeni ng'ammanyile bae imunu iyamuhonetse kwaapfila iwanu tsawengi na Yesu ma tsakoka.
Hambele Yesu kampfika imunu yula mne Ing'anda ya Ukulombela, kamlongela, “Tegheletsa, sambi kuhona. Uleke kutenda nzambi, ung'atenda nzambi, ichinu chihile chitsokulawila.”
Kuya imunu yula koka, kawalongela iwakulu wa Wayahudi ka yamuhonetse Yesu.
Kwaapfila Yesu yang'ali yotenda ipfinu pfino mne Litsuwa lya Sabato, Wayahudi wandusa kumhila.
Yesu kawalongela, “Aba wangu kosang'ana ghamatsuwa ghose, na nene pfipfila nobamighwa nisang'ane.”
Apfo Wayahudi wabama wamkome Yesu. Tsawabama wamkome Yesu si kwaapfila kalibetsa Litsuwa lya Sabato liliheka, ila tsakamkema Imulungu Aba wake, apfo ketenda keghala ne Imulungu.
Yesu kawedika, “Nowalongela ghendo, Imwana ng'odaha bae kutenda chinu chochose yaliyeka, Imwana kodaha kutenda aghala ghomwona Aba wake koghatenda, kwaapfila ghoghose ghotenda Aba, Imwana naye koghatenda.
Kwaapfila Aba komnoghela Imwana na komlangusa ghose ghayotenda. Kuya katsomlangusa ipfinu pfikulu pfa kusang'ana kubita pfino, namwe mtsokangawala.
Ka Aba pfayowatsilihula iwanu iwafile na kuweng'a ughima, pfipfila Imwana kolapfa ughima kwe iwanu iyowabama.
Aba ng'omuhigha bae imunu wowose, lekeni kamwing'a Imwanaghe uwetso wa kuhigha,
ili iwanu wose wamuhulikitse Imwana ka pfawomuhulikitsa Aba. Imunu wowose iyolema kumuhulikitsa Imwana komlema Aba iyamtumile.
“Nowalongela ghendo, imunu wowose iyohulika mbuli yangu na kumtoghola ayula iyanitumile kana ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose, ng'atsohighighwa kwaapfila kaloka lifwa kengila mne ughima.
Nowalongela ghendo, litsuwa lyakutsa na sambi ma lipfika iwanu iwafile hawatsohulika litsi lye Imwana we Imulungu, na awala iwahulike watsakuwa waghima.
Ka Aba imwenyegho pfayali mwanduso we ighima, pfipfila kamtenda Imwanaghe kuwa mwanduso we ughima.
Kamwing'a imwana uwetso wa kuhigha, kwaapfila ka Imwana we Imunu.
Mleke kukangawala mbuli ino, litsuwa lyakutsa iwanu iwafile hawatsohulika litsi lyake,
watsolawa mne tsikabuli tsawo, awala iwatendile ghanoghile watsotsilihulighwa wawe waghima, na iwatendile ghehile watsotsilihulighwa wahighighwe.
Nene sidaha bae kutenda ichinu imwenyegho, nohigha ka Imulungu pfonongela, nohigha kwa haki, kwaapfila sitenda bae chanibama, ila notenda achila chobama ayula iyanitumile.
“Ning'alonga mbuli tsangu imwenyegho, ukalangama wangu wa ughutsu.
Lekeni kuna yungi iyolonga mbuli tsangu, nomanya chila chinu chalongile kalongesa.
Mwemwe tsamuwatuma iwanu kwa Yohane, na mbuli tsangu tsalongile tsolongesa.
Sibama bae ukalangama we imunu, ila nolonga apfi ili mwemwe mkombolighwe.
Yohane tsakakala ka ichitasa, iching'ali chikwaka na chomwemwesa, namwe msaghula ghamatsuwa chidogho kudeng'elela ghumwanga ghwake.
Nina ukalangama mkulu kubita wa Yohane. Kwaapfila ing'onde iyangaile Aba niimalitsa, isang'ano yanisang'ana, yolangusa Aba kanituma.
Aba imwenyegho iyanitumile kalonga mbuli tsangu. Ng'amuhulike bae litsi lyake wala kuchona chihanga chake,
na mbuli yake ng'aikala bae mghati mwenu, kwaapfila ng'amumtoghole yula iyamtumile.
Mwosoma Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka, kwaapfila mwopfikitsa mne Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka mtsopata ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose. Ghamaandiko ghagho Mahenzeluka gholonga mbuli tsangu!
Lekeni mng'ali mwolema kunitsila muwe na ughima.
“Sibama bae iwanu wanitunye.
Lekeni nommanyani ka mwahela unoghelo we Imulungu mne imimoyo yenu.
Nitsa kwa taghwa lya Aba wangu, ng'amnitoghole bae, lekeni imunu yungi ang'atsa kwa taghwa lyake, mtsombokela.
Apfi mtsodahatse kunitoghola, ka mwemwe mwobama kubokela utunitso kulawa kuna mwemwe iwenyegho, lekeni mwolema kubokela utunitso iulawa kwe Imulungu yaliyeka?
Mleke kupfikitsa nitsowalongeletsa kwa Aba. Musa iyammwikile lolelo lyenu, ayo yuyo iyatsomuhighani.
Mng'amtoghole Musa, mng'anitoghole na nene, kwaapfila tsakandika mbuli tsangu.
Lekeni ka ng'amchitoghola achila chandikile, apfi mtsotogholatse chanilonga?”
Hambele Yesu kaloka kumwambu mwa tsimbu Galilaya au tsimbu Tiberiya.
Likingili lye iwanu limuwinza Yesu kwaapfila tsawona pfihulo pfayatendile pfa kuwahonetsa iwatamu.
Kuya Yesu ne iwanang'ina wake wagheluka mchidunda, wakala hasi.
Ichihungo che Ipasaka ya Wayahudi tsachikala chahabehi.
Yesu hayalolile mmbalimbali kona mtingano mkulu ghwe iwanu womtsila, kamghutsa Filipi, “Kwani twodaha kughula ichijo tuweng'e iwanu wano waje?”
Yesu kaghutsa pfino kumghetsa Filipi, kwaapfila tsakamanya katsotenda choni.
Filipi kamwidika, “Sendi miya mbili ng'atsidaha bae kumghulila chighate chila imunu!”
Imwanang'ina yungi wa Yesu, Andereya, ndughu yake Simoni Petiri, kamlongela Yesu,
“Hano hana imsongolo yumwe, yane ipfihindi pfitano pfe pfighate ne iwasomba weli. Lekeni watsoghutatse kwe ipfijo pfino chidogho?”
Yesu kawalongela iwanang'ina wake, “Muwalongele iwanu wakale hasi.” Hanu hala tsahana imitsani, iwanu wakala hasi, tsakukala ne iwamale elufu tano.
Kuya Yesu kasola ipfihande pfe pfighate, kalonga, “Mighede Imulungu,” kaweng'a iwanu iwakalile hasi. Katenda pfipfo kwa iwasomba ka iwanu pfawabamile.
Iwanu wose hawaghutile, Yesu kawalongela iwanang'ina wake, “Mdondole ipfihande ipfikalile. Chochose chileke ukwagha.”
Apfo iwanang'ina wadondola, wamemesa ipfiseghe kumi na pfili pfe ipfihande pfe pfighate ipfikalile.
Iwanu hawonile pfihulo ipfitendighwe na Yesu, wandusa kulonga, “Kweli ayuno ka nabii iyakutsa muisi.”
Yesu tsakamanya iwanu wambama ghendo wamtende yawe imndewa, apfo kagheluka keli mchidunda yaliyeka.
Litsua haliswele, iwanang'ina wake Yesu wahulumka mbaka mne tsimbu,
wadina mnumbwi waloka tsimbu waghenda Kaperinaumu. Tsakukala ne ichisi, na Yesu tsakakala ng'ana yawapfikile bae.
Libeho kulu ling'ali lyoduma na ghamatsi ghatibuka.
Iwanang'ina hawaghendile utali we maili ndatu au maili nne, tsawamwona Yesu koghenda mchanya mwe ghamatsi, kakutsa habehi na mnumbwi, iwanang'ina wapfuka.
Lekeni Yesu kawalongela, “Na nene, mleke kupfuka!”
Kuya wabama wamsole Yesu mne mnumbwi, bahala mnumbwi tsaghupfika hanu hawabamile kupfika.
Litsuwa lya keli kingili lye iwanu ilikalile kumwambu mwe tsimbu wamanya kukala na mnumbwi umwe uliyeka, Yesu ng'engile bae mne mnumbwi ne iwanang'ina wake, ila iwanang'ina tsawoka waliyeka.
Kuya iminumbwi mingi ilawile Tiberiya tsaipfika habehi ne hanu iwanu hawajile pfighate Imtwatsa hayamalitse kupfibaliki.
Iwanu hawamanyile Yesu ne iwanang'ina wake ng'awalibaho bae hanu hala, wengila mne iminumbwi waghenda Kaperinaumu kumbama.
Iwanu hawamwonile Yesu ubali ungi we tsimbu, wamghutsa, “Mlangulitsi, apfi hano upfikile tsuwachi?”
Yesu kawedika, “Nowalongelani ghendo, mwonibama kwaapfila mja pfighate mghuta, si kwaapfila mwona pfihulo pfangu.
Mleke kuchisulukila ichijo ichikola, mchisulukile ichijo ichikala ghamatsuwa ghose. Ichijo chino chicho Imwana we Imunu yatsomwing'ani, kwaapfila Imulungu, Aba kamsaghula na kamtoghola.”
Kuya wamghutsa Yesu, “Apfi tutende choni ili tughatende aghala ghobama Imulungu tughatende?”
Yesu kawedika, “Achino ichinu chayobama Imulungu mtende, mumtoghole ayula iyamtumile.”
Apfo wamghutsa, “Angu pfihulo pfachi pfausang'ana ili tupfone tukutoghole? Kutsotenda choni?
Iwabala wetu waja mana kunyika, ka pfayandikighwe mne Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka, ‘Kaweng'a chighate ichihulumke kulanga waje.’ ”
Yesu kawalongela, “Nowalongela ghendo, si Musa bae iyaweng'ile chighate ichihulumke kulanga, ila Aba wangu iyo iyaweng'ile chighate che ukweli kulawa kulanga.
Kwaapfila chighate chayotwing'a Imulungu iyo ayula iyakutsa kulawa kulanga na iyolapfa ughima kwe iwanu iwali muisi.”
Wamlongela, “Imtwatsa, utwing'e chighate chino ghamatsuwa ghose.”
Kuya Yesu kawalongela, “Nene na ichijo ichighala ughima, awala iwakutsa kuna nene ng'awatsokwona nzala bae, na awala iwonitoghola ng'awatsakwona ng'ilu bae.
Ka pfaniwalongele, mmbona lekeni mng'ali ng'amnitoghola bae.
Wose iyongaya Aba watsakutsa kuna nene, imunu wowose iyonitsila, simuwinga bae.
Kwaapfila nihulumka kulawa kulanga si kutenda pfanibama bae, ila kutenda pfayobama ayula iyanitumile.
Ayula iyanitumile kobama apfi, ndeke kumwaghitsa imunu wowose mna iwanu wala iyangaile, ila niwatsilihule wose mna litsuwa lya usighilo.
Kwaapfila Aba wangu kobama chila imunu iyomlola Imwana na kumtoghola yawe na ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose. Nitsomtsilihula litsuwa lya usighilo.”
Wayahudi wandusa kumnung'unikila Yesu kwaapfila tsakalonga, “Nene na chighate ichihulumke kulawa kulanga.”
Walonga, “Apfi ayu si Yesu bae imwana wa Yosefu, aba wake ne mai wake twowamanya. Lelo kodahatse kulonga, ‘Nihulumka kulawa kulanga?’ ”
Yesu kawalongela, “Mleke kunung'unika.
Kuduhu imunu iyodaha kunitsila ka Aba iyanitumile ng'amkweghile bae, na nene nitsomtsilihula litsuwa lya usighilo.
Wanabii tsawandika, ‘Iwanu wose watsolangulitsighwa ne Imulungu.’ Chila imunu iyomtegheletsa Aba na kwilangulitsa kuna yeye katsokutsa kuna nene.
Chanilonga chicho chino, kuduhu imunu iyamwonile Aba ila yula iyalawile kwe Imulungu, ayo yuyo yaliyeka iyamwonile Aba.
Nowalongela ghendo, imunu wowose iyotoghola kana ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose.
Nene na chijo ichighala ughima.
Iwabala wenu tsawaja mana kunyika lekeni wafa.
Lekeni achino ichighate ichihulumka kulawa kulanga, imunu iyochija ng'atsokufa bae.
Nene na ichijo che ughima ichihulumke kulawa kulanga. Imunu ang'aja chijo chino, katsokala ghamatsuwa ghose. Chijo chino lukuli lwangu, nolulapfa ili iwanu we isi yose wawe ne ughima.”
Kuya Wayahudi wandusa kwighutsa kwa maya, “Apfi imunu yuno kodahatse kutwing'a lukuli lwake tuluje?”
Yesu kawalongela, “Nowalongela ghendo, ka ng'amkuja lukuli lwe Imwana we Imunu na kunwa idamu yake, ng'amtsokuwa ne ughima mghati mwenu.
Imunu wowose iyoluja lukuli lwangu na kunwa idamu yangu kana ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose, nitsomtsilihula mne litsuwa lya usighilo.
Kwaapfila lukuli lwangu ichijo cha kweli na idamu yangu chokunwa cha kweli.
Imunu wowose iyoluja lukuli lwangu na kunwa idamu yangu, ayo kokala mghati mwangu, na nene nokala mghati mwake.
Aba iyali mghima kanituma, na kwaajili ya Aba nene nokala, apfo imunu iyoluja lukuli lwangu katsokala kwaajili ya nene.
Achino chicho ichijo ichihulumke kulawa kulanga, si ka mana iwajile iwabala wenu, na ukufa. Lekeni imunu iyakuja chijo chino katsokuwa mghima ghamatsuwa ghose.”
Yesu kaghalonga agho hayang'ali yolangulitsa mne ing'anda ye ukulombela ako Kaperinaumu.
Iwanu wengi iwamuwinzile Yesu hawahulike apfo, walonga, “Ghamalangulitso ghano makomu. Apfi yuhi iyodaha kughatoghola?”
Kuduhu imunu iyamlongele Yesu ichinu chawang'ali wonung'unika iwanang'ina wake, lekeni yeye tsakamanya, apfo kawaghutsa, “Ule ghamalangulitso ghano ghoghetsa ukutoghola kwenu?
Itsakuwatse ka mtsomwona Imwana we Imunu kakuya kulanga hanu hayakalile mwanduso?
Ghumuhe we Imulungu kolapfa ughima, ngupfu tsa imunu ng'atsidaha chinu. Mbuli tsaniwalongele tsowaghalila muhe na ughima.
Hata apfo, wangi wenu mng'ali ng'amtoghola.” Kwaapfila Yesu tsakamanya kulawa mwanduso tsina nani ing'awotoghola na tsakamanya nani iyatsomhunduka.
Kuya Yesu kalonga keli, “Kwaajili ayo tsaniwalongela kuduhu imunu iyodaha kunitsila mbaka Aba yamtoghole.”
Kulawa litsuwa lino iwanang'ina wake wengi woya kuchughu, ng'awamuwinzile keli.
Yesu kawaghutsa iwanang'ina wake kumi na weli, “Pfii, namwe pfipfila mwobama kuka?”
Simoni Petiri kamwidika, “Imtwatsa, tughende kwa nani? Ghweghwe kuna mbuli itsighala ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose.
Twotoghola na twomanya ghweghwe kwa Mwenzeluka we Imulungu.”
Kuya Yesu kawedika, “Apfi siwasaghuleni mwemwe kumi na weli bae? Lekeni yumwe wenu ka Setani.”
Yesu tsayang'ali yolonga mbuli tsa Yuda, imwana wa Simoni Isikarioti, yumwe we iwanang'ina wala kumi na weli, iyomhunduka Yesu hambele.
Hambele, Yesu kaghenda Galilaya, ng'abamile bae kughenda Yudeya, kwaapfila iwakulu we Wayahudi tsawabama wamkome.
Lekeni chihungo cha Wayahudi cha Ipfibumbulika haching'ali habehi,
ndughu tsake Yesu wamlongela, “Ulawe hano ughende Yudeya, ili iwanang'ina wako wone pfihulo pfausang'ana.
Kuduhu imunu iyofisa aghala ghayotenda ka kobama yamanyike ne iwanu wangi. Kwaapfila ghweghwe kwotenda ipfinu pfino, wilanguse kwe iwanu we iisi yose.”
Mana hata iwandughu tsake ng'awamtoghole.
Yesu kawalongela, “Litsuwa lyangu linoghile ng'ana lipfike bae, ila kuna mwemwe chila litsuwa linogha.
Iwanu we isi ng'awodaha kuwahilani mwemwe, ila wonihila nene kwaapfila nolonga ka aghala ghawotenda gheha.
Mghende mne Ichihungo. Nene sighenda bae mne Ichihungo acho, kwaapfila litsuwa lyangu ng'ana lipfike bae.”
Tsakalonga apfi, kuya kakala ako Galilaya.
Iwandughu tsake hawaghendile mne ichihungo, naye Yesu pfipfila kaghenda, lekeni ng'aghendile bae mwatsimwatsi, ila kaghenda chinyelenyele.
Mne ichihungo acho, iwakulu we Wayahudi wang'ali wombama Yesu, waghutsa, “Apfi yalikwani imunu yula?”
Mne likingili, iwanu wang'ali wenong'onetsa mbuli tsa Yesu. Iwanu wangi walonga, “Imunu yuno kanogha.” Wangi wedika, “Mbe, kowaghitsa iwanu.”
Lekeni kuduhu imunu iyadahile kulonga mbuli yoyose ya Yesu mwatsimwatsi, kwaapfila wawapfuka iwakulu wa Wayahudi.
Ichihungo haching'ali habehi kumala Yesu kaghenda mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu, kandusa kulangulitsa.
Iwakulu we Wayahudi wakangawala, walonga, “Apfi imunu yuno aghapatiletse ghamalangulitso ghano, naye ng'asomile bae?”
Yesu kawedika, “Ghamalangulitso ghanilangulitsa si ghangu bae, ila gholawa kwa yula iyanitumile.
Imunu wowose ang'asaghula kutenda pfayobama Imulungu, katsomanya ka ghamalangulitso ghangu gholawa kwe Imulungu au nolonga kwa uwetso wangu imwenyegho.
Imunu iyolonga mbuli tsake kobama utunitso wake, lekeni imunu iyobama utunitso kwa yula iyamtumile ayo mwenyepfale, kuduhu ughutsu mna yeye.
Apfi Musa ng'aweng'ile bae Ghamalaghitso? Lekeni kuduhu imunu iyokinda Ghamalaghitso mna mwemwe. Ebali mwobama mng'ome?”
Likingili lye iwanu limwidika, “Ghweghwe kuna chinyamkela. Yuhi iyobama yakukome?”
Yesu kawedika, “Tsanenda chihulo chimwe, namwe wose mkangawala.
Musa tsakamlaghitseni muwengitse ngoma iwanenu, hata ka si Musa bae ila iwabala wenu iwanduse ichinu acho, namwe mwomwingitsa ngoma imwana Litsuwa lya Sabato.
Ka mwomwingitsa ngoma imwana Litsuwa lya Sabato ili kukindilisa Ghamalaghitso gha Musa, ebali mwakwona maya kwaapfila nimhonetsa imunu mne Litsuwa lya Sabato?
Mleke kuhigha kwa kulola kuliheka, ila muhighe kwa haki.”
Iwanu wangi wa Yerusalemu wandusa kwighutsa, “Apfi si imunu yuno bae iwombama wamkome?
Lola hayuno! Kolonga mwatsimwatsi na iwanu ng'awomlongela ichinu bae. Pfii iwakulu wetu womanya ghendo ayu ka Kiristu?
Kiristu hayatsakutsa kuduhu imunu iyatsomanya kolawila kwani, lekeni twetwe twomanya koyolawila imunu yuno.”
Yesu hayang'ali yolangulitsa mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu, kalonga kwa kukemelela, “Ona, mwonimanya na mwomanya kwonilawila. Sitsile bae kwa kubama imwenyegho, lekeni iyanitumile ka ukweli. Mwemwe ng'amummanyile bae,
lekeni nene nommanya kwaapfila nolawila kuna yeye, naye kanituma.”
Kuya wabama kumghogha, lekeni kuduhu imunu iyagholose ghamoko ghake kumghogha, kwaapfila litsuwa lyake tsang'ana lipfike.
Lekeni iwanu wengi kulawa mne likingili wamtoghola walonga, “Kiristu hayatsakutsa, apfi katsotenda pfihulo pfingi kubita imunu yuno?”
Mafarisayo wahulika iwanu wonong'ona mbuli tsa Yesu. Apfo iwatambika wakulu na Mafarisayo wawatuma iwabetetsi we Ing'anda ye Imulungu kumghogha Yesu.
Yesu kawalongela, “Nokala namwe kwa matsuwa chidogho, kuya nitsoghenda kwa ayula iyanitumile.
Mtsombama, lekeni ng'amtsombona bae, kwaapfila ng'amdaha bae kutsa hanu hanili.”
Wayahudi welongela, “Apfi imunu yuno katsoghenda kwani mbaka tuleke kumwona? Pfii katsoghenda mne kaye tsa Wagiriki iwokala iwanu wetu na kuwalangulitsa Wagiriki?
Apfi kana mana yachi hayalongile ‘Mtsonibama, lekeni ng'amtsombona’ na ‘ng'amdaha bae kutsa hanu hanili’?”
Litsuwa lya usighilo na litsuwa kulu lya ichihungo, Yesu kema, kakemelela, “Imunu wowose yane ng'ilu, yatse kuna nene yanwe.
Imunu wowose iyonitoghola nene, ka Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka pfagholonga, ‘Imito ye ghamatsi iighala ughima itsokwitika kulawa mghati mwake.’ ”
Yesu tsayang'ali yolonga mbuli tse Ghumuhe, yawatsombokela iwanu awala iwomtoghola. Mbaka litsuwa lila iwanu tsawang'ali ng'aweng'ighwe bae Ghumuhe, kwaapfila Yesu tsakakala ng'ana yatunitsighwe ne Imulungu.
Hawahulike mbuli tsake, iwanu wangi walonga, “Kweli imunu yuno ka ayula Nabii.”
Iwanu wangi walonga, “Ayuno ka Kiristu Mkombotsi.” Lekeni iwanu wangi wang'ali weghutsa, “Apfi Kiristu kodahatse kulawa Galilaya?
Apfi Ghamaandiko Maenzeluka ng'aghalongile bae Kiristu katsolawila mlukolo lwa imndewa Daudi na kwelekighwa Betilehemu, kaye yakalile Daudi?”
Apfo iwanu tsawebaghula kwaajili ya Yesu.
Iwanu wangi wabama kumghogha, lekeni kuduhu imunu iyamgholosele ghumoko.
Wakalitsi we Ing'anda ye Imulungu hawoyile, iwatambika wakulu na Mafarisayo wawaghutsa, “Ule ng'amtsile naye bae?”
Wakalitsi wawedika, “Kuduhu imunu yadahile kulonga ka imunu yuno!”
Mafarisayo wawaghutsa, “Pfii namwe pfipfila kawabugha?”
“Angu kuna imkulu au Mfarisayo iyamtoghole?
Bali iwanu wano ng'awomanya bae Ghamalaghitso gha Musa, apfo walighitighwa ne Imulungu.”
Nikodemu, Mfarisayo yumwe, iyamghendele Yesu aho mwanduso, kawalongela,
“Apfi Ghamalaghitso ghetu ghomhigha imunu wowose ka ng'atumhulikitse na kumanya chayatendile?”
Wamwidika, “Pfii naghwe kwolawa Galilaya? Lola Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka, kutsomanya ka kuduhu nabii iyolawila Galilaya.”
Kuya chila imunu koka ukaye yake.
Lekeni Yesu kaghenda kune chidunda che Mitseituni.
Nemitondotondo litsuwa lya keli Yesu kaghenda keli mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu. Iwanu wose wamtsunguluka, naye kakala hasi, kandusa kuwalangulitsa.
Iwalangulitsi wa Ghamalangulitso na Mafarisayo wamghala ipinga iyaghoghighwe ughoni. Wamwika ipinga ayo hambele hawo.
Wamlongela Yesu, “Mlangulitsi, ipinga yuno kaghoghighwa ughoni.
Mne Ghamalaghitso, Musa katulaghitsa apfi, ipinga ka ayu kobamighwa yatowighwe na ghamabwe mbaka yafe. Lelo ghweghwe ulongatse?”
Tsawaghutsa pfino wamwonze Yesu ili wapate ghomba lya kumghoghela. Lekeni Yesu kenamila hasi, kandusa kwandika hasi kwa chidole chake.
Hawaghendelele kumghutsa, Yesu kenuka kawalongela, “Imunu wowose mna mwemwe iyalihela nzambi, yalongole kumwasila libwe.”
Kuya Yesu kenama keli, kandika hasi.
Iwanu wala hawahulike apfi, wandusa kuka yumweyumwe, wandusa iwabala. Yesu kasighala ne ipinga ayula yemile hala.
Yesu kenuka kamghutsa, “Walikwani iwanu iwakughoghile? Pfii kuduhu imunu iyakuhighile?”
Ipinga ayo kamwidika, “Imtwatsa, kuduhu imunu iyanihighile.” Yesu kamlongela, “Na nene sikuhigha bae. Ghenda na uleke kutenda keli nzambi.”
Yesu hayalongile keli ne iwanu, kalonga, “Nene na ghumwanga ghwe iisi. Imunu wowose iyoniwinza ng'atsokwanga mchisi bae, ila katsokuwa na ghumwanga ghwe ughima.”
Mafarisayo wamwidika, “Ghweghwe kwelapfila imwenyegho ukalangama, na ukalangama wako wa ughutsu.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Hata ning'elapfila ukalangama imwenyegho, ukalangama wangu wolongesa, kwaapfila nomanya kwani kwanilawila na kwani konighenda. Lekeni mwemwe ng'ammanyile bae kwani kwanilawila au kwanighenda.
Mwemwe mwohigha ka iwanu pfawohigha. Nene simuhigha imunu bae.
Lekeni ka nohigha, nohigha ghoya, kwaapfila sisang'ana bae niliyeka, Aba iyanitumile kahamwe na nene.
Yandikighwa mne Ghamalaghitso ghenu ukalangama we iwanu weli wotogholighwa.
Nene nelapfila imwenyegho ukalangama, na mkalangama wangu yungi, Aba iyanitumile.”
Kuya wamghutsa, “Aba wako yalikwani?” Yesu kawedika, “Ng'amnimanyile nene wala ng'amummanyile Aba wangu, mng'animanyile, pfipfila mng'ammanyile Aba wangu.”
Yesu kalonga mbuli tsino hayang'ali yolangulitsa mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu, hanu hane chinu cha kwikila sadaka. Kuya kuduhu imunu iyamghoghile kwaapfila chipindi chake tsa ng'ana chipfike bae.
Yesu kalonga nawo keli, “Nakuka, mtsombama lekeni mtsakufa mne nzambi tsenu. Ng'amdaha bae kutsa hanu hanighenda.”
Iwakulu wa Wayahudi waghutsa, “Kolonga ng'atudaha bae kughenda hanu hoyoghenda. Pfii kobama yekome imwenyegho?”
Lekeni Yesu kawedika, “Mwemwe mwa wa iisi ino ili hasi, lekeni nene na wa kulanga. Mwemwe mwa iwanu wa muisi amu, lekeni nene si wa muisi amu.
Tsaniwalongela mtsakufa mne nzambi tsenu. Kwaapfila ng'amtoghola bae ‘Nene na Yuyula’ mtsakufa mne nzambi tsenu.”
Wamghutsa Yesu, “Lelo ghweghwe uli nani?” Yesu kawedika, “Nene na Yuyula kulawa mwanduso.”
“Nina mbuli nyingi tsa kulonga mna mwemwe na kuwahigha. Lekeni iyanitumile yeye kotogholighwa, na chanihulike kuna yeye, chicho chaniwalongela iwanu wose.”
Ng'awamanyile bae ka Yesu yang'ali yowalongela mbuli tse Aba wake.
Yesu kawalongela, “Hamtsomwinula Imwana we Imunu mna msalaba, mtsomanya nene na Yuyula, kuya mtsomanya ka nene sitenda ichinu chochose niliyeka, ila nolonga chayanilangulitse Aba wangu.
Yula iyanitumile kahamwe na nene, ng'anilekile niliyeka bae, kwaapfila ghamatsuwa ghose notenda ighomnoghela.”
Iwanu wengi iwamhulikitse Yesu hayang'ali yolonga pfinu pfino wamtoghola.
Kuya Yesu kawalongela awala Wayahudi iwamtoghole, “Mng'aghakinda ghamalaghitso ghangu, mwemwe mtsakuwa iwanang'ina wangu ghendo.
Kuya mtsomanya ukweli, na ukweli utsowakombola.”
Wamwidika Yesu, “Twetwe twa watsukulu wa Abrahamu, ng'atuwile bae iwatumwa we imunu wowose. Pfii kuya kwolonga tutsokombolighwa?”
Yesu kawedika, “Nowalongela ghendo, imunu wowose iyotenda nzambi ka imtumwa wa nzambi.
Imtumwa ng'okala bae ukaye ghamatsuwa ghose, ila imwana kokala ukaye ghamatsuwa ghose.
Imwana ang'amkombolani, mtsokombolighwa ghendo.
Nomanya mwemwe mwa watsukulu we Abrahamu. Lekeni mwobama mnikome kwaapfila ng'amtoghola ghamalangulitso ghangu.
Nowalongela achila Aba wangu chayanilanguse, lekeni mwemwe mwotenda achila chayawalongele aba wenu.”
Wamwidika, “Aba wetu Abrahamu.” Yesu kawedika, “Mng'awile iwana we Abrahamu, mng'atendile aghala ghayatendile Abrahamu.
Niwalongela ukweli yaniuhulike kwe Imulungu. Lekeni mwemwe mng'ali mwobama mnikome. Abrahamu ng'atendile pfino bae!
Mwemwe mwotenda ipfinu ipfitendighwe na aba wenu.” Wamwidika, “Imulungu yaliyeka iyo Aba wetu yatulinaye. Twetwe twa iwanaghe ghendo.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Ka Imulungu ang'awile Aba wenu, mng'amnoghele, kwaapfila ndawa kwe Imulungu na sambi nahano. Sitsile bae kwa uwetso wangu imwenyegho, ila yeye kanituma.
Ebali ng'amchimanya bae chanilonga? Kwaapfila mwemwe ng'amdaha bae kuhulikitsa chanilonga.
Mwolawa kwa aba wenu Yehile, na mwotenda ka aba wenu pfayobama. Kulawa mwanduso tsakawakoma iwanu, kwaapfila kuduhu ukweli kuna yeye. Hayolonga ughutsu, kolonga chihendo chake, kwaapfila ka mghutsu na aba we ughutsu.
Na nene kwaapfila nolongesa, ng'amnitoghola bae.
Apfi mna mwemwe kuna imunu iyodaha kulapfa ukalangama ka nene nina nzambi? Ka nolongesa, ebali ng'amnitoghola bae?
Imunu we Imulungu kohulikitsa mbuli tse Imulungu. Mwemwe ng'amuhulikitsa kwaapfila mwemwe si iwanu we Imulungu bae.”
Wayahudi wamligha Yesu kwa kumghutsa, “Apfi ng'atulongile ghoya bae ka ghweghwe kwa Msamariya na kuna chinyamkela?”
Yesu kawedika, “Nene nahela chinyamkela, nene nomuhulikitsa Aba wangu lekeni mwemwe ng'amnihulikitsa bae.
Nene sibamila utunitso imwenyegho bae, ila kabaho iyoubama, ayo ka mlamutsi.
Nowalongela ghendo, imunu wowose iyokinda ghamalaghitso ghangu ng'atsokufa bae.”
Wayahudi wamlongela Yesu, “Sambi twomanya kuna chinyamkela! Abrahamu na manabii wafa, lekeni ghweghwe kwolonga imunu wowose iyokinda ghamalangulitso ghako ng'atsakufa bae.
Angu ghweghwe kwa mbala kubita aba wetu Abrahamu iyafile? Pfipfila manabii nawo wafa. Apfi ghweghwe kwolonga uli nani?”
Yesu kawedika, “Ning'etunya imwenyegho, utunitso wangu si chinu. Aba wangu yamumkema Imulungu wenu, yeye iyo yonitunya.
Mwemwe ng'amummanya bae, lekeni nene nommanya. Ning'alonga simmanyile bae, nitsakuwa mghutsu ka mwemwe. Lekeni nommanya na nokinda imbuli yake.
Aba wenu Abrahamu kadeng'elela kwaajili ya kulyona litsuwa lya kutsa kwangu, naye kalyona, kalideng'elela.”
Wayahudi wamlongela Yesu, “Ghweghwe ng'una upfike imiyaka hamsini, naghwe kumwona Abrahamu!”
Yesu kawedika, “Nowalongela ghendo, Abrahamu ng'ana yelekighwe nene nabaho.”
Kuya wadondola ghamabwe wabama wamtowe Yesu, lekeni Yesu kalawa mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu.
Yesu hayang'ali yoghenda mmbalimbali, kamwona imunu chifita kulawa kwelekighwa kwake.
Iwanang'ina wake wamghutsa, “Mlangulitsi, yuhi iyatendile nzambi, mbaka imunu yuno yelekighwe chifita, imunu yuno au iwamweleke?”
Yesu kawedika, “Si imunu yuno wala iwamweleke bae iwatendile nzambi, lekeni ilawila pfino ili ngupfu ye Imulungu yoneke mne ughima wake.
Kwaapfila kung'ali misi, twobamighwa kusang'ana ing'onde ya ayula iyanitumile. Chilo hachikutsa kuduhu imunu iyodaha kusang'ana.
Haning'ali muisi, nene na ghumwanga ghwe isi.”
Hayamalitse kulonga apfi, kabwalula ghamate mne lidongo, kapfulugha likododo kwa ghamate kambaka chifita mnenge.
Yesu kamlongela, “Ghenda ukahopfughe chihanga chako mne tsimbu Siloamu.” Siloamu mana yake “Iyatumighwe.” Apfo imunu yula koka kaghenda kuhopfugha chihanga chake, kuya koka ukaye aku kakona.
Iwanu iwang'ali wokala naye habehi ne iwanu iwamwonile hayang'ali yolomba weghutsa, “Apfi ayu si imunu yula iyang'ali yolomba?”
Iwanu wamwenga walonga, “Ayuno yeye,” lekeni wangi walonga, “Ayu si yeye bae, keghala naye.” Lekeni imunu yula kalonga, “Nene na yuyula iyaning'ali nilomba.”
Wamghutsa, “Apfi kudahatse kona?”
Imunu ayo kawedika, “Imunu iwomkema Yesu kapfulugha likododo kanibaka mnenge mwangu. Kanongela ng'ende Siloamu nikahopfughe chihanga changu. Apfo ng'enda, bahala haning'ali nohupfugha chihanga, nidaha kwona.”
Wamghutsa, “Alikwani imunu hayo?” Kawedika, “Imane.”
Kuya iwanu wamghala imunu yula yakalile chifita kwa Mafarisayo.
Litsuwa Yesu lyapfulughe likododo na kumhonetsa imunu chifita tsalikala Litsuwa lya Sabato.
Kuya Mafarisayo wamghutsa keli imunu ayo pfayadahile kona. Kawedika, “Kanibaka likododo mnenge mwangu, nihopfugha chihanga changu, sambi nakona.”
Mafarisayo wamwenga walonga, “Imunu yuno yatendile pfino ng'olawa bae kwe Imulungu, kwaapfila kolibetsa Litsuwa lya Sabato.” Lekeni iwanu wangi waghutsa, “Apfi imunu yane nzambi kodahatse kutenda pfihulo ka pfino?” Apfo weghola.
Kuya Mafarisayo wamghutsa imunu ayo, “Kulonga kakuhonetsa tsinenge tsako. Ghweghwe ulongatse kwa imunu ayo?” Naye kawedika, “Imunu ayo ka nabii.”
Kuya iwakulu wa Wayahudi ng'awatoghole bae ka imunu ayo tsachifita na kadaha kona, mbaka wawakema aba na mai we imunu hayo.
Wayahudi wawaghutsa, “Apfi ayu mwanenu? Yumlonga kelekighwa chifita, lelo kodahatse ukona?”
Aba wake na mai wake wawedika, “Twomanya ayu mwanetu, twomanya tsakelekighwa chifita.
Lekeni ng'atumanyile bae pfayadahile kona na ng'atummanyile imunu iyamhonetse nenge tsake. Mumghutse, yeye ka imbala kodaha kwidika imwenyegho!”
Aba wake na mai wake walonga apfi kwaapfila wang'ali wowapfuka iwakulu wa Wayahudi, kwaapfila tsawalonga imunu wowose iyolonga Yesu ka Kiristu katsowingighwa mne Ing'anda ye Kulombela.
Kwaajili ayo aba na mai wake tsawalonga apfi, “Imwenyegho ka imbala, mghutseni.”
