Wayahudi wamkema keli imunu ayo, wamlongela, “Wilahe kwe Imulungu ka kolongesa! Twomanya imunu iyakuhonetse kana nzambi.”
Imunu ayo kawedika, “Imane ka imunu ayu kana nzambi au kahela nzambi. Ichinu chimwe chanimanya; tsang'ala chifita lekeni sambi nakona!”
Kuya wamghutsa imunu ayo, “Angu akutendele choni? Yatendiletse kukuhonetsa tsinenge tsako?”
Imunu ayo kawedika, “Tsaniwalongela lekeni ng'ambamile bae kutegheletsa. Ule mwobama kuhulika imbuli ino keli? Pfii namwe mwobama kuwa iwanang'ina wake?”
Kuya wamligha wamlongela, “Ghweghwe kwa mwanang'ina wake! Twetwe twa iwanang'ina wa Musa!
Twomanya Imulungu tsakalonga na Musa, lekeni imunu yuno, ng'atumanyile bae kolawila kwani!”
Imunu yula kawedika, “Mwonikangawatsa! Mwemwe ng'ammanyile kwani koyolawila, lekeni katsihonetsa nenge tsangu.
Twomanya Imulungu ng'omhulikitsa bae imunu yane nzambi. Imulungu komhulikitsa imunu iyomtoghola na iyotenda chayambamile kutenda.
Kulawa iisi pfailumbighwe kuduhu imunu yahulike ka imunu wowose kamhonetsa imunu iyelekighwe chifita.
Ka imunu yuno ng'olawa bae kwa Imulungu, tsayang'alekile kudaha kusang'ana chochose!”
Wamwidika, “Ghweghwe kwelekighwa na kukulila mnzambi. Apfi udahatse kutulangulitsa?” Apfo Wayahudi wamuwinga imunu ayo mne Ing'anda ya Kulombela.
Yesu tsakahulika imunu iyamuhonetse kawingighwa, hayamwonile kamghutsa, “Pfii kwomtoghola Imwana we Imunu?”
Imunu ayo kamghutsa, “Imtwatsa, apfi imunu ayo nani? Nongele nimtoghole!”
Yesu kamwidika, “Sambi kumwona, yulonga naye iyo yuyo.”
Kuya imunu ayo kamwidika, “Imtwatsa, notoghola,” kampfughamila Yesu ghamaghoti.
Yesu kalonga, “Nitsa muisi amu kuhigha, pfifita wone na iwanu iwakona wawe pfifita.”
Mafarisayo wangi iwakalile na Yesu wamhulika hayalongile pfino, wamghutsa, “Apfi kwolonga twetwe twa pfifita?”
Yesu kawedika, “Mng'awile pfifita, mng'akalile mwahela nzambi, lekeni kwaapfila mwolonga mwakona, mwemwe mng'ali mna nzambi.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Nowalongela ghendo, imunu wowose ka ng'akwingila bae mne libanda lya wang'olo kubitila halibani, ila kakwingila kwa nzila ingi ayo ka mbapfi na mbokaji.
Imunu iyakwingila kubitila libani ayo ka mdimi we wang'olo.
Mbetetsi kompfughulila libani, na wang'olo wohulikitsa litsi lya mdimi. Kowakema wang'olo wake kwa mataghwa, kowalongotsa kunze.
Hayowalapfa kunze wang'olo wake kowalongola, na wang'olo wake womuwinza kwaapfila womanya litsi lyake.
Lekeni ng'awomuwinza bae imunu yungi, watsomlema kwaapfila ng'awomanya bae litsi lye imunu yungi.”
Yesu kawalongela imbuli ino, lekeni ng'awamanyile bae chayawalongele.
Kuya Yesu kalonga keli, “Nowalongela ghendo, nene nalibani lya wang'olo.
Iwanu wose iwanongole tsawabapfi na wabokaji, lekeni wang'olo ng'awawahulikitse bae.
Nene nalibani. Imunu wowose iyakwingila kubitila nene katsokombolighwa. Katsakwingila na kulawa, naye katsopata ipfijo.
Wabapfi wakutsa kwiba, kukoma na kuhinya, nene nitsa wawe ne ughima bwelele, na watsokala ghamatsuwa ghose.
“Nene namdimi yaninoghile. Mdimi yanoghile kolapfa ughima wake kwa wang'olo.
Imunu yodima kwa kulihighwa na si mdimi yane iwang'olo bae. Hayomwona yumbwa wa kumuhulo kakutsa, kowaleka iwang'olo kotsuma. Apfo yumbwa wa kumuhulo kowaghogha iwang'olo na kowapwililisa.
Imunu ayo kotsuma kwaapfila yeye ka imunu wa kulihighwa na ng'owalolesa bae wang'olo.
“Nene namdimi yaninoghile, nowamanya wang'olo wangu na wang'olo wangu wonimanya,
ka Aba pfayonimanya na nene nommanya Aba, na nowalapfila wang'olo ughima wangu.
Nina wang'olo wangi, awo si wa banda lino. Pfipfila nobamighwa niwaghale. Pfipfila nawo watsohulika litsi lyangu, na kutsakuwa na kingili limwe na mdimi yumwe.
“Nomnoghela Aba wangu kwaapfila nolapfa ughima wangu ili niubokele keli.
Kuduhu imunu iyoniboka ughima wangu. Noulapfa imwenyegho ughima wangu kwaapfila nodaha kughulapfa na kughusola keli. Nibokela laghitso lino kulawa kwa Aba wangu.”
Mbuli tsino tsa Yesu tsiwatenda Wayahudi weghole keli.
Iwanu wemwenga walonga, “Kana chinyamkela na kamkwalukwale. Ule mwomtegheletsa?”
Lekeni wangi walonga, “Imunu yane chinyamkela ng'odaha bae kulonga pfino. Apfi chinyamkela kodaha kumhonetsa imunu chifita?”
Hako Yerusalemu tsakukala na Chihungo cha Kuika wakifu Ing'anda ye Imulungu, tsaghukala msimu ghwa chipfeghetsi.
Yesu yang'ali yakwanga mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu hane chitala cha Selemani.
Wayahudi wamtsunguluka wamghutsa, “Kutsotuleka tuleke kumanya mbaka tsuwachi? Tulongele mwatsimwatsi ka ghweghwe kwa Kiristu Mkombotsi.”
Yesu kawedika, “Tsaniwalongela, lekeni ng'amnitoghole bae. Pfihulo ipfanitenda kwa taghwa lya Aba wangu pfonilangusa,
lekeni mwemwe ng'amtoghola kwaapfila mwemwe si wang'olo wangu.
Wang'olo wangu wohulika litsi lyangu, nowamanya, nawo woniwinza.
Noweng'a ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose, nawo ng'awatsakufa bae. Kuduhu imunu iyodaha kuwaboka mna ghamoko ghangu.
Aba wangu, iyangaile, ka mkulu kubita wose, kuduhu imunu iyodaha kuwaboka kulawa mna ghamoko gha Aba wangu.
Nene na Aba twa chinu chimwe.”
Wayahudi wadondola keli ghamabwe wamtowe Yesu,
lekeni Yesu kawalongela, “Niwalangusa pfihulo pfingi ipfilawile kwa Aba. Apfi chihulo chachi ichiwatenda mnitowe ne ghamabwe?”
Wamwidika, “Ng'atukwasila ghamabwe kwaapfila kutenda pfihulo, ila kwaapfila kumligha Imulungu! Ghweghwe kwa imunu, lekeni kwolonga ghweghwe kwa Imulungu.”
Yesu kawedika, “Apfi ng'ayandikighwe mne Ghamalaghitso ghenu Imulungu tsakalonga, ‘Mwemwe mwa walungu?’
Imulungu tsakawakema walungu awala yaweng'ile usenga wake, na Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka gholongesa ghamatsuwa ghose.
Aba kanisaghula na kanituma nene muisi. Ule mwolonga nimligha Imulungu kwaapfila nilonga ‘Nene na lmwana we Imulungu?’
Ka sisang'ana bae sang'ano tsa Aba wangu yanibamile nitsisang'ane mleke kunitoghola.
Lekeni ka notsisang'ana sang'ano tsake na mng'ali mwolema kunitoghola, togholeni pfihulo pfangu, ili mmanye na mtange ka Aba ka mghati mwangu, na nene na mghati mwe Aba.”
Kuya wabama wamghoghe keli, lekeni Yesu kaswekuka kawaleka.
Kuya Yesu koya keli kumwambu mwe Ghumto Yoridani hanu Yohane hayakalile yobatitsa iwanu, kakala kuko.
Iwanu wengi wamghendela Yesu. Walonga, “Yohane ng'atendile pfihulo, ila chila imbuli ye imunu yuno iyalongile Yohane ilongesa.”
Baho iwanu wengi wamtoghola Yesu.
Imunu yumwe iyakemighwe Lazali tsamtamu. Lazali yang'ali yokala Betaniya, kaye yake Mariya ne ndughu yake Marita.
Mariya yuno tsakakala yuyula iyambakile Imtwatsa Yesu ghamafuta ighonung'ila mmaghulu na kughabaghusa kwa mvili tsake, lumbu wake Lazali tsakakala mtamu.
Apfo lumbu tsake Lazali wamtumila Yesu usenga, “Imtwatsa, sale yako yumnoghele koghula.”
Yesu hayahulike apfi, kalonga, “Utamu uno ng'autsomkoma bae Lazali, utamu uno ulawila kwa utunitso we Imulungu ili Imwana we Imulungu yatunitsighwe kubitila utamu uno.”
Yesu tsakawanoghela Marita na lumbu wake na Lazali.
Yesu hayahulike Lazali koghula, kongetsa ghamatsuwa meli gha kukala hala hayakalile.
Kuya Yesu kawalongela iwanang'ina wake, “Tuye keli Yudeya.”
Iwanang'ina wake wamlongela, “Mlangulitsi, ghamatsuwa chidogho ighalutile Wayahudi tsawabama wakutowe ne ghamabwe, ule kwobama ughende keli hanu hala?”
Yesu kawedika, “Apfi misi yahela masaa kumi ne meli bae? Imunu iyokwanga nemisi ng'ekwala bae kwaapfila koghwona ghumwanga ghwe isi ino.
Lekeni imunu ang'anga nechilo kekwala, kwaapfila kahela ghumwanga.”
Yesu hayalongile apfi, kaghendelela kuwalongela, “Sale yetu Lazali kawasa, lekeni noghenda kumlamsa.”
Iwanang'ina wake wamwidika, “Mtwatsa, ka kawasa, katsohona.”
Yesu tsayang'ali yolonga Lazali tsakafa lekeni iwanang'ina wake wapfikitsa Lazali tsakawasa.
Apfo Yesu kawalongela mwatsimwatsi, “Lazali kafa,
lekeni kwaajili yenu nodeng'elela kwaapfila sikalile naye bae, ili mtoghole. Leka tumghendele.”
Kuya Tomasi, iyakemighwe Basa kawalongela iwanang'ina wayaghe, “Leka tughende ne Mlangulitsi ili tufe naye.”
Yesu hayapfikile, tsakapfika lukuli lwa Lazali lwikighwa mne likabuli ghamatsuwa mane ighalutile.
Kaye ya Betaniya tsaikala habehi ne Yerusalemu, utali wa maili mbili,
na Wayahudi wengi watsa kuwakanza Marita ne Mariya kwa ukufa kwa ndughu yawo.
Marita hayahulike Yesu kakutsa, kaghenda kunze kwitingana na Yesu, lekeni Mariya tsakasighala mng'anda.
Marita kamlongela Yesu, “Mtwatsa, ka ung'awile hano, lumbu wangu tsa yang'alekile kufa!
Lekeni nomanya hata sambi Imulungu katsokwing'a chochose chaumlomba.”
Yesu kamlongela, “Lumbu wako katsotsilihuka.”
Marita kamwidika, “Nomanya katsotsilihuka keli mne litsuwa lya ukutsigha.”
Yesu kamlongela, “Nene nautsilihuko ne ughima. Imunu iyonitoghola nene, ang'afa katsakuwa mghima,
na imunu wowose iyokala na kunitoghola nene ng'atsakufa bae. Pfii kwotoghola?”
Marita kamwidika, “Ona, Mtwatsa! Nokutoghola ghweghwe kwa Kiristu, Imwana wa Imulungu, iyatsile mne isi.”
Marita hayalongile pfino, kaghenda mng'anda kamkema Mariya chinyelenyele. Kamlongela, “Mlangulitsi kabaha, kokukema.”
Mariya hayahulike pfino, kenuka himahima kamghendela Yesu.
Na Yesu tsakakala ng'ana yapfike mkaye, ila kakala hanu hala hayetingane ne Marita.
Wayahudi iwakalile mng'anda womkanza Mariya, hawamwonile Mariya kenuka himahima na kulawa kunze wamuwinza, wapfikitsa yang'ali yoghenda kulila mne likabuli.
Mariya hayapfikile hanu hayali Yesu na hayamwonile, kamtowela ghamaghoti, kamlongela, “Mtwatsa, ka ung'awile hano, lumbu wangu tsa yang'alekile kufa!”
Yesu hayamwonile Mariya kolila, na Wayahudi iwatsile na Mariya nawo wolila, Yesu kaghanzika mne ghumoyo ghwake, kona usungu.
Yesu kawaghutsa, “Angu mumtsikile kwani?” Wamwidika, “Mtwatsa, itsa wone.”
Yesu kalila.
Kuya Wayahudi walonga, “Mlole pfayamnoghele!”
Lekeni iwanu wangi welongela, “Ka kamhonetsa imunu chifita, ule ng'adahile kumtenda Lazali aleke kufa?”
Yesu yang'ali yoghanzika keli mne ghumoyo ghwake, kaghenda mbaka mne likabuli, likabuli tsalikala imango iighubikighwe ne libwe.
Yesu kawalaghitsa, “Mlibimbilise libwe!” Marita lumbu wa imunu iyafile kamwidika, “Mtwatsa, lekeni katsonung'a, ghamatsuwa mane ghabita kulawa yatsikighwe!”
Kuya Yesu kamlongela, “Apfi sikulongele bae ka ung'atoghola, kutsakona utunitso we Imulungu?”
Apfo wabimbilisa libwe. Kuya Yesu kalola kulanga kalonga, “Aba, nolonga mighede kwaapfila kwonihulika.
Nomanya ghamatsuwa ghose kwonihulika, lekeni nolonga pfino kwaajili ya iwanu iwemile hano, ili watoghole ghweghwe kunituma.”
Yesu hayamalitse kulonga apfi, kakemelela, “Lazali, lawa kunze!”
Naye Lazali kalawa kunze, ghamoko na maghulu ghake ghoighwa isanda na ichihanga chake chighubikighwa chitambala. Yesu kawalongela, “Mdoholeni mumleke yoke.”
Apfo Wayahudi wengi iwaghendile kumwangila Mariya, waghona ghayatendile Yesu, na wamtoghola.
Lekeni iwanu wangi woya kwa Mafarisayo wawalongela aghala ghayatendile Yesu.
Apfo Mafarisayo na iwatambika wakulu wetingana ne iwanu we Libalatsa lye Wayahudi, weghutsa, “Tutende choni? Imunu yuno kotenda pfihulo pfingi.
Tung'amleka aghendelele, iwanu wose watsomtoghola, kuya iwakulu wa Waroma watsakutsa kusola Ing'anda yetu ya ukulombela na isi yetu.”
Kuya yumwe wawo, iyakemighwe Kayafa, iyakalile Mtambika mkulu wa ghumwaka ghula, kalonga, “Mwawabotsi!
Apfi ng'ammanyile bae ka pfinogha kuna mwemwe imunu yumwe yafe kwaajili ya iwanu wose kubita isi yose ihinyighwe?”
Ng'alongile bae kwa kubama imwenyegho, lekeni kwaapfila tsakakala mtambika mkulu wa ghumwaka ghula, tsakatabili Yesu katsakufa kwaajili ya isi ya Wayahudi,
kuya si kwaajili ya isi ila iliyeka, ila pfipfila kuweka hamwe iwana we Imulungu iwapwililike wawe wamwe.
Apfo kulawa litsuwa lila iwakulu wa Wayahudi wabama inzila ya kumkoma Yesu.
Apfo Yesu ng'aghendile bae mwatsimwatsi muisi ya Yudeya, ila kalawa ako kaghenda habehi na kunyika, kune kaye iikemighwe Efuremu, hao kakala ne iwanang'ina wake.
Ichihungo che Ipasaka cha Wayahudi hachipfikile habehi, iwanu wengi wagheluka Yerusalemu ili wadeghesighwe ng'ana Ipasaka ipfike.
Wang'ali wombama Yesu, na hawetingane mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu weghutsa, “Mkwonatse? Apfi ng'atsakutsa bae mne lchihungo?”
Lekeni iwatambika wakulu na Mafarisayo walapfa laghitso imunu wowose iyomanya kwayali Yesu, yalonge, ili wamghoghe.
Ghamatsuwa sita ng'ana ichihungo che Ipasaka chipfike, Yesu kapfika Betaniya, ukaye kwa Lazali, imunu iyamtsilihule.
Iwanu wamwikila Yesu ichijo cha nemihe, Marita angali yowasang'anila. Lazali tsakakala yumwe we iwanu iwang'ali wakuja na Yesu.
Kuya Mariya kasola isupa ye ghamafuta ighonung'ila ghoya ighalawile mne ghummeya ighukemighwe narido, kambaka Yesu ghamaghulu na kumbaghusa kwa mvili tsake. Ing'anda yose tsainung'ila ghoya.
Yuda Isikarioti, yumwe wa iwanang'ina wake, iyatsomhunduka Yesu kaghutsa,
“Ule ghamafuta ghano ghang'autsighwe dinari miya ndatu na sendi weng'ighwe iwahingwa?”
Yuda tsakalonga pfino, si kwakuwonela libatsi iwahingwa, ila kalonga pfino kwaapfila tsakakala mbapfi, yeye yang'ali yokindagha ghumkoba ghwo ukwikila tsisendi na yang'ali yakwibagha tsisendi.
Yesu kamwidika, “Mleke! Katenda pfino kulyandaa litsuwa lya kutsikighwa kwangu.
Ghamatsuwa ghose mtsokala ne iwahingwa, lekeni ng'amtsokala na nene bae ghamatsuwa ghose.”
Wayahudi wengi hawahulike Yesu kakala Betaniya waghenda, ng'awaghendile bae kumwona Yesu aliheka, pfipfila waghenda kumwona Lazali, imunu yula Yesu iyamtsilihule.
Apfo iwatambika wakulu wabama inzila ye kumkoma Lazali,
kwa achila ichimlawile Lazali Wayahudi wengi wamghendela Yesu na kumtoghola.
Litsuwa liwinzile iwanu wengi watsa mne Ichihungo che Ipasaka, tsawahulika Yesu ang'ali yakutsa Yerusalemu.
Apfo wasola ghamaputila ghe mibiki, waghenda kumbokela, wakemelela, “Mtunitse Imulungu! Imulungu kambaliki iyakutsa kwa taghwa lya Imtwatsa, Imulungu kambaliki Imndewa wa Isiraeli!”
Yesu kamwona imwana punda, kamdina, ka pfayandikighwe mne Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka
“Mleke kupfuka, iwanu we Sayuni, Imndewa wenu kakutsa, kadina imwana punda.”
Mwanduso iwanang'ina wake ng'awamanyile bae mbuli tsino. Lekeni Yesu hayatsilihuke na kutunitsighwa, iwanang'ina wakumbuka Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka ighalongile mbuli tsake na ka wanu wamtendela pfinu apfo.
Iwanu iwakalile na Yesu hayamkemile Lazali kulawa mne likabuli na kumtsilihula, walonga aghala ighalawile.
Iwanu wengi waghenda kutingana na Yesu kwaapfila tsawahulika Yesu katenda chihulo.
Apfo Mafarisayo welongela, “Mlole, ng'atudaha kutenda chochose. Iwanu wose womuwinza!”
Kukala na Wagiriki wengi mne iwanu iwatsile Yerusalemu kutamanila mne ichihungo cha Ipasaka.
Wamghendela Filipi, iyalawile Betisaida mne isi ya Galilaya wamlongela, “Mkulu, twobama tumwone Yesu.”
Filipi kaghenda, kamlongela Andereya, kuya wose weli waghenda kumlongela Yesu.
Yesu kawedika, “Chipindi chipfika che Imwana we Imunu kutunyighwa!
Nowalongela ghendo, ka mbeghu ye uhemba ng'ailaghale mdongo na ukufa, yokala pfipfo imwe iliyeka. Lekeni ing'afa na ukota, itsokweleka mbeghu bwelele.
Imunu iyounoghela ughima wake katsowaghitsa, ila imunu iyouhila ughima wake katsokwing'ighwa ughima we ghamatsuwa ghose.
Imunu wowose iyobama kunitumikila yaniwinze, hohose hanikala imtumwa wangu akale baho. Aba wangu katsomtoghola imunu iyonitumikila.
“Sambi ghumoyo ghwangu ghwoghanzika, na nene nonge choni? ‘Aba unikombole mne chipindi chino?’ Bae, acho chicho chanitsile, nibite chipindi chino cha maghayo.
Aba, litunye taghwa lyako!” Kuya litsi kulawa kulanga lilonga, “Nilitunya na nitsolitunya keli.”
Iwanu wengi iwemile hala wahulika litsi lila, iwanu wangi walonga kukala na mdumo, lekeni iwanu wangi walonga, “Malaika kalonga naye!”
Bali Yesu kawalongela, “Litsi lino ng'alinitsile nene bae lekeni liwatsilani mwemwe.
Chipindi cha kuhighighwa isi ino chipfika, mkulu we isi ino katsowingighwa.
Hanitsokwinulighwa muisi, nitsowakwegha iwanu wose kuna nene.”
Yesu kalonga pfino kulangusa pfayatsokufa.
Mtingano we iwanu wamghutsa, “Ghamalaghitso ghetu tsaghalonga Kiristu katsokala ghamatsuwa ghose. Ule lelo kwolonga ‘Imwana we Imunu kobamighwa yenulighwe?’ Apfi Imwana yuno we Imunu nani?”
Kuya Yesu kawalongela, “Mtsokala ne ghumwanga kwa chipindi chidodo. Mwange hamng'ali nawo ghumwanga, ng'ana ichisi chiwatsile. Imunu iyokwanga mchisi ng'omanya bae koyoghenda.
Mtoghole ghumwanga hamng'ali nawo, ili muwe iwana we ghumwanga.” Hayamalitse kulonga apfi, Yesu koka, kepfisa waleke kumwona.
Hata ka Yesu tsakasang'ana pfihulo hambele hawo, lekeni ng'awamtoghole bae.
Agha ghose ghalawila ghatimile aghala ghayalongile Nabii Isaya. “Imtwatsa, nani iyautoghole usenga wetu? Na ghumoko ghwa Imtwatsa ughubulighwa kwa nani?”
Apfo ng'awadahile bae kutoghola, kwaapfila Isaya pfipfila tsakalonga keli.
Imulungu kalonga, “Nitsowabopfula nenge tsawo, nitsotsibumbuwatsa mbutsi tsawo, waleke kwona kwa tsinenge tsawo, waleke kumanya kwa mbutsi tsawo, waleke kunihundukila, na kuwahonetsa.”
Isaya tsakalonga apfi kwaapfila tsakawona utunitso wa Yesu na kulonga mbuli tsake.
Hata iwakulu wangi wa Wayahudi tsawamtoghola Yesu. Lekeni ng'awadahile bae kulonga mwatsimwatsi kwaapfila wapfuka Mafarisayo watsowawinga mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu.
Kwaapfila tsawanoghelighwa sideke kutunyighwa ne iwanu kubita kutunyighwa ne Imulungu.
Yesu kakemelela, “Imunu wowose iyonitoghola nene, ng'onitoghola nene niliyeka bae ila pfipfila komtoghola ayula iyanitumile.
Imunu wowose iyombona nene komwona yula iyanitumile.
Nitsa muisi niwe ghumwanga, ili iwanu wose iwonitoghola waleke kukala mchisi.
Ka imunu kotegheletsa mbuli tsangu na ng'otsikinda bae, sitsomuhigha bae. Kwaapfila sitsile bae kuhigha iisi lekeni nitsa kuikombola.
Yeye iyondema nene na kulema mbuli tsangu, ayo kenaye wa kumhigha. Mbuli tsila tsanongile tsitsomhigha mna litsuwa lya ukutsigha.
Kwaapfila silonga bae kwa ukulu wangu, ila Aba wangu iyanitumile kandaghitsa chokulonga, na nilongetse.
Nomanya laghitso lyake lyoghala ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose. Apfo nolonga aghala Aba wangu ghayandaghitse nighalonge.”
Tsaikala ichihungo che Ipasaka ng'ana chipfike. Yesu tsakamanya saa yake ya ukuka kulawa iisi ino na kughenda kwa Aba wake ipfika. Tsakawanoghela ng'ani iwanu wake iwali muisi, kawalangusa unoghelo wake ing'autsigha bae.
Yesu ne iwanang'ina wake wang'ali wakuja ichijo cha nemihe, yehile ma tsakamwingila Yuda, imwana wa Simoni Isikarioti, mne ghumoyo ghwake, kumhunduka Yesu.
Yesu tsakamanya Aba kamwing'a ghose mna ghamoko ghake, tsakamanya kalawila kwa Imulungu na kakuya kwe Imulungu.
Apfo kenuka mmetsa, keka mmbalimbali gholole lyake, keyoha lighwanda lingi mchuno.
Kuya keka ghamatsi mchiya, kandusa kuwahopfugha ghamaghulu iwanang'ina wake na kuwabaghusa kwa lighwanda ilili mchuno mwake.
Yesu kapfika hayali Simoni Petiri, iyamghutsile Yesu, “Imtwatsa, ghweghwe uhopfughe ghamaghulu ghangu?”
Yesu kamwidika, “Chanisang'ana sambi ghweghwe ng'uchimanyile bae, lekeni kutsochimanya hambele.”
Petiri kalonga, “Bae, ng'utsoghahopfugha bae ghamaghulu ghangu!” Yesu kamwidika, “Ka sighahopfugha bae ghamaghulu ghako, ng'utsakuwa keli bae imwanang'ina wangu.”
Simoni Petiri kamwidika, “Imtwatsa, uleke kughahopfugha ghamaghulu ghangu ghaliyeka, ila pfipfila uhopfughe na ghamoko ghangu na litwi lyangu!”
Yesu kedika, “Imunu yoghile kela lukuli lwose na kobamighwa yofughe ghamaghulu ghaliyeka. Mwemwe mwela ila si wose bae.”
Yesu tsakalonga si wose bae iwelile kwaapfila tsakamanya imunu iyoghenda kumhunduka.
Yesu hayamalitse kuwahopfugha ghamaghulu ghawo, kapfala keli gholole lyake kakala hanu hake. Kawaghutsa, “Apfi mghamanya ghaniwatendele?”
“Mwonikema Mlangulitsi na Imtwatsa, mwotenda ghoya kwaapfila apfo pfipfo pfanili.
Nene na Imtwatsa na Mlangulitsi wenu, niwahopfugha mwemwe ghamaghulu ghenu, namwe pfipfila mwihopfughe ghamaghulu ghenu.
Nimlangutsani nzila ya kutenda, namwe mtende ka pfaniwatendele.
Nowalongela ghendo, kuduhu mtumwa imkulu kubita imtwatsa wake, na kuduhu mtumwa imkulu kubita yula iyamtumile.
Lelo mwopfimanya pfinu pfino, mng'atenda mtsobweda.
“Siwalonga bae mwemwe wose, nowamanya awala yaniwasaghule. Lekeni leka Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka ghatimile igholonga, ‘Imunu yanikuja naye kanihunduka.’
“Sambi nowalongela ng'ana chilawile, ili hachitsolawila mtsotoghola ‘Nene iyo Yeye.’
Nowalongelani ghendo, imunu wowose iyombokela imunu yanimtumile kombokela nene, na imunu wowose iyonitoghola nene kombokela ayula iyanitumile.”
Yesu hayamalitse kulonga apfi, kona usungu ng'ani mne ghumoyo ghwake, kalonga, “Nowalongela ghendo, yumwe wenu katsonihunduka!”
Iwanang'ina wake tsawelolesa na ng'awamanyile bae yang'ali yomlonga nani.
Imwanang'ina yumwe, iyanoghelighwe na Yesu, tsakakala habehi naye.
Simoni Petiri kampfinyighitsa na kulonga, “Mghutse yomlonga nani.”
Imwanang'ina ayo kasoghela habehi na Yesu, kamghutsa, “Imtwatsa, umlonga nani?”
Yesu kamwidika, “Imunu yula iyanimwing'a chihande che chighate chanipfabika mwibakuli, ayo iyo yeye.” Kuya kasola chihande che chighate, kachipfabika, kamwing'a Yuda, imwana wa Simoni Isikarioti.
Bahala Yuda hayasolile chighate, Setani kamwingila. Kuya Yesu kamlongela, “Tenda himahima chaubama kutenda!”
Lekeni mna iwanu wala iwang'ali wakuja tsahaduhu imunu iyamanyile ule Yesu tsakamlongela pfino.
Kwaapfila Yuda tsakakala mkinda mkoba ghwa sendi, iwanang'ina wangi wapfikitsa Yesu yang'ali yomlongela Yuda yaghende kughula ipfinu ipfibamighwa mne Ichihungo, au kuweng'a chinu iwahingwa.
Bahala Yuda hayasolile chighate, kalawa kunze. Tsaikala nechilo.
Yuda hayokile, Yesu kalonga, “Lelo utunitso we Imwana we Imunu woneka, na utunitso we Imulungu woneka kubitila yeye.
Ka utunitso we Imulungu ughubulighwa kubitila yeye, kuya Imulungu imwenyegho katsoughubula utunitso we Imwana we Imunu, na baho katsomtunya.
Wanangu, nitsokala namwe chidodo. Mtsombama, lekeni sambi nowalongela achila chaniwalongele Wayahudi, ‘Kwanighenda ng'amdaha kutsa bae.’
Lelo noweng'a laghitso lya sambi. Mwinoghele. Ka pfaniwanoghele, namwe mwinoghele pfipfo.
Mng'enoghela, iwanu wose watsomanya mwemwe mwa iwanang'ina wangu.”
Simoni Petiri kamghutsa, “Imtwatsa, ughenda kwani?” Yesu kamwidika, “Ng'udaha bae sambi kuniwinza hanu hanighenda, lekeni hambele kutsoniwinza.”
Petiri kamghutsa, “Imtwatsa ule sidaha kukuwinza sambi? Nene nitsokulapfila ughima wangu.”
Kuya Yesu kamwidika, “Ghweghwe kodaha kundapfila nene ughima wako? Nokulongela ghendo, jogholo ng'ana yeke bae kutsonibela mala ndatu!
“Mleke kughanzika mne mimoyo yenu, mtogholeni Imulungu, pfipfila mnitoghole nene.
Mng'anda kwa Aba wangu kuna pfiheleto pfingi, ka si pfipfo bae, ning'awalongele. Lelo noghenda kuwaandalila hanu henu.
Ning'aghenda, noghenda kuwaandalila hanu henu, nitsowoyila na kuwasola ili mkale hala nene hanikala.
Mwoimanya inzila ya hanu hanighenda.”
Tomasi kamghutsa, “Imtwatsa, ng'atumanyile bae kwani kwaughenda, lelo tuimanyetse inzila ayo?”
Yesu kamwidika, “Nene na inzila, kweli na ughima. Haduhu imunu iyodaha kughenda kuna Aba ka ng'abitile bae kuna nene.
Mng'animanyile nene, pfipfila mng'ammanyile Aba wangu na kulawa sambi mwommanya na mumwona.”
Filipi kamlongela, “Imtwatsa, tulanguse Aba ayo, ayo iyo yuyo yatumbama.”
Yesu kamlongela, “Filipi nikala namwe matsuwa mengi, ung'ali ng'unimanyile bae? Imunu wowose iyambonile nene kamwona Aba. ‘Ule kwolonga tulanguse Aba?’
Apfi ng'autoghola bae ka nene namghati mwa Aba, naye kamghati mwangu? Mbuli tsanilonga si tsangu bae, ila Aba iyokala mghati mwangu kosang'ana ng'onde yake.
Mnoghole haniwalongela nene namghati mwa Aba naye Aba kamghati mwangu. Ka ng'utoghola imbuli yangu, toghola pfinu pfanitendile.
Nowalongela ghendo, imunu iyonitoghola nene katsotenda apfila pfanendile, katsotenda ipfinu pfikulu kubita pfino, kwaapfila nene noghenda kwa Aba wangu.
Nitsowatendelani chochose chamlomba kwa taghwa lyangu, ili utunitso wa Aba woneke kubitila Imwana.
Mng'anilomba ichinu chochose kwa taghwa lyangu, nitsowatendelani.
“Ka mwoninoghela, mtsoghakinda ghamalaghitso ghangu.
Nitsomlomba Aba, naye katsomwing'ani Mwapfitsi yungi, katsokala namwe ghamatsuwa ghose.
Ayo Ghumuhe ghwe Imulungu iyoighubula kweli. Iwanu wa isi ng'awodaha bae kumbokela kwaapfila ng'awodaha bae kumwona na kummanya. Lekeni mwemwe mwommanya, kwaapfila kokala namwe na katsokuwa mghati mwenu.
“Hanitsakuka, siwaleka bae mliyeka ka wachuwa, nitsowoyila.
Mne ichipindi chidodo ichikutsa iwanu wa iisi ng'awatsombona keli bae, lekeni mwemwe mtsombona, kwaapfila namghima, pfipfila namwe mtsakuwa waghima.
Mne litsuwa alyo mtsomanya nene namghati mwa Aba wangu, namwe mwamghati mwangu, na nene namghati mwenu.
“Iwanu wala iwobokela ghamalaghitso ghangu na kughakinda, iwanuwo woninoghela. Aba wangu katsowanoghela iwanu wala iwonoghela nene, pfipfila nene nitsowanoghela na nitselangusa kuna wawo.”
Yuda, si Yuda Isikarioti bae kalonga, “Imtwatsa, ebali kobama kwilangusa kuna twetwe tuliyeka na si kwe iwanu we isi yose bae?”
Yesu kamwidika, “Imunu wowose iyonoghela nene katsoghakinda ghamalaghitso ghangu. Aba wangu katsomnoghela, nene na Aba wangu tutsomtsila na kukala naye.
Imunu wowose ing'ayoninoghela ng'oghakinda bae ghamalangulitso ghangu. Ghamalangulitso ighamuhulike si ghangu bae, gholawa kwa Aba iyanitumile.
“Niwalongela ghano haning'ali namwe.
Aba wangu katsowatumila Mwapfitsi, Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka kwa taghwa lyangu, katsowalangulitsa mmanye ipfinu pfose na kuwatenda mkumbuke chila ichinu chaniwalongele.
“Nowalekela iamani, noweng'a iamani yangu. Siweng'a bae ka isi pfaitendagha. Mleke kughanzika. Mleke kupfuka.
Tsamuhulika haniwalongele, ‘Noghenda, kuya nitsowoyila.’ Ka tsamninoghela mng'adeng'elele nene kughenda kwa Aba, kwaapfila Aba kamkulu kubita nene.
Niwalongela ng'ana ghalawile, ili haghatsolawila mtoghole.
Sitsolonga keli bae namwe mbuli nyingi, kwaapfila imkulu wa iisi ino kakutsa. Hayo kahela ngupfu kuna nene,
lekeni iwanu we iisi wamanye ka nene nomnoghela Aba, nosang'ana chichila Aba wangu chayanilaghitse. “Mwinuke tukeni.
“Nene na mtsabibu wa kweli, na Aba wangu iyo iyolima.
Koghana ghamaputila ghose ghang'aghakweleka, kohalilila ghamaputila ghose ighakweleka ghamatunda, ili gheleke ng'ani.
Mwemwe ma mdegheta kwa imbuli ila yaniwalongeleni.
Mkale mghati mwangu, na nene nitsokala mghati mwenu. Haduhu putila ilidaha kweleka lyenyegho, lyobamighwa likale mne mbiki. Pfipfila namwe ng'amdaha bae kweleka ghamatunda mbaka mkale mghati mwangu.
“Nene na mtsabibu, mwemwe mwa ghamaputila. Imunu ang'akala mghati mwangu na nene ng'ale mghati mwake, ayo katsakweleka ghamatunda mengi, kwaapfila mwemwe mliyeka ng'amdaha bae kutenda chochose.
Imunu wowose ka ng'okala bae mghati mwangu, keghala ne putila ilikwasighwa kutali na kunyala. Ghamaputila agho ghokungighwa, ghokwasighwa mmoto, gholakatsighwa.
Mng'akala mghati mwangu na mbuli tsangu tsing'akala mghati mwenu, mlombe chinu chochose chambama, mtsokwing'ighwa.
Aba wangu kotunyighwa mwemwe mng'eleka ghamatunda mengi, namwe mtsakuwa iwanang'ina wangu.
Nowanoghela mwemwe ka Aba pfayanoghele nene. Lelo mkale aku mwomanya ka nomnoghelani.
Mng'aghakinda malaghitso ghangu, mtsokala mne unoghelo wangu, ka nene pfanighakindile ghamalaghitso gha Aba na nikala mne unoghelo wake.
“Tsaniwalongela agha ghose ili ndeng'elelo yangu ikale mghati mwenu na ndeng'elelo yenu ileke kumala.
Alino laghitso lyangu, mwinoghele ka pfaniwanoghele mwemwe.
Kuduhu unoghelo mkulu kubita unoghelo wa imunu iyoulapfa ughima wake kwaajili ya sale tsake.
Mwemwe mwa sale tsangu mng'atenda achila chaniwalaghitse.
Sitsowakema keli mwemwe watumwa bae, kwaapfila mtumwa ng'omanya sang'ano tse mtwatsa wake. Lekeni nowakema mwemwe sale tsangu, kwaapfila niwalongela ghose ghanihulike kwa Aba wangu.
Si mwemwe bae yamnisaghule, ila nene yanimsaghuleni mghende na mweleke ghamatunda, ghamatunda ing'aghoupa bae. Kuya Aba katsomwing'ani chochose ichamlomba kwa taghwa lyangu.
Alino laghitso lyangu kuna mwemwe, Mwinoghele.
“Iwanu we iisi wang'awahilani, mmanye ka tsawalongola kunihila nene.
Mng'awile we iisi ino, iwanu wa iisi wang'amnogheleni ka iwanu wake. Lekeni kwaapfila mwemwe si wa isi ino, ila nene nimsaghulani mghati mwe iwanu we isi ino. Kwaajili ayo iwanu wa isi womuhilani.
Mkumbuke chaniwalongele, ‘Imtumwa si mkulu bae kubita imtwatsa wake.’ Ka iwanu wandununza nene, namwe pfipfila watsowadununzani. Wang'aghakinda ghamalangulitso ghangu, pfipfila watsoghakinda ghamalangulitso ghenu.
Watsowatendela agha ghose kwaapfila mwemwe mwa iwanu wangu, kwaapfila ng'awammanyile bae yula iyanitumile.
Ka sitsile bae na kulonga nawo, wang'alongile wahela nzambi, lekeni sambi ng'awodaha bae kwiyamila ka wahela nzambi.
Imunu iyonihila nene, pfipfila komhila Aba wangu.
Ka sighatendile bae kuna wawo aghala ng'ana ghatendighwe ne imunu yungi, sambi wang'akalile wahela nzambi. Lekeni sambi wapfona pfihulo pfanendile, nawo wang'ali wotuhila wose nene na Aba wangu.
Lekeni ilawila pfino kutimitsa imbuli iyandikighwe mne Ghamalaghitso ghawo. ‘Wanihila hela.’
“Nitsomtuma Mwapfitsi kulawa kwa Aba, ayo Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka. Ayo katsoghubula ukweli we Imulungu, na katsowalongela mbuli tsangu.
Pfipfila namwe mwobamighwa kulonga mbuli tsangu, kwaapfila mkala na nene kulawa mwanduso.
Yesu kaghendelela kulonga, “Niwalongela ghano ghose ili mleke ukwaghitsa ukutoghola kwenu.
Iwanu watsowawinga mne Ing'anda ya Ukulombela, na chipindi chakutsa chila yatsowakoma katsopfikitsa komlapfila Imulungu inambiko.
Iwanu watsowatendelani ghano kwaapfila ng'awommanya Aba, wala ng'awonimanya nene.
Nimlongelani ghano, ili chipindi hachitsakutsa mkumbuke aghala ghaniwalongele. “Siwalongele ghano kulawa mwanduso kwaapfila tsanahamwe namwe.
“Sambi noghenda kwa ayula iyanitumile, haduhu imunu iyonighutsa, ‘Ughenda kwani?’
Kwaapfila niwalongela agha ghose, mimoyo yenu imema usungu.
Lekeni nowalongela ghendo, pfinogha kuna mwemwe nene mbuke, kwaapfila ka sikuka bae, Mwapfitsi ng'atsowatsilani. Lekeni ning'aghenda, nitsomghalilani.
Naye hayatsakutsa, katsolangusa iwanu wa iisi ka wakwalangula pfihile mne mbuli tsa nzambi, na mne mbuli tsa kutenda haki na Imulungu pfayohigha.
Tsawatotsa mne mbuli tsa nzambi, kwaapfila ng'awanitoghole,
Tsawatotsa mne mbuli tsa haki, kwaapfila noghenda kwa Aba, wala ng'amtsombona keli,
na watotsa mne mbuli tsa kuhigha, kwaapfila Setani ma kahighighwa.
“Nina mbuli nyingi tsa kumlongelani, ila sambi ng'amdaha bae kutsidudumila.
Ghumuhe ghwe Imulungu hayatsokutsa, katsowalongotsa mmanye ukweli wose. Ng'atsolonga kwa uwetso wake bae, katsolonga aghala ghayahulike na katsowalongela aghala ighakutsa.
Hayo katsonitunya nene, kwaapfila katsowalangulitsa ghose ghayapatile kuna nene.
Pfinu pfose iyali napfo Aba pfa kwangu. Ndo mana tsaniwalongela Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka katsowalangulitsa aghala ghayapatile kuna nene.
“Mne ichipindi chidodo ng'amtsombona keli, kuya ichipindi chidodo hambele mtsombona.”
Iwanang'ina wake wangi weghutsa, “Angu mbuli yachi ino hayalongile, ‘Mne ichipindi chidodo ng'amtsombona keli, kuya ichipindi chidodo hambele mtsombona?’ Kuya kolonga ‘Kwaapfila noghenda kwa Aba?’
Waghendelela kwighutsa, ‘Ichipindi chidodo’ choni? Ng'atumanyile kolonga imbuli yachi.”
Yesu kamanya chawabamile kumghutsa, apfo kawalongela, “Pfii mweghutsa tsanongile choni hanilongile, ‘Mne ichipindi chidodo ng'amtsombona keli, kuya ichipindi chidodo hambele mtsombona’?
Nowalongela ghendo, mtsolila na kwona usungu mne mimoyo, lekeni isi itsodeng'elela. Mtsakuwa na usungu, ila usungu wenu utsoghaluka ndeng'elelo.
Ipinga hayakweleka, kana usungu kwaapfila ichipindi chake cha kudununzika chipfika, lekeni imwana ang'oneka kosemwa usungu wake, kodeng'elela kwaapfila imwana koneka muisi.
Namwe pfipfila, sambi mna usungu, lekeni nitsomwonani keli, namwe mtsodeng'elela, kuduhu imunu iyodaha kuwaboka ndeng'elelo yenu.
“Mne litsuwa lila ng'amtsonilomba chinu chochose. Nowalongela ghendo, Aba wangu katsomwing'ani chinu chochose chamlomba kwa taghwa lyangu.
Mbaka sambi ng'amlombile chinu chochose kwa taghwa lyangu. Mlombe, mtsobokela, na ndeng'elo yenu itsotimila.
“Niwalongelani agha ghose kwa tsimbuli. Ichipindi chitsakutsa sitsolonga namwe kwa tsimbuli bae, ila nitsolonga mwatsimwatsi mbuli tsa Aba wangu.
Mne litsuwa lila mtsolomba kwa taghwa lyangu. Siwalongela ka nitsowalombela kwa Aba,
Aba imwenyegho kowanoghelani. Kowanoghelani kwaapfila tsamninoghela nene na mtoghola ka ndawa kwe Imulungu.
Ndawa kwa Aba, nitsa muisi, lelo noileka iisi nakuya kwa Aba.”
Kuya iwanang'ina wake wamlongela, “Sambi kwolonga mwatsimwatsi bila ya tsimbuli.
Lelo twomanya kwomanya ghose, apfo ng'atubama bae kukughutsa keli. Chinu achi chotutenda tutoghole ka kulawa kwe Imulungu.”
Yesu kawedika, “Pfii sambi mtoghola?”
Ichipindi chakutsa, kuya ma chipfika, mwemwe wose mtsopwililika, chila imunu na ukaye yake. Mwemwe wose mtsondeka niliyeka. Lekeni siliyeka bae, kwaapfila na hamwe na Aba wangu.
“Niwalongela agha ghose, ili mwilunge na nene na mkale tseghamba. Mne iisi ino mtsodununzika. Lekeni mwighangamitse! Niihuma iisi ino.”
Yesu hayamalitse kulonga ghano, kalola kulanga kalonga, “Aba, chipindi chipfika. Watende iwanu wawone utunitso wa Imwanagho ili wawone utunitso wako kubitila Imwanagho.
Kwaapfila kumwing'a Imwanagho uwetso kwe iwanu wose, ili yaweng'e ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose wose waumwing'ile.
Auno iwo ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose, iwanu wakumanye ghweghwe Imulungu uliyeka wa kweli, na wammanye Yesu Kiristu yaumtumile.
Niulangusa utunitso wako mne isi kwa kuimalitsa ng'onde yungaile niisang'ane.
Aba! Lelo unitunye, utunitso uhula yaning'ali nawo hamwe naghwe hala ng'ana iisi ilumbighwe.
“Nilitenda taghwa lyako limanyike kwa iwanu wala yungaile muisi. Tsawakala wako, naghwe kungaya nene nawo waikinda imbuli yako.
Sambi womanya ipfinu pfose pfaungaile pfolawa kuna ghweghwe.
Kwaapfila niweng'a mbuli tsaungaile nawo watsitoghola, na wamanya ghendo ndawa kuna ghweghwe, watoghola ghweghwe kunituma.
“Nowalombela. Siwalombela bae iwanu we iisi, ila nowalombela iwanu wala yungaile, kwaapfila awano iwo wako.
Iwanu wose wanilinawo wako, na wose yaulinawo wangu. Na utunitso woneka kubitila wawo.
Sambi nakutsa kuna ghweghwe, sili muisi keli bae, lekeni wawo wang'ali muisi. Aba Mwenzeluka! Walolese kwa ngupfu ya taghwa lyaungaile, ili wawe wamwe ka ghweghwe na nene pfatuli wamwe.
Haning'ali nawo, niwalolesa kwa ingupfu ya taghwa lyako lyaungaile. Kuduhu imunu yaghile ila yula iyasaghulighwe kwagha, ili Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka ghatimile.
“Sambi nakutsa kuna ghweghwe, tsanonga ghano ghose haning'ali muisi, ili wameme ndeng'elo yangu mne mimoyo yawo.
Niweng'a imbuli yako na iwanu wa iisi wawahila, kwaapfila wawo si wa iisi ino bae, na nene si wa iisi ino bae.
Sikulomba bae uwalapfe muisi, ila nokulomba uwalolese na ayula Yehile.
Nene si wa iisi ino, nawo pfipfila si wa iisi ino bae.
Uwatende wawe wako kwa kweli yako, imbuli yako iyo kweli.
Niwatuma muisi, ka ghweghwe pfaunitumile muisi.
Nelapfa imwenyegho kwaajili yawo, ili nawo welapfe ghendo kuna ghweghwe.
“Siwalombela wawo waliyeka bae, ila pfipfila nowalombela iwanu wala iwatsonitoghola kwa usenga wawo.
Nolomba wose wawe wamwe. Aba, nolomba wakale mghati mwetu, ka ghweghwe pfaukala mghati mwangu na nene pfanikala mghati mwako, ili iwanu we isi watoghole ka ghweghwe kunituma.
Niweng'a utunitso uhula yungaile, ili wawe wamwe ka twetwe pfatuli wamwe.
Nene niwe mghati mwawo, naghwe uwe mghati mwangu, nolomba wawe wamwe ghendo, ili iwanu we iisi wamanye ghweghwe kunituma, na nene niwanoghela ka ghweghwe pfaunoghele nene.
“Aba, nobama iwanu wala yungaile wakale na nene hanu hanili, ili wawone utunitso wangu. Utunitso yungaile, kwaapfila tsakuninoghela ng'ana iisi ilumbighwe.
Aba unoghile! Iwanu we iisi ng'awakumanyile bae, lekeni nene nokumanya, na wano womanya ka kunituma.
Nikutenda wakumanye, na nitsoghendelela kutenda apfo, ili unoghelo wako kuna nene ukale mghati mwawo, na nene nikale mghati mwawo.”
Yesu hayamalitse kulomba, yeye ne iwanang'ina wake waloka kumwambu mwa lwanda Kidironi. Hanu hala tsahana mghunda we mibiki, Yesu na iwanang'ina wake wengila amwo.
Yuda, iyamhunduke Yesu, tsakahamanya hanu hala kwaapfila Yesu tsakaghendagha ne iwanang'ina wake.
Apfo Yuda kaghenda mne mghunda aghwo, hamwe ne kingili lya asikali na iwabetetsi wangi iwatumighwe na iwatambika wakulu na Mafarisayo. Tsawatsa ne pfitasa, pfiwenge na tsisilaha.
Yesu tsakamanya ghose ighatsomlawila, kawaghendela kawaghutsa, “Mumbama nani?”
Wamwidika, “Yesu wa Natsareti,” Yesu kawalongela, “Nene iyo yuyo.” Yuda iyamhunduke tsakakala kema baho hamwe nawo.
Yesu hayawalongele, “Nene iyo yuyo,” woya kuchughu waghwa hasi.
Yesu kawaghutsa keli, “Mumbama nani?” Wamwidika, “Yesu wa Natsareti.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Tsaniwalongela nene iyo yuyo, ka mwombama nene, walekeni wano wangi woke.”
Kalonga apfi ili aghala ghayalongile ghatimile, “Iwanu awala yungaile simwaghitse bae hata yumwe.”
Kuya Simoni Petiri, tsakakala ne limaghe, kalisomola, kamsepula ghutwi lye kujilo imtumwa we Imtambika mkulu. Imtumwa ayo tsakakemighwa Malikusi.
Yesu kamlaghitsa Petiri, “Yuitsa limaghe lyako. Pfii ndeke kuchinwa ichikombe cha maghayo chayangaile Aba?”
Kuya asikali na imbala wawo na iwabetetsi we Ing'anda ye Imulungu ya Wayahudi wamghogha Yesu, wamwoha,
tanu wamghala kwa Anasi. Anasi tsakakala mkwe yake Kayafa, Kayafa tsakakala Imtambika mkulu mwaka ghula.
Kayafa iyo yuyula iyawalongele iwakulu we Wayahudi, ng'apfu imunu yumwe yafe kwaajili ye iwanu wose.
Simoni Petiri ne imwanang'ina yungi wamuwinza Yesu. Kwaapfila imwanang'ina yula yungi tsakamanyika ne Imtambika mkulu, apfo kengila hamwe na Yesu hachikuta che Iwatambika wakulu,
lekeni Petiri kema kunze mwa libani. Kuya imwanang'ina yula yungi koya, kalonga na ipinga mbetetsi wa libani, kuya ipinga ayo kamlongela Petiri yengile.
Ipinga iyobetetsa libani kalonga na Petiri, “Apfi naghwe si imwanang'ina wa imunu yuno?” Petiri kamwidika, “Bae, nene si mwanang'ina wake.”
Kwaapfila tsakukala na chipfeghetsi, iwatumwa na iwabetetsi wabwina ghumoto, wang'ali wakota. Naye Petiri kema hamwe nawo, kota ghumoto.
Imtambika mkulu kamghutsa Yesu mbuli tsa iwanang'ina wake ne ghamalangulitso ghake.
Yesu kamwidika, “Nilonga mwatsimwatsi ne iwanu wose, ghamatsuwa ghose tsanilangulitsa mne tsing'anda tsa ukulombela na mne tsing'anda tse Imulungu, hawetinganila hamwe Wayahudi wose. Silongile bae ichinu chochose chinyelenyele.
Ule kwonighutsa nene? Waghutse yawanihulike. Waghutse chaniwalongele, womanya chanilongile.”
Yesu hayalongile ghano, imbetetsi yumwe yemile habehi kamtsaba Yesu chibawo kalonga, “Ule umwidika apfi Imtambika mkulu?”
Yesu kamwidika, “Ka nilonga ichinu chihile, uchilonge hambele he iwanu. Lekeni ka nongesa, ule kwonitowa?”
Kuya Anasi kamghala Yesu kwa Kayafa Imtambika mkulu aku yang'ali kohighwa.
Simoni Petiri tsayang'ali kema baho kakota ghumoto, iwanu wangi wamghutsa, “Ambe naghwe pfipfila kwa imwanang'ina wa imunu yuno?” Petiri kabela kalonga, “Si nene bae.”
Imtumwa yumwe wa Imtambika mkulu, ndughu yake imunu yula iyasepulighwe lighutwi na Petiri kamghutsa, “Angu sikwonile naye mne mghunda we imibiki?”
Petiri kabela keli, kalonga, “Bae.” Bahala jogholo keka.
Nemitondotondo Yesu tsakasolighwa mne ing'anda ya Kayafa kaghalighwa mne ing'anda ye imkulu wa Roma. Iwakulu we Wayahudi ng'awengile mng'anda, kwaapfila ng'awabamile wehe, ili wadahe kuchija ichijo che Ipasaka.
Pilato kalawa kunze kawaghutsa, “Apfi imunu yuno kana ghomba lyachi?”
Wamwidika, “Ka ng'atendile totso tung'alekile kukughalila.”
Pilato kawedika, “Msoleni mkamuhighe kwa ghamalaghitso ghenu.” Wayahudi wamwidika, “Ng'atubamighwa bae kumkoma imunu wowose.”
Ilawila pfino ili tsitimile mbuli tsayalongile Yesu kulangusa katsokufatse.
Kuya Pilato kengila keli mng'anda, kamghutsa Yesu, “Apfi ghweghwe kwa Imndewa wa Wayahudi?”
Yesu kamghutsa, “Agha ghaunighutsa ghalawa mghati mwako au iwanu wangi wakulongela mbuli tsangu?”
Pilato kamwidika, “Apfi kwopfikitsa nene na Myahudi? Iwanu wako na iwatambika wako wakulu wakughala kuna nene. Angu utendile choni?”
Yesu kalonga, “Undewa wangu si wa iisi ino bae, undewa wangu ung'awile wa iisi ino, iwatumighwa wangu wang'etowile na Wayahudi waleke kungogha. Bali undewa wangu si wa iisi ino!”
Pilato kamghutsa, “Apfi ghweghwe kwa mndewa?” Yesu kamwidika, “Ghweghwe kwolonga nene namndewa. Nyelekighwa na nitsa muisi kwaajili ayo, kulonga mbuli tsa ukweli. Iwanu wose iwonoghela ukweli wonitegheletsa.”
Pilato kamghutsa, “Ukweli chinu chachi?” Kuya Pilato kalawa keli kunze kawalongela Wayahudi, “Sonile bae ghomba lya kumhigha imunu yuno.
Lekeni mne ichihendo chenu, nomlekelagha mwohighwa yumwe mne ghamatsuwa gha Ipasaka. Mwobama niwalekeleleni Imndewa wa Wayahudi?”
Wakemelela, “Bae, si yuno bae! Twombama Baraba! Baraba tsaang'ali yoboka iwanu.”
Kuya Pilato kalaghitsa Yesu yasolighwe, yapfapulighwe pfiboko.
Asikali wabota fiya ya tsimiwa walika mwitwi mwake. Kuya wampfatsa lighwanda lye chindewa.
Wamghendela wamlongela, “Mbukwa, imndewa wa Wayahudi!” Wamtowa makofi.
Pilato kalawa keli kunze kawalongela Wayahudi, “Mlole, nomlapfa kunze na mmanye sipatile ghomba lya kumhigha.”
Apfo Yesu kalawa kunze kapfala fiya ya tsimiwa na lighwanda lye chindewa. Pilato kawalongela, “Mlole! Hayuno ano!”
Iwatambika wakulu na iwabetetsi we Ing'anda ye Imulungu hawamwonile Yesu, wakemelela, “Muwambe! Muwambe!” Pilato kawalongela, “Msoleni mkamuwambe mna msalaba mwemwe muwenyegho. Sonile bae ghomba lya kumhigha.”
Wayahudi wamwidika, “Twetwe tuna Laghitso, na kwa Laghitso alyo kobamighwa yafe, kwaapfila tsakalonga yeye ka Imwana we Imulungu.”
Pilato haulike apfi, kapfuka ghendo.
Kengila keli mng'anda kamghutsa Yesu, “Angu ulawila kwani?” Lekeni Yesu ng'edike bae.
Pilato kamlongela, “Kwolema kulonga na nene? Ng'umanyile bae ka nina uwetso wa kukulekelela au kukuwamba mna msalaba?”
Yesu kamwidika, “Ghweghwe kuna uwetso wa kunihigha kwaapfila kwing'ighwa uwetso awo ne Imulungu. Apfo ayula iyangalile kuna ghweghwe kana nzambi ng'ulu ng'ani.”
Pilato hayahulike apfi, kabama nzila ya kumlekelela Yesu. Lekeni Wayahudi wadama, “Ung'amlekelela, ghweghwe si sale wa mndewa wa Roma bae! Imunu wowose iyolonga ka imndewa komlema mndewa wa Roma!”
Pilato hayahulike apfi, kamghala Yesu kunze, kakala mne ichighoda cha mlamutsi hanu hamanyike ka “Chibwalu che Ghamabwe.” Kwa Chihebulaniya “Gabatsa.”
Ikala saa sita nemisi, litsuwa lya kuiyandaa Ipasaka. Pilato kawalongela Wayahudi, “Ayuno ano imndewa wenu!”
Lekeni Wayahudi wakemelela, “Mkome! Mkome! Mumuwambe mna msalaba!” Pilato kawaghutsa, “Mwombama nimuwambe imndewa wenu?” Iwatambika wakulu wamwidika, “Twetwe twahela imndewa yungi ila imndewa wa Roma yaliheka!”
Kuya Pilato kamlapfa Yesu, kaweng'a wakamuwambe. Kuya asikali wamsola Yesu.
Naye kalawa aku kaughala msalaba wake, kughenda hanu hakemighwe Bombwe lya Litwi. Kwa Chihebulaniya hokemighwa Goligota.
Baho wamuwamba Yesu mna msalaba, pfipfila tsawawawamba iwanu weli, yumwe ubali ungi na yungi ubali ungi, Yesu haghatighati.
Pilato kandika chitango kachika mna msalaba. Kandika, “Yesu wa Natsareti, Imndewa wa Wayahudi.”
Wayahudi wengi wachisoma chitango chino, kwaapfila hanu hayawambighwe Yesu kukala habehi na ghumji, na chitango chandikighwa kwa Chihebulaniya, Chilatini na Chigiriki.
Iwatambika wakulu wamlongela Pilato, “Leka kwandika ‘Imndewa wa Wayahudi,’ ila imunu yuno tsakalonga yeye ka imndewa wa Wayahudi.”
Pilato kawedika, “Chanyandike, nyandika.”
Asikali hawamuwambile Yesu, wasola ghamaghwanda ghake, waghaghola mabughulu mane, chila bughulu kwa asikali yumwe. Pfipfila wasola na lighwanda lyake ing'alisonighwe bae, ilifumighwe kwandusila mchanya mbaka hasi.
Asikali welongetsa, “Tuleke kulidegha, leka tutowe simbi tulole yuhi yatsolipata.” Ilawila pfino ili ghatimile Ghamaandiko Maenzeluka igholonga, “Wegholela ghamaghwanda ghangu lighwanda lyangu walitowela simbi.” Apfi pfipfo pfawatendile asikali awo.
Habehi na msalaba wa Yesu tsawema mai wake, lumbu wa mai wake na Mariya mwehe wa Kileopa, na Mariya Magidalena.
Yesu hawonile mai wake ne imwanang'ina wake iyamnoghele wema hala, kamlongela mai wake, “Mai, ayuno iyo imwanagho.”
Kuya Yesu kamlongela imwanang'ina wake, “Ayuno ano iyo mai wako.” Kulawa baho, imwanang'ina ayo kamsola Mariya, kakala naye ukaye yake.
Yesu tsakamanya ka ghose ghatimila, ili Ghamaandiko Maenzeluka ghatimile, Yesu kalonga, “Nakwona ng'ilu.”
Hanu hala tsahakala na siki, apfo wapfabika lidodoki mne siki, walika mne lubiki lwa msopo, wamwikila mumlomo.
Yesu hayafonzile siki ayo kalonga, “Ghatimila.” Kenamisa litwi lyake, kafa.
Tsalikala Litsuwa lya Kwiyandaa, na litsuwa liwinzile likala Litsuwa lya Sabato. Iwakulu we Wayahudi ng'awabamile bae ng'uli tsisighale mna misalaba mne Litsuwa lya Sabato. Kwaapfila Litsuwa lya Sabato tsalikala litsuwa kulu. Wayahudi wamlomba Pilato ghamaghulu ghe iwanu iwawambighwe ghabenighwe, kuya mitufi yawo ihulumsighwe.
Apfo asikali waghenda, waghabena ghamaghulu gha imunu wa mwanduso iyawambighwe na Yesu, kuya waghabena ghamaghulu gha ayula yungi.
Lekeni hawapfikile kwa Yesu wampfika ma kafa, ng'awabenile bae ghamaghulu ghake.
Asikali yumwe kamuhoma Yesu mlubapfu kwa mghowa, bahala ilawa idamu na ghamatsi.
Imunu iyonile ichilawile katulongela ukalangama tutoghole. Na acho chayalongile kalongesa, kuya yeye komanya ka kolongesa.
Ilawila pfino Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka ghatimile, igholonga, “Kuduhu mpate wake yautsobenighwa.”
Kuya Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka gholonga keli, “Watsomlola imunu yula iwamuhomile.”
Hambele, Yosefu imunu iyolawila ghumji ghwa Arimataya, kamlomba Pilato amwing'e lukuli lwa Yesu. Yosefu tsakakala imwanang'ina wa Yesu kwa chinyelenyele kwaapfila tsakawapfuka iwakulu wa Wayahudi. Pilato kamlongela Yosefu alusole lukuli lwa Yesu, apfo Yosefu kaghenda kalusola lukuli lwa Yesu.
Yosefu tsakelongotsa na Nikodemu, imunu yula iyaghendile kwa Yesu chilochilo aho mwanduso. Nikodemu tsakaghala pishi tano tse upfumba iunung'ila iutifighwe ne ubani.
Iwanu weli walusola lukuli lwa Yesu, walupfatsa sanda hamwe ne upfumba iunung'ila kwa ichihendo cha Wayahudi cha kutsika.
Hanu hayawambighwe Yesu tsakukala na mghunda we mibiki, mumghunda amwo tsakukala na mango lya kutsikila lya sambi, kuduhu imunu iyatsikighwe mmango amwo.
Kwaapfila likala Litsuwa lya Wayahudi kwitanda, na kwaapfila mango ikala habehi, walwika amwo lukuli lwa Yesu.
Nemitondotondo litsuwa lya mwanduso lya juma, kung'ali ne ichisi, Mariya Magidalena tsakaghenda mne imango, kona libwe lilapfighwa kulawa mne libani lya imango.
Katsuma kaghenda kwa Simoni Petiri ne imwanang'ina yungi, yula iyanoghelighwe na Yesu, kawalongela, “Walusola lukuli lwa Imtwatsa mmango, ng'atumanyile bae wamwikile kwani!”
Kuya Petiri ne imwanang'ina yungi waghenda mmango.
Wose weli tsawatsuma, lekeni yula imwanang'ina yungi katsuma kubita Petiri, kalongola kupfika mmango.
Kenama kasungulila mghati, tsakona sanda, lekeni ng'engile bae mghati.
Kuya Simoni Petiri, iyakalile kuchughu kwake, kapfika kengila mmango. Kona isanda,
na chighwanda ichohighwe mwitwi mwa Yesu, ng'achikalile bae hamwe ne isanda ila chipfingilisa na chikala chiliyeka.
Kuya imwanang'ina yula yungi iyandusile kupfika mmango, pfipfila kengila mghati, kona, katoghola.
Tsawang'ali ng'awoghamanya bae Ghamaandiko Maenzeluka ighalongile Yesu kobamighwa yatsilihuke.
Kuya iwanang'ina woya ukaye.
Mariya tsakema kunze mwa imango kolila. Hayang'ali yolila, kenama kasungulila mghati mwe imango,
kawona malaika weli iwapfalile ghamaghwanda matselu, wakala hanu halukalile lukuli lwa Yesu, yumwe tsakakala halikalile litwi, yungi kakala haghakalile ghamaghulu.
Wamghutsa, “Mai, angu choulila choni?” Mariya kawedika, “Wamsola Imtwatsa wangu, na simanyile bae wamwikile kwani!”
Kuya Mariya kahunduka kamwona Yesu kema hala, lekeni ng'amanyile ka tsakakala Yesu.
Yesu kamghutsa, “Mai, angu choulila choni? Umbama nani?” Mariya kapfikitsa kolonga ne imbetetsi wa imghunda we imibiki, apfo kamlongela, “Imtwatsa, ka kumsola, nongele umwikile kwani, ng'ende nikamsole.”
Yesu kamlongela, “Mariya!” Mariya kamuhundukila kamlongela kwa Chihebulaniya “Raboni!” Mana yake Imlangulitsi.
Yesu kamlongela, “Leka kunikinda, kwaapfila sina ng'ende bae kwa Aba. Ghenda ukawalongele ndughu tsangu nene nakuya kwa Aba wangu na Aba wenu pfipfila, Imulungu wangu na Imulungu wenu.”
Mariya Magidalena kaghenda kawalongela iwanang'ina ka kamwona Imtwatsa, kawalongela achila Yesu chayamlongele.
Mihe ila mne litsuwa lya mwanduso lya juma, iwanang'ina hawetingane hamwe aku imibani ihindighwa kwa kuwapfuka iwakulu we Wayahudi, Yesu katsa, kema mghati mwawo, kawalongela, “Mkale tseghamba.”
Hayamalitse kulonga ghano, Yesu kawalangusa ghamoko ghake na lubapfu lwake. Iwanang'ina tsawadeng'elela hawamwonile Imtwatsa.
Yesu kawalongela keli, “Mkale tseghamba. Ka Aba pfayanitumile nene, na nene nomtumani mwemwe.”
Kuya kawahumulila, kawalongela, “Bokeleni Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka.
Mng'awaleghusila nzambi iwanu, iwanu awo woleghusighwa nzambi, ka ng'amuwaleghusila nzambi, iwanu awo ng'awoleghusighwa nzambi bae.”
Mwanang'ina yumwe mne iwanang'ina kumi na weli, Tomasi, iyakemighwe Basa, ng'awile baho hayatsile Yesu.
Apfo iwanang'ina wangi wamlongela, “Tumwona Imtwatsa!” Lekeni Tomasi kawalongela, “Ka sitsona bae ng'opfu tsa misumari mne ghamoko ghake na kwika chidole changu mne ng'opfu atso, na kwika ghumoko ghwangu mlubapfu mwake, sitoghola bae.”
Haghabitile matsuwa manane iwanang'ina wetingana keli mng'anda, na Tomasi tsakakala nawo. Imibani tsaihindighwa, lekeni Yesu katsa, kema mghati mwawo, kawalongela, “Mkale tseghamba.”
Kuya Yesu kamlongela Tomasi, “Wike chidole chako hano, ulole ghamoko ghangu, kuya gholosa ghumoko ghwako ughwike mlubapfu mwangu. Leka kulema kutoghola, utoghole!”
Tomasi kamwidika, “Imtwatsa wangu na Imulungu wangu!”
Yesu kamlongela, “Kwotoghola kwaapfila kumbona? Wabweda awala iwotoghola bila kumbona!”
Yesu tsakatenda pfihulo pfingi hayakalile ne iwanang'ina wake, ila ng'apfandikighwe bae mne ichitabu chino.
Lekeni mbuli tsino tsandikighwa ili mghendelele kutoghola Yesu ka Kiristu Mkombotsi, Imwana we Imulungu na kwa kumtoghola muwe ne ughima kwa ngupfu ya taghwa lyake.
Hambele Yesu kawalawila keli iwanang'ina wake mmbalimbali mwa tsimbu Tiberiya. Tsakawalawila pfino,
Simoni Petiri, Tomasi iyakemighwe Basa, Nasanaeli iyalawile Kana ghumji ghwa Galilaya, iwana wa Sebedayo, ne iwanang'ina wangi weli wa Yesu wose tsawakala hamwe.
Simoni Petiri kawalongela, “Noghenda kulowa iwasomba.” Wamlongela, “Twoghenda naghwe.” Apfo wengila mumnumbwi, lekeni chilo chila chose ng'awapatile chinu bae.
Nemitondotondo, Yesu tsakema mmbalimbali mwa tsimbu, lekeni iwanang'ina ng'awamtangile bae ka tsa Yesu.
Kuya Yesu kawaghutsa, “Sale tsangu, ng'ampatile chinu bae?” Wamwidika, “Ona, ng'atupatile chinu.”
Kuya Yesu kawalongela, “Mwase ichelo lubali lwa kumoso lwe imnumbwi, mtsolowa iwasomba.” Apfo wasa ichelo mmatsi na ng'awadahile bae kukwegha kwaapfila tsawapata iwasomba wengi ng'ani.
Kuya imwanang'ina yumwe, iyanoghelighwe na Yesu kamlongela Petiri, “Ayuno ka Imtwatsa.” Bahala Simoni Petiri ayahulike yula tsakakala Imtwatsa, keyoha lighwanda lyake kwaapfila tsakalitsula. Kuya kadalukila mmatsi.
Iwanang'ina wangi watsa mne mnumbwi, kwaapfila ng'awakalile hatali ne isi, ila tsawakala utali wa ghamaghulu miya imwe, tsawakwegha ichelo ichimemile iwasomba.
Hawapfikile mmbalimbali mwa tsimbu, wona ghumoto na iwasomba wekighwa mchanya mwake, na chighate.
Yesu kawalongela, “Mngaye iwasomba wangi wamlowile.”
Kuya Simoni Petiri kadina mne mnumbwi, kakwegha ichelo mmbalimbali mwe tsimbu, ichimemile iwasomba wakulu miya imwe na hamsini na tatu. Hata ka tsakukala ne iwasomba wengi, ichelo ng'achidegheke bae.
Yesu kawalongela, “Mtse mje.” Kuduhu imwanang'ina iyaghetsile kumghutsa, “Ghweghwe uli nani?” Kwaapfila wammanya tsakakala Imtwatsa.
Yesu katsa, kasola pfighate ne iwasomba wala, kaweng'a.
Aluno lukala lwakadatu Yesu kuwalawila iwanang'ina wake kulawa hayatsilihuke.
Hawamalitse ukuja, Yesu kamghutsa Simoni Petiri, “Simoni imwana wa Yohane, apfi kwoninoghela kubita wano?” Simoni Petiri kamwidika, “Ona, Imtwatsa ghweghwe kwomanya ka nene nokunoghela.” Yesu kamlongela, “Wadime iwanang'olo wangu.”
Kuya Yesu kamghutsa lwa keli, “Simoni imwana wa Yohane, apfi kwoninoghela.” Petiri kamwidika, “Ona, Imtwatsa ghweghwe kwomanya ka nene nokunoghela.” Yesu kamlongela, “Wadime iwang'olo wangu.”
Yesu kamghutsa keli lwa kadatu, “Simoni mwana wa Yohane, kwoninoghela?” Simoni Petiri kona usungu kwaapfila Yesu kamghutsa lwa kadatu, “Apfi kwonoghela?” Kamwidika, “Imtwatsa, kwomanya pfinu pfose, kwomanya ka nokunoghela.” Yesu kamlongela, “Wadime iwang'olo wangu.
Nokulongela ghendo, haung'ali msongolo, tsakutsowela kupfala msipi imwenyegho na kughenda hanu haubamile, lekeni hautsolala kutsogholosa ghamoko ghako, imunu yungi katsokwoha na kukughala hanu ng'aubamile bae kughenda.”
Yesu kalonga pfino, kulangusa Petiri pfayatsokufa na kumtunitsa Imulungu. Kuya Yesu kamlongela, “Niwinze!”
Petiri kahunduka, kamwona imwanang'ina yula iyanoghelighwe na Yesu kowawinza. Imwanang'ina yuno tsakakala yula iyakalile na Yesu mne ichijo cha Ipasaka na iyamghutsile, “Mtwatsa, yuhi iyatsokuhunduka?”
Petiri hamwonile, kamghutsa Yesu, “Imtwatsa, ayuno naye?”
Yesu kamwidika, “Ka nombama akale mghima mbaka hanikuya, ghweghwe ubama choni? Ghwe niwinze!”
Apfo mbuli tsenela kwa wandughu kuwa imwanang'ina yula ng'atsakufa bae. Lekeni Yesu ng'alongile ka imwanang'ina yuno ng'atsakufa. Bali kalonga, “Ka nombama akale mghima mbaka hanikuya, ghweghwe ubama choni?”
Ayuno iyo imwanang'ina iyalongile agha ghose na kughandika, na twetwe twomanya ghano ghayalongile gholongesa.
Yesu tsakatenda pfinu pfingi. Pfinu pfose pfing'andikighwe chimwechimwe, isi yose ing'akalile yahela hanu he ukwika ipfitabu ipfandikighwe.
Kuna imkulu Teofili, Mne ichitabu changu chanongole ukwandika, tsanyandika ipfinu pfose Yesu pfatendile na pfayalangulitse, kulawa handuse isang'ano yake
mbaka litsuwa lila hayasolighwe kughenda kulanga. Ichipindi ng'ana yasolighwe, tsakaweng'a malaghitso kwa uwetso wa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka iwatumighwa wala iyawasaghule.
Matsuwa alubaini kulawa hafile, Yesu kawalawila mala nyingi na kwilangusa ghendo ka tsakakala mghima. Wamwona, naye kalonga nawo mbuli tse Undewa we Imulungu.
Na litsuwa limwe, hayang'ali yakuja nawo kawalaghitsa pfino, “Mleke kulawa Yerusalemu, ila mwemwe mbete achila chayalongile Aba, iyo Ghumuhe yamnihulike nomlonga.
Yohane tsakabatitsa kwa ghamatsi, lekeni matsuwa chidogho ighakutsa, mtsobatitsighwa kwa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka.”
Iwatumighwa hawetingane na Yesu, wamghutsa, “Imtwatsa, pfii matsuwa ghano kutsowoyitsila Waisiraeli Undewa?”
Yesu kawalongela, “Matsuwa na msimu pfamne uwetso wa Aba wangu, mwemwe ng'ambamighwa bae kumanya itsakuwa tsuwachi.
Lekeni Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka hatsowahulumkila, mtsobokela ingupfu, namwe mtsakuwa iwakalangama wangu ako Yerusalemu, mne tsiisi tsa Yudeya na Samariya, na muisi mwose.”
Hayamalitse kulonga apfo kasolighwa kulanga, aku wose womlola, kuya liwingu limghubika nawo ng'awamwonile keli bae.
Hawang'ali wotsodola tsinenge kulanga Yesu hang'ali yakuka, bahala iwanu weli iwapfalile maghwanda matselu wema habehi yawo,
walonga, “Mwemwe iwanu wa Galilaya! Ebali mwima hano mwolola kulanga? Yesu yuyuno, iyasolighwe kuna mwemwe kughenda kulanga, katsakuya keli ka pfipfo pfammwonile kakuka kulanga.”
Kuya iwatumighwa woya Yerusalemu kulawa mne Chidunda cha Mitseituni, utali wa chilomita ka imwe kulawa mkaye.
Hawapfikile mkaye, wengila mne chiheleto cha kuchanya chawang'ali wokalagha. Nawo tsawakala Petiri, Yohane, Yakobu, Andereya, Filipi, Tomasi, Batalomeyo, Matei, Jakobu imwana we Alifayo, Simoni Mkanani na Yuda mwanaghe Jakobu.
Awo wose tsawaghendelela kwitingana hamwe ukulomba, hamwe ne iwapinga wangi, na Mariya mai wake Yesu, na ndughu tsake Yesu.
Litsuwa limwe mne matsuwa agho, Petiri kema haghati he iwanu iwetingane. Tsawakala iwanu miya imwe na ishilini.
Petiri kalonga, “Ndughu tsangu, tsaibamighwa Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka ghatimile. Ghumwande Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka tsakalonga kubitila Daudi, Daudi tsakatabili mbuli tsa Yuda, iyawalongotse iwanu wala iwamghoghile Yesu.
Yuda tsakakala miyetu kwaapfila tsakasaghulighwa na Yesu tusang'ane naye.”
Yeye tsakaghula mghunda kwa sendi tsapatile kwa sang'ano yake ila ihile, kaghwa hamo, katulika na usapi wake wose ulawa kunze.
Iwanu wose wa Yerusalemu tsawahulika mbuli atso, apfo mne chilugha chawo waghukema mghunda aghwo Akelidama, mana yake “Mghunda ghwe Idamu.”
Petiri kalonga, “Kwaapfila yandikighwa mne Tsaburi, ‘Ing'anda yake ikale uchuwa, imunu wowose aleke kukala mng'anda amwo.’ Pfipfila yandikighwa, ‘Imunu yungi yeng'ighwe isang'ano yake ya kulongotsa.’
“Apfo yobamighwa kumsaghula imunu yumwe kulawa mne iwanu iwelongotse na twetwe matsuwa ghose Imtwatsa Yesu hayang'ali na twetwe,
kulawa Yohane hayang'ali yobatitsa mbaka litsuwa lila Yesu hayasolighwe kulawa kuna twetwe kughenda kulanga. Imunu ayo kobamighwa yawe mkalangama miyetu wa kutsilihuka kwa Yesu.”
Apfo wasaghula mataghwa meli, Yosefu iyakemighwe Barisaba, pfipfila tsakakemighwa Yusti, na wa keli Matiasi.
Kuya walomba, “Imtwatsa, ghweghwe kwoimanya imimoyo ye iwanu wose. Lelo utulanguse, imunu yuhi yumsaghule mne iwanu wano weli
ili asole isang'ano ye utumighwa yailekile Yuda na kughenda hanu hake imwenyegho.”
Kuya watowa simbi, na simbi imghwila Matiasi, naye kongetsighwa mne iwatumighwa wala kumi na yumwe.
Litsuwa lya Pentekoste halipfikile, wose iwamtoghole Yesu tsawetingana hanu hamwe.
Bahala, iwanu wahulika chinu choduma kulawa kulanga ka beho liduma kwe ingupfu, limemesa ing'anda yose iwakalile iwanu awo.
Kuya, pfilawila ipfinu ipfikoneka ka milambi ya ghumoto, napfo pfipwililika na kukala mchanya mwa chila imunu.
Wose tsawamemesighwa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka, wandusa kulonga lugha tsingi ka Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka pfayawatendile wadahe kulonga.
Ako Yerusalemu tsakukala na Wayahudi iwompfuka Imulungu iwalawile chila isi.
Hawahulike litsi alyo, iwanu wetingana hamwe. Wose wakangawala kwaapfila chila imunu kawahulika wolonga kwa chilugha chake imwenyegho.
Wakangawala ng'ani, walonga, “Pfii, iwanu wano wose watuwahulika wolonga pfino, si Wagalilaya bae?
Ebali lelo, chila imunu mna twetwe kowahulika wolonga chokaye?
Wamwenga twolawila Paritiya, Midiya na Elamu, wamwenga wolawila Mesopotamiya, Yudeya, Kapadokiya, Ponto na isi ya Asiya,
Na wamwenga wolawa Firigiya, Pamfiliya, Misiri na kaye tsa Libiya tsili habehi na Kirene, wamwenga wetu wolawila Roma,
na Wayahudi ne iwanu iwengile mne dini ya Chiyahudi, wamwenga wolawila Kirete ne Arabiya. Twetwe wose twowahulika wolonga ipfinu pfikulu pfayatendile Imulungu kwa lugha tsetu iwenyegho.”
Wose wakangawala, wapfuka, weghutsa, “Achi nacho choni?”
Lekeni iwanu wangi wawabetsa, walonga, “Iwanu wano wapatika!”
Kuya Petiri kema nawo iwatumighwa wala kumi na yumwe, kandusa kuwalongela iwanu awo kwa kukemelela, “Wayahudi weyangu, na mwemwe mwose yamkala hano Yerusalemu, mleke niwalongele, namwe mtegheletse ghoya chanilonga.
Iwanu wano ng'awapatike bae ka pfamlonga. Sambi saa tatu nemitondo!
Achino ichilawile chicho chayalongile Yoeli, nabii we Imulungu,
‘Imulungu kolonga, mne matsuwa gha utsighilo nitsowamwaghila iwanu wose Ghumuhe ghwangu. Iwana wenu na neghe tsenu watsopeta mbuli yangu, iwasongolo wenu watsakona ghamaono, ne iwabala wenu watsolota tsindoto.
Hata iwatumwa wangu pfipfila, wose iwamale ne iwapinga nitsowamwaghila Ghumuhe ghwangu mne matsuwa agho, nawo watsopeta mbuli yangu.
Nitsotenda pfihulo uchanya kulanga, ne ipfinu pfa ukukangawatsa muisi, kutsakuwa na idamu, ghumoto na hosi tito.
Litsua litsoghaluka kuwa chisi, na lwetsi lutsakuwa ludung'u ka idamu, aho ng'ana lipfike litsuwa lila likulu lye utunitso we Imtwatsa.
Ne imunu wowose iyatsolomba kwa taghwa lye Imtwatsa katsokombolighwa.’
“Iwanu we Isiraeli, mtegheletse imbuli ino! Yesu wa Natsareti tsakakala imunu yane uwetso iyalangusighwe kuna mwemwe kwe pfihulo, pfinu pfa kukangawatsa ne ipfitango pfatendile Imulungu kuna mwemwe kubitila yeye, ka mwemwe iwenyegho pfammanya.
Kulawa mwanduso Imulungu imwenyegho tsakabama Yesu aghoghighwe na mwemwe, namwe mumkoma kwa kuwaleka iwanu wehile wamuwambe mna msalaba.
Lekeni Imulungu kamtsiliula Yesu, kamkombola kulawa mne usungu we lifwa kwaapfila ng'aidahike bae lifwa limwohe.
Mana Daudi tsakalonga pfino mbuli tsa Yesu, ‘Tsanimwona Imtwatsa hambele hangu matsuwa ghose Kwaapfila yeye ka habehi hangu Sitsohighisika bae.
Apfo, ghumoyo ghwangu ghwodeng'elela, lulimi lwangu lolonga kwa kudeng'elela, na lukuli lwangu lutsokala kwa lolelo,
kwaapfila ng'utsondeka kutsimu bae, ng'utsomleka bae Mwenzeluka wako yole mne likabuli.
Kunilangusa inzila ye ughima, kutsonimemesa ndeng'elo kwaapfila kwa hamwe na nene.’
“Wandughu, ndekeni nonge mwatsimwatsi mbuli tsa aba wetu mkulu Daudi. Yeye kafa, katsikighwa na likabuli lyake lyabahano mbaka leloli.
Lekeni kwaapfila Daudi tsakakala nabii we Imulungu, kamanya ka Imulungu kelaha kuna yeye ka ang'amtendile mtsukulu wake yumwe yawe imndewa ka pfayakalile Daudi.
Daudi tsakalongola kughona agho ighatsotendighwa ne Imulungu, apfo kalonga mbuli tse ukutsilihuka kwa Kiristu Mkombotsi, hala hayalongile, ‘Ng'alekighwe kutsimu bae, wala lukuli lwake ng'alolile bae.’
“Imulungu iyo yamtsilihule ayo Yesu, na twetwe twa iwakalangama we chinu acho.
Naye Yesu henulighwe na kwikighwa lubali lwa kujilo lwe Imulungu, kabokela Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka kulawa kwa Aba wake ka pfayatulongele. Kuya katughalila Ghumuhe ayo, na acho chicho chamchona sambi na kuchihulika.
Kwaapfila si Daudi bae iyasolighwe kughenda kulanga, ila yeye kalonga, ‘Imtwatsa kamlongela Imtwatsa wangu, ukale hano hane ubali wangu wa kujilo
mbaka niwatende wehile wako wawe hasi ha ghamaghulu ghako.’
“Apfo iwanu wose wa Isiraeli wobamighwa wamanye ghendo, Imulungu kamtenda ayu Yesu imumuwambile mna msalaba yawe Imtwatsa na Kiristu Mkombotsi.”
Iwanu hawahulike agho, ghawahoma ghendo mmoyo, wawaghutsa Petiri na iwatumighwa wangi, “Ndughu tsetu, lelo tutendatse?”
Petiri kawedika, “Chila imunu yatsileke nzambi tsake, mbatitsighwe kwa taghwa lya Yesu Kiristu, na Imulungu katsomleghusilani nzambi tsenu. Namwe mtsobokela laghano lye Imulungu, iyo Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka.
Kwaapfila laghano lila tsamwikilighwa mwemwe, na iwana wenu, na iwanu wose iwali kutali na awala wose iwatsokemighwa ne Imtwatsa Imulungu wetu.”
Kwa mbuli nyingi Petiri kawakomangitsa iwanu, kalonga, “Mwikombole kulawa mweleko ghuno ghuhile.”
Iwanu wengi watsitoghola mbuli tsake, wabatitsighwa. Mne litsuwa lila, iwanu ka 3,000 wongetseka.
Awo wose waghendelela kulangulitsighwa ne iwatumighwa wa Yesu, wakala hamwe ka iwandughu, wamegha ichighate na walomba hamwe.
Iwatumighwa tsawatenda pfihulo na pfinu pfa kukangawatsa pfingi, chila imunu ang'ali yopfuka.
Iwatoghole wose waghendelela kukala hamwe na kwigholela ipfinu pfawo.
Tsawang'ali wohutsa mali tsawo ne ipfinu pfawo na kwigholela sendi ka chila imunu pfayabamile.
Waghendelela kwitingana mne ing'anda ye Imulungu chila litsuwa. Lekeni hawang'ali womegha chighate, tsawetingana mne tsing'anda tsawo na ukuja ichijo acho kwa ndeng'elo na ghumoyo mtselu.
Tsawamtunitsa Imulungu ne iwanu wose wanoghelesighwa nawo. Na chila litsuwa Imtwatsa yang'ali yowongetsela iwanu iwang'ali wokombolighwa.
Litsuwa limwe, Petiri na Yohane wang'ali woghenda mne ing'anda ye Imulungu saa tisa nemisi, iwanu hawoghendagha kulomba.
Iwanu tsawang'ali womghalagha imunu yumwe iyakalile chimbete kulawa kwelekighwa kwake. Chila litsuwa iwanu wang'ali womwika imunu ayo mne libani lye ing'anda ye Imulungu ilikemighwe “Libani linoghile” ili yalombe chochose kwe iwanu iwang'ali wakwingila mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu.
Hayawonile Petiri na Yohane wakwingila mng'anda, kawalomba wamwing'e chochose.
Nawo wamtsodolela tsinenge. Kuya Petiri kamlongela, “Tulolese!”
Naye kawalola, kalolela kupata ichinu chochose kulawa kuna wawo.
Lekeni Petiri kamlongela, “Nahela sendi, ila nokwing'a achila chanili nacho, kwa taghwa lya Yesu Kiristu wa Natsareti, winuke ughende!”
Kuya kamkinda ghumoko ghwake ghwa kujilo, kamwapfila ukwinuka, bahala ghamaghulu, na mbweghele tse imunu ayo tsiwa na ngupfu.
Kadaluka kwa ghamaghulu ghake na kwandusa ukughenda. Kuya kengila nawo mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu, koghenda kodaluka daluka aku komtunya Imulungu.
Iwanu wose hawamwonile koghenda na komtunya Imulungu,
wamtanga yeye kayuyula iyang'ali yolomba habehi na “Libani linoghile” lye Ing'anda ye Imulungu, weduka, wakangawala kwa achila ichimlawile.
Imunu ayo hang'ali yoghenda na Petiri na Yohane, iwanu wose wang'ali wokangawala na wandusa kutsumila hanu ha kwitinganila hakemighwe “Ukumbi wa Selemani.”
Petiri honile apfi, kawalongela, “Iwanu wa Isiraeli, ebali mwokangawala kwe ichinu chino? Mbona mwotutsodolela tsinenge ka twetwe itumtendile imunu yuno yadahe kughenda kwa ngupfu tsetu iwenyegho au kwaapfila tunogha hambele he Imulungu?
Imulungu wa Abrahamu, Isaka na Yakobu, Imulungu we iwabala wetu, tsakamtunya Yesu imtumighwa wake, ila mwemwe mumghogha ili yakomighwe, namwe mumlema hambele ha Pilato, lekeni Pilato tsakabama yamlekelele yoke.
Tsakakala Mwenzeluka na imunu yanoghile, lekeni mwemwe mumlema, mumlomba Pilato yamlekelele imunu iyakomile.
Mwemwe mumkoma yeye yali mwanduso wa ughima, lekeni Imulungu kamtsilihula kulawa mne lifwa, na twetwe twa wakalangama we ichinu acho.
Kwa kutoghola taghwa lya Yesu, imunu ayu immwona na imummanya keng'ighwa ingupfu. Ukutoghola na taghwa lya Yesu pfimhonetsa ghendo imunu ayu ka wose pfammwona.
“Lelo ndughu tsangu, nomanya ka mwemwe ne iwakulu wenu mghatenda agho kwaapfila ng'ammanyile bae.
Lekeni Imulungu katimitsa achila chayalongile ghumwande kubitila manabii wose we Imulungu, ka ibamighwa Kiristu wake yadununzike.
Lelo mtsileke nzambi tsenu mmuyile Imulungu, ili yawaleghusile nzambi tsenu. Mng'atenda apfo,
mtsakongetsighwa ngupfu tsa muhe kulawa kwe Imtwatsa, naye katsomtuma Yesu Kiristu, iyamsaghulileni.
Kobamighwa akale kulanga mbaka ichipindi che Imulungu kutenda ipfinu pfose pfiwe pfa sambi chipfike, ka pfayalongile ghumwande kubitila manabii wake wahenzeluka.
Kwaapfila Musa tsakalonga, ‘Imtwatsa Imulungu wenu katsomghalileni nabii wake ka pfanighalile nene, ayo katsolawila mghati mwenu mwenyegho, mwobamighwa muhulikitse chila ichinu chayowalongela.
Imunu wowose iyolema kumuhulikitsa nabii ayo, katsobaghulighwa kulawa kwe iwanu we Imulungu na katsokomighwa.’
Wanabii wose we Imulungu, kwanzila Samweli na awala iwatsile hambele, tsawalonga mbuli tse ipfinu ipfilawila mne matsuwa ghano.
Imulungu tsakawalapfila mwemwe laghano kubitila wanabii we Imulungu, namwe mwamghati mwa laghano lila lyatendile Imulungu ne iwabala wenu, ka pfayamlongele Abrahamu, ‘Kubitila mweleko ghwako, nitsowabaliki iwanu wose muisi mwose.’
Imulungu hayamtsilihule imtumighwa wake, tanu kamtumilani mwemwe, yawabaliki na yamtende chila yumwe wenu aleke kutenda ghehile.”
Petiri na Yohane hawang'ali wowalongela iwanu, iwatambika wakulu ne iwakulu wa wakalitsa Ing'anda ye Imulungu hamwe na Masadukayo tsawapfika.
Tsawona maya ng'ani kwaapfila iwatumighwa awo wang'ali wolangulitsa iwanu ka Yesu katsilihuka, ichinu ichikonesa ghendo ka iwanu iwafile watsotsilihuka.
Apfo wawaghogha Petiri na Yohane, waweka mwigheletsa mbaka ilupfi yake, kwaapfila tsaikala nemihe.
Lekeni iwanu wengi iwahulike imbuli yawailongile Petiri na Yohane watoghola, na iwanu iwatoghole tsawongetseka na kuwa ka iwanu elufu tano.
Litsuwa liwinzile, iwakulu wa Wayahudi, iwabala ne iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso wetingana hamwe ako Yerusalemu.
Tsawetingana ne Imtambika mkulu Anasi, Kayafa, Yohane, Alekisanda na iwanu wangi wa lukolo lwa Imtambika mkulu.
Tsawaweka hambele hawo, wawaghutsa, “Mwemwe mtenda ichinu chino kwa ingupfu yachi na kwa taghwa lya nani?”
Kuya Petiri, aku kamema Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka, kawedika, “Mwemwe iwakulu ne iwabala we iwanu!
Mng'atughutsa leloli kwa chinu chila chinoghile chayatendelighwe imunu yula chimbete, na pfahonile,
iwanu wose wa Isiraeli mwobamighwa mmanye ka imunu ayu iyemile hano hambele henu, kamghima ghendo kwe ingupfu ya taghwa lya Yesu Kiristu wa Natsareti, yula imumuwambile mna msalaba na Imulungu iyamtsilihule kulawa mne lifwa.
Yesu iyo ‘Libwe lyamlemile mwemwe iwatsenga ng'anda, sambi liwa libwe kulu lya ukwalambatsa.’
Yeye yaliyeka iyodaha kuwakombola iwanu, kwaapfila mne isi yose kuduhu taghwa lyatwing'ighwe twetwe tukombolighwe nalyo.”
Iwabala awo wa libalatsa tsawamanya ka Petiri na Yohane tsawakala iwanu mbughilambughila ing'awasomile bae, apfo wakangawala kuwona pfawalongile pfinoghile, wamanya kuwa wahamwe na Yesu.
Lekeni kwaapfila wamwona imunu yahonetsighwe kema hamwe na Petiri na Yohane, ng'awadahile bae kulonga ichinu chochose.
Apfo wawalaghitsa walawe kunze kwe libalatsa, kuya wandusa kwilongetsa iwenyegho.
Weghutsa, “Tuwatende choni iwanu wano? Chila imunu iyokala Yerusalemu komanya kuwa watenda chihulo chikulu, na twetwe ng'atudaha bae kubela.
Lekeni ili imbuli ino ileke kwenela ng'ani kwe iwanu, tuwakanye waleke kulonga keli ne imunu wowose kwa taghwa lya Yesu.”
Kuya wawakema keli mng'anda, wawalaghitsa waleke kulonga keli na kulangulitsa kwa taghwa lya Yesu.
Lekeni Petiri na Yohane wawedika, “Mlamle mwemwe muwenyegho, chihi ichinoghile kwe Imulungu, kuwahulikitsa mwemwe au kumuhulikitsa Imulungu.
Kwaapfila ng'atudaha bae kuleka kulonga aghala ghatwonile na ghatuhulike.”
Kuya iwabala awo wa libaratsa wawakanya ghendo na kuwalekelela. Ng'awadahile bae kuweng'a atsabu kwaapfila iwanu wose wakala womtunitsa Imulungu kwa achila ichilawile.
Imunu ayo iyahonetsighwe tsakakala imbala wa kubita miyaka alubaini.
Bahala Petiri na Yohane hawalekilighwe, woya kwa weyawo, wawalongela achila chawalongelighwe ne iwatambika wakulu ne iwabala.
Nawo hawahulike imbuli ayo wamlomba Imulungu kwa ghumoyo ghumwe. “Imtwatsa, ghweghwe kwa Maumba yulumbile kulanga na iisi, ne ibahali na pfose ipfili mumo!
Tsakulonga kwa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka kubitila kwa imtumighwa wako, aba wetu Daudi, ‘Ebali wanu wali muisi waghudubuka? Mbona iwanu wokwalangula ipfinu ipfilihela mana?
Iwandewa we iisi weyandaa, ne iwatawala watingana hamwe, kumpinga Imtwatsa na Kiristu wake.’
Kwaapfila Herodi, Pontiyo Pilato, iwanu we Isiraeli ne iwanu iwali si Wayahudi watingana mne ghumji ghuno kumpinga Yesu, Imtumighwa wako Mwenzeluka, yumsaghule yawe Kiristu.
Tsawatingana watenda aghala ghubamile kulawa ghumwande kwa uwetso wako ghalawile.
Lelo ghwe Imtwatsa, ulole pfawatutenda tupfuke, utwapfile twetwe iwatumwa wako tudahe kulonga imbuli yako bila kupfuka.
Gholosa ghumoko ghwako kuhonetsa iwanu, utende ipfitango na pfihulo kwa taghwa lya Yesu Imtumighwa wako Mwenzeluka.”
Hawamalitse kulomba, hanu hala hawatinganile tsahahighisighwa. Wose wamemesighwa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka, na waghendelela kulonga imbuli ye Imulungu bila kupfuka.
Iwanu wose iwatoghole tsawakala na ghumoyo ghumwe na tsawalangula chinu chimwe. Kuduhu imunu wowose iyalongile ka ichinu iyalinacho chake aliyeka, ila wegholela ipfinu pfose pfawakalile napfo.
Iwatumighwa waghendelela kulonga kwa ngupfu Imbuli ya ukutsilihuka kwa Yesu, na Imulungu kawabaliki ghendo.
Tsahaduhu imunu wowose iyakalile kahela ichinu. Iwanu iwakalile ne imighunda au tsing'anda tsawang'ali wohutsa, na waghala sendi
kwe iwatumighwa, nawo tsawatsighola kwa chila imunu ka pfayabamile.
Tsakukala na Mlawi yumwe iyolawila Kupulo, iyakemighwe Yosefu. Iwatumighwa tsawamwing'a taghwa Balinaba, mana yake “Mghuma ghumoyo iwanu”
Ayu tsakakala na mghunda, kauhutsa, kasola sendi atso katsighala kwe iwatumighwa.
Tsakukala ne imunu yumwe iyakemighwe Ananiya na mwehe wake Safila. Nawo pfipfila tsawahutsa mghunda ghwawo.
Lekeni Ananiya kabaghula sendi tsingi katsifisa, aku mwehe wake kapfimanya. Sendi itsisighale katsighala kwe iwatumighwa.
Petiri kamghutsa, “Ananiya, ebali kumleka Setani yengile mmoyo mwako, na kukutenda umghutsukile Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka, kwa kupfisa sendi tsingi tsupatile kwa kuhutsa mghunda?
Pfii mghunda ng'aghukalile ghwako bae hala ng'ana ghuhutsighwe? Na hauutsile sendi atso ambe tsikala tsako, utsitendele chochose choubama. Ebali lelo kulamla kutenda ichinu chino? Ng'umghutsukile imunu bae, ila kumghutsukila Imulungu!”
Bahala Ananiya hayahulike apfo, kaghwa hasi, kafa. Iwanu wose iwahulike imbuli ayo wapfuka ng'ani.
Kuya iwasongolo watsa, walupfatsa sanda lukuli lwake, wamlapfa kunze, wamtsika.
Masaa madatu haghabitile, mwehe wake naye kengila, ng'amanyile bae aghala ighalawile.
Petiri kamghutsa, “Unongele, atsino tsitso sendi tsose tsampatile ghweghwe na mmale wako kwa kuhutsa mghunda ghwenu?” Naye kedika, “Ona, tsitso.”
Petiri kamlongela, “Ebali ghweghwe na mmale wako mlamula kumghetsa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka ghwe Imtwatsa? Tegheletsa, iwanu iwamtsikile mmale wako, sambi wa hane libani, nawo pfipfila watsokusola ghweghwe!”
Bahala ipinga ayo kaghwa mmaghulu mwa Petiri, kafa. Kuya iwasongolo wala wengila, wampfika ma kafa. Apfo wamlapfa naye kunze, wamtsika habehi na mmale wake.
Iwanu wose iwamtoghole Yesu ne iwanu wangi iwahulike mbuli atso wapfuka ng'ani.
Iwatumighwa tsawatenda pfihulo na pfinu pfingi pfa kukangawatsa mghati mwe iwanu. Na iwanu wose iwatoghole wang'ali wotingana hamwe mne chitala cha mtingano cha Selemani.
Kuduhu imunu wowose ing'ayamtoghole Yesu iyaghetsile kwilunga nawo. Hata apfo, iwanu wangi tsawang'ali wowatunya.
Iwanu iwamtoghole Imtwatsa wang'ali wakongetseka ng'ani, iwamale ne iwapinga.
Mbaka iwanu wang'ali wowaghala iwatamu mne tsinzila na kuwawasisa mlutsatsi na mne ghamatemvu ili Petiri ang'abita sisila lyake liwabitile wangi wawo.
Iwanu wengi, iwalawile mne miwambo ya habehi na Yerusalemu watsa, wawaghala iwatamu na iwanu wane ipfinyamkela, nawo wose wahonetsighwa.
Kuya Imtambika mkulu na weyaghe, iwanu we chikingili cha Masadukayo wa hanu hala, wawonela chepfu iwatumighwa.
Wawaghogha Iwatumighwa, wawoha mwigheletsa.
Lekeni nechilo malaika we Imtwatsa kapfughula imibani ya ligheletsa, kawalapfa kunze, kawalongela,
“Mghende, mkeme mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu, muwalongele iwanu imbuli yose ye ughima uno wa sambi.”
Iwatumighwa wahulikitsa, kuya nemitondotondo wengila mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu, wandusa kulangulitsa. Imtambika mkulu na weyaghe hawapfikile, wawakema hamwe iwanu we libaratsa kulu lye iwabala we Isiraeli, kuya wawatuma iwanu mchifungo wawaghalile iwatumighwa wala.
lekeni iwanu wala hawapfikile ako, ng'awawapfikile bae iwatumighwa wa Yesu mwigheletsa. Apfo woya mne libaratsa na kuwalongela imbuli ayo,
walonga, “Tupfika ligheletsa lihindighwa pfipfila, na iwakalitsi wokalitsa imibani. Lekeni hatufughule imibani, ng'atumpfikile imunu wowose mng'anda.”
Imkulu we iwokalitsa ing'anda ye Imulungu ne iwatambika wakulu hawahulike imbuli ayo, wakangawala ichinu chachi ichiwapatile iwatumighwa wa Yesu.
Kuya imunu yumwe katsa, kawalongela, “Iwanu wala yamuwekile mwigheletsa, sambi wamne Ing'anda ye Imulungu, wowalangulitsa iwanu!”
Baho imbala we iwokalitsa ing'anda ye Imulungu hamwe ne iwanu wake waghenda mne ing'anda ye Imulungu, wawasola na kuwaghala mne libaratsa. Lekeni ng'awawaghoghile bae kwe ingupfu, kwaapfila wawapfuka iwanu wang'awatowile na ghamabwe.
Kuya wawaghala iwatumighwa wa Yesu na kuwemisa hambele ha libaratsa. Imtambika mkulu kawaghutsa,
“Ambe tuwaghoma mwemwe ukulangulitsa kwa taghwa lye imunu ayu, lelo mlole achi chamtendile! Mghenetsa ghamalangulitso ghenu Yerusalemu yose na mwobama kulonga twetwe iwo itumtendile yafe!”
Petiri na iwatumighwa wala wangi wedika, “Twobamighwa tumhulikitse Imulungu, si iwanu bae!
Imulungu we iwabala wetu kamtsilihula Yesu, imumkomile kwa kumuwamba mna msalaba.
Imulungu kamwinula mbaka lubali lwake lwe kujilo, kawa Chilongotsi ne Mkombotsi, awatende iwanu we Isiraeli watsileke nzambi ili Imulungu awaleghusile nzambi tsawo.
Twetwe twa iwakalangama we ipfinu pfino, na Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka Imulungu iyaweng'ile iwanu wose iwomhulikitsa, naye ka mkalangama wa chinu chino.”
Iwanu wose wa libaratsa hawahulike apfo, wona maya ghendo, wabama wawakome iwatumighwa awo wa Yesu.
Lekeni Mfarisayo yumwe taghwa lyake Gamalieli, mlangulitsa ghamalaghitso yahulikitsighwe ne iwanu wose, kema hambele he libaratsa, kabama iwatumighwa wala walapfighwe kunze chidogho.
Kuya kawalongela iwanu wa libaratsa, “Waisiraeli weyangu mwalangitse ichinu ichimbama kuwatendela iwanu wano!
Ghumwande chidogho tsakalawila imunu yumwe taghwa lyake Teuda, tsakalonga yeye ka imunu mkulu, ne iwanu ka miya nne tsawamuwinza. Lekeni kakomighwa, ne iwanu wake wose wapwililika na imbuli yake imalila baho.
Kuya matsuwa ghala gha kupetighwa iwanu, tsakalawila Yuda wa Galilaya. Ayo naye tsakalongotsa iwanu wengi, lekeni naye pfipfila kakomighwa, ne iwanu wake wose iwamuwinzile wapwililika.
Lelo nowalongela mleke kuwatendela ichinu chochose chihile, muwalekele woke! Kwaapfila ka ichinu chino ne isang'ano ino ilawa kwe iwanu, itsomala.
Lekeni ka ilawa kwe Imulungu, mwemwe ng'amdaha bae kuwatenda iwanu wano waileke mbuli yawo, pfipfila mtsokuwa mwesonga ne Imulungu.” Iwanu wose we libaratsa watoghola chayalongile Gamalieli.
Wawakema iwatumighwa wala mng'anda, walamla watowighwe ipfiboko na wawaghoma waleke ukulangulitsa keli kwa taghwa lya Yesu, kuya wawalekelela woke.
Iwatumighwa wala walawa kunze mwa libaratsa wodeng'elela kwaapfila ibamighwa wapate chinyala kwaajili ya taghwa lya Yesu.
Tsawaghendelela chila litsuwa ukulangulitsa ne ukupeta Imbuli Inoghile mne ing'anda ye Imulungu na mmakaye mwe iwanu ka Yesu iye Kiristu Mkombola.
Hambele, iwanu iwamtoghole Yesu hawang'ali wakongetseka, tsakulawila manung'uniko mghati mwe iwomtoghola Yesu iwolonga Chigiriki, na awala iwolonga Chihebulaniya. Awala iwolonga Chigiriki tsawanung'unika ka iwasaka wawo wang'ali wosemighwa mne ukugholelighwa ipfijo pfa chila litsuwa.
Apfo iwatumighwa wala kumi na weli wawakema iwanu wose iwamtoghole Yesu, walonga, “Ng'apfinoghile bae twetwe kuleka kupeta imbuli ye Imulungu ili kutenda isang'ano ya kughola ipfijo.
Apfo ndughu tsetu, msaghule iwanu saba mghati mwenu iwomanyika wamema Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka na wane ihekima, na twetwe tutsoweng'a isang'ano ino.
Kuya twetwe tutsolomba na kutenda isang'ano ya kupeta Imbuli ye Imulungu.”
Imbuli ayo iwadeng'eletsa iwanu wose iwomtoghola Yesu. Wawasaghula Stefani, imunu iyotoghola ghendo na yamemile Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka, Filipi na Porokoro na Nikanori na Timona na Parimena na Nikolayo iyolawila Antiyokiya, iyengile mne dini ya Chiyahudi hao mwanduso.
Waweka hambele he iwatumighwa, nawo wawalombela na kuwekila ghamoko.
Imbuli ye Imulungu ighendelela kwenela na iwanu iwatoghole tsawongetseka ng'ani ako Yerusalemu, na iwatambika wengi nawo watoghola.
Stefani imunu iyabalikighwe ng'ani na kwing'ighwa ingupfu ne Imulungu, tsakatenda pfihulo na pfinu pfa kukangawatsa mghati mwe iwanu.
Lekeni iwanu wangi we ing'anda ye ukulombela iikemighwe Ing'anda ye iwanu iwalekelighwe, iwalawile Kirene, Alekisandiliya na wangi iwalawile Kilikiya na Asiya, wandusa kwihisanya na Stefani.
Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka kamwing'a Stefani inzewele, hayang'ali yolonga ng'awadahile bae kumuhuma.
Apfo wawasongetsa iwanu wangi walonge, “Tumuhulika Stefani kolonga mbuli tsa kuwaligha Musa ne Imulungu.”
Kwa kutenda apfi, wawasongesa iwanu, iwabala ne iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso. Apfo wamghogha Stefani wamghala mwibaratsa.
Kuya wawaghala iwakalangama we ughutsu iwalongile, “Imunu yuno ng'oleka bae kuhalonga pfihile hanu hano haenzeluke na kughalonga pfihile Ghamalaghitso gha Musa.
Kwaapfila tsatumuhulika kolonga ayo Yesu wa Natsareti katsohahinya hanu hano na kuchighelusa ichihendo ichatubokele kwa Musa.”
Wose iwakalile mne libaratsa lila wamtsodolela tsinenge Stefani, wawona uhanga wake wakoneka ka uhanga wa malaika.
Kuya Imtambika mkulu kamghutsa Stefani, “Pfii mbuli tsino tsolongesa?”
Naye Stefani kedika, “Ndughu tsangu ne aba tsangu mnitegheletse! Aba wetu Abrahamu hayang'ali ng'ana yaghende kukala Harani, Imulungu we utunitso tsakamlawila akula Mesopotamiya.
Imulungu kamlongela, ‘Ileke isi yako, waleke iwanu wa lukolo lwako, ughende kune isi yanitsokulangusa.’
Baho Abrahamu kaileka isi ya Kalidayo, kaghenda kukala Harani. Aba wake hayafile, Imulungu kamlapfa Harani katsa kukala mne isi ino yamkala sambi.
Imulungu ng'amwing'ile bae hata hanu hadoghodogho he isi ino hawe hanu hake, hata apfo tsakamlongela katsomwing'a isi ino iwe yake na iwe ye iwanaghe, hata ka matsuwa agho ng'akalile ne imwana bae.
Imulungu kamlongela pfino, ‘Iwana wako watsoghalighwa kune isi iitawalighwa ne iwanu wangi, ako watsotendighwa iwatumwa, na kutendighwa ghehile kwa miyaka maghana mane.
Lekeni nene nitsowahigha iwanu we isi ayo iitsowatenda mwemwe iwatumwa. Kuya nitsowalapfa mne isi ayo watse hanu ano wanitamanile.’
Kuya Imulungu kamwing'a Abrahamu chihendo cha kwingitsa ngoma chiwe chitango che laghano lyake. Apfo Abrahamu kamwingitsa ngoma imwanaghe Isaka litsuwa lya nane kulawa hayoneke. Na Isaka pfipfila kamwingitsa ngoma imwanaghe Yakobu. Naye Yakobu kawatendela pfipfo awala iwabala wetu kumi na weli.
