na kwa ngupfu ya pfitango pfa kukangawatsa na kwa ngupfu ye Ghumuhe we Imulungu. Apfo mne ghumwanza wangu kulawa Yerusalemu mbaka ghumkowa ghwa Iluriko, chila hanu niwapetela iwanu Imbuli Inoghile ya Kiristu.
Chonibama nene ghamatsuwa ghose nipete Imbuli ye Imulungu mne isi tsila ng'ana Kiristu yamanyike bae, ili ndeke kutsenga mna lukwalambatsa lwikighwe ne imunu yungi.
Ka Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka pfogholonga, “Awala ng'ana walongelighwe mbuli tsake, watsakona, na awala ng'ana wahulike bae mbuli tsake, watsomanya.”
Apfo kwaajili ya chinu acho ghamatsuwa mengi tsangomighwa kumwangilani.
Lekeni kwaapfila sambi nimalitsa isang'ano yangu mne isi tsino, na kwaapfila tsambama ghamatsuwa mengi kutsa kuwonani,
nololela kutenda apfo sambi. Nitsomwangilani hanibita kughenda Spania, kuya nobama mwemwe mnyapfile kupfika ako hanimalitsa kudeng'elela kukala namwe chidogho.
Lekeni sambi noghenda Yerusalemu kuwasang'anila iwanu we Imulungu iwali ako.
Mana iwanu we Imulungu wa Makedoniya na wa Akaya wona pfinogha kuwachangila wahenzeluke we Imulungu iwali wahingwa ako Yerusalemu.
Wawo iwenyegho tsawona pfinogha kutenda apfo, na kweli tsawabamighwa ghendo watende apfo. Kwaapfila ka iwanu si Wayahudi bae wabokela pfinu pfa chimuhe kulawa kwa Wayahudi, nawo wobamighwa wawagholele Wayahudi ipfinu pfa lukuli.
Apfo, hanimalitsa ing'onde ino na kuweng'a Wayahudi achila chawachangile iwanu, nitsomwangilani mwemwe hanighenda Spania.
Hanikutsa kuna mwemwe nomanya nitsakutsa na tsibalaka ketseketse tsa Kiristu.
Lelo ndughu tsangu, nowalomba ghendo, kwa Imtwatsa wetu Yesu Kiristu na kwa unoghelo wa Ghumuhe, mwilunge na nene mnombele kwe Imulungu.
Mnombele nikomboke kulawa kwe iwanu wala ing'awomtoghola Kiristu iwali Yudeya, na mnombele isang'ano yangu muisi ya Yerusalemu itogholighwe ne iwanu wa Imulungu iwali ako.
Apfo Imulungu ang'abama, nitse kuna mwemwe aku moyo wangu wodeng'elela, mbwihile hamwe namwe.
Imulungu wa tindiwalo yakale na mwemwe wose. Ona.
Nobama mumtange lumbu wetu Fibi, yeye ka imunu yanoghile, kowasang'anila mtingano we iwanu we Imulungu iwali Kenkeliya.
Mbokeleni kwa taghwa lya Imtwatsa, ka pfawabokelighwa iwanu we Imulungu, mmwapfile chochose chila choyomlombani, kwaapfila yeye tsakawapfila iwanu wengi, tsakanyapfila na nene pfipfila.
Ndamsileni Pilisila na Akila, iwasang'ana wayangu mne ing'onde ya Yesu Kiristu.
Awo chidogho wakomighwe, ili nene nihone. Nolonga mighede kuna wawo, si nene niliheka bae, hata mitingano ye iwanu we Imulungu wa isi tsingi wolonga mighede kuna wawo.
Ndamsileni iwanu iwomtoghola Kiristu iwotingana mne ing'anda yawo. Ndamsileni na sale yangu Epaineto, iyandusile kumtoghola Kiristu mne isi ya Asiya.
Ndamsileni Mariya, iyamsang'anileni ng'ani.
Ndamsileni Andironiko na Yuniya, ndughu tsangu iwakalile mchifungo na nene. Wawo womanyika ghendo mghati mwa watumighwa, nawo tsawanongola kumtoghola Kiristu.
Ndamsileni Ampiliato, sale yangu mkulu mne kwilunga ne Imtwatsa.
Ndamsileni Uribano, msang'ana miyetu mne ng'onde ya Kiristu, na sale yangu mkulu Stakisi.
Ndamsileni Apele, iyaghetsighwe na kutogholighwa ne Kiristu. Walamseni iwanu wala iwali mkaye mwa Alistobulo.
Ndamsileni ndughu yangu Herodioni, na iwanu iwomtoghola Kiristu iwali mkaye mwa Narikiso.
Ndamsileni Trifaina na Tirifosa, mapinga iwomsang'anila Imtwatsa. Pfipfila ndamsileni lumbu jangu Perisi, pinga yungi iyamsang'anile Imtwatsa sideke.
Ndamsileni Lufo, munu iyasaghulighwe ne Imtwatsa, hamwe na mai wake, yakalile ka mai wangu pfipfila.
Ndamsileni Asinkilito na Filegoni na Herima na Patiroba na Hema na wanu wose iwomtoghola Kiristu iwali hamwe nawo.
Ndamsileni Filologo, Yuliya, Nerea na lumbu wake, Olimpa ne wahenzeluka wose we Imulungu iwali hamwe nawo.
Mwilamse mwemwe kwa mwemwe kwa ukwinonela ikunoghile. Iwanu wose iwamtoghole Kiristu womlamsani.
Ndughu tsangu, nowalombani mwalangitse na awala iwowatenda iwanu webaghule, na kuwatenda iwanu wangi waleke kughakinda malangulitso ghambokele. Mkale kutali nawo,
kwaapfila wanu ka awo ng'awomsang'anila Kiristu Imtwatsa wetu bae, ila woghasang'anila mada ghawo wenyegho. Kwa mbuli tsawo tsine umta na itsinogheletsa wowabugha iwanu iwanoghile.
Mana mwemwe mmanyika kwe iwanu wose kwa kutegheletsa, apfo nowadeng'elelani. Nombamani mkengele mne kutenda ghanoghile, na mkale mwahela matotso mna ghehile.
Imulungu wa tindiwalo, ng'atsokawa bae kumhonda Setani hasi mwe maghulu ghenu. Uluso we Imtwatsa wetu Yesu ukale namwe.
Msang'ana myangu Timoteo, komlamsani, pfipfila ndughu tsangu Lukiyo na Yasoni na Sosipateli wose womlamsani.
Na nene Teritio, inimwandikile Pauli ibaluwa ino nomlamsani kwa taghwa lye Imtwatsa.
Gayo, mwenyekaye wangu, na iwanu wose iwomtoghola Kiristu womlamsani. Erasto, mkulu wa isi ino na ndughu yetu Kwalito, wose womlamsani.
Uluso we Imtwatsa wetu Yesu ukale namwe mwose. Ona.
Lelo tumtunye Imulungu iyodaha kumtendani mwime mna Imbuli Inoghile ya Yesu Kiristu yanimpetile, na mne ughubulo we imbuli iifisighwe kulawa ghumwande.
Lekeni sambi imbuli ayo ighubulighwa na imanyika kubitila ghawandike manabii, na kwa laghitso lye Imulungu wa ghamatsuwa ghose imanyika kwe iwanu wose, ili makabila ghose ghamtoghole na ghamtegheletse.
Imulungu yaliheka iyane nzewele yatunyighwe ghamatsuwa ghose kubitila Yesu Kiristu! Ona.
Nene Pauli yanikemighwe niwe mtumighwa wa Kiristu Yesu ka Imulungu pfayabamile, na ndughu yetu Sostene.
Twomwandikilani mwemwe kanisa ilili mne ghumji ghwa Kolinto, mwemwe imkemighwe muwe iwanu wake wahenzeluka kwa ukwilunga na Yesu Kiristu, hamwe na wala wose iwali chila hanu iwomlomba Imtwatsa wetu Yesu Kiristu.
Imulungu Aba wetu na Imtwatsa wetu Yesu Kiristu wawatendeleni uluso na yamwikeni tseghamba.
Nolonga mighede kwe Imulungu ghamatsuwa ghose kwa uluso iyawatendele mwemwe kubitila Yesu Kiristu.
Mana kwa ukwilunga ne Kiristu, mwemwe mbweda kwa chila chinu, mbweda mne ukulonga na mne ukumanya.
Usenga wa Kiristu wima pfinoghile mghati mwenu.
Apfo ng'amuhungukighwe bae na ghweko lyolyose kulawa kwa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka, ka pfomumbeta Imtwatsa Yesu Kiristu yaghubulighwe.
Naye katsowakindilisa, katsoweng'a ingupfu mbaka utsighilo, ili mkale mwahela litotso mne litsuwa lye Imtwatsa wetu Yesu Kiristu.
Imulungu iyotogholighwa, kamkemani muwe sale wa Mwanaghe Yesu Kiristu, Imtwatsa wetu.
Ndughu tsangu, nowalomba kwa taghwa lye Imtwatsa wetu Yesu Kiristu mwilaghane kwa chila chinu chomlonga ili mleke kwibaghula mwemwe kwa mwemwe. Ghendoghendo mwalangule chinu chimwe na mlonge chicho.
Ndughu tsangu, iwanu wangi kulawa ing'anda ya Kiloe wanongela ka mwemwe mwisonga.
Nobama nilonge chanihulike kuna mwemwe, munu yumwe kolonga, “Nene nomuwinza Pauli,” na munu yungi kolonga, “Nene nomuwinza Apolo,” na yungi kolonga, “Nene nomuwinza Kefa” na yungi “Nene nomuwinza Kiristu.”
Angu Kiristu keghola? Angu Pauli tsakawambighwa mna msalaba kwaajili yako? Angu tsambatisighwa mughwe wanang'ina wa Pauli?
Mighede Imulungu kwaapfila simbatitse imunu wowose bae ila Kirispo na Gayo waliheka.
Apfo imunu wowose aleke kulonga ka mwemwe mbatisighwa muwe wanang'ina wangu.
Nikumbuka, pfipfila tsanimbatisa Stefana na iwanu iwali mng'anda mwake, kuya imane ka nimbatisa imunu yungi.
Kwaapfila Kiristu ng'anitumile bae kubatitsa, ila kuwapetela iwanu Imbuli Inoghile, na si kwa mbuli tsa kuwanogheletsa iwanu, ili lifwa lye Kiristu mna msalaba lileke kwoneka si chinu bae.
Kwaapfila usenga wa lifwa lya Yesu mne msalaba wakoneka ubotsi kwe iwanu iwakwagha, lekeni twetwe itukombolighwa twowona ngupfu ye Imulungu.
Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka gholonga, “Nitsotsihinya nzewele tse wanu wane nzewele, na tsimbutsi tse iwanu wane chisomo nitsotsasa kutali.”
Walikwani wanu wane nzewele? Walikwani walangulitsi wa ghamalaghitso? Walikwani wane tsimbutsi sideke? Imulungu kalangusa ghendo ka nzewele ye iwanu we isi ina ubotsi.
Kwa nzewele ye Imulungu, ng'aidahika bae iwanu kummanya yeye kwa nzewele tsawo wenyegho, Imulungu tsakanoghelighwa kuwakombola iwanu iwotoghola kubitila usenga watuwapetela, aula iukoneka ubotsi kwa awala wane nzewele.
Wayahudi wobama kwona pfinzonza, Wagiriki wobama nzewele.
Lekeni twetwe, twowapetela imbuli ye Kiristu iyawambighwe mna msalaba, imbuli iikoneka ng'walo kwa Wayahudi na ubotsi kwe Iwanu iwali si Wayahudi.
Lekeni kwa awala iwakemighwe ne Imulungu, wose Wayahudi na Wagiriki, Kiristu iyo ngupfu ye Imulungu na nzewele ye Imulungu.
Kwaapfila achila ichikoneka ubotsi we Imulungu, china nzewele kubita nzewele ye imunu, na achila ichikoneka chahela ngupfu kwa Imulungu china ngupfu kubita ngupfu ye imunu.
Ndughu tsangu, lelo mkumbuke hamkemighwe ne Imulungu, wengi mna mwemwe tsamkala mwahela nzewele ya chimunu, na si wengi bae imkalile ne ngupfu na si wengi bae imkalile ne ubala.
Lekeni Imulungu kasaghula pfinu ipfikoneka pfa ubotsi ipfili muisi kuwaghuma chinyala iwanu wane nzewele, Imulungu kasaghula ipfinu ipfilihela ngupfu, kuwaghuma chinyala awala wane ngupfu.
Imulungu kasaghula aghala ghawabetsile iwanu na aghala ighoneke si chinu bae, ili kughahinya aghala ghawonile iwanu chinu chikulu.
Imulungu katenda apfi ili imunu wowose aleke kwighoda hambele he Imulungu.
Imulungu iyo iyawatendike mwemwe mwilunge na Yesu Kiristu, iyawile nzewele yetu kulawa kwe Imulungu, twakoneka tunogha hambele he Imulungu, twenzeluka na tukombolighwa.
Apfo ka pfayandikighwe, “Iyobama kwighoda, yeghodele chayatendile Imtwatsa.”
Ndughu tsangu, hanitsile kuna mwemwe siwapeteleni bae ukweli we usenga we Imulungu kwa kulangusa ka nene nomanya ng'ani au kwa nzewele tse iwanu.
Mana hanikalile na mwemwe sibamile bae kumanya chinu chingi ila kummanya Yesu Kiristu yaliyeka, ayula iyawambighwe mna msalaba.
Hanitsile kuna mwemwe, tsanahela ngupfu, tsanidedema ghendo kwa kupfuka.
Usenga wangu na kupeta kwangu ng'akukalile bae kwa malonga gha nzewele ghane kukwegha iwanu, ila tsaghana ingupfu ye Ghumuhe we Imulungu.
Tsanenda apfi ili ukutoghola kwenu kuleke kukala mne hekima tse iwanu, ila ikale mne ngupfu ye Imulungu.
Twopeta usenga we hekima kwa awala iwakomale mne ukutoghola, lekeni si ihekima ye muisi amu bae, wala si ihekima ye iwakulu we muisi amu iwakwaghitsa ngupfu.
Nowapetela nzewele ye Imulungu iipfisighwe, iyaisaghule kwaajili ye ukwingila mne utunitso wake hata ng'ana isi yose ilumbighwe.
Kuduhu iwakulu we isi yose iwamanyile nzewele ino. Wang'aimanyile wang'alekile kumuwamba mna msalaba Imtwatsa we utunitso.
Lekeni ka Ghamaandiko pfagholonga, “Aghala ing'aghoneke wala kuhulikighwa, aghala ng'ana ghakwalangulighwe mmoyo mwe imunu, igho ghagho Imulungu ghawekile awala iwomnoghela.”
Lekeni Imulungu katughubulila chinu acho kubitila Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka. Kwaapfila Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka kosakula chila chinu hata ipfinu ipfili mghati mwe Imulungu.
Yuhi iyodaha kumanya aghala ighali mghati mwe imunu ka si muhe iuli mghati mwake mwenyegho? Pfipfila kuduhu iyomanya ipfinu pfe Imulungu ila Ghumuhe we Imulungu.
Ng'atubokele bae muhe we iisi, ila tubokela Ghumuhe iyatumighwe ne Imulungu ili tumanye aghala ghose ghatwing'ighwe hela ne Imulungu.
Apfo ng'atulonga bae kwe tsimbutsi itsilangulitsighwe ne nzewele tse iwanu, ila twolonga kwe tsimbutsi itsilangulitsighwe ne Ghumuhe, twolonga ipfinu pfa umuhe wa ukweli kwa awala iwane Ghumuhe.
Imunu yalihela Ghumuhe we Imulungu ng'odaha bae kubokela aghala igholawa kwe Imulungu, kwaapfila ghakoneka gha ubotsi kuna yeye, na ng'oghatanga bae, kwaapfila ghomanyika kwa kwapfilighwa ne Ghumuhe.
Lekeni imunu wowose yane Ghumuhe we Imulungu, kodaha kughatanga ghose, na kuduhu imunu iyodaha kumuhigha.
Ka Ghamaandiko pfagholonga, “Yuhi yatsimanyile tsimbutsi tse Imtwatsa? Yuhi yodaha kumlangulitsa Imtwatsa?” Lekeni twetwe tuna tsimbutsi tse Kiristu.
Ndughu tsangu, nene silongile namwe bae ka iwanu imli ne Ghumuhe we Imulungu, lekeni tsanonga namwe ka iwanu we isi ino, ka iwana wadowado mne ukumtoghola Kiristu,
Tsaniweng'a matombo na si chijo chikomu bae, kwaapfila ng'amdahile bae kuchija. Hata sambi ng'amdaha bae kuchija.
Kwaapfila mwemwe mng'ali mwokala ka iwanu we isi yose pfawokala. Angu pfii kuduhu chepfu na kwisonga mghati mwenu? Agho ghose gholangusa mwemwe mng'ali mwa iwanu we isi yose, na mwokala ka isi yose pfaibama.
Imunu yumwe ang'alonga, “Nene nomuwinza Pauli,” na munu yungi kolonga, “Nene nomuwinza Apolo.” Apfi ng'amtenda bae ka iwanu we isi yose pfawotenda?
Angu Apolo nani? Na Pauli nani? Twetwe twa iwatumwa we Imulungu yatumghalileni mwemwe ukutoghola, na chila munu kotenda isang'ano iyeng'ighwe ne Imtwatsa.
Nene nihanda imbeghu, Apolo kaimwaghila ghamatsi, lekeni Imulungu iyo yaitendile ikule.
Apfo iyahandile si chinu bae wala ayula iyaimwaghile ghamatsi, ila Imulungu yaliyeka yaitendile yote, iyo imkulu.
Imunu yaihandile na imunu yaimwaghile ghamatsi wose weghala, na Imulungu katsomghweka chila imunu kwa sang'ano yake yaitendile.
Kwaapfila twose twosang'ana hamwe ne Imulungu, mwemwe ka mghunda we Imulungu na ka ing'anda ye Imulungu.
Kwa ligweko lyangaile Imulungu, nyika lukwalambatsa ka imunu yadahile kutsenga pfinoghile, na imunu yungi kotsenga mchang'a mwake. Lekeni chila imunu iyotsenga yalangitse pfoyotsenga mchang'a mwake.
Kuduhu imunu yungi iyodaha kwika lukwalambatsa lungi kubita yalwikighwe, iyo Yesu Kiristu.
Mchang'a mwe lukwalambatsa alo, imunu yumwe kodaha kutsengela nzahabu, au kutsengela pfetsa, au kutsengela ghamabwe gha bei ng'ulu au kutsengela mibiki, au kutsengela tsinyasi au mitsani.
Ukunogha kwe isang'ano ya chila imunu kutsolangusighwa na kwikighwa mwatsi mne litsuwa lya Kiristu, kwaapfila mne litsuwa alyo ghumoto ghutsoghubula isang'ano ya chila imunu, ghumoto ghutsoghetsa tsisang'ano tsawo na kulangusa ka tsinogha.
Ka isang'ano ye imunu ng'ailakale mmoto, imunu ayo katsobokela lighweko.
Isang'ano ye imunu ing'alakala, imunu ayo katsolyaghitsa lighweko, lekeni yeye mwenyegho katsokombolighwa, ka kaswekuka mmoto.
Angu ng'ammanyile bae ka mwemwe mwa Ing'anda ye Imulungu, na Ghumuhe ghwe Imulungu kokala mghati mwenu?
Apfo imunu ang'aihinya ing'anda ye Imulungu, Imulungu katsomhinya. Kwaapfila ing'anda ye Imulungu idegheta, namwe mwa ing'anda ye Imulungu.
Uleke kwighutsukila mwenyegho, imunu wowose yali mghati mwenu ang'eghoda kana nzewele mne isi ino, ng'apfu yawe mbotsi ili yawe na nzewele ya kweli.
Kwaapfila nzewele ye isi ino ya ubotsi hambele he Imulungu. Ka pfayandikighwe, “Imulungu kowaghogha iwanu wane nzewele mne ukukengela kwawo.”
Kuya yandikighwa, “Imtwatsa koghamanya aghala ighawakwalangula iwanu wane nzewele ka ng'aghanoghile bae.”
Apfo imunu aleke kwighodela aghala ghawotenda iwanu. Mana ghose ghenu mwemwe.
Yawe Pauli au yawe Apolo au Kefa au isi au ughima au lifwa au aghala ghali baha, au aghala ighakutsa, mana ghose ghenu mwemwe.
Mwemwe mwa iwanu we Kiristu, na Kiristu ka we Imulungu.
Iwanu watwone twetwe ka twawatumighwa wa Kiristu, yatwing'ighwe ing'onde ye kuwapetela iwanu tsimbuli itsipfisike tse Imulungu.
Lelo ichibamighwa awala iweng'ighwe isang'ano wawe iwanu iwotogholighwa.
Kuna nene si chinu bae ning'ahighighwa na mwemwe au ne imunu wowose. Wala nene sihigha nimwenyegho bae.
Mmoyo mwangu sihighighwa bae ne chinu chochose bae, lekeni chinu acho ng'achilangusa ka nahela totso. Imulungu iyo yonihigha nene.
Apfo mleke kuhigha mbuli yoyose ng'ana chipindi chake chipfike, mbetetse mbaka Imtwatsa hayatsakutsa. Katsoghubula aghala ighapfisighwe mchisi na katsogheka mwatsi aghala ighali mmoyo mwe iwanu. Baho chila imunu katsobokela sifa yake kulawa kwe Imulungu.
Ndughu tsangu, nimtumila Apolo na nene mwenyegho ili kubitila twetwe mwilangulitse mbuli ino, “Mghakinde ighandikighwe mne Ghamaandiko.” Mleke kwighodela munu yuno na kumbetsa yungi.
Yuhi iyakutendile mkulu kubita munu yungi? Apfi Imulungu ng'akwing'ile bae pfose pfawinapfo? Ka kwing'ighwa, lelo ule wighoda ka ng'wing'ighwe bae?
Haya, ma mghapata ghose! Lelo ma muwa matajiri! Muwa wandewa bila ya twetwe! Nobama mng'awile iwandewa ili tuwe wandewa hamwe na mwemwe!
Kwaapfila nene pfanikona Imulungu katundenda twetwe iwatumighwa tuwe iwanu wa kuchisogho ghendo, ka iwanu iwahighighwe kukomighwa hambele he wamalaika ne iwanu.
Twetwe twawabotsi kwaajili ya kumtumikila Kiristu, lekeni mwemwe mna nzewele kwa kwilunga na Kiristu! Twetwe twahela ngupfu, lekeni mwemwe mna ngupfu, mwemwe ng'ambetsighwa bae, lekeni twetwe twobetsighwa.
Mbaka sambi tuna nzala na ng'ilu, twahela chokupfala, twotohighwa sideke, twahela hanu ho ukukala.
Kuya twoghaya kusang'ana kwa ghamoko ghetu wenyegho. Hatulighitwa, twetwe twobaliki, hatudunuzighwa, twetwe todudumila,
hatulighighwa, twetwe twakwidika ghoya. Mbaka sambi twetwe twakoneka ka mibangu ye isi, na kwa chila imunu twakoneka wabewebewe!
Si kwandika bae agha ghose ili niwaghume chinyala, lekeni nowafunda ka wanangu iwonoghela.
Hata mng'awa ne iwemilitsi wengi kwa kwilunga ne Kiristu, lekeni aba wenu yumwe yaliheka, kwaapfila kwa kwilunga na Yesu Kiristu nene niwa aba wenu kwa kuwaghalila Imbuli Inoghile.
Apfo nowalomba mtende ka pfanitenda nene.
Apfo nomghalilani Timoteo, imwanangu mna ukwilunga na Kiristu iyonoghela na iyotogholighwa. Ayo katsomkumbusani inzila yaniiwinza nene iili mghati mwa Yesu Kiristu. Inzila iyanilangulitsa chila hanu mne makanisa ghose
Iwanu wamwenga kulawa mna mwemwe wandusa kwighoda, kulonga ka sikutsa bae kuna mwemwe.
Lekeni Imtwatsa ang'abama, nitsakutsa kuna mwemwe sambi, baho nitsakona mwenyegho, si ghawolonga ghaliheka, ila ne ingupfu iwali nayo iwanu awo iweghoda.
Kwaapfila undewa we Imulungu si wa kulongalonga bae, ila wa ingupfu.
Choni ichiwanoghela? Nitse na fimbo, au nitse ne unoghelo na ghumoyo ghuholile?
Sambi yolongighwa ghendo ka mghati mwenu kuna ughoni, na ughoni awo ng'ana woneke bae hata kwe iwanu ing'awammanyile Imulungu. Imunu kowasa na imwehe wa aba wake!
Kuya lelo mdahatse kwighoda! Ing'awile ng'apfu mwemwe mwone usungu, na imunu iyatendile chinu acho yawingighwe mghati mwenu.
Hata ka nakutali na mwemwe kwa lukuli, lekeni kwa ghumoyo nahamwe namwe. Ma nimuhigha imunu ayo yatendile chinu acho cha chinyala ka nabaho kuna mwemwe.
Hamtingana kwa taghwa lya Imtwatsa wetu Yesu nene na hamwe namwe mmoyo, na ngupfu ya Imtwatsa wetu Yesu yabaho,
mmwing'e Setani imunu ayo lukuli lwake luhinyighwe ili muhe wake ukombolighwe litsuwa alyo Imtwatsa hayatsokutsa kuwahigha iwanu.
Kwighoda kwenu ng'akunoghile bae, angu ng'ampfimanyile bae ka hamira chidogho yotenda bulunge lya usaghe we chighate liwe kulu?
Muilapfe hamira ya ghumwande ye nzambi ili mdeghete ghendo. Kuya mwitseghala ne bulunge lya usaghe we pfighate pfa sambi ililihela hamira, ka pfambamighwa kuwa. Mana Pasaka wetu, Kiristu, tsakalapfighwa yawe nambiko.
Apfo, tutende chihungo acho cha Paska, si kwa hamira ye ghumwande, hamira ila ye nzambi na ghehile. Bali kwa chighate ing'achighumighwe hamira, iwo ghumoyo ghunoghile na ighulongesa!
Niwandikilani mne ibaluwa yangu ingi, mleke kwihanganya ne waghoni.
Silonga bae mleke kwihanganya ne iwanu ing'awammanyile Imulungu, awala iwaghoni, wabwa, wabapfi na awala iwotamanila pfinyagho. Mana ili kuwahepa iwanu awo wose mwobamighwa mlawe muisi mno.
Lekeni sambi nowandikilani mleke kwihanganya ne imunu wowose iyolonga komtoghola Kiristu aku kamghoni, ka mbwa, kotamanila pfinyagho, kana maligho, kopatika, ka mwihitsi Imunu ka ayo hata ukuja naye mleke.
Angu sang'ano yangu kuwahigha iwanu iwali kunze mwe kingili lyenu? Aku mwemwe ng'amuwahigha iwali mghati mwenu?
Imulungu mwenyegho katsowahigha awo iwali kunze, “Muwingeni imunu yehile iyali mghati mwenu!”
Imunu ang'esonga ne myaghe, ikuwatse yamghale hane libaratsa lye iwanu ing'awammanyile Imulungu? Ng'ambe kobamighwa yamghale kwe iwanu we Imulungu.
Angu, ng'ammanyile bae ka iwanu we Imulungu watsoihigha iisi? Ka mwemwe mtsoihigha iisi, ule ng'amdaha bae kuigha maghomba ghano madomado?
Apfi ng'ammanyile bae ka mwemwe mtsowahigha malaika, pfii lelo mne ghamaghomba ighali muisi?
Hampata lighomba, apfi mwowakema iwanu ing'awolitoghola kingili lye iwanu we Imulungu wamuhigheni?
Nolonga apfi kuwaghumani mwemwe chinyala. Apfi kuduhu imunu mghati mwenu yane nzewele ye kuhigha lighomba lye wakiristu wayaghe?
Lekeni, mkiristu komghala mkiristu myaghe mne libaratsa na wowaleka iwanu iwang'amnyile Imulungu wawahighe.
Kwa kwighala mwemwe kwa mwemwe kune ghamabalatsa, kolangusa mwemwe mtotsa ghendo. Ambe ing'awile ng'apfu mwemwe kubokighwa pfinu pfenu?
Lekeni mwemwe mwobunza na mwoboka, kuya agho mwowatendela wakiristu wayenu!
Angu ng'ammanyile bae iwanu wehile ng'awatsouhala bae undewa we Imulungu? Mleke kwighutsukila, si waghoni wala iwanzinzi, wala iwowatamanila pfinyagho, wala awala iwowasa ne iwamale weyawo,
wala wabapfi, wabwa, iwopatika, wang'enye, iwaboka weyawo, wala wane maligho, awo wose ng'awatsouhala bae undewa we Imulungu.
Wamwenga wenu tsamkala ka iwanu awo. Lekeni nzambi tsenu tsileghusighwa, mtendighwa muwe wenzeluka na mwikighwa kwa litaghwa lye Imtwatsa Yesu Kiristu na kwa ghumuhe ghwe Imulungu wetu.
Imunu yungi kodaha kulonga, “Nilekelighwa kutenda pfinu pfose,” lekeni si pfinu pfose bae ipfikwapfila. Notoghola ka nodaha kutenda chila chinu, lekeni sileka bae chinu chochose chinongotse.
Ichijo kwaajili ye munda na munda kwaajili ye ichijo, lekeni Imulungu katsofihinya pfose. Lukuli si kwaajili ye ughoni bae, ila kwaajili ye Imtwatsa, naye Imtwatsa koulolesa lukuli.
Imulungu kwa ingupfu yake kamtsiliula Imtwatsa, naye katsotusiliula twetwe pfipfila.
Apfi, ng'ammanyile bae ka ng'uli tsenu pfilungo pfa Kiristu? Lelo nipfisole pfilungo pfa Kiristu nipfilunge na chiweghe? Bae!
Ebu ng'ammanyile bae ayula iyelunga na chiweghe kakuwa lukuli lumwe naye? Ka Ghamaandiko pfagholonga, “Nawo weli watsakuwa lukuli lumwe.”
Lekeni ayula yelunga na Imtwatsa kakuwa naye kwa muhe.
Mkale kutali ne ughoni. Nzambi tsose tsimwenga itsitendighwa ng'atsilagha lukuli, lekeni mghoni kolutendela nzambi lukuli lwake.
Apfi ng'ammanyile bae ka ng'uli tsenu tsa ing'anda ye Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka, iyali mghati mwenu, iyamumbokele kulawa kwe Imulungu? Apfo mwemwe mwa wanu we Imulungu.
Kwaapfila tsamghulighwa kwa bei ng'ulu, apfo mumtunye Imulungu kwa ng'uli tsenu.
Apfo kwa mbuli ya aghala ghamwandike; pfinogha imunu yaleke kukwela.
Lekeni kwaapfila kuna ughoni sideke, chila mmale yawe na mwehe wake mwenyegho. Na chila pinga yawe na mmale wake mwenyegho.
Immale yatende chayobamighwa kumtendela mwehe wake, na ipinga yatende chayobamighwa kumtendela immale wake.
Lukuli lwa mwehe, si lwake yaliyeka bae, ila lwa immale wake pfipfila. Na lukuli lwa mmale si lwake yaliyeka bae ila lwa mwehe wake pfipfila.
Mleke kwiima, ila ka mwilaghana kwa ghamatsuwa chidogho, ili mdahe kukala kwa kumlomba Imulungu, kuya muyile keli ili Setani aleke kuwaghetsa kwaapfila ng'amdaha kududumila.
Aghano noghalonga nene, na si laghitso bae.
Nobama iwanu wawe ka nene pfanili, lekeni chila imunu keng'ighwa ne Imulungu ghweko lyake mwenyegho. Munu yumwe kana lino na munu yungi kana lila.
Apfo kwa awala iwang'ali ng'ana wakwele na awala ng'ana wakwelighwe, nene nolonga pfino; pfinogha wang'akala ka nene pfanili.
Lekeni ka ng'amdaha bae kwikinga wenyegho, mkwele, kwaapfila pfinogha ng'ani kukwela kubita kusulukila.
Kwa awala iwakwelighwe na iwakwelile noweng'a laghitso lino, kuya si langu bae ila lye Imtwatsa. Mwehe yaleke kwileka na mmale wake.
Lekeni ang'atenda apfo, yakale bila ukukwelighwa, au yelamlitse ne immale wake. Naye immale aleke kumleka mwehe wake.
Kwa awala iwasighale nolonga pfino. Nene mwenyegho, si Imtwatsa bae. Ka immale kana mwehe ing'ayomtoghola Yesu, na mwehe ayo kotoghola kukala na mmale wake, mmale aleke kumleka mwehe wake.
Na ka ipinga kana immale na immale ayo ng'omtoghola Yesu bae, ila kotoghola kukala na mwehe wake, ipinga ayo aleke kumlema mmale wake.
Kwaapfila immale yula ing'omtoghola Yesu kobokelighwa ne Imulungu kubitila mwehe wake. Na ipinga yula ing'omtoghola Yesu kohenzeluka kubitila immale wake. Ka si pfipfo bae, iwana wenu wang'alekile weha, lekeni ka pfaili, iwana wenu wenzeluka.
Ka imunu ing'omtoghola Yesu kobama yamleke myaghe, umleke atende apfo. Immale au ipinga iyotoghola Imulungu ng'oghomighwa bae kutenda apfo. Imulungu katukema twetwe tukale kwa tindiwalo.
Umanyatse, lamda ghwe mwehe kutsodaha kumkombola immale wako? Kuya umanyatse ghwe immale lamda kutsodaha kumkombola mwehe wako?
Apfo chila imunu yakale ka pfayagholelighwe ne Imulungu, yakale ka pfayakemighwe ne Imulungu. Alino laghitso lyangu kwa makingili ghose ghe iwanu we Imulungu.
Ka imunu hayakemighwe tsakakala kengila ngoma, ayo aleke kwitenda ka ng'ana yengile ng'oma. Na ka imunu hayakemighwe tsakakala ng'engile ng'oma bae, aleke kwingila ng'oma.
Kwaapfila, kwingila ngoma au kuleka kwingila ng'oma si chinu bae, ichinu chikulu, kukinda ghamalaghitso ghe Imulungu.
Chila imunu yakale ka pfayakemighwe ne Imulungu.
Apfi, haukemighwe tsakukala mtumwa? Uleke kwalangula, lekeni ka kopata uhuru utumile.
Kwaapfila yeye iyakemighwe ne Imtwatsa aku ka mtumwa, ayo kokombolighwa ne Imtwatsa. Pfipfila ayula iyakemighwe aku si mtumwa bae, ayo kakuwa mtumwa wa Kiristu.
Imulungu kamghulani kwa bei ng'ulu, lelo mleke kuwa watumighwa we iwanu.
Sale tsangu, chila munu na akale ka pfayakemighwe, kwaapfila Imulungu kahamwe na mwemwe.
Lelo, kwa imbuli ya awala ing'awakwelighwe bae, nene nahela laghitso kulawa kwe Imtwatsa, lekeni nene nolonga ghano ka imunu iyatogholighwe ne libatsi lye Imtwatsa.
Pfanikona nene, ukughaya kwamghaya sambi, pfinogha mwemwe kukala ka pfamli.
Pfii ma kukwela? Uleke kumleka mwehe wako. Pfii ng'una ukwele bae? Uleke kubama ipinga.
Lekeni ung'akwela, ng'utotsa bae, na imwali ang'akwelighwa, ayo ng'ototsa bae, lekeni iwanu ka awo watsopata maghayo mengi ghe ughima uno, lekeni nene nobama agho ghaleke kuwapata mwemwe.
Sale tsangu, nobama nonge apfi, ghamatsuwa ighasighale si mengi bae, kulawa sambi awala iwakwelile wakale ka ng'awakwelile bae,
na awala iwolila wawe ka ng'awolila bae na awala wodeng'elela wawe ka ng'awodeng'elela bae. Na awala iwoghula ipfinu, pfinu apfo pfiwe ka si pfawo bae,
awala iwane sang'ano ne iisi ino wakale ka wahela sang'ano nayo. Kwaapfila ka pfatumanya, iisi ino ya sambi yofosa.
Nobama mwemwe mleke kwalangula. Imunu yalihela mwehe kakwalangula sang'ano ye Imtwatsa, pfayatsomnogheletse Imtwatsa.
Immale iyakwelile kosang'ana ne tsing'onde tse iisi ili yamnogheletse mwehe wake,
naye kokweghighwa ne pfinu pfili. Ipinga yang'akwelighwe au imwali kakwalangula ng'onde tse Imtwatsa ili yawe mwenzeluka mlukuli na mne muhe. Lekeni ipinga iyakwelighwe kakwalangula ng'onde tse iisi, ili yamdeng'eletse mmale wake.
Nolonga apfi kwaapfila nobama niwapfile. Sibama bae kwingilila uhuru wenu, ila nobama mwemwe mtende ighanoghile na mwilapfe muwenyegho mne tsing'onde tse Imtwatsa bila kuwinza pfinu pfingi.
Imunu ang'ona ng'otenda pfinoghile bae kuleka kumkwela mwali yamlapfile tsengele, na ka ng'odaha bae kukala bila kukwela, na ang'ona mwali wake miyaka yake yofosa, yatende pfayobama, ang'amkwela pinga ayo, ng'otenda nzambi bae.
Lekeni immale ayo ang'alamla imwenyegho kuleka kukwela, na ka kodaha kuleka kusulukila wapinga, ayo katsotenda pfinoghile ghendo kuleka kumkwela imwali ayo.
Apfo ayula yobama kukwela kotenda pfinoghile, na ayula yoleka kukwela kotenda pfinoghile ghendo.
Ipinga iyakwelighwe kohighwa na mmale wake ka immale ayo mghima. Lekeni immale wake ang'afa, kodaha kukwelighwa keli na imunu yungi iyombama, lekeni immale ayo yawe iyommanya Kiristu.
Lekeni pfanikona nene, ng'apfu ghendo ipinga ayo ang'akala yaliheka, na nene nakona pfipfila nina Ghumuhe we Imulungu.
Lelo, aino imbuli ye pfijo ipfitambikighwe pfinyagho. Twomanya ghendo ka “twetwe wose tuna chisomo”, ka pfawolonga. Lekeni ukumanya ako kwowatenda iwanu weghode, ila unoghelo wotsenga.
Imunu ang'alonga komanya chinu, ng'omanya chinu bae ka pfoyobamighwa kumanya.
Lekeni imunu iyomnoghela Imulungu komanyika na Imulungu.
Apfo, mne imbuli ye ipfijo ipfitambikighwe pfinyagho, twomanya ghendo ka chinyagho si chinu bae muisi mno, na twomanya ghendo kuduhu Imulungu yungi ila Imulungu wetu yaliyeka.
Hata ka kuna pfinu ipfikemighwa milungu muisi mno au kulanga, na hata ka kuna milungu ne iwandewa wengi,
lekeni kuna twetwe Imulungu ka yumwe; Aba, yalumbile pfinu pfose, kubitila yeye twetwe twa waghima. Kuya tuna Imtwatsa yumwe, iyo Yesu Kiristu, kubitila yeye pfinu pfose tsapfilumbighwa, na twetwe twa waghima kubitila yeye.
Lekeni si chila imunu bae komanya agha ghose. Iwanu wamwenga iwatsowele kutambikila pfinyagho, mbaka leloli wang'aja ichijo acho wotonga chilawa kwe ipfinyagho. Na kwaapfila mimoyo yawo yahela ingupfu, wetenda iwenyegho weha kwa ukuja ichijo acho.
Ichijo ng'achidaha bae kukughala habehi ne Imulungu, tung'aleka kuchija ng'atuhungukighwa na chinu bae, tung'aja ng'atukongetsighwa chinu bae.
Lekeni mwalangitse pfamlekelelighwe ukutenda pfinu, mleke kuwahonza awalaiwotoghola chidogho wengile mnzambi.
Ka imunu yotoghola chidogho kakona ghweghwe iumanyile kwakuja mne ng'anda ye pfinyagho, pfii ng'atsoghumighwa ghumoyo bae kuja ichijo ichitambikighwe pfinyagho?
Apfo imunu yuno yane noghola ilihela ngupfu, iyo Kiristu yafile kwaajili yake ng'atsakwagha bae kwaajili ya achila ghweghwe kochikema ukumanya?
Ka mwowaghitsa pfino wakiristu wayenu, na kutsilagha noghola tsawo itsilihela ngupfu, mwomtendela nzambi Kiristu.
Apfo ichijo ching'amtenda mkiristo miyangu yaghwe mnzambi, sitsakuja bae inyama, kwaapfila ning'aja nitsomhonza ndughu yangu yaghwile mnzambi.
Angu nene sina ng'ombolighwe bae? Pfii nene si mtumighwa bae? Apfi nene simwonile Imtwatsa wetu Yesu? Angu mwemwe si ghamatunda ghe isang'ano yangu bae?
Hata ka kwa wamwenga nene si mtumighwa bae, lekeni kuna mwemwe nene na mtumighwa. Mwemwe mwa wakalangama we utumighwa wangu kwaapfila mwilunga ne Imtwatsa.
Apfi pfipfo pfaniyamila kwe iwanu iwonighutsa.
Pfii ng'atubamighwa ukwing'ighwa bae ichijo na choukunwa kwaajili ye sang'ano yetu?
Apfi twahela haki ye ukumsola mwehe iyomtoghola Kiristu na kwanga naye mne ghumwanza ka pfawotenda iwatumighwa wangi na iwandughu we Imtwatsa na Kefa.
Au twetwe tuliheka nene na Balinaba itubamighwa kusang'ana ili tupate aghala ighatubama.
Angu asikali wachi iyoghenda kwing'ondo keliha imwenyegho? Yuhi iyohanda mitsabibu aku ng'akuja bae ghamatunda ghake? Yuhi iyodima iwanyama aku ng'akunwa bae matombo ghawo?
Apfi agha ghanilonga nolonga gha chimunu? Angu Ghamalaghitso gha Musa nagho ng'agholonga apfi bae?
Mana yandikighwa mne Ghamalaghitso gha Musa, “Haumtumila ing'ombe kupfuna uhunga, uleke kumwoha chibang'wa.” Pfii, Imulungu kolonga mbuli tse ng'ombe?
Apfi hayalongile apfo ng'alongile mbuli tsetu bae? Tsayandikighwa kwaajili ya twetwe ghendo. Kwaapfila ayula iyolima na ayula iyopfuna, wose wana haki yo ukubetela ipfijo.
Ka twetwe tuhanda imbeghu ye umuhe mghati mwenu, apfi chinu chikulu twetwe tung'apata aghala ghatubama kulawa kuna mwemwe?
Ka wanu wamwenga wodaha ukughalolela agho kulawa kuna mwemwe. Apfi twetwe ng'atudaha bae ukughalolela agho kubita wawo? Lekeni twetwe ng'atutumile bae uwetso awo. Ila tsatududumila chila chinu ili tuleke kuighoma Imbuli Inoghile ye Kiristu.
Apfi ng'ammanyile bae, awala iwosang'ana mne ing'anda ye Imulungu wopata ipfijo pfawo mng'anda amo, na awala iwalapfa nambiko hanu ha kutambikila wopata ipfinu pfe inambiko ayo?
Pfipfila, Imtwatsa kalaghitsa apfi, awala iwopetela iwanu Imbuli Inoghile wabokele ipfijo pfawo kulawa mne imbuli inoghile.
Lekeni nene situmile bae uleghelo hata umwe. Wala sighandika bae ghano ili mnendele apfo. Ng'apfu nene nife kubita kumtenda imunu yambone ka nene neghoda hela.
Ka nene nopeta Imbuli inoghile, acho si chinu cha kwighodela bae. Ayo iyo sang'ano yaning'ighwe. Na nitsolyona ka siipeta bae Imbuli inoghile!
Ning'atenda sang'ano ino kwa ukubama mwenyegho, ning'alolele ukughwekighwa, lekeni ka nene nobamighwa kuitenda sang'ano ayo, ayo yolangusa ka Imulungu kangaya sang'ano ayo niitende.
Lelo nobokela maliho ghachi? Hanipetela iwanu Imbuli inoghile, sibama bae kwing'ighwa chinu, wala silomba maliho kwaajili ye sang'ano ye kupeta Imbuli inoghile.
Nene si mtumwa wa imunu wowose bae. Lekeni netenda imwenyegho kuwa mtumwa wa chila imunu ili nimpatile Kiristu iwanu wengi.
Haning'ali nisang'ana na Wayahudi tsanikala ka Myahudi, ili niwapate Wayahudi; hata ka nene imwenyegho silongotsighwa bae na malaghitso gha Musa, lekeni tsanikala ka nolongotsighwa na malaghitso agho ili niwapate awala iwalongotsighwa na malaghitso gha Musa.
Haning'ali nisang'ana na awala iwalihela malaghitso gha Musa, tsanikala ka nahela malaghitso, ili niwapate awala iwalihela malaghitso gha Musa. Kulonga apfo si ka nene sighawinza malaghitso hambele he Imulungu, kwaapfila nina malaghitso hambele he Kiristu.
Hanisang'ane na awala wane noghola ilihela ngupfu, tsanikala ka nina noghola yangu yahela ngupfu ka wawo pfawali, ili niwapate awo wane noghola ilihela ngupfu. Nitenda chila chinu kwe iwanu wose ili nidahe kuwatenda wakombolighwe kwa nzila yoyose ila.
Notenda agha ghose kwaajili ya imbuli inoghile, ili mbokele balaka tsake.
Apfi ng'ammanyile bae iwanu hawotsuma, wose wotsuma, lekeni ayula iyowalongola weyaghe iyo iyoghwekighwa? Mtsume pfipfo ili mghwekighwe.
Imunu wowose iyobama kuwahuma weyaghe mna ukutsuma, tanu kalekagha ghose, kotenda apfo ili yabokele taji ilihinyika, lekeni twetwe twotenda apfo ili tubokele taji ing'alihinyika bae.
Apfo notsuma ka imunu iyobama kuhuma. Sitowa bae ka imunu yetowa ne libeho,
ila noludununza lukuli Iwangu luwe na ngupfu na nolutenda luwe mtumwa wangu, notenda apfo ili hanimalitsa kuwapetela iwanu wangi nene imwenyegho ndeke koneka sinoghile bae kubokela ghweko.
Ndughu tsangu, sibama bae mwemwe mleke kumanya ka aba tsenu tsawahasi mwe libingu lila, na wose tsawaloka mne bahali ila ndung'u.
Wose tsawabatitsighwa wawe ka wa Musa mne libingu na mne ibahali.
Wose tsawaja ichijo chichila che ghumuhe,
pfipfila tsawanwa chokunwa chichila che ghumuhe, mana tsawanwa kulawa mne bambalawe lye umuhe iliwawinzile, bambalawe lila tsalikala Kiristu imwenyegho.
Lekeni, Imulungu ng'anoghelighwe na wamwenga wawo. Apfo ng'uli tsawo tsatsipwililika mnyika.
Apfo agha ghose ghalawila ili kutukanya tuleke kuwa iwanu wa kusulukila ghehile ka wawo pfawasulukile.
Mleke kutamanila pfinyagho, ka wamwenga pfawatendile. Ka pfayandikighwe, “Iwanu tsawakala hasi waja na wanwa, kuya wema wapfina pfihile.”
Mleke kutenda uweghe, ka iwanu wangi pfawatendile, kwa litsuwa limwe iwanu elufu ishilini na wadatu tsawafa.
Mleke kumghetsa Kiristu ka iwanu wangi pfawamghetsile, wose tsawafa kwa kulumighwa ne wanzoka.
Mleke kunung'unika ka iwanu wangi pfawatendile, nawo tsawakomighwa na mtumighwa we kulanga we lifwa.
Agha ghose ghawalawila wawo ili twetwe tulangulitsighwe, ghandikighwa ili ghatukanye twetwe itukala mne ghamatsuwa ighali habehi na utsighilo.
Apfo, ayula iyebona kema pfinoghile, yalangitse aleke kughwa.
Ghamaghetso ghampatile si magheni bae kwe iwanu. Imulungu kotogholighwa, naye ng'atsowaleka mghetsighwe kubita pfamdaha. Lekeni hamghetsighwa, yeye katsoweng'a ingupfu yo kududumila, na inzila yo kulawila.
Lelo ndughu tsangu wanoghelighwa, mkale kutali ne ukutamanila pfinyagho.
Nolonga na mwemwe ka iwanu wane tsimbutsi, mwalangule achino chanilonga.
Hatubaliki ichikombe che ichijo che ukumkumbuka lmtwatsa, apfi ng'atwilunga bae na idamu ya Kiristu? Pfii hatubena chighate ng'atwilunga bae na lukuli lwa Kiristu?
Kwaapfila hana chighate chimwe, na twetwe yatuli wengi, twalukuli lumwe, mana twetwe wose twegholela chighate chicho.
Muwalole Wayahudi wenyegho, awala iwakuja nambiko welunga ne Imulungu kubitila nambiko atso.
Lelo nonge choni? Ichijo ichitambikighwe pfinyagho chinu chikulu kubita ichijo? Na ipfinyagho chinu chikulu?
Bae! Chanilonga nene chicho chino, nambiko tse iwanu ing'awammanyile Imulungu wowalapfila pfinyamkela, si Imulungu bae. Na nene sibama bae mwilunge na ipfinyamkela.
Ng'amdaha bae kuchinwela ichikombe che Imtwatsa aku mwochinwela chikombe che pfinyamkela. Ng'amdaha ukuja mne metsa ye Imtwatsa na baho mne metsa ya pfinyamkela.
Angu twobama tumtende Imtwatsa yawe na chepfu. Apfi mwopfikitsa tuna ngupfu kubita yeye?
Wamwenga wolonga, “Ipfinu pfose ng'apfighomighwa bae,” lekeni nene nolonga si pfose ipfikwapfila. Kuya wamwenga wolonga, “Ipfinu pfose ng'apfighomighwa bae,” lekeni nene nolonga, si pfose ipfitsenga.
Imunu wowose mna mwemwe aleke kwibamila yaliyeka ghanoghile, ila yawabamile na weyaghe.
Mje chochose ichihutsighwa mne maghulilo bila kughutsaghutsa kwaajili ye imimoyo yenu.
Kwaapfila Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka gholonga, “Isi ya Imulungu na ghose ighali mumo ghake.”
Ka imunu ing'ayomtoghola Yesu komkemani mkaje ichijo kaye yake, namwe mwobama kughenda, mje chochose ichikighwe hambele henu bila kughutsaghutsa kwaajili ya imimoyo yenu.
Lekeni imunu yungi ang'akulongela, “Chijo chino chitambikighwa pfinyagho,” uleke kuja kwaajili ye imunu iyakulongele na kwa kwaajili ya ghumoyo.
Nolonga, kwaajili ya ghumoyo wa munu yungi si kwaajili ya ghumoyo ghwako bae, Imunu yungi ang'aghutsa, “Ule lelo ukukombolighwa kwangu kuhighighwe ne ghumoyo ghwe imunu yungi?
Ka nolonga mighede kwe Imulungu kwa ichijo chanikuja, ebali imunu yungi yanonge pfihile kwa ichijo acho?”
Apfo, chochose chamtenda, ukuja au ukunwa, mtende ghose kwa utunitso we Imulungu.
Mleke kuwatenda Wayahudi wala Iwanu iwali si Wayahudi, wala makingili ghe iwanu we Imulungu wekwale.
Muwe ka nene, nene nobama kuwadeng'eletsa wanu wose mna ghose ghanitenda. Mana sibamila niliheka ghanoghile, ila nowabamila ghanoghile iwanu wose ili wakombolighwe.
Mniwinze ka nene pfanimuwinzile Kiristu.
Nomtunyani kwa kunikumbuka, ne ukughakinda malaghitso ghaniweng'ileni.
Lekeni nobama mwemwe mmanye pfino, Kiristu iyo litwi lya chila mmale, na mmale iyo litwi lya pinga wake, na Imulungu iyo litwi lya Kiristu.
Apfo imunu wowose iyolomba au iyopeta usenga iulawa kwe Imulungu aku kaghubika litwi lyake, ayo komghuma chinyala Kiristu.
Na ipinga wowose hayolomba au hayopeta usenga we Imulungu aku litwi lyake ng'alighubikighwe bae, komghuma chinyala mmale wake, ipinga ayo keghala na ipinga iyaghetile mvili tsake tsose.
Ka ipinga ng'oghubika bae litwi lyake, ng'apfu yabehe mvili tsake. Lekeni ka chinyala kwe ipinga kugheta mvili tsake au kubeha mvili tsake, yaghubike litwi lyake
Immale ng'obamighwa bae yaghubike litwi lyake, kwaapfila yeye keghala ne Imulungu na ka utunitso we Imulungu. Lekeni ipinga ka utunitso we immale.
Kwaapfila, immale ng'alawile bae kwe ipinga, ila ipinga kalawa kwe immale.
Immale ng'alumbighwe bae kwaajili ye ipinga, ila ipinga tsakalumbighwa kwaajili ya immale.
Apfo kwaajili ye malaika, ipinga yaghubike litwi lyake, ili chiwe chitango cha uwetso uli mchanya mwake.
Lekeni, hambele he Imtwatsa ipinga ng'omuhila bae immale, na immale ng'omuhila bae ipinga.
Mana ka ipinga pfayalawile kwe immale, pfipfila immale naye kakwelekighwa ne ipinga, lekeni ghose gholawa kwe Imulungu.
Mlamle wenyegho, angu pfinogha kwe ipinga kumlomba Imulungu aku ng'aghubike bae chinu chochose mwitwi mwake?
Hata iwanu pfatulumbighwe pfolangusa ghendo, mmale kuwa na mvili ng'ulu chinyala kuna yeye,
lekeni ipinga ang'awa na mvili ng'ulu, acho chinu chinoghile kuna yeye. Kwaapfila keng'ighwa mvili ng'ulu tsimghubike.
Imunu ang'abama kwihisanya mna mbuli ino, twetwe twahela matsowela ghangi. Wala makingili ghe iwanu we Imulungu ghahela matsowela ghangi.
Mne malaghitso ghano ghanimwing'ani siwatunya bae, mana mne mitingano yenu yo ukumtamanila Imulungu mwotenda ghehile ghendo kubita ighanoghile.
Aho mwanduso tsanihulika hamtingana mne mitingano yenu mwebaghula. Nani chidogho notoghola,
mana kobamighwa kuwe na ubaghutsi mghati mwenu, ili awala iwatogholighwe ne Imulungu woneke pfinoghile.
Hamtingana hamwe, mwopfikitsa mwakuja ichijo che ukumkumbuka Imtwatsa, kumbe bae!
Kwaapfila hamkuja, chila munu koghendelela ukuja bila kuwabeta wayenu, mbaka wangi wokala ne nzala aku wamwenga wapatika.
Angu ng'amdaha bae ukuja na kunwa mmakae mwenu? Ebu mwolibesa kingili lye iwanu we Imulungu, na kuwaghuma chinyala iwanu iwalihela chinu? Lelo niwalongeleni choni? Niwatunye? Mbe siwatunya bae kwaajili ya chinu acho.
Mana nighabokela kulawa kwe Imtwatsa ghamalangulitso ghanimwing'eni, Imtwatsa Yesu chilo chila chayahundukighwe, tsakasola chighate,
hayamalitse kulonga mighede kwe Imulungu, kachibena, kalonga, “Aluno lukuli lwangu, lwamwing'ighwe mwemwe, mtende apfi kwa kung'umbuka nene.”
Pfipfila hayamalitse ukuja, kasola chikombe, kalonga, “Chikombe chino laghano lya sambi lye idamu yangu. Mtende apfi chila hamkunwa kwa kung'umbuka nene.”
Mana chila hamkuja chighate chino na kuchinwela chikombe chino, mwolipeta lifwa lye Imtwatsa, mbaka hayatsakuya keli.
Apfo imunu wowose iyakuja chighate chino na kuchinwela chikombe che Imtwatsa ing'apfibamighwa, ayo katsokuwa na totso kwa lukuli na idamu ye Imtwatsa.
Apfo, chila imunu tanu yelolese mwenyegho, kuya kodaha ukuja chighate acho na ukunwela chikombe acho.
Mana imunu wowose iyakuja na kunwa bila kulutanga lukuli lwe Imtwatsa chinu chachi, ayo kehigha imwenyegho.
Kwaajili ayo iwanu wengi mghati mwenu wahela ingupfu na watamu, na wamwenga wafa.
Twing'elolesa pfinoghile, tung'alekile kuhighighwa ne Imulungu.
Lekeni hatuhighighwa ne Imtwatsa twolangulisighwa tunoghe ili tuleke kuhighighwa hamwe ne iisi yose.
Apfo ndughu tsangu, hatwitingana hamwe ukuja ichijo che Imtwatsa, chila munu yambete myaghe.
Imunu ang'awa ne nzala, aje ukaye yake ili hamtingana kuleke kuwa ne ukuhighighwa ne Imulungu. Lekeni agho ghangi, nitsowalangulitsani hanikutsa.
Lelo ndughu tsangu nobama mmanye pfinoghile mbuli tse pfigholelo ipfilawa kwe Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka.
Mwomanya hamng'ali ng'ana mumtange Imulungu, tsamlongosighwa mne nzila tsihile muitamanile milungu ilihela ughima.
Nobama mmanye pfino, kuduhu imunu iyolongosighwa ne Ghumuhe ghwe Imulungu iyodaha kulonga “Yesu yalighitighwe,” kuya kuduhu imunu iyodaha kulonga “Yesu iyo Imtwatsa,” bila kulongosighwa na Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka.
Kuna pfigholelo pfingi tofwautitofwauti, lekeni Ghumuhe iyopfilapfa ka yumwe.
Kuya kuna nzila tofwautitofwauti tsa sang'ano, lekeni Imtwatsa ka yumwe.
Kuya kuna nzila tofwautitofwauti tse kutenda sang'ano atso, lekeni Imulungu iyo yuyo iyosang'ana ng'onde tsose kwe iwanu wose.
Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka kelangusa kwa chila imunu kwa nzila tofwautitofwauti kwaajili ye iwanu wose.
Ghumuhe komwing'a imunu yumwe mbuli tsa nzewele, Ghumuhe yuyo komwing'a imunu yungi uwetso we ukumanya pfinu.
Ghumuhe yuyo komwing'a imunu yungi ukutoghola, na Ghumuhe yuyo komwing'a imunu yungi uwetso wa kuwahonetsa iwanu.
Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka komwing'a imunu yumwe uwetso we kutenda pfihulo, Ghumuhe yuyo komwing'a imunu yungi uwetso we kulapfa unabii na imunu yungi kubaghula pfigholelo ipfili pfa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka na ipfili si pfa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka bae, yungi kulonga lugha ing'atsimanyika bae, na yungi kutsifasiri.
Atso tsose sang'ano tsa yuyo yumwe Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka, naye komgholela chila imunu ka pfoyobama imwenyegho.
Lukuli lwa lumwe, hata ka lulumbighwa na pfilungo pfingi, na hata ka una pfilungo pfingi, lekeni pfolumba lukuli lumwe. Apfo pfipfo pfaili kwa Kiristu.
Kwaapfila twetwe wose tsatubatitsighwa kwa Ghumuhe yumwe, tuwe Wayahudi au si Wayahudi bae, tuwe watumwa au si watumwa bae, wose tunwesighwa Ghumuhe yuyula yumwe.
Kwaapfila lukuli ng'alulumbighwe bae kwa chilungo chimwe, ila kwa pfilungo pfingi.
Mghulu ung'alonga, “Kwaapfila nene sili ghumoko bae, nene si wa lukuli.” Apfi mghulu utsokuwa si wa lukuli bae?
Na lighutwi ling'alonga, “Kwaapfila nene sili inenge bae, nene si wa lukuli bae.” Apfi lighutwi litsokuwa si lya lukuli bae?
Ka lukuli lwose lung'awile inenge, ukuhulika kung'akalile kwani? Na lukuli lwose lung'awile lighutwi, ukunusa kung'akalile kwani?
Lekeni Imulungu keka pfilungo pfose mne lukuli lwa chila munu ka pfayabamile pfiwe.
Ka pfilungo pfose pfing'awile chilungo chimwe, lukuli lung'akalile kwani!
Ka pfaili, kuna pfilungo pfingi, lekeni lukuli lwa lumwe.
Inenge ng'aidaha bae kughulongela ghumoko, “Sikubama bae!” Wala litwi ng'alidaha bae kughalongela maghulu “Simbamani bae!”
Lekeni kubita agho, yolangusa ipfilungo pfila ipfikoneka pfahela ngupfu, apfo pfipfo chinu chikulu,
na pfilungo pfila pfatulonga pfahela heshima, twopfing'a heshima ng'ulu, na pfilungo ipfikoneka ng'apfinoghile, twopfighubika pfinoghile.
Lekeni pfilungo pfetu ipfinoghile sideke ng'apfibama bae kuhambighwa. Imulungu mwenyegho kalwika pfipfo lukuli, na kapfing'a heshima pfilungo pfila ipfihungukighwe.
Apfo kuleke kuwa na ubaghutsi mne lukuli, ila pfilungo pfose pfilolese.
Chilungo chimwe ching'atama, pfilungo pfose pfotama hamwe nacho, na chilungo chimwe ching'atunyighwa, pfilungo pfose pfodeng'elela hamwe nacho.
Apfo chila munu mghati mwenu ka lukuli lwa Kiristu, na chila munu ka chilungo cha lukuli alwo.
Na mne kingili lye iwanu we Imulungu, Imulungu keka wa mwanduso iwatumighwa, wa keli manabii, wa kadatu iwalangulitsi, wa kane awala iwotenda pfihulo, na wala iweng'ighwe ingupfu yo kuwahonetsa iwatamu, na iwodaha kuwapfila iwanu wangi, kuya pfilongotsi na iwolonga lugha ing'atsimanyika.
Si wanu wose bae watumighwa au manabii au walangulitsi. Na si wose bae iwotenda pfihulo.
Si wose iwodaha kuhonetsa iwanu. Si wose iwolonga kwa lugha ing'atsimanyika.
Apfo mbame pfigholelo pfikulu. Nani leloli nowalangusa nzila inoghile kubita nzila tsose.
Hata ka nodaha kulonga lugha tse iwanu na tse wamalaika we kulanga, lekeni ka nahela unoghelo, nene neghala na malati iikema hela au tsimbughi.
Hata ka nodaha kupeta usenga we Imulungu, na kumanya ghose na mbuli na kutanga chila chinu, hata ka nodaha kusoghetsa pfighongo kwa ukutoghola kwangu, lekeni ka nahela unoghelo, nene si chinu bae.
Hata ka ning'aweng'a iwahingwa pfinu pfose pfanilinapfo na kulwika lukuli lwangu lulakale mlambi, lekeni ka nahela unoghelo, nene sipata chinu bae.
Munu yane unoghelo kodudumila, kana libatsi, kahela chepfu, ng'etunya bae wala ng'eghoda bae.
Imunu yane unoghelo kana mahala, ng'abamagha bae mbuli tsake mwenyegho, ng'asumkagha bae kona maya, kuya ng'ekagha bae fondogholo mmoyo.
Imunu yane unoghelo ng'odeng'elelela bae ghehile, ila kodeng'elela ukweli.
Yane unoghelo kodudumila ghamatsuwa ghose, kotoghola ghamatsuwa ghose, ghamatsuwa ghose kololela bila kwipfa, kodudumila ghamatsuwa ghose.
Unoghelo ng'autsighagha bae, ka hana unabii, awo utsotsigha, ka hana ukulonga kwa lugha ing'atsimanyika, ako kutsomala, ka hana ukumanya, kutsoluta.
Mana ukumanya kwetu ng'akutimile bae, na ukulapfa unabii kwetu ng'akutimile bae,
lekeni Imulungu hayatsotimilitsa ghose, achila ing'achitimile chitsohupa.
Haning'ali mdodo, tsanonga ka mwana mdodo, tsanyalangula ka mwana mdodo, tsanimanya ka mwana mdodo. Lekeni hanikulile nighaleka aghala gha udodo.
Mana sambi twolola ka chihanga ing'achikoneka pfinoghile bae mne chilolelo, lekeni hambele tutsolola chihanga kwa chihanga. Ghanimanya sambi ng'aghatimile bae, kuya hambele nitsomanya ghose ka Imulungu pfonimanya.
Lelo pfinu pfidatu ipfighendelela; kuko ukutoghola na lolelo na unoghelo, lekeni chikulu kubita pfose uwo unoghelo.
Muubame unoghelo, na mbame pfigholelo pfingi pfa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka, kubita pfose mpate chigholelo cha kuwapetela iwanu usenga we Imulungu.
Kwapfila imunu wowose iyolonga kwa lugha ing'atsimanyika, ayo ng'olonga bae ne iwanu, ila kolonga ne Imulungu, kwaapfila kuduhu imunu iyohulika. Kolonga pfinu ipfipfisike kwa ngupfu ye Ghumuhe.
Lekeni awala iwopeta usenga we Imulungu wolonga ne iwanu na kuwapfila, kuwaghuma ghumoyo na kuwakanza.
Ayula iyolonga kwa lugha ing'atsimanyika, ketsenga mwenyegho, ila ayula iyopeta usenga we Imulungu kowatsenga iwanu we Imulungu.
Nene nobama mwemwe mwose mlonge kwa lugha ing'atsimanyika, lekeni kubita alyo nobama mwemwe mlonge usenga we Imulungu. Kwaapfila ayula iyolonga usenga we Imulungu kotenda ghanoghile kubita ayula iyolonga lugha ing'atsimanyika, ila ka kabaho imunu yungi iyodaha kuwafasilila iwanu choni chayalongile, ili iwanu wose we Imulungu wadahe kwapfilighwa.
Lelo ndughu tsangu, ning'atsa kuna mwemwe na kulonga kwa lugha ing'atsimanyika, angu mwemwe mtsobweda choni? Ng'amtsobweda bae! Ila ka nolonga namwe kwa nzila ya ughubulo, au ukumanya, au imbuli ye Imulungu au malangulitsi.
Hata ipfinu ipfilihela ughima ipfilapfa litsi kaapfila ichimbeta au chilimba, ka ng'apfilapfa bae litsi tofwautitofauti, imunu yatsomanyatse wila wachi iutowighwa?
Ka malati ng'ailapfa bae litsi pfinoghile, yuhi yatseyandaa kughenda kwing'onde?
Na mwemwe pfipfila, ka ghamlonga ng'aghomanyika bae, yuhi iyodaha kumanya mlonga choni? Apfo mwakuwa ka iwanu iwolonga na libeho.
Muisi mna lugha nyingi, lekeni tsose tsomanyika.
Ka simanya bae ichilongighwa ne imunu yungi, nene nakuwa mgheni kwa imunu ayo iyolonga na nene, naye kakuwa mgheni kuna nene.
Pfipfila na mwemwe wose, kwaapfila mwobama ghendo kubokela pfigholelo pfe Ghumuhe, mtende pfomdaha kongesa pfigholelo ipfiwatenda iwanu we Imulungu wabwede.
Apfo ayula iyolonga kwa lugha ing'atsimanyika, yalombe yadahe kuwafasilila iwanu achila chalongile.
Mana ning'alomba kwa lugha ing'atsimanyika, muhe wangu nawo wolomba, lekeni mbutsi tsangu ng'atsitenda chinu bae.
Lelo nitendetse? Nitsolomba kwa ghumuhe wangu, pfipfila nitsolomba kwa mbutsi tsangu, nitsakwimba kwa ghumuhe wangu, pfipfila nitsakwimba kwa mbutsi tsangu.
Ung'amtunya Imulungu wako kwa ghumuhe wako uliheka, ka kuna imunu ing'ayomanya chaulonga, yodahatse kwidika “Ona” haulonga mighede kwe Imulungu ka ng'omanya bae chaulonga?
Kwodaha kulonga mighede kwe Imulungu pfinoghile, lekeni ng'aitsomwapfila bae imunu yungi.
Nolonga mighede kwe Imulungu kwaapfila nene nolonga lugha ing'atsimanyika kubita mwemwe wose.
Lekeni mne likanisa nonoghelighwa kulonga malonga matano ighomanyika, ili nidahe kuwalangulitsa iwanu wengi kubita kulonga malonga mengi kwa lugha ing'atsimanyika.
Ndughu tsangu mleke kutonga ka iwana wadowado, lekeni muwe iwana wadowado mna aghala ghehile, hamtonga muwe ka iwanu wabala.
Yandikighwa mne ghamalaghitso, “Imtwatsa kolonga, ‘Kwa nzila ye iwolonga lugha ing'atsimanyika, na kwa milomo ya iwahenza, nitsolonga ne iwanu wano, hata apfo ng'awatsonihulikitsa bae.’ ”
Apfo ukulonga kwa lugha ing'atsimanyika, acho chitango kwa awala ing'awotoghola bae, lekeni si kwa awala iwotoghola, lekeni ukupeta usenga we Imulungu, acho chitango kwa awala iwotoghola na si kwa awala ing'awotoghola bae.
Lelo ka iwanu wose we Imulungu wetingana hamwe na chila imunu kolonga lugha ing'atsimanyika, na awala ing'awomanya na ing'awotoghola wang'engila, angu ng'awatsolonga bae ka mna lukwale?
Lekeni wose wang'alonga usenga iweng'ighwe ne Imulungu, iwanu ing'awomanya au ing'awotoghola wang'engila, watsoghahulika ghose ghamlonga, nagho ghatsowahigha.
Na aghala ighapfisike mmoyo mwawo ghatsoghubulighwa, nawo watsopfughama na kumtamanila Imulungu, aku wolonga; “Imulungu ka mghati mwenu ghendo!”
Ndughu tsangu, lelo tulonge choni? Hamtingana hamwe kumtamanila Imulungu, yumwe yembe wila, yungi yalangulitse, na yungi yawe na ughubulo iulawa kwe Imulungu, ayu yalonge kwa lugha ing'atsimanyika, yungi yawafasilile iwanu achila ichilongighwe. Ghose ghatendeke kwa kuwapfila iwanu we Imulungu.
Imunu wowose ang'alonga kwa lugha ing'atsimanyika, iwanu weli au wadatu walonge, lekeni walonge yumweyumwe aku kukale na imunu yungi iyowafasilila achila ichilongighwa.
Lekeni ka kuduhu imunu iyowafasilila iwanu achila ichilongighwa, imunu iyolonga kwa lugha ing'atsimanyika yanyamale, na yelongele mwenyegho ne Imulungu.
Iwanu weli au wadatu iweng'ighwe usenga we Imulungu walonge aku iwanu wangi walamule achila ichilongighwe.
Lekeni ka imunu yali mne mtingano kabokela usenga we Imulungu, ayula iyolonga yanyamale.
Kwaapfila mwose mwodaha kulonga yumweyumwe usenga wamwing'ighwe ne Imulungu, ili chila imunu yelangulitse na yaghumighwe ghumoyo.
Muhe tse manabii tsowategheletsa manabii.
Kwaapfila Imulungu si Imulungu wa kutenda pfinu chakachaka bae, ila yeye ka Imulungu wa tindiwalo. Pfipfila ka pfaili mne makingilli ghe iwanu we Imulungu,
iwapinga wanyamale mne makingilli ghe iwanu we Imulungu, ng'awobamighwa bae kulonga, wala kulongotsa ka Ghamalaghitso gha Wayahudi pfagholonga.
Wang'abama kumanya mbuli yoyose ila, wawaghuse wamale wawo ukaye yawo, mana chinu cha chinyala kwe ipinga kulonga mbuli yoyose mne kingili lye iwanu we Imulungu.
Pfii mwopfikitsa imbuli ye Imulungu ilawa kuna mwemwe au iwapfikila mwemwe mliheka?
Imunu wowose iyebona keng'ighwa usenga we Imulungu au kana gholelo lya Ghumuhe, yatange ghendo ka chanikwandika, nakwandika laghitso lye Imtwatsa.
Imunu ang'aghabetsa ghano, naye yabetsighwe.
Apfo ndughu tsangu, msulukile kuwalongela iwanu imbuli ye Imulungu, kuya mleke kuwaghoma iwanu kulonga lugha ing'atsimanyika.
Ghose ghatendeke ghoya na pfinoghile.
Lelo ndughu tsangu nobama niwalongele keli Imbuli Inoghile yaniwapetele, yamuibokele iili lukwalambatsa lwa ukutogha kwenu, na mna ayo mwemwe mwakwima ghendo.
Usenga awo yaniwapetele iyo Imbuli Inoghile, mwemwe mwokombolighwa mng'ahakinda ghoya aghala ghaniwapetele, ka si pfipfo bae mtoghola hela.
Niwagholela aghala ghanibokele nene mwenyegho, Kiristu tsakafa kwa nzambi tsetu ka pfagholonga Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka,
tsakasikighwa, na katsilihuka mna litsuwa lya kadatu, ka Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka pfagholonga,
tanu tsakamlawila Petiri kuya kawalawila watumighwa wose 12.
Pfipfila kawalawila ndughu ka 500 kwa mala lumwe, wengi mna wawo waghima mbaka sambi, lekeni wangi wawo ma wahupa.
Hambele kamlawila Jakobu, kuya kawalawila watumighwa wose.
Pfipfila kandawila nene, ka imunu yanyelekighwe mne chipindi si chake bae.
Kwaapfila nene na mtumighwa mdodo, sinoghile bae kukemighwa mtumighwa, kwaapfila tsanighadununza makingili ghe iwanu we Imulungu.
Lekeni uluso we Imulungu, unitenda niwe ka pfino pfanili, uluso wangaile, ng'angaile hela bae. Nene tsanisang'ana kubita iwatumighwa wose, si nene bae, ila uluso we Imulungu tsausang'ana hamwe na nene.
Hata apfo iwe nene au wawo iwoipeta Imbuli inoghile si chinu bae, acho chicho chatupeta na chicho chamtoghola.
Lekeni ka tsaipetighwa Kiristu katsilihuka, wamwenga wenu wodahatse kulonga kuduhu kutsilihuka?
Ka kuduhu kutsilihuka kwe iwanu, apfo Kiristu naye ng'atsilihuke bae,
kuya ka Kiristu ng'atsilihuke bae, chatuwapetela si chinu bae, pfipfila chamtoghola si chinu bae.
Kubita ghose, pfipfila twetwe twoneka tulonga ughutsu hambele he Imulungu, kwaapfila tsatulonga Imulungu kamtsilihula Kiristu, kumbe ng'amtsilihule bae, ka iwanu iwafile ng'awotsilihuka bae.
Kwaapfila ka iwafile ng'awatsilihuka bae, Kiristu naye ng'atsilihuke bae.
Kuya ka Kiristu ng'atsilihuke bae, ukutoghola kwenu kwahela sang'ano, na nzambi tsenu mng'ali natso.
Pfipfila wanu iwafile aku womtoghola Kiristu wagha.
Ka tumlolela Yesu Kiristu mna ughima uno uliheka, twobamighwa twonelighwe libatsi kubita iwanu wose.
Lekeni kwo ukulongesa ghendo Kiristu katsilihuka, yeye iyo wa mwanduso we iwanu iwawasile mlifwa, apfo yolangusa iwanu wangi watsotsilihuka.
Mana ka lifwa lighalighwa ne imunu yumwe, pfipfila kutsilihuka nako kughalighwa ne imunu yumwe.
Ka iwanu wose pfawakufa kwa ukwilunga na Adamu, pfipfila kubitila Kiristu iwanu wose watsakuwa waghima.
Lekeni chila imunu na hanu hake, tanu Kiristu, kuya awala iwali wake Kiristu hayatsakuya.
Kuya utsighilo utsakutsa, Kiristu hayatsomwing'a Undewa Aba Imulungu, hayamalitsa kuhinya utawala na ukulu na ngupfu tsose itsihile.
Kwaapfila Kiristu kobamighwa yatawale mbaka Imulungu yaweke iwanebe wose hasi he ghamaghulu ghake.
Lifwa iyo mwihile wa usighilo iyatsokomighwa.
Mana Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka gholonga, “Imulungu keka pfinu pfose hasi he maghulu ghake.” Lekeni ghamaandiko hagholonga, “Pfinu pfose pfikighwa hasi he maghulu ghake yapfitawale,” yakoneka ghendo Imulungu ng'alimumo bae mna pfinu apfo, kwaapfila yeye iyo iyekile pfinu apfo hasi he ghamaghulu gha Kiristu.
Lekeni hayatsakwika pfinu pfose hasi he ghamaghulu gha Kiristu, naye Imwana katseika mwenyegho hasi he Imulungu, ili Imulungu yatawale ghendo chila chinu chila hanu.
Lelo ka kuduhu kutsilihuka, watsotendatse awala iwabatitsighwe kwaajili ye iwanu iwafile? Ka iwafile ng'awotsilihuka bae, ule iwanu wobatisighwa kwaajili yawo?
Na twetwe, ebali twehonza chila saa?
Wandughu, noulapfa ughima wangu chila litsuwa, neghoda kwaajili yenu mna ukwilunga na Yesu Kiristu Imtwatsa wetu.
Ka ukwitowa kwangu ne iwanu iwakalile ka iwanyama wane usongo akula Efeso tsanitowa kwa mbuli tse chimunu, angu nipatile choni? Lekeni iwanu iwafile ka ng'awotsilihulighwa bae, leka, “Tuje na tunwe kwaapfila ilupfi twakufa.”
Mleke kughutsukighwa. “Usale wihile wohinya chitsowelo chinoghile.”
Mlamke lelo! Mleke kutenda nzambi, kwaapfila kuna iwanu wamwenga mghati mwenu ng'awammanyile ghendo Imulungu, chinyala kuna mwemwe kwa ghano ghanongile.
Lekeni munu kodaha kughutsa, “Apfi iwanu wotsilihukatse? Watsokuwa na lukuli lwachi?”
Mleke kuwa wabotsi! Imbeghu yuhanda ng'aikota bae mbaka ife tanu.
Hauhanda, kohanda imbeghu iliheka, iwe ya uhemba au ya mitama au mbeghu tsingi, ng'uhanda mbiki wose iulawila hambele.
Lekeni Imulungu koing'a mbeghu ayo lumbo ka pfoyobama na chila mbeghu ina lumbo lyake.
Ng'uli tse pfilumbe ng'atsighala bae. Iwanu wana lukuli lwawo na iwanyama wana lukuli lwawo, wapfideghe wana lukuli lwawo na iwasomba wana lukuli lwawo.
Kuya kuna ng'uli tsa kulanga na tsa muisi, ukunogha kwe ng'uli tsa kulanga ng'akwighala ne ukunogha kwe ng'uli tsa muisi.
Litsua lina ukunogha kwake na lwetsi luna ukunogha kwake na tsinondo tsina ukunogha kwake, na hata tsinondo natso ng'atsighala bae mna ukunogha.
Apfi pfipfo pfaitsakuwa hawatsotsilihuka iwanu. Ka pfaili imbeghu, lukuli lotsikighwa aku lwola, lekeni lwotsilihuka aku lughima.
Lwotsikighwa mna chinyala, lotsilihuka mna utunitso, lwotsikighwa aku lwahela ngupfu lwotsilihuka aku luna ngupfu.
Haulutsikighwa, lwotsikighwa lukuli lwa chimunu, kuya lwotsilihuka lukuli lwe chimuhe. Ka hana lukuli lwa chimunu, pfipfila hana lukuli lwa chimuhe.
Mana Ghamaandiko gholonga, “Imunu we mwanduso, Adamu, tsakawa imunu mghima,” lekeni Adamu wa usighilo iyo Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka iyoweng'a iwanu ughima.
Si lukuli lwa ghumuhe bae iulongola, ila lukuli lwa chimunu, kuya lukuli lwa chimuhe.
Adamu wa mwanduso tsakalawa mne timbwisi lye isi, Adamu wa keli tsakalawa kulanga.
Awala we iisi weghala na ayula iyalawile muisi, na awala we kulanga weghala na ayula iyalawile kulanga.
Ka pfatwighalile na ayula yalumbighwe na lidongo, pfipfila twitseghala na ayula yalawile kulanga.
Ndughu tsangu chonilonga hano chicho chino, lukuli lwe imunu ng'aludaha bae kuhala Undewa we Imulungu, wala aghala ighohinyika ng'aghodaha bae kuleka ukuhinyika.
Tegheletseni, nowalongelelani mbuli; wose ng'atutsokufa bae, ila wose tutsoghaluka,
malati haitsolila, baho, iwanu iwafile watsotsilihulighwa aku ng'uli tsawo ng'atsolile bae, kuya na twetwe ng'atutsakufa ila tutsoghaluka.
Mana aghala ighohinyika ghobamighwa ghaghaluke ghawe ing'aghohinyika bae, lukuli ulukufa lughaluke luleke kufa.
Apfo lukuli luno iluhinyika halutsoghaluka luleke kuhinyika, na achila ichikufa hachitsoghaluka chileke kufa, baho ghatsotimila Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka igholonga, “Lifwa likomighwa, ukuhuma kutimila!”
Ghwe lifwa kulikwani ukuhuma kwako? Ghwe lifwa ulikwani usungu wako?
Lifwa lyopata ngupfu yo ukulagha kulawa mnzambi, na nzambi yopata ngupfu mne Ghamalaghitso gha Musa.
Lekeni mighede kwe Imulungu iyotutenda tuhume kubitila Imtwatsa wetu Yesu Kiristu.
Apfo ndughu tsangu mwime ghoya, mleke kuhighisika. Matsuwa ghose mghendelele ghendo kusang'ana ing'onde ye Imtwatsa, kwaapfila mmanye isang'ano yamsang'ana mghati mwa Imtwatsa ng'aikwagha hela bae.
Lelo nonge imbuli yokuwasangila iwanu we Imulungu, mtende achila chanighalongele makingili ghe iwanu we Imulungu gha Wagalatiya.
Chila jumapili, chila munu mghati mwenu yabaghule sendi iilawa mna achila choyobokela, kuya yeke ili hanikutsa ndeke kubama msango keli.
Kuya hanipfika kuna mwemwe nitsowatuma awala yamuwasaghula waghale ibaluwa na msango wenu Yerusalemu.
Ka pfinogha na nene kughenda ako, watselongotsa na nene.
Hanitsobita kughenda Makedoniya, tanu nitsakutsa kuna mwemwe, mana nobama kughenda Makedoniya.
Nodaha kukala na mwemwe chidogho, au kukala namwe matsuwa ghose gha chipfeghetsi, ili mnyapfile mna ghumwanza wangu kokose konighenda.
Sibama bae kwibona na mwemwe kwa kubita kuliheka, nobama nikale namwe chidogho Imtwatsa ang'abama.
Lekeni nitsokala hano Efeso mbaka litsuwa lya Pentekoste,
kwaapfila libani lya mwatsi kwa sang'ano yangu ng'ulu hano, hata ka kuna iwanu wengi iwobela ghanilonga.
Timoteo ang'atsa mumtende aleke kwalangula chinu chochose hayatsokala na mwemwe, kwaapfila yeye kosang'ana ing'onde ye Imtwatsa ka nene.
Apfo imunu wowose yaleke kumbetsa, ila mwapfileni yaghendelele tseghamba na ghumwanza wake ili yadahe kumbuyila. Mana nomlolela yoye ne iwanu wangi.
Lelo nonge mbuli ya ndughu yetu Apolo, tsanimkomangitsa yamwangileni hamwe na iwandughu wangi. Lekeni ng'obama bae kutsa sambi, lekeni katsakutsa hayatsopata uleghelo.
Mkale meso, mwikindilise mne ukutoghola, mwime chilume na muwe iwanu wane ngupfu.
Msang'ane ghose kwa kwinoghela.
Mwommanya Stefana na iwanu wa mkaye mwake, wawo tsawalongola kuwa wakiristu ako Akaya, kuya tsawelapfa wenyegho kuwasang'anila iwanu we Imulungu. Apfo ndughu tsangu nowalomba,
muwategheletse iwanu ka awo na chila imunu iyosang'ana nawo.
Tsandeng'ela hawatsile Stefana na Fotonata na Akaiko, kwaapfila tsawamemesa achila ichihunguke kuna mwemwe.
Mana tsawadeng'eletsa ghumoyo ghwangu ka pfawamdeng'eletseni mwemwe. Iwanu awo pfinogha wang'akumbukighwa.
Makingili ghe iwanu we Imulungu gha Asiya ghomlamsani. Akila na Pilisila ne iwanu wose iwotingana mkaye mwawo womlamsani kwa taghwa lye Imtwatsa.
Wandughu wose iwali hano womlamsani. Mwilamse kwa kulangusa unoghelo wa Kiristu.
Nene, Pauli nowalamsani, nakwandika kwa ghumoko ghwangu mwenyegho.
Imunu wowose iyolema kumnoghela Imtwatsa, ayo yalighitwe. Utse ghwe Imtwatsa wetu.
Uluso we Imtwatsa Yesu ukale namwe.
Unoghelo wangu ukale na mwemwe wose yamli mghati mwa Kiristu Yesu.
Nene Pauli, mtumighwa wa Yesu Kiristu kwa unoghelo we Imulungu, hamwe na ndughu yetu Timoteo twomlamsani. Twomwandikilani mwemwe kingili lye iwanu we Imulungu lyose ilili Kolinto, na iwanu wose we Imulungu iwali muisi yose ya Akaya.
Nomlomba Imulungu Aba wetu na Imtwatsa wetu Yesu Kiristu yawatendele uluso na yamwikeni tseghamba.
Yatunyighwe Imulungu, Aba wa Imtwatsa wetu Yesu Kiristu, Aba wa libatsi na Imulungu iyokanza ghendo.
Imulungu kotukanza mna ghamaghayo ghose, ili tuwakanze awala iwali mne maghayo ghoghose ka Imulungu pfayotukanza twetwe.
Ka ghamaghayo gha Yesu pfaghokongetseka mghati mwetu, pfipfo pfatughendelela kukanzighwa na Kiristu.
Tung'aghanzika, twoghanzika ili mwemwe mwapfilighwe na mkombolighwe. Tung'akanzighwa, namwe pfipfila mwokanzighwa na mwakwing'ighwa ngupfu mdudumile maghayo ghaghano ghatududumila.
Lolelo lyatuli nalyo kuna mwemwe kulu sideke, kwaapfila twomanya ghendo mwoghaya na pfipfila mwokanzighwa ka twetwe pfatukanzighwa.
Ng'atubama bae mwemwe mleke kumanya maghayo ghatupatile muisi ya Asiya. Ghamaghayo agho tsaghabita ngupfu tsetu mbaka tsatupfikitsa ng'atuhona bae.
Lekeni mne imimoyo yetu tsatupfikitsa ka tuighighwa kufa. Ilawila apfo ili tuleke kwihuhila wenyegho, ila tumuhuhile Imulungu iyowatsilihula iwanu iwafile.
Tsakatukombola mne ghamaghayo ing'aghadahile kutukoma, naye katsotukombola. Na twetwe twomlolela yeye ka katsoghendelela kutukombola.
Mwemwe mng'atwapfila kwa kutulombela. Ukutulombela kwenu ng'ani kutsakwidikighwa, na Imulungu katsotubaliki, kuya iwanu wengi watsolonga mighede kwe Imulungu kwaajili ya twetwe.
Twetwe tweghodela chinu chimwe, mimoyo yetu yotulangusa ka kukala kwetu muisi amu, hasa na mwemwe, tukala kwa uhenzeluka na ghumoyo ghunoghile ghwatwing'ighwe ne Imulungu. Ng'atulongotsighwe ne tsimbutsi tse iwanu bae, ila twolongotsighwa ne uluso we Imulungu.
Mana ng'atukwandika bae chinu chochose mwemwe chang'amdaha bae kuchisoma au kuchimanya. Nololela mtsomanya pfinoghile ghendo,
hata ka mbaka sambi mwomanya chidogho, hambele mtsomanya ghendo na mtseghoda kwaajili ya twetwe, ka twetwe pfatwitseghoda kwaajili ya mwemwe mne litsuwa lya Imtwatsa wetu Yesu.
Aku ng'ala nololela agho. tsambama ghendo tanu kumwangilani mwemwe, ili mbwede lwakeli.
Tsambama kumwangilani hanibita kughenda Makedoniya na kuya kuna mwemwe hanilawa Makedoniya, ili mnyapfile mne ghumwanza wangu kughenda Yudeya.
Pfii hanibamile kutenda apfi, tsanikala chigeugeu? Ebu ghanitenda notenda kwa mbutsi tse chimunu, na hanilonga, “Ona, ona” na hanilonga, “Bae, bae”?
Lekeni ka Imulungu pfoyotogholighwa, usenga wetu kuna mwemwe si mbuli ya kulonga “Ona” na “Bae”, chipindi chicho.
Kwaapfila Kiristu Yesu, Imwana we Imulungu, yapetelighwe kuna mwemwe na Silivani na Timoteo na nene mwenyegho ng'awile “Ona” na “Bae.” Lekeni mna yeye kuna “Ona” iliyeka matsuwa ghose,
kwaapfila chila chinu Imulungu chayalaghane kubitila Yesu chakuwa “Ona,” mna Kiristu. Apfo “Amina” yetu yolongighwa kubitila yeye, kwa utunitso we Imulungu.
Lelo iyotutenda twetwe na mwemwe twime pfinoghile mna Kiristu, na iyatusaghule, iyo Imulungu mwenyegho,
naye katughela ichitango ichilangusa ka twetwe twawakwake, na katwing'a Muhe wake mna imimoyo yetu yaghwe tsamana kwa aghala ghose ighotutsila.
Imulungu iyo mkalangama wangu yeye kaghumanya ghumoyo wangu! Nene sitsile keli bae Kolinto kwa kuwonelani mwemwe libatsi.
Ng'atubama kuwananahitsa mne ukutoghola kwenu, twetwe twomanya mwemwe mwima pfinoghile mne ukutoghola, lekeni twosang'ana hamwe na mwemwe kwa ndeng'elelo yenu.
Apfo nilamla ndeke kumwangilani keli na kuwaghuma usungu.
Ning'awaghuma usungu, nani lelo yatsonenda ndeng'elele? Ng'ambe wawala niwaghumile usungu!
Niwandikilani mbuli ayo ili hanikutsa ndeke kughumighwa usungu na awala iwabamighwe kunitenda ndeng'elele. Nomanya ghendo nene ning'adeng'elela, namwe wose mtsodeng'elela pfipfila.
Niwandikilani kwa usungu mkulu aku nisusuwala na masotsi ghondawa, sibamile bae kuwaghuma usungu, lekeni kuwatenda mmanye pfaniwanoghela sideke.
Imunu wowose ang'amghuma imunu usungu, ng'anighumile nene niliheka bae, ila kawaghuma usungu mwemwe wose, nene sibama niwe mkali ng'ani.
Kubaghulighwa kwayabaghulighwe imunu ayo ne iwanu wengi kumkolela.
Namwe mwobamighwa mumleghusile totso lyake na mumghume ghumoyo ili aleke kona usungu sideke, na aleke kuya kuchughu ghendo.
Apfo nowalomba, mumlanguse ka mwemwe mwomnoghela ghendo.
Tsaniwandikilani ibaluwa ila kwaapfila tsambama kumanya ka mwodaha kunitegheletsa mna chila chinu chanilonga.
Mng'amleghusila imunu totso lyake, nene pfipfila nomleghusila totso lyake. Kwaapfila ning'amleghusila imunu totso lyake, nimleghusila hambele he Kiristu kwaajili ya mwemwe
ili tuleke kumleka Setani yatubughe, kwaapfila twomanya chayobama kutenda.
Lelo hanipfikile Tirowa kupeta Imbuli Inoghile ya Kiristu, Imtwatsa kangoloselela inzila nisang'ane ng'onde yake.
Lekeni tsanighaya mmoyo mwangu kwaapfila simpfikile bae ndughu yangu Tito, apfo niwaagha iwanu ng'enda Makedoniya.
Lekeni mighede kwe Imulungu iyotutenda tuhume ghamatsuwa ghose kubitila Kiristu, na kubitila twetwe itukwenetsa imbuli ye ukummanya Kiristu chila hanu hatumsang'anila ka nung'o inoghile.
Kwaapfila hambele he Imulungu, twetwe twa nung'o inoghile ya Kiristu kwa awala iwokombolighwa na kwa awala iwakwagha.
Kwa awala iwakwagha, twetwe twa nung'o iighala lifwa, na kwa wamwenga iwokombolighwa twetwe twa nung'o iighala ughima, lelo yuhi yodaha ing'onde ayo?
Twetwe si ka iwanu wamwenga bae iwochuhutsa Imbuli ye Imulungu, lekeni mghati mwa Kiristu twetwe twa iwanu iwolongesa hambele he Imulungu, ka iwanu iwatumighwe ne Imulungu.
Angu twakwandutsa keli kwitunya iwenyegho? Au twobama baluwa itsitutoghola kutsa kuna mwemwe, au baluwa tso ukutoghola kulawa kuna mwemwe, ka iwanu wangi pfawotenda?
Mwemwe muwenyegho mwa ibaluwa yetu, iyandikighwe mmimoyo mwetu, yomanyika na yosomighwa na chila imunu.
Pfimanyika ka mwemwe mwa baluwa ya Kiristu, iilawile mne sang'ano yetu, ayo ng'ayandikighwe bae kwa lwino ila kwa Ghumuhe we Imulungu iyali mghima, na si mne lwala lwe libwe bae, ila mne imimoyo ye iwanu.
Na lolelo alyo tunalyo hambele he Imulungu kubitila Kiristu.
Kuduhu ichinu chochose ichitutenda tulonge ka twodaha kusang'ana ng'onde ino, lekeni ukudaha kwetu kolawa kwe Imulungu.
Ayo iyo yuyo iyatutendile tudahe kutumikila laghano lya sambi, na si laghano lya ghamalaghitso bae, ila laghano lya Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka. Mana ghamalaghitso ighandikighwe ghoghala lifwa, ila Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka koghala ughima.
Lelo ka ghamalaghitso ighaghalile lifwa, ghala ighandikighwe mne ghamabwe ghatsa na utunitso, mbaka Waisiraeli ng'awadahile bae kuchilola chihanga cha Musa kwaajili ya ukung'ala kwake, nawo tsaukala utunitso iuhupa,
pfii lelo sang'ano ya Ghumuhe ng'aitsokuwa ya utunitso mkulu bae?
Ka isang'ano iiwahigha iwanu tsaikala na utunitso mkulu, apfi isang'ano iighala ughima si ng'ulu bae kubita ayo?
Lelo utunitso mkulu ghendo ughubika utunitso ula wo ghumwande, hata ka utunitso awo tsawoneka mkulu, lekeni sambi uhupa.
Mana ka achila ichikalile chidogho tsachikala na utunitso, pfii lelo achila ichikala ghamatsuwa ghose, ambe chitsakuwa na utunitso mkulu ghendo!
Kwaapfila tuna lolelo alyo, twolonga bila kupfuka.
Twetwe si ka Musa bae, iyaghubike chihanga chake kwa lighwanda ili iwanu wa Isiraeli waleke kona ukumala kwe ukung'ala kula.
Lekeni tsimbutsi tsao tsatsighubikighwa. Kwaapfila mbaka leloli halisomighwa laghano lya ghumwande chighubiko acho chabaho chighubika mbutsi tsawo. Cholapfighwa hala imunu ang'amtoghola Kiristu.
Hata leloli hawosoma Malaghitso gha Musa, chighubiko choghubika mbutsi tsao.
Lekeni chighubiko acho cholapfighwa ahala imunu ang'amuyila Imtwatsa.
Lelo Imtwatsa ka Ghumuhe, na hane Ghumuhe we Imtwatsa, hana ukulekelighwa.
Lekeni twetwe wose tune pfihanga ing'apfighubikwe bae, twakona ka mne chilolelo utunitso we Imtwatsa, na twetwe twotendighwa twighale naye kwa kongetseka mne utunitso iulawa kwe Imtwatsa, ayo iyo Ghumuhe.
Kwa libatsi lyake Imulungu katwing'a isang'ano ino, apfo ng'atukuya kuchughu bae.
Lekeni tupfileka pfinu pfose pfa chinyala na pfa chinyelenyele. Ng'atukala bae kwa ukubugha na ng'atughela ughutsu bae mne mbuli ye Imulungu, ila kwa kuulangusa ukweli, tweika hasi mwe malamutsi ghe mimoyo ye iwanu hambele he Imulungu.
Hata ka imbuli inoghile yotuwapetela ipfisika, ipfisika kwa awala iwakwagha waliheka.
Hawo ng'awotoghola bae kwaapfila imulungu yehile we isi ino katsighuma ichisi tsimbutsi tsawo waleke kuwona ghumwanga we Imbuli Inoghile ye utunitso wa Kiristu, iyeghalile ghendo ne Imulungu.
Kwaapfila ng'atwipeta bae iwenyegho, ila twompeta Yesu Kiristu ka Imtwatsa, na twetwe iwenyegho ka watumwa wenu kwaajili ya Yesu.
Imulungu yuyula iyalongile, “Ghumwanga ghulangatse kulawa mchisi,” iyo yuyo iyoilangatsa imimoyo yetu, na kutwing'a ghumwanga wo ukumanya utunitso we Imulungu iulang'atsa mchihanga mwa Yesu Kiristu.
Lekeni twetwe ituli na hatsina lino tweghala na ipfiha pfa lidongo, ili yoneke ka ingupfu ayo ng'ulu yolawa kwe Imulungu, wala ng'ailawa kuna twetwe bae.
Twokandamitsighwa chila ubali, lekeni ng'atuhondeka bae, twopfuka lekeni ng'atukuya kuchughu,
twoghanzika, lekeni twokwapfilighwa, twokwasighwa hasi, lekeni ng'atulaghighwa bae.
Matsuwa ghose twosola lifwa lya Yesu mlukuli mwetu, ili ughima wa Yesu pfipfila woneka mne ng'uli tsetu.
Mana twetwe yatuli waghima, ghamatsuwa ghose twolapfighwa tufe kwaajili ya Yesu ili ughima wake woneke mne ng'uli tsetu itsikufa.
Apfo lifwa lyosang'ana mghati mwetu, lekeni ughima wosang'ana mghati mwenu.
Ghamaandiko Maenzeluka gholonga, “Tsanitoghola, ndo mana tsanilonga.” Na twetwe pfipfila kwa muhe uhula wa ukutoghola, twotoghola na twolonga.
Kwaapfila twomanya ghendo Imulungu iyamtsilihule Imtwatsa Yesu, pfipfila katsotutsilihula twetwe na Yesu, na kutwika hamwe namwe hambele hake.
Kwaapfila agha ghose ghatendeka kwaajili ya mwemwe, ili uluso we Imulungu hauwapfikila iwanu wengi ng'ani, utsowatenda iwanu walonge mighede na ukumtunya Imulungu kwongetseke.
Apfo ng'atukuya kuchughu bae, hata ka ng'uli tsetu tsolala, lekeni mghati muhe tsetu tsotendighwa tsa sambi chila litsuwa.
Kwaapfila ghamaghayo ghatughaya mabewe na ghokala chidogho, lekeni ghatsotwing'a utunitso wa ghamatsuwa ghose iukongetseka ng'ani.
Apfo tuleke kulola ng'ani aghala ighakoneka, ila tulole aghala ing'aghakoneka bae. Kwaapfila aghala ighakoneka ng'aghokala bae, lekeni aghala ing'aghakoneka ghokala ghamatsuwa ghose.
Kwaapfila lelo twomanya ka chibumbulika chotukala hano muisi ching'ahinyika, Imulungu katsotwing'a ing'anda ingi kulanga, ing'anda ya ghamatsuwa ghose ing'aitsengighwe bae kwa ghamoko ghe iwanu.
Kwaapfila sambi twoghutilila, aku twololela kwa kusulukila ghendo ukupata lukuli lwa kulanga,
kwaapfila hatutsopata lukuli lwa kulanga, ng'atutsakoneka twahela lukuli bae.
Hatung'ali twokala mne chibumbulika chino che isi twoghutilila na kuhondighwa, ng'atubama bae kulutsula lukuli luno ulukufa, ila twobama kupfatsighwa lukuli ing'alukufa bae, ili achila ichikufa chighalusighwe ghendo chiwe na ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose.
Imulungu imwenyegho iyo yatutendile pfinu apfo, naye katwing'a Ghumuhe wake yawe nzamana kwa aghala ghose ghayatwikile.
Apfo ghamatsuwa ghose twoghumighwa ghumoyo na twomanya ghendo tung'akala mna lukuli luno luliheka, twokala kutali na ukaye yetu kwe Imtwatsa.
Twokala kwa inoghola, na si kwa aghala ghatukona bae.
Lekeni tughumighwa ghumoyo na twobama kukala kutali na lukuli, tukale hamwe ne Imtwatsa.
Lekeni chinu chikulu ghendo, twobama kumdeng'eletsa, tung'awa hano muisi au tung'awa hako.
Kwaapfila twetwe wose twobamighwa twime hambele he Kiristu, tuhighighwe naye, na chila imunu katsobokela achila chayobamighwa kubokela kwa aghala ghayatendile hayakalile muisi, ghawe ghanogha au gheha.
Kwaapfila twomanya kumpfuka Imtwatsa chinu chachi, apfo twotenda ka pfatudaha wakwegha iwanu. Imulungu kotumanya pfinoghile, nani nololela mwemwe pfipfila mwotumanya pfinoghile mne imimoyo yenu.
Ng'atubama bae kwitunya keli hambele henu. Lekeni twomwing'ani nyafasi ye ukwighoda kwaajili ya twetwe ili mdahe kuwedika awala iweghodela ighakoneka ne tsinenge kubita aghala ighali mmoyo.
Hata ka twakoneka tuna lukwale, tuna lukwale kwaajili ye Imulungu na mbutsi tsetu tsinogha kwaajili ya mwemwe.
Mana unoghelo wa Kiristu wotulongotsa, sambi twotanga ka imunu yumwe tsakafa kwaajili ya wose, apfo wose tufa hamwe naye.
Yeye tsakafa kwaajili ya wose, ili awala iwali waghima waleke kukala kwaajili yawo wenyegho, ila kwaajili ya yeye iyafile kwaajili yawo na iyatsilihulighwe.
Apfo kulawa sambi na kughendelela ng'atummanya bae imunu kwa kumlolesa. Hata ka tsatummanya Yesu Kiristu kwa kumlolesa, lekeni sambi ng'atutenda apfo keli.
Apfo, imunu ang'awa mghati mwa Kiristu, ayo ka chilumbe cha sambi, ghumwande ghahupa, ghawa gha sambi.
Agha ghose ghalawa kwe Imulungu iyatulamlitse twetwe naye imwenyegho kubitila Kiristu na kutwing'a ing'onde yo ukuwalamlitsa iwanu ne Imulungu.
Imulungu tsakakala mghati mwa Kiristu tsakailamlitsa iisi na yeye, bila ukupeta nzambi tse iwanu. Naye katwing'a usenga wo ukuwalamlitsa iwanu.
Apfo twetwe twosang'ana ka iwanu iwatumighwe ne Kiristu, twolonga ka Imulungu mwenyegho iyolonga kubitila twetwe. Kuya twetwe twomlombani ghendo, mwilamlitse ne Imulungu.
Kiristu tsang'akalile na nzambi bae, lekeni Imulungu kamtenda yabape nzambi tsetu, ili twetwe kwa kwilunga naye, tudahe kuwa iwanu wanoghile hambele he Imulungu.
Mne sang'ano yetu ne Imulungu, twomlombani mleke kuuleka uluso we Imulungu wambokele waghe hela.
Mana Imulungu kolonga, “Mne chipindi cha libatsi lyangu tsaniwahulika, mne litsuwa lya ukukombola tsanimwapfilani.” Nowalongelani, sambi chicho chipindi cha libatsi lye Imulungu, leloli ilo litsuwa lya ukukombolighwa!
Ili sang'ano yetu ileke kwoneka si chinu bae, ng'atubama kumwikila imunu wowose chikwatso,
ila kwa chila chinu chatusang'ana twelangusa twetwe twa iwatumighwa we Imulungu kwa ukududumila ukughanzika na maghayo ghose.
Tsatutwowighwa, twohighwa, tutwowighwa ne iwanu, tusang'ana sang'ano ng'omu, ng'atuwasile bae, tukala ne nzala.
Tsatwilangusa ka twa iwatumwa we Imulungu kwa kukala kwa ukudegheta, kwa ukumanya, kwa ukududumila, kwa ghumoyo ghunoghile na kwa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka na kwa unoghelo ulihela ung'enye,
na kwa usenga wetu iulongesa na kwa ngupfu ye Imulungu. Haki iyo isilaha yetu mne ghumoko ghwe kujilo na ghumoko ghwe kumoso.
Twiyandaa ukutogholighwa na ukubetsighwa, ukulongighwa na ukutunyighwa. Twakoneka ka waghutsu, lekeni twolongesa,
ka iwanu ing'awomanyika, lekeni twomanyika na wose, tutowighwa lekeni ng'atukomighwe bae, ka iwanu iwafile, lekeni ka pfamkona twetwe twa waghima ghendo.
Hata ka tuna usungu, lekeni ghamatsuwa ghose twodeng'elela, hata ka twakoneka ka wahingwa, ila twoweng'a mali iwanu wengi, hata ka twakoneka twahela chinu, lekeni tuna chila chinu.
Mwemwe ndughu tsetu Wakolinto, tsatuwalongelani ghose mwatsimwatsi na imimoyo yetu ipfughuka kuna mwemwe.
Si twetwe bae yatuhindile imimoyo yetu kuna mwemwe, ila mwemwe iwo yamuhindile imimoyo yenu kuna twetwe.
Lelo nolonga namwe ka wanangu, mfughule imimoyo ka twetwe pfatutendile.
Mleke kwilunga ne iwanu wala ing'awomtoghola bae Imulungu, angu ghanoghile na ghehile ghodaha kukala hamwe? Ghumwanga na ichisi pfidahatse kukala hamwe?
Apfi Kiristu na Setani wetegheletsa? Lelo imunu iyomtoghola Kiristu na ing'ayomtoghola Kiristu wana usale wachi?
Apfi Ing'anda ye Imulungu ina usale wachi ne ipfinyagho ipfitamanilighwa? Kwaapfila twetwe twa ing'anda ye Imulungu iyali mghima, ka Imulungu mwenyegho pfayalongile, “Nitsokala nawo na kwanga mghati mwao, nitsakuwa Imulungu wao, nawo watsakuwa iwanu wangu.”
Kuya Imtwatsa kolonga, “Mlawe mna wawo mwibaghule nawo. Mleke kukinda chinu chihile, na nene nitsowabokela.
Imtwatsa yane Ngupfu kolonga, nene nitsakuwa Aba wenu, namwe mtsakuwa wanangu wamale na wapinga.”
Sale tsangu, kwaapfila tunagho malaghano. Apfo twideghete kulawa mna ghose ighoutenda ghumuhe na lukuli wihe, tuwe wenzeluka ghendo kwa kumpfuka Imulungu.
Twing'eni uleghelo mna imimoyo yenu. ng'atumtotsele imunu wowose, ng'atumlaghile imunu wala ng'atumghutsukile imunu wowose bae.
Silonga agha bae kwa kuwahighani mwemwe, ka pfanongole kulonga, mwemwe mwamghati mwe imimoyo yetu, hatukufa au hatukala waghima.
Nene nowatogholani, neghoda kwaajili ya mwemwe! Mne ghamaghayo ghetu ghose noghumighwa ghumoyo na nodeng'elela sideke.
Kwaapfila hata hatupfikile Makedoniya, ng'atubwihile bae. Tsatupata maghayo chila hanu, kunze ughobo, mne imimoyo ukupfuka.
Lekeni Imulungu iyowakanza iwabeneke ghumoyo, tsakatukanza hayatsile Tito.
Wala si kwa kutsa kwake kuliheka bae, ila pfipfila tsakatulongela pfamumkanzile yeye. Tsakatulongela pfambama ghendo kumbona, pfamli na usungu mkulu kwa aghala ighalawile na pfambama kunyamila, apfo nodeng'elela sideke.
Hata ka niwaghuma usungu kwe baluwa ila, nene sijuta bae. Hata ka ning'ajutile, nakona ibaluwa ayo imwing'ani usungu lekeni kwa chipindi chidodo.
Lekeni sambi nodeng'elela, si kwaapfila tsaniwaghuma usungu, lekeni kwaapfila usungu wenu uwatenda mwemwe mghaluke na kuleka nzambi. Kwaapfila tsamwona usungu ka pfayabamile Imulungu, apfo twetwe ng'atuwalaghileni bae.
Usungu iughalighwa ne Imulungu woghalusa ghumoyo, na kughala ukombotsi ulihela majuto. Lekeni usungu we chimunu womghala imunu mlifwa.
Lelo mlole usungu iughalighwe ne Imulungu chautendile kuna mwemwe, mwemwe sambi muwa iwanu we ibidii, pfambama kulangusa mimoyo yenu pfainoghile, mwakwiduka na kwalangula, pfomninoghela kumbona na pfamwilapfa mwobama kona ihaki yotendeka. Mwemwe mlangusa ghendo ka mwahela totso mne chinu chino.
Apfo hata ka nyandika ibaluwa ila si kwaajili ya yula yatotsile au yula yatotselighwe, ila nyandika apfo ili kumwikileni mwatsi hambele he Imulungu ili mwone pfamwilapfa kwaajili ya twetwe.
Apfo tughumighwa ghumoyo. Si ka tughumighwa ghumoyo ghuliheka, ila Tito tsakatudeng'eletsa ghendo kwa ndeng'elelo ng'ulu yakalile nayo kwa pfamumtendile yasangalale.
Nene tsanighoda hambele hake kwaajili yenu namwe ng'amnighumile chinyala bae. Lekeni chila chinu chatuwalongele tsatulongesa, na kuwaghodelani mwemwe hambele ha Tito tsachikala chinu cha kulongesa.
Unoghelo wake kuna mwemwe mkulu sideke, hayokumbuka pfamtegheletse, pfamumbokele kwa kupfuka na kudedema.
Nodeng'elela ng'ani kwaapfila nodaha kuwahuwila mwemwe ghendo.
Ndughu tsangu, twobama kuwalongela uluso we Imulungu waweng'ighwe iwanu we Imulungu wa Makedoniya.
